[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde sa bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D301}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a b+hi niSh+k+ra maN sU tra/_bod skad du/_mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig nyid kyi 
[\[1b.2\]]dbu ni rin chen 'od ldan dang /_/btsun mo pad ma kha bye ma rnyis mdangs ldan pas/_/slong ba dga' mdzad sangs rgyas go 'phang brnyes gyur cing /_/chos rnams ston mdzad zhi ba de la 
[\[1b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig rnyed pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs las 'das gyur cing /_/srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad zad byed zhir gyur la/_/sdug bsngal mtha' med 'khor ba'i rgya 
[\[1b.4\]]mtsho las rgal ba'i/_/zam pa gcig pu bde gshegs chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang la yon tan phul byung la gnas sbyin pa'i gnas/_/mchod pa cung zad byas kyang rgya che nyid 
[\[1b.5\]]'gyur ba/_/bde bar gshegs pas rab bsngags gang zag mchog brgyad kyis/_/rab brgyan 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thub gsung rnam par brtags na 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]dad pa mi skyed pa'am/_/phan pa mi 'byung gang de ci yang yod min la/_/tshig btu ba dang 'dzin pa'i nus dang rnam bral ba/_/rnam par g.yengs phyir 'bras rtsol 'di bdag nyung zad cig_/ji ltar pad ma kha bye'i dbus gnas bung ba ni/_/'khor zhing pad 
[\[2a.2\]]ma la ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]sogs par byed/_/de bzhin thub pa'i zhal gyi pad ma'i tshal nang nas/_/rang yid rab tu dga' byed [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bsdu bar bya/_/thub pa'i gsung ni ma lus shin tu rtogs dka' ba/_/dad ldan mi la nyin re'ang rgyas par nyer 'gro ste/_/rnam par dpyad 
[\[2a.3\]]na tshigs bcad phyed mtha'ang mi dpogs na/_/rin chen mdo brgya bsdu ba 'di ni smos ci dgos/_/phyogs go rnams su snyan dang grags pa'i snang bas khyab/_/rab gsal zhes bya sa yi bdag por gyur pa na/_/bsod nams stobs kyis dgra las rgyal bas rgyal phran gyis/_/
[\[2a.4\]]btud pas nor bu'i cod pan 'od kyis zhal gtsang byas/_/glang po'i dbang po rgyags 'khrig 'dod chags kyis chags pa/_/'phral du bcos pa'i thabs med nyon mongs skabs gyur la/_/gzigs nas 'gro ba'i chags sogs nyes pa zhi bzhed pas/_/thugs brtan 
[\[2a.5\]]thub dbang gyur par des ni smon lam btab/_/de nas brtsams te sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan mi g.yo blo gros rnon po rnams/_/nyid bde'i ltos med shin tu yun ring yang dag spel/_/'gro la phan phyir shin tu dka' ba brgya phrag 
[\[2a.6\]]mdzad/_/thugs rje cher ldan drang srong mchog 'di tshe gzhan du/_/nyid kyis 'gro phan don mdzad mi skyo ji snyed de/_/brjod par 'di na shA ri'i bus kyang mi nus na'ang /_/gang dag phyir ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yongs su brjod par bya/_/stag mo shi bi glang po spre'u dka' thub 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]dbang /_/tshangs sogs sku tshe brgya phrag du mar dge mdzad nas/_/don kun sgrub brtson bdag nyid chen po tshe gcig thogs/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas su skye ba bzhes/_/der bzhugs nas ni 'gro ba kun la legs gzigs nas/_/skyabs med g.yo zhing 
[\[2b.2\]]phongs pa du mas yongs khyab la/_/thugs rje chen pos thugs ni spro ba bskyed gyur te/_/gzhan gyi don mdzad thugs dam nyid kyi rgyud dgongs gyur/_/de bas 'di ni ji ltar mi yul nyer gshegs te/_/skye dang rga shi na ba'i 'jigs pa gzigs nas ni/_/rab byung blo gros des mdzad 
[\[2b.3\]]byang chub yang dag brnyes/_/de bzhin chos ston mdzad pa bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/_/de nas dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa mang por bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rnam pa du mar nye bar bsags pas byang chub 
[\[2b.4\]]kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/_nyon mongs pa'i chu bo stobs dang ldan pas shin tu chod pa rnams la thugs rjes yongs su bskul ba/_gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir rtag tu brtson par mdzad pa de thugs la dgongs pa 'di lta bu mngon sum du mdzad de/_gang ngas skye ba mang por 
[\[2b.5\]]yongs su 'khor ba na rang gi sha dang khrag dang mgo dang mig dang bu dang chung ma rnams gtong ba dang shin tu gtong bas yongs su btang ba dang /_dka' ba'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang /_gzhan gyis sbyar ba'i bsnyen bkur ma yin pa sna tshogs pa bzod par byas pa dang /_rtag tu lhod pa med 
[\[2b.6\]]pa'i spro ba dang /_'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la ma chags pa dang /_yod pa dang med pa'i don la rnam par dpyod pa dang ldan pas gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i blo gros kyis shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnam pa mang pos sems la gdungs pa'i sdug phongs 
[\[2b.7\]]pa'i srog chags rnams la mchog tu snying rje bskyed nas byams pa'i stobs dang /_zla 'od dang shi bi dang glang po dang thams cad sgrol dang bzod par smra ba dang spre'u'i bdag po dang mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang sman chen po la sogs pa skyes pa'i rabs stong phrag snyed tu smon lam byas shing bsags pa/_e ma'o kye 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]ma bdag gis 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/_yongs su 'dren pa med pa/_chos ma yin pa/_'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro ba/_log pa'i chos kyis yongs su khyab pa/_sems la mi bzad pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa/_khro ba mang ba/_lta ba ngan pa'i 
[\[3a.2\]]tshang tshing gis rnam par brlag pa/_phrag dog dang ser snas kun tu bcings pa/_legs par spyod pa la 'jug pa la rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyes par spyod pa la kun tu gzhol bar gyur pa rnams la bdag sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bya'o/_/ma grol 
[\[3a.3\]]ba rnams ni dgrol bar bya'o/_/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/_/yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes ngas yun ring du mngon par 'dod pa yin nad ni don de bya ba'i dus la bab pa yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis 
[\[3a.4\]]'jig rten gyi gnas skabs ci zhig yin pa bltas na gdul bar nus so/_/gdul bar nus so zhes de ltar rnam par dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la gzigs pa 'jug ste/_su ni 'grib/_su ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel/_su ni gnod par gyur/_su ni 
[\[3a.5\]]nyam thag par gyur/_su ni sdug bsngal bar gyur/_gang la ni ngas ma 'jigs shig_/ma 'jigs shig ces mi 'jigs pa sbyin pas dbugs dbyung bar bya/_su ni ngan song la gzhol/_su ni ngan song la 'bab/_su ni ngan song la bab/_su ni ngas ngan song las bton te/_
[\[3a.6\]]mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba la lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba rnams la 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug gi bdag po la gzhag par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed par bya/_gang gi dge 
[\[3a.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya/_gang gi yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug par mdzad pa na srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa la la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed par bskyed par 'os pa dang /_la la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]yongs su smin par nus pa dang /_la la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa bde 'gror 'gro bar gzhol ba dang /_la la 'bras bu dang po thob par gzhol ba dang /_la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub 'thob par gzhol ba dang /_la la 
[\[3b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_la la ni sngon gyi smon lam rnams nye bar bsags pas rkyen la rag las pa gang zhig ma thos pas dam pa'i chos las yongs su nyams par gyur par gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_
[\[3b.3\]]kye ma'o bdag gis yun ring po nas yang dag par rtogs pa rdzogs par gyur cing nga'i ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to zhes dgyes shing ngas bya ba ni byas so/_/ngas khur bskur bar dka' ba ni mthar phyin te/_gang nga'i yongs su dag pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i zhing du gyur cing gdul bya'i skye 
[\[3b.4\]]bo rnams yun ring por mi thogs par pad ma'i tshal yongs su smin cing kha bye la ma reg pa'i nyi ma shar bas rgyas par 'gyur ba lta bur gyur gyis phyi bshol mi bya'o/_/'dir gnas bzhin du yang dngos po thams cad rdzogs par bya bar nus pa ma yin pas na gzhes pa'i dus ni ma yin gyis ma 
[\[3b.5\]]la bdag mi'i 'jig rten du song la der phyin nas brtson 'grus kyi grogs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par byas te/_'di rnams skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'di rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su smin la rnam par grol bar bya zhing skye ba dang rga ba 
[\[3b.6\]]dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba/_skyabs med pa/_yongs su skyob pa med pa'i srog chags rnams dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i lag pa brkyang bas gdon par bya'o/_/thog ma med pa'i dus nas rjes su 
[\[3b.7\]]'brel ba'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug gi mes kun tu gdungs pa rnams la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs pas sdug bsngal ma lus pa bsal bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i thugs la dgongs pa nges par bskyed nas/_'dzam bu'i gling du 'jug par 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]mdzad pa na rigs dang yul dang dus dang rgyud dang bud med de gzigs pa rnam pa lngas gzigs par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du 
[\[4a.2\]]dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/_bram ze'i rigs sam/_rgyal rigs su yin la/_de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/_res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/_da lta na ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur 
[\[4a.3\]]bar gzigs nas/_ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/_/zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i 
[\[4a.4\]]dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la 
[\[4a.5\]]gzigs par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/_'bras dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_slongs mo 
[\[4a.6\]]pa brgya 'du ba/_mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/_dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i yul gang yin pa gzigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram 
[\[4a.7\]]shing gi phreng ba dang 'bras dang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_slongs mo pa brgya 'du ba/_mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/_dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/_gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po btul bar 'gyur ba yin gyis/_ma la bdag la gzhan dag 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]byang chub sems dpas yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las 
[\[4b.2\]]byas shing bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' yul la gzigs par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis na dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[4b.3\]]dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta bu zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/_skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la/_/mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa 
[\[4b.4\]]na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/_mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la blun zhing dbang po rtul 
[\[4b.5\]]ba dang /_bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste tshe'i snyigs ma dang /_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /_sems can gyi snyigs ma dang /_lta ba'i snyigs ma dang /_dus kyi 
[\[4b.6\]]snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing 
[\[4b.7\]]bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/_rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang /_pha mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med par gzigs 
[\[5a.2\]]nas/_de 'di snyam du dgongs te shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis/_ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 
[\[5a.3\]]'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas 
[\[5a.4\]]rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi 
[\[5a.5\]]rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/_rigs dang ldan pa/_rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba/_khro bag can ma yin pa/_phra ma can ma yin pa/_ngag rtsub pa ma yin pa/_dad pa dang ldan pa/_rang bzhin 
[\[5a.6\]]bzang ba/_bsam pa dge ba/_rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/_rigs mtho ba/_nye du'i rigs dang ldan pa/_shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/_gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/_mtshan nyid mi g.yo ba/_rang bzhin brtan la rgod bag can ma yin pa khengs pa med pa/_byams pa'i 
[\[5a.7\]]sems dang ldan pa/_sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/_'jig rten thams cad la chos dang ldan pa/_bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la e ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]du 'dzin nus pa dang rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_rigs dang ldan pa dang /_tshul 
[\[5b.2\]]dang ldan zhes bya ba nas bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_khro bag can ma yin pa dang /_rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang /_rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul 
[\[5b.3\]]chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/'di 
[\[5b.4\]]ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' bud med rnams la gzigs par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[5b.5\]]gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas dga' ldan na spyod pa'i lha'i ris rnams la gsungs pa/_grogs po dag shes par gyis shig_/nga 'dzam bu'i gling du babs nas yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba len gyis khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus kyi grong khyer 
[\[5b.6\]]chen po drug po 'di lta ste/_mnyan yod dang sA ke ta dang yangs pa can dang tsam pa dang rgyal po'i khab dang bA rA Na sIr nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub 
[\[5b.7\]]sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig_/da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/_skye dgu ni ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/_'dzam bu'i gling na rtog ge pa drug dang /_rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis dkrugs pa lags so/_/de la rtog ge pa drug gang 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'od srung rdzogs byed dang /_kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /_smrang 'don gyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+yA'i bu nog can dang /_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o/_/rjes su sgrogs pa drug 
[\[6a.2\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bram ze sgyus rgal dang /_bram ze rnas rdeg dang /_bram ze bzang ldan dang /_bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang /_bram ze pad ma'i snying po dang /_bram ze dmar po'o/_/snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 
[\[6a.3\]]dang /_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang /_kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang /_bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang /_drang srong nyon mongs med pa dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can no/_/'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' khyed kyi gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa 
[\[6a.4\]]bsham pa bgyi zhing bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de chos de bdag cag gis thos nas ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyid 
[\[6a.5\]]par sems lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/grogs po dag de'i phyir rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad rdungs shig_/dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha spyad 
[\[6a.6\]]thams cad brdungs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te gsungs pa/_grogs po dag 'di la lhag par sgra gang che/_bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so/_/grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du 
[\[6a.7\]]ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang /_rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/_bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o/_/mi rtag pa'i dung bud par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o/_/bdag 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o zhes gsungs nas tshigs su bcad de yang gsungs pa/_seng ge gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs ni du ma 'joms/_/rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig_/brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms/_/nyi ma 
[\[6b.2\]]gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel/_/grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni btsun mo sgyu 
[\[6b.3\]]'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyis ma la de la bdag gis gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/_lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so/_/
[\[6b.4\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rigs dang /_yul dang /_dus dang /_rgyud dang /_bud med la gzigs pa ste/_gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas nam gyi gung la glang po cher bstan te dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums 
[\[6b.5\]]su zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag 
[\[6b.6\]]smag tu gyur pa/_gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che bdag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba mi mthong ba las/_de rnams snang ba 
[\[6b.7\]]des gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so/_/ji ltar sprin ni rgya chen legs 'dus pa/_/chu mang bsags pa rlung gis bskyod pa ltar/_/de bzhin blo ldan de ni 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]lhums 'dug pa/_/ston ka'i sprin rum zla rgyas ji bzhin no/_/gang tshe rtsal ldan mnyam med nyer gshegs la/_/de tshe 'jig rten so so'i gling bar na/_/mun gyis khebs bsal phyogs kun shin tu ni/_/gsal snang byung gyur 'di 'dir chos nyid do/_/
[\[7a.2\]]gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs par mdzad pa de nyid kyi mtshan mo btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos rmi lam bzhi mthong ste glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa dang /_steng gi nam mkha' la 
[\[7a.3\]]skyil mo krung gis 'chag pa dang /_seng ge'i gdan la 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston pa dang /_lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed pa'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo las de thos pa dang /_mtshan mkhan rnams la rmi lam 'di 
[\[7a.4\]]ji ltar ston pa yin dris pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/gang btsun mos rmi lam du mthong ba glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras bltam par 'gyur ro/_/steng 
[\[7a.5\]]gi nam mkha' la 'chag go zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ge'i gdan la 'dug ste chos ston to zhes bya ba ni de yang seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs te 'khor bzhi la chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag 
[\[7a.6\]]byed do zhes bya ba nas gal te de rab tu byung bar gyur na lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed la mngon par bstod par 'gyur ro/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa de'i 
[\[7a.7\]]tshe/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar/_lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srungs mar 'jog pa ni lag na ral gri dang /_lag na mdung dang /_lag na mdung thung dang /_lag na mda' bo che'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]lha mchog bzhi la brgya byin gyis smras pa/_/khyed rnams song la lha mi rnams kyi ni/_/shin tu mchog gyur yum de ji ltar su'ang /_/gnod mi byed par gus pas yongs su srungs/_/de rnams shin tu 'bad byas dga' ba dang /_/brgya byin lung ni spyi bos mnos nas 
[\[7b.2\]]su/_/rnam kun mda' mdung ral gri lag na thogs/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni srung bar byed/_/g.yul du rgyal gyur lha bzhis sbas pa dang /_/de ni nyin mtshan sna tshogs rgyan 'chang zhing /_/lha mo rang khyim nang nas rnam rol pa/_/dga' ba'i tshal na spyod pa 
[\[7b.3\]]lta bur spyod/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/_kye ma'o lha btson thams cad thar bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas btson thams cad thar bar byas so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na 
[\[7b.4\]]btsun mo 'dod pa skyes pa/_kye ma'o lhas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi dbus su dman pa dang /_long ba dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dang /_slongs mo pa rnams la sbyin pa byin la bsod nams dag byas pa dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_sum 
[\[7b.5\]]mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang /_long ba dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dang /_slongs mo pa rnams la sbyin pa byin/_bsod nams ni bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su dman pa dang /_long ba dang /_
[\[7b.6\]]bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dang /_slongs mo pa rnams la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang /_ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin/_bsod nams ni byas pa dang /_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_sum mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang /_long ba dang /_
[\[7b.7\]]bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dang /_slongs mo pa rnams gang mngon par 'dod pa dang /_ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin bsod nams ni byas so/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /_sha ma'i dri ma dang /_khrag gi dri ma dang /_mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/_/dper na nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang /_ka shi'i ras kyang 
[\[8a.2\]]nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /_sha ma'i dri ma dang /_khrag gi dri ma dang /_mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/_/
[\[8a.3\]]ji ltar nor bu tshon shel 'od gsal dang /_/rab gtsang ka shi'i ras kyang gos pa med/_/de bzhin thub chen lhums na bzhugs pa na/_/mngal gyi dri ma cis kyang gos pa med/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs 
[\[8a.4\]]pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/dper na nor bu bai dUr+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po/_rigs dang ldan pa/_dang ba gsal ba/_dri ma med pa/_tshon skud sna lnga sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le 
[\[8a.5\]]brgan la brgyus la de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o/_/'di ni nor bu'o/_/skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i 
[\[8a.6\]]tshe/_de'i yum gyi lhums na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par lhums kyi nang na bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/ji ltar dri med nor bu bai dUr+ya/_/'od gsal lag par bzhag pa snang ba ltar/_/de bzhin thub chen yum gyi lhums bzhugs pa/_/shes shing sems pas yum 
[\[8a.7\]]ni yang dag lta/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/_de'i yum 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas lus ngal ba 'am lus dub par 'gyur ba med do/_/las kyi rnam smin zad pas mtho ris 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]'phos/_/gang tshe 'di ni lhums zhugs bzhugs pa na/_/de'i yum ngal bas 'dzin par mi byed par/_/de tshe gyur pa 'dir de chos nyid do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe 
[\[8b.2\]]yum de phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar ldog go/_/ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs pa spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_sbyar ba'i chang 
[\[8b.3\]]myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/_'bru'i chang dang /_sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byed do/_/srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi smra dang chang la mi brkam dang /_/'khrig pa'i mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 
[\[8b.4\]]'di/_/'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/_skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa med do/_/nyon mongs 
[\[8b.5\]]rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing /_/de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/_/de yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi/_/skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtod pa med/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa kye ma bdag gis rgya mtsho 
[\[8b.6\]]chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyam nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/_ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes/_mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lha btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[8b.7\]]kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i rgya mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud na cir 'gyur/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_sras yan lag ma tshang ba 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_nga'i ming zas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya'am/_de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun tu rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas rgya mtsho chen po las 
[\[9a.2\]]chu myur bar khug shig ces bsgo ba dang /_des de nyid na 'dug bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu drangs te de rnams la btsun mo 'thung du bcug pa dang /_de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul 'di lta bu'i 
[\[9a.3\]]'dod pa skyes te/_kye ma'o bdag lus lum bi nI'i tshal du zhugs la shing gi rtsar yal ga'i mthar 'dug par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul de lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes par rig nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs bshams te 
[\[9a.4\]]glang po'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs te dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te/_btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig tu chas nas lum bi nI'i tshal du phyin to/_/
[\[9a.5\]]de nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos lum bi ni'i tshal mthong ba na sems rtse gcig par gyur pa dang /_de khyogs las babs te/_shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog yang dag par rgyas pa mthong bas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te de der song nas me tog dang /_'dab ma'i g.yur gyis 
[\[9a.6\]]dud pa'i yal ga la 'jus te/_bud med rgan pas bskor nas gnas so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo sras bltam par nye bar gnas kyis ma la bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang po bltam pa na blang bar bya'o/_/
[\[9a.7\]]de nas yang bsams pa/_btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo ni ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa yin pas bdag gi mdun du bltam mi phod kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bud med rgan mo zhig gi cha byad du sprul te/_des gang gis bud med rgan mo de rnams phyogs 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]bcur 'bros par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag po zhig sprul nas de rnams bros pa dang /_bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du 'dug go/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' ni mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums 
[\[9b.2\]]su 'jug pa dang /_mkhyen bzhin du gnas pa dang /_mkhyen bzhin du 'byung ba yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te gang bdag skyes bu tha mal pa bzhin du mngal gyi sgo nas 'byung ba ni tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis ma la bdag gis yum gyi 
[\[9b.3\]]dku g.yas pa brtol la 'byung bar bya'o zhes de nas byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi dku g.yas pa brtol te byung ba dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te brgya byin 'di bdag gis byang chub sems 
[\[9b.4\]]dpa' 'di blangs so zhes dregs pa skye bar 'gyur bar mkhyen nas ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje'i snying po can gyi skur byin gyis brlabs te lhums su ni yum 'dzin pas nyon mongs par ma gyur cig snyam du dgongs nas yang bar mdzad de bzhugs pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[9b.5\]]gyis 'dzin par ma nus pa dang 'dar bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka thong thong /_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa la bzhag go/_/bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la sus kyang ma 
[\[9b.6\]]bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun bor zhing tshig tu yang gsung ba/_kau shi ka phyogs 'di gang yin/_byang chub sems dpa' shar phyogs lags so/_/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka sems can thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro 
[\[9b.7\]]bar bya'o/_/phyogs 'di gang yin/_lho phyogs lags so/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o/_/phyogs 'di gang yin/_byang phyogs lags so/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar bya'o/_/phyogs 'di gang yin/_nub phyogs lags so/_/
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]nga'i skye ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro/_/skye 'chi mthar byed de ni bltams pa na/_/sa la gom pa bdun ni bzhud nas su/_/'di nga'i skye ba tha mar gyur yin zhes/_/'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma gcig pus gsungs/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems 
[\[10a.2\]]dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas byung ba de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/_'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di 
[\[10a.3\]]ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba las de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/_shes ldan dag 
[\[10a.4\]]sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so/_/gang tshe rnam 'dren bltam par gyur pa na/_/de tshe sa ni rir bcas shin tu g.yos/_/gang gis 'jig rten par yang skad cig gis/_/snang byed 'od gsal 
[\[10a.5\]]de yang byung bar gyur/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas sa g.yos pa chen po dang snang ba rgya chen po mthong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba'i bu skyes pa ni 
[\[10a.6\]]bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa na ral gri shubs nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /_sha ma'i dri ma dang /_khrag gi dri ma dang /_mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna 
[\[10a.7\]]tshogs kyis ma gos so/_/ji ltar 'od gsal tshon shel bzang po dang /_/ka shi ras gtsang phan tshun gos mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin thub de lhums nas byung ba na/_/gser sbyangs me chen nang nas bton pa 'dra/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe de'i yum mi 'dug mi nyal te 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltam par byed do/_/de ni mi 'dug nyal ba'ang ma yin te/_/yan lag lnga ldan tshul khrims kyis brgyan pas/_/de ni 'greng bzhin shin tu dge ba 
[\[10b.2\]]yi/_/gzhon nu de 'dir brgya byin dag gis blangs/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to/_/dri med zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[10b.3\]]'khor 'od 'dra'i gdugs/_/lha yi gtso bos dbu yi steng nas 'dzin/_/gdub 'khrol 'od zer gyis 'bar lag pa dang /_/rnga yab bzang gis 'di la g.yob par byed/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa'i mod la 
[\[10b.4\]]bar snang las chu bsil ba gcig dang /_chu dron mo gcig ste/_chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do/_/dri med rab dag bsil dang de bzhin dro'i/_/chu yis rkang gnyis gtso bo khrus mdzad de/_/rigs 
[\[10b.5\]]rgyud gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs/_/klu rnams de la'ang mchod pa byed par gyur/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la skrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'babs par gyur te de la de'i yum khrus chu'i bya ba byed do/_/rkang gnyis 
[\[10b.6\]]gtso bo gzhon nu bltam pa na/_/lha de rnams ni shin tu yid dga' bas/_/der ni chu bzang phyung bar gyur pa la/_/de yum der ni chu yis bya ba byed/_/lha yi rol mo shin tu sgra snyan rnams/_/shin tu dga' ba mchog tu rdung bar byed/_/de rnams gos dang phreng ba 'thor byed 
[\[10b.7\]]cing /_/gzhan dag rab tu 'dud cing de bzhin bstod/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la lhas bar snang las lha'i ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor ro/_/lha'i me tog man dA ra bas kyang 'thor ro/_/lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to/_/gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do/_/mkhas pas btud pa'i sangs rgyas bltam pa na/_/dri zhim dri mchog char ni phab pa dang /_/de 
[\[11a.2\]]dang des na rang spobs tshul 'thun pa'i/_/rab dga'i sems kyis bstod pa rjod par byed/_/'dis ni byang chub mchog dag thob 'gyur zhing /_/sdug bsngal zad pa'i 'gro phan mdzad gyur la/_/'gro ba mi shes rab rib mig ldongs la/_/sman pa mchog 'di mig ni rab stsol 
[\[11a.3\]]'gyur/_/'di ni rmongs pas mig khebs long ba yi/_/'gro ba'i sgron ma chen po nyid du 'gyur/_/lta ngan gyis brlag log pa'i lam zhugs la/_/ma 'tshol drang ba'i lam ni ston par 'gyur/_/ngan 'gro'i lam ni ma lus 'gog 'gyur zhing /_/lha yi gnas kyis ni 
[\[11a.4\]]'byed 'gyur zhes/_/'og min bar na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni/_/lha yi gnas su yang yang sgrogs par byed/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs byin bu btsas pa na tshangs byin 'di snyam du sems 
[\[11a.5\]]te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas de bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad ma chen po bu btsas pa na pad ma chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu 
[\[11a.6\]]btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/_/ko'u shAm bi na rgyal po dmag brgya pa bu btsas pa na dmag brgya pa 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi 
[\[11a.7\]]bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/_/grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]lta bur gyur pas 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te/_de ni de lta ma yin no/_/'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe dga' bo la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon 
[\[11b.2\]]nu lnga brgya btsas pa dang /_grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya btsas pa dang /_'dun pa la sogs pa rim gro pa lnga brgya btsas pa dang /_bsngags ldan la sogs pa rta lnga brgya 'brangs so/_/lha rnams kyis gter lnga'i kha yang nye bar bstan to/_/
[\[11b.3\]]khams kyi rgyal phran rnams dang /_mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams kyis rab tu btud cing thams cad kyis kyang dpya phul lo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'dod pa thams cad grub pas na gzhon nu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes 
[\[11b.4\]]bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' la thog mar mtshan btags so/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa'i mod la yab yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang /_ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas/_shes ldan dag cig gzhon nu gang dag dang 
[\[11b.5\]]ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung 
[\[11b.6\]]ste/_/'di lta ste/_/'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o/_/bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan 
[\[11b.7\]]pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong 'byung ba de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa med pa/_chos dang 'thun pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen 
[\[12a.2\]]po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nas lha mad lags te/_gzhon nu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du gdags par 'gyur 
[\[12a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_snga ma bzhin du 'di ni 'dir chos nyid yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rgyal pos gzhon nu bltam nas skyes bu yi/_/mtshan shes bram ze la dris de tshe smras/_/rgyal bu gal te khyim na gnas gyur na/_/nges par 'di ni mi dbang dag tu 'gyur/_/
[\[12a.4\]]brtul bar ldan zhing rgyal po gzhan rnams kyi/_/spyi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/'di ni gling rnams kun tu mngon rgyal ba'i/_/chos kyi rgyal srid dag ni byed par 'gyur/_/rin chen gyur pa 'di ni rin chen bdun/_/mi mchog bsod nams las kyis 
[\[12a.5\]]'thob par 'gyur/_/gang gi mthu yis sa ni ma lus pa/_/'di ni lung mi gcog par spyod par 'gyur/_/gser las legs byas lte ba shin tu zlum/_/rtsibs stong ldan zhing mu khyud ma nyams bzang /_/dang por sa la rnam par rgyal 'gyur gang /_/'khor lo de 'dis 
[\[12a.6\]]dang por thob par 'gyur/_/yan lag thams cad legs skyes sa la ni/_/rab gnas gangs can rtse 'dra'i glang po'i mchog_/rgyal po la 'os mkha' la 'gro ba yi/_/rin chen mchog ni gnyis pa 'dis 'thob 'gyur/_/tho rangs dus su phyogs kun ma lus pa'i/_/
[\[12a.7\]]sa rnams bskor nas slar ni ldog gyur gang /_/rma bya'i mgrin 'dra spu ni yid 'ong ba'i/_/rin chen rta ni 'di yis 'thob par 'gyur/_/rin chen dri med bai dUr+ya rang bzhin/_/kun tu dpag tshad tsam du snang byed pa/_/dri med mtshan mo ci 'dra nyin de bzhin/_/rin chen mchog ni 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig reg dri gzugs dang mdangs ldan pa'i/_/bud med dam pa dregs ldan rnams kyi mchog_/lha mo bzhin du yon tan kun ldan pa/_/bud med rin chen de 'dir 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang yang 'di na rgyal la mu tig dang /_/
[\[12b.2\]]gser sogs shin tu mang po 'bul ba yi/_/nor ldan mtshungs par nor mang khyim bdag ni/_/rin chen thob nas rnam par spyod par 'gyur/_/'gro dang kun tu gnas dang rnam ldog dang /_/ma lus dpung la mkhas par byed pa yi/_/dpa' ldan bdun pa 'byung bar 
[\[12b.3\]]'gyur ba ni/_/mi yi rin chen blon po zhes bya yin/_/dpa' zhing rtul phod yan lag mchog gzugs ldan/_/bu stong dag ni 'di la 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/gang gi gzi brjid shin tu stobs che zhing /_/sa bdag gzhan dag 'dud par byed pa 'byung /_/gal te 
[\[12b.4\]]khyim ni nyes mang gis dkrugs pa/_/rab 'bar shing ni bya yis spong ba ltar/_/nye bar zhi phyir nags su nges song na/_/de 'dir ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/khyod kyi sras 'di deng ni 'di 'dra ba/_/gzhon nu 'gro ba'i rin chen gcig bltam pa/_/'gro ba 
[\[12b.5\]]gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gro ba/_/de ltar sngags kyi tshig las mthong ba lags/_/shes ldan dag gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[12b.6\]]gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni gang dag yin/_lha gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so/_/zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/de'i 
[\[12b.7\]]zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu'i sor mo ring ba dang /_zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dang /_de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/_phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa ni dper na/_shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/_ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin no/_/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[13a.2\]]mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu'i phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa lags te/_de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa ni dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu bzhin no/_/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu'i zhabs 
[\[13a.3\]]long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang /_byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i lta bu dang /_sku mdud pa dang /_sku bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis slebs shing reg pa ste/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha 
[\[13a.4\]]gzhon nu ni mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/_de'i mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni dper na glang po che cang shes kyi'am/_rta cang shes byung ma thag gi bzhin no/_/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu'i sku 
[\[13a.5\]]ci srid par 'dom yang de srid la/_'dom ci srid par sku yang de srid pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu'i ro stod kyi spu re re nas skye zhing de'i sku la spu re re nas skye ba yang 
[\[13a.6\]]mthing ga la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skye lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni mdog gser 'dra ba dang /_'od 'dom gang ba dang /_pags pa srab cing mdog gser gyi 'dra ba lags te/_pags pa srab 
[\[13a.7\]]pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/_/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu'i sku ni bdun mtho ba ste sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang /_zhabs gnyis dang /_dpung mgo gnyis dang ltag pa lags 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni thal gong rgyas pa dang /_sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /_sku drang zhing kho lag che ba dang /_dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang /_tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang /_tshems mnyam 
[\[13b.2\]]pa dang /_tshems thags bzang ba dang /_mche ba shin tu dkar ba dang /_'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/_/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni ljags shin tu ring zhing srab 
[\[13b.3\]]pa lags te/_ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang /_srab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas phyang bas skra mtshams nas bzung ste/_zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha 
[\[13b.4\]]gzhon nu ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_ka la ping ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang /_rnga'i dbyangs can lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu'i spyan mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang /_gtsug tor dang ldan 
[\[13b.5\]]pa dang /_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha 'di dag ni gang dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin 
[\[13b.6\]]du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so/_/bdag nyid legs bsgoms sku la ni/_/sku yi tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa'i/_/thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/_/de ni bdag gis brjod par 
[\[13b.7\]]bgyi/_/'di zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/_/sa la mnyam par 'bab pa yin/_/'di zhabs phyag gi mthil la ni/_/'khor lo shin tu dbyibs legs skyes/_/'di zhabs rting pa yangs pa dang /_/de ni sor mo ring zhing mdzes/_/phyag zhabs dra bar 'brel pa 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dang /_/shing bal lta bur 'jam pa dang /_/'di'i zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon/_/byin pa e ne ya dang mtshungs/_/mi mchog sku yang ma btud par/_/phyag gis pus mo'i lha nga slebs/_/mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub/_/n+ya gro d+ha ltar 
[\[14a.2\]]chu zheng gab/_/ro stod spu ni re re nas/_/skye zhing de spu g.yas su 'khyil/_/mdog ni gser sbyangs 'dra ba dang /_/kun nas 'dom gang 'od dang ldan/_/bcom ldan de ni pags srab cing /_/'di sku bdun ni mtho ba ste/_/bcom ldan thal gong rgyas pa dang /_/sku stod 
[\[14a.3\]]seng ge 'dra ba dang /_/sku drang kho lag che ba dang /_/dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang /_/bcu phrag bzhi yi tshems rnams ni/_/yongs su rdzogs shing ma tshang med/_/mnyam dang thags bzang nyid du ni/_/de yi tshems ni legs par gnas/_/rab dkar 'gram pa seng ge 'dra/_/
[\[14a.4\]]ro bro mchog dang ldan pa dang /_/ljags ni shin tu srab pa dang /_/bcom ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan/_/rdzi ma ba 'dra spyan mthon mthing /_/smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu ni/_/dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil/_/mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis 'di/_/gang 
[\[14a.5\]]zhig la ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de ni 'gro ba gnyis 'gyur gyi/_/gsum par 'gyur ba ma lags so/_/'di ni gal te khyim gnas na/_/'khor los sgyur rgyal nyid 'gyur te/_/dran ldan bu ni mang ba dang /_gnod pa chung zhing mkhas par 'gyur/_/gal te rab byung 
[\[14a.6\]]rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/gang zag mnyam pa med par 'gyur/_/bshos dang btung dang na bza' dang /_/gzims cha rnams kyang rnyed 'gyur la/_/'di yi 'khor ni mi phyed cing /_/lus can kun gyi yid du 'ong /_/lha rnams rjes su 'brang ba dang /_/mi rnams kyang ni de 
[\[14a.7\]]bzhin te/_/chos kyi bdag po mchog 'gyur zhing /_/mi yul dag tu'ang de bzhin 'gyur/_/mnyam pa med cing 'dra ba med/_/rnam 'dren mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/_/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags te/_gang dang ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]gzhan ni ma lags zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /_de skrun pa'i yum nongs par gyur te/_nongs ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par skyes so/_/de nas rgyal po zas 
[\[14b.2\]]gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' ma ma rnams la gtad nas ma ma khyed kyis gzhon nu 'di dus dus su sku mnye byos shig_/dus dus su khrus byos shig_/dus dus su zas byin cig_/dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig_/ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa 
[\[14b.3\]]gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su sku mnye byed/_dus dus su khrus byed/_dus dus su zas byin/_dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do/_/yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams byugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab 
[\[14b.4\]]zas gtsang la phul ba dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te dga' bas pang du bzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba skyed do/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mi'i kha dog las yang 
[\[14b.5\]]dag par 'das la lha'i kha dog ma thob pa/_skyes pa dang /_bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/_dper na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser la mgar ba mkhas pas/_rgyan brdungs pa/_la ba dkar po sar pa'i steng du bzhag na shin tu gsal 
[\[14b.6\]]zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_mi'i kha dog las 'das shing lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug 
[\[14b.7\]]pa dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/_/yang 'di skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag pa nas phrag par spo bar byed pa ni dper na ston ka'i pad ma skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la lta ste/_de spyan mi 'dzums pa ni dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las 
[\[15a.2\]]kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan des de nyin dang mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu gzigs so/_/las bcas las byung dri med spyan gyis ni/_/gzugs chen po dang de bzhin phra rab rnams/_/nyin dang mtshan du khor yug dpag tshad gcig_/mdun 
[\[15a.3\]]na gnas pa bzhin du'ang gzigs par 'gyur/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /_gsung snyan pa dang /_gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/_dper na gangs can gyi bya skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /_skad snyan pa dang /_
[\[15a.4\]]yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /_gsung snyan pa dang /_gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no/_/ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying 
[\[15a.5\]]rje dang ldan pa/_skye dgu la mnyes gshin pa zhig gnas te de la tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba yod pa dang /_de de'i tshe phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa na byang chub sems dpa' bltam ste/_/'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur pa'i snang ba de mthong ba dang nyon mongs med 
[\[15a.6\]]la smras pa/_mkhan po 'dir ni nyi ma thams cad dag_/cig car byung bar gyur tam ci/_/'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa/_/'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur/_/nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa/_nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du rno/_/bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni/_/yan lag reg 
[\[15a.7\]]na 'od bsil bas/_/nges par thub pa de yi 'od/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od can ni/_/nges par lhums nas bltam gyur la/_/bltams nas sems dpa' chen po de'i/_/'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni/_/dri ma med pa 'di dag gis/_/'jig rten gsum ni snang byas yin/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]mis byin gyis smras pa/_mkhan po bzhud/_ci re zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ram/_'on te bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba rang nyid kyis blta bar mdzod cig_/drang srong nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/_da ltar na ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i 
[\[15b.2\]]khyim nyi 'og gi rgyal po dang /_mkhar gyi rgyal po dang /_tshong pa dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag brgya stong dpag tu med pas kun tu khyab nas 'dug gis gang gi tshe de dben par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro 
[\[15b.3\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du kye ma'o drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir 'ongs na ci ma rung snyam du sems so/_/de nas drang srong nyon mongs med steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang sgor phyin 
[\[15b.4\]]pa dang /_ji tsam na sgo srungs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_drang srong nyon mongs med 'dir mchis so zhes rig par byas pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos te dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_mchog tu rangs pa 
[\[15b.5\]]byung nas mchog tu gus pas mchod de 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong chen po legs par 'ongs so/_/dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/_nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'dir/_/khyed sras blta ba'i phyir mchis te/_/'jig rten gtso bo rnam 
[\[15b.6\]]'dren pa/_/thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na ni gzhon nu gnyid log gis sad kyi bar du re zhig sdod cig_/nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/_rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/_/mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/_/dgos pa don 
[\[15b.7\]]gnyer rnams kyi gnyid/_/mig la yun ring mi gnas so/_/de nas gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ma ma'i pang na 'dug pa drang srong nyon mongs med la byin pa dang /_drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas yud tsam brtags te smras pa/_lha gzhon nu 'di mtshan mkhan 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]rnams kyis ji skad lung bstan/_rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras 
[\[16a.2\]]pa/_sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/_/rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung /_/bsod nams mchog gis chos kyi mdzod 'di ni/_/nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po/_/gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag 
[\[16a.3\]]po dbang phyug 'gyur/_/thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor los sgyur/_/de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha'i nges pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa brtag pa la zhugs 
[\[16a.4\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes nas/_khab nas byung nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/bdag ni bar skabs der 'chi ba'i dus byed par mthong nas de mig mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa 
[\[16a.5\]]rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas dngangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skyes pa bud med rnams kyis mthong ba na/_/ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/_/lus bzang dge byed de ni 'dir mthong nas/_/drang srong chen po ci slad ngu bzhin gyur/_/
[\[16a.6\]]gang las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa'am/_/tshe zad 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas grang /_/de ni myur du legs par bdag la smros/_/khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar gyur/_/drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gal te 'di yi steng 
[\[16a.7\]]du nam mkha' las/_/rdo rje ser drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang /_/thub pa chen po'i sku la ba spu ni/_/nyag ma gcig kyang g.yos par mi nus so/_/me chen rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang /_/mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzad dang /_/drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]rnon yang /_/gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jigs mi 'gyur/_/thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa/_/'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/_/de ni 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs 'joms na/_/mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung /_/
[\[16b.2\]]'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi/_/gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la/_/tshangs bcas lha yang rtag tu srung byed pa/_/mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung /_/mi dbang bdag gi rgud pa mthong nas ni/_/gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob bdag tu mod/_/chos 
[\[16b.3\]]kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang phrad nas ni/_/don ma thob par bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/gang dag smra ba dam pa mtshungs med pa/_/'di yi chos thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang /_/rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag_/skyid cing bsod nams ldan la rims nad bral/_/
[\[16b.4\]]de nas drang srong nyon mongs med byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams so/_/nyams pa dang nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/_rkang kho nas grong khyer nas phyir 'byung bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos pa dang grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang /_
[\[16b.5\]]gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams bsal nas spos dang /_phye mas khyab par byed du bcug go/_/de nas drang srong nyon mongs med 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer nas byung ste/_rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin du phyin pa dang mis byin la smras pa/_ngas gzhon nu mthong ste/_bla na med pa'i ye 
[\[16b.6\]]shes rtogs par 'gyur na ngas ni de sleb par mi 'gyur te nga ni bar skabs su dus byed par 'gyur gyis khyod ni de'i thad du rab tu byung la/_nga rgyal dang dregs pa nges par bcom par gyur pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la spyad par bya ste/_rigs kyis dregs par mi bya/_rus kyis 
[\[16b.7\]]dregs par mi bya/_rigs rgyud kyis dregs par mi bya ste/_khyod kyis kyang yun ring po mi thogs par bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur gyis zhes smras nas yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na/_/shar phyogs su ni khyod 'dug dang /_/rdzogs 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/_/rnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas/_gtsang mas gzhon nu ma ma'i pang na 'dug pa la yang dang yang du lta zhing nga'i bu ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni sa'i steng na su la yang med do snyam du 
[\[17a.2\]]sems shing shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring por ma lon par ma ma'i pang du bzhugs nas/_gser gyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar bsres pa'i chan gsol ba na de ma mas bkag kyang ma thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par 
[\[17a.3\]]brtsams pa dang /_dbrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang /_rgyal po btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams pa dang des kyang ma nus so/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang ser skya na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bsgo na de rnams kyis 
[\[17a.4\]]kyang dbrog par ma nus so/_/de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/_'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gis ma la bdag gis mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa nas gzung ngo snyam nas des mdzub mo 
[\[17a.5\]]bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang /_glang po che lnga brgya po de dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa dbrog par ma nus so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po 
[\[17a.6\]]che lnga brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni glang po che stong thub kyis de bas na gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags so zhes btags so/_/grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so/_/
[\[17a.7\]]shAkya rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u'am/_bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir 'khrid pa yin pas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' glang po che la bskyon te dpung gi tshogs dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor te grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi sgra bcu gnyis dang bral bar gyur cing byang chub 
[\[17b.2\]]sems dpa' de nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du gnas par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsams pa/_grong khyer 'di 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i sgra dang /_rta'i sgra dang /_shing rta'i sgra dang /_dpung bu chung gi sgra dang /_dung gi sgra dang /_rnga bo che'i sgra dang /_
[\[17b.3\]]be de'i sgra dang /_rwa dung gi sgra dang /_gar gyi sgra dang /_glu'i sgra dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sbyin pa ni byin/_bsod nams ni gyis/_bsnyen gnas la ni nye bar gnas/_/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mnos shig ces bya ba'i sgra ste sgra bcu gnyis dang bral zhing 
[\[17b.4\]]gzhon nu de nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du zhi bar gnas pas gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar btags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gan du khyer ba dang /_gnod 
[\[17b.5\]]sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag byas so/_/de mthong ba dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/_lhas kyang 
[\[17b.6\]]rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya bar btags so/_/de nas de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis dgos pa'i ched la 'dug nas don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge dag 
[\[17b.7\]]shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge slob par btang nas yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas byang chub sems dpa' la yi ger bris nas phog pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]dpas smras pa/_'di ni ngas shes so/_/de nas des yi ge gnyis dang gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'di dag thams cad kyang ngas shes kyis gzhan dag smros shig_/srin bu go chas 
[\[18a.2\]]smras pa/_'jig rten na ni yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi gzhan ni bdag gis ma 'tshal to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/_yi ge 'di ming ci yin smros shig_/des smras pa ma 'tshal to/_/byang chub sems dpas 
[\[18a.3\]]gsungs pa/_'jig rten du gnyis shig byung nas mngon par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba'o/_/nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/_srin bu go cha byang chub sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/_yi ge 'di ni 
[\[18a.4\]]'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na mngon par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o/_/byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklags la nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byas pas tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya 
[\[18a.5\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa dang 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas par bzang len dang /_lhar bcas zhes bya ba 'phong gi slob dpon gyi gan du 'phong gi gnas su gtad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnas lnga po rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra 
[\[18a.6\]]grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs che ba la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas bzang len dang /_lhar bcas 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad bslab kyi lha sbyin 'di ni gdug 
[\[18a.7\]]pa yin pas 'jig rten thams cad du gnod par 'gyur na mi rung gis 'di la gnad du bsnun par bslab par mi bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na lha sbyin gyis ngang pa lcags mdas bsnun pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la bzhugs pa de'i pang 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]par de lhu nga ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bzung nas mda' phyung ste sman gyis byugs pas sos so/_/lha sbyin gyis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' ngang pa 'di ni ngas yongs su bzung ba yin gyis bskur cig_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_ngas ches sngar 
[\[18b.2\]]yongs su bzung ste gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe yongs su bzung ngo /_/der byang chub sems dpa' la lha sbyin gnod sems dang /_bzod pa ma yin pa dang /_phebs pa ma yin pa byung bar gyur to/_/de nas lha sbyin la 
[\[18b.3\]]sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya byung ba dang /_lha sbyin gyis ras kyis bcings nas shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bsgyel to/_/ci tsam na byang chub sems dpa' phyogs der bzhud pa dang /_lha sbyin gyis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' ci la sdod/_byang chub sems dpas kyang 
[\[18b.4\]]ras bcings te shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bsgyel to/_/de nas lha sbyin ras kyis bcings pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas kyang bzung ste rkang pa gyen du bstan nas gan rgyal du bsgyel pa dang /_der yang byang chub sems dpa' la lha sbyin gnod sems dang /_mi bzod pa dang /_
[\[18b.5\]]bag mi phebs pa'i sems gnyis pa bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya mda' gzhu thogs te phyi rol du byung nas ta la la tshabs byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_la las ni ta la gcig phigs so/_/la las ni gnyis so/_/lha sbyin gyis ni gsum mo/_/byang chub 
[\[18b.6\]]sems dpas lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang shing ta la bdun phigs pa las ji srid rlung gis bskyod de thams cad 'gyel ba'i bar du rgya cher sbyar ro/_/de nas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram na shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye ba mtshan 
[\[18b.7\]]mo ni sen mos kyang gcad du rung la nyin par ni mtshon gyis kyang gcad par mi nus pa zhig yod pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma pa'i lha rnams kyis gang gis shing dge ba'i snying po rtsa ba steng du bton nas ro hi ta ka'i nang du bcug pa de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag cig sprul to/_/de rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /_
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]legs par rab sad kyis thos nas shing 'dis grong khyer brlag par ma gyur tam snyam nas srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang /_shing dge ba'i snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_'khor brgya stong dpag tu med pas drangs su zin kyang ci tsam du bskyod 
[\[19a.2\]]par yang ma nus so/_/'char kas smras pa/_lha byang chub sems dpa' sbron cig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kho bos gzhon nu la bka' stsol bar mi nus so/_/'char kas smras pa/_khyed rnams kyis ca co'i sgra gsang mthon po sgrogs shig_/ci nas kyang ngas 
[\[19a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' gshegs par bya'o/_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis sgra gsang mthon po dang chen pos ca co'i sgra bsgrags so/_/'char ka byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'char ka ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig yin/_
[\[19a.4\]]'char kas rnam pa de dag rgya cher gsol to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_gal te de lta na 'byin du 'deng /_de nas 'char ka dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chas pa dang /_ci tsam na khung nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung ngo /_/'char kas byang chub sems dpa' zin par 
[\[19a.5\]]gyur du 'ong ngo zhes ral gri rnon pos rked pa bcad pa dang /_sbrul gyi dug gi dbugs kyis 'char ka la phog ste de nag por gyur nas de'i ming yang 'char ka nag po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing dge ba'i snying po gang na ba der bzhud de phyin pa dang /_lha sbyin la 
[\[19a.6\]]gsungs pa/_khyod kyi stobs ci tsam pa blta yis bskyod cig_/lha sbyin gyis 'bad de cung zad cig bsgul to/_/dga' bos ni cung zad drangs so/_/ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi nyams sad par mdzad cing shing dge ba'i snying po phyag gis blangs te 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram 
[\[19a.7\]]nas 'phangs te byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_shes ldan dag shing dge ba'i snying po 'di ni bsil ba'i rang bzhin yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang /_shu ba dang /_phol mig byung ba la byugs na zhi bar 'gyur gyis dum bur byos la khyer te rang rang gi khyim du zhog shig_/yang yangs 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]pa can du glang po che rin po che zhig skyes pa dang /_de nas yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams kyis glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/_rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i 
[\[19b.2\]]mthus glang po che rin po che 'di byung gis dong la de kho na la dbul lo snyam mo/_/de rnams kyis glang po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che'i dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang /_ma stes te gdug pa'i 
[\[19b.3\]]las can lha sbyin phyir byung ba des glang po che'i dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan par mthong nas de des phrag dog chen po skyes te de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/_glang po che'i dam pa 'di su'i yin/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams 
[\[19b.4\]]kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo/_/lha sbyin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/_re zhig de 'khor los sgyur bar ma gyur par je khyed cag glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas 
[\[19b.5\]]thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do/_/ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/_shes ldan dag glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha sbyin gyis so/_des bsams pa gdon mi za bar 'di la lha sbyin gyi mthu sad kyis ma la bdag 
[\[19b.6\]]gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste gom pa bdun du bor ro/_/ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/_glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/_de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/sus bsad/_lha sbyin 
[\[19b.7\]]gyis so/_/mgron rnams la mgron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin nam legs pa zhig byas so/_/phyogs gang du bsad/_pha bir ro/_/'dir sus drud/_dga' bos so/_/des dgongs pa 'dir gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis 'di la mthu sad kyis ma la ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]snyam du dgongs nas mjug ma nas bzung ste ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las ra ba rim pa bdun dang /_'obs rim pa bdun las 'das te bor ro/_/de lhung bas gshong btod pa glang po che'i gshong glang po che'i gshong zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_
[\[20a.2\]]lha sbyin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad/_/dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du drud/_/byang chub sems dpas phyag gis bar snang la/_/rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/_/mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_gal te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rab tu ma 
[\[20a.3\]]byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag gis 'di la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga phal po che byin na de lta na ni de rnams la dga' bas rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[20a.4\]]mdun du gos dang /_rgyan gyi phung po bzhag nas smras pa/_deng khyed kyis shAkya'i bu mo rnams la rgyan dang gos rnams byin cig_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ser skya'i grong khyer du deng gzhon nu gos dang rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyis shAkya'i bu mo thams cad shog shig ces dril 
[\[20a.5\]]sgrog tu bcug go/_/de nas shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya 'ongs pa dang /_thams cad la byang chub sems dpas gos dang rgyan rnams byin no/_/de nas shAkya dbyig pa can la grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo yod pa dang /_des de la smras pa/_khyed la yang gzhon nu gos dang 
[\[20a.6\]]rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyis song /_de nas grags 'dzin ma ci bdag la byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan su zhig khyor 'gyur snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song ba dang /_ci tsam na gos dang rgyan thams cad byin zin nas ci yang ma lus pa dang /_des byang 
[\[20a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i mgul na shin tu mdzes shing rin che ba'i mu tig phreng gcig lus pa mthong nas de de la dga' bas bag 'khums pa med par rang nyid kyis bkrol te rang gi mgul du btags nas byang chub sems dpa'i thad nas song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te bu mo 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]'di phebs shing brtan pa las na 'dis gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus kyis 'di blang bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_song las 
[\[20b.2\]]kyi mtha' ci tsam pa la ltos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsgo ba gsan te shing rta bzang po la zhugs nas phyi rol du gshegs te yab rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i las kyi mtha' gzigs shing byang chub sems dpa' las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa rnams kyi gan du 
[\[20b.3\]]byon pa dang /_gshol lnga brgya dang zhing rmed cing zhing pa'i mi de rnams kyis kyang gshol gnon cing 'dren pas stobs nye bar nyams pa mgo lus rdul gyis yog pa dang /_rlung dang than pas lus la gdungs pas lus rtsub cing mdog ngan pa/_rkang pa dang /_lag pa gas pa dang /_dengs 
[\[20b.4\]]shing dri ma can gyi gos gyon pa/_rkang pa dri ma can/_ltogs pa dang skom pas mdog ngan zhing /_lkog ma dang /_mkhur ba dang /_mig gi logs skams pa dang /_glang de rnams kyang rmon pa lcags gzer rnon po can gyis lus dral bas rgyab dang /_mjug do'i phyogs khrag gis g.yogs 
[\[20b.5\]]pa/_ltogs pa dang skom pas dbugs brtsegs shing snying ga'i phyogs nas dbugs brtsegs pa ring du 'dren la gnya' shing gis mnan pa'i rma las rnag khrag 'dzag pa la sbrang bu dang /_'bu'i tshogs kyis za ba/_thong lcags kyis rkang pa la rma byung zhing kha dang sna nas kha chu dang sna chu 'dzag 
[\[20b.6\]]pa la sbrang ma dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]yog pa rnams gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsod nams bskyed cing bsags pa'i thugs rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i thugs kyis zhing pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/shes ldan 
[\[20b.7\]]dag khyed su'i yin/_de rnams kyis gsol pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lags so/_/des gsungs pa/_shes ldan dag khyed deng phan cad bran du mi bya/_mngag gzhug par mi bya/_rang dbang can gar dga' bar 'gro bar byas/_bde ba la reg par gnas shig_/rmon pa 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]rnams kyang bkrol nas gsungs pa/_khyed cag kyang deng phan cad rtswa mchog ma nyams pa za zhing chu ma rdul ma brnyogs shing dang bdag la 'thung shig_/khyed la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsil ba ldang bar gyur cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid byung ba 
[\[21a.2\]]de nyid kyis yab shAkya zas gtsang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs nas snum zhing sngo la 'dab ma mthug cing grib ma bzang po dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te/_'dod pa las dben pa sdig pa 
[\[21a.3\]]mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' spangs te mi 'gro bar shing 
[\[21a.4\]]gzhan rnams kyi drung na sdod do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/_byang chub sems dpa' ring zhig thogs te 'di ltar dro'i dus las yol gyis bltar 'gro'o zhes de shing rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub sems dpa' tshol zhing shing 'dzam 
[\[21a.5\]]bu'i drung du phyin to/_/de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/_shar phyogs su 'bab/_shar phyogs su bab par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ngo /_/rgyal po 
[\[21a.6\]]zas gtsang gis nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/_shar phyogs su 'bab/_shar phyogs su bab par gyur na/_shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[21a.7\]]gzhon nu ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_'di ltar da nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/_shar phyogs su 'bab/_shar phyogs su bab par gyur na/_shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngo mtshar che'o snyam 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]mo/_/de nas dga' ba'i bsti stang byas te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar bltam tshes ni g.yos pa ltar/_/'dzam bu'i grib ma khyod sku mi gtong ba/_/blo chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di ste/_/kun gzigs khyod kyi 
[\[21b.2\]]zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas shing rtar zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na gter skyong ba skra dang kha spu dang sen mo ring ba gter thogs te byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad 
[\[21b.3\]]ces gsol to/_/lha gter 'di rnams bzhes shig_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_'di gang gi lha skyes bu gang zhig dus las 'das pa de rnams kyi lags so/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_'di rnams kyis chog gis re zhig de rnams kyi blun po 
[\[21b.4\]]yongs su gzung ba byas nas ci zhig byas khyed nga la dgos pa med kyis song shig_/tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsungs pa/_gang gis nga la 'chi ba'i gtam smras pa/_/de dag kyang shi gtam du gyur pa yin/_/bdag kyang shi nas ring por mi thogs par/_/gzhan dag gi yang 
[\[21b.5\]]gtam du 'gyur bar 'ong /_/de rnams kyis yang sgra phyung ba/_gzhon nu gal te mi bzhes na bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpas ci bde bar zhugs shig ces gsungs pa dang /_de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i 
[\[21b.6\]]ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya dgos te 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi nang nas gshegs pa na/_lha 
[\[21b.7\]]rnams kyis mi ro rnam par sngos pa dang /_rnam par rnags pa dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang /_rnam par bam pa dang /_rnam par zos pa zhig bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas skyo ba 'khrungs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]sems dpa' lam gzhan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par byas so/_/de nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi'i bud med kyi tshogs skar khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_ba gam dag na byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing 'dug pa dang /_shAkya dus legs 
[\[22a.2\]]kyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' la rtog pa na rkang pa'i mthe bos sa la brkos te khrag byung yang ma tshor ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang sa 'tsho ma la gzigs pa na phyag g.yas kyis mda' phye mar rlags so/_/kha lo bas
