[\[22a.3\]]lcags mda' phul ba dang de yang phye mar rlags so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/_'dis ni gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus so snyam mo/_/de nas kha lo sgyur bas shing rta drangs pa dang /_shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes zhes bya bas byang 
[\[22a.4\]]chub sems dpa' shing rtar zhugs te byon pa mthong ba dang /_yang steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kye ma 'di yi yum bde zhing /_/yab kyang shin tu bde ba yin/_/kye ma gang gi khyim thab gyur/_/bud med de yang mya ngan 'das/_/skyes 
[\[22a.5\]]mchog bsam gtan pa de yis/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra gsan nas/_/mya ngan 'das pa zhi nyid du/_/mkhyen nas de la thugs dgyes gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra gsan pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes la dgyes te mgul nas mu tig phreng cig phog ste/_
[\[22a.6\]]'phangs nas shing rta de la bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do/_/phreng ba de yang de'i mgul du 'khris par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/_'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dang bstun par nus so snyam nas sa 'tsho ma bud med nyi 
[\[22a.7\]]khris bskor ba dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes kyang bud med nyi khris bskor ba byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/_/de ltar na grags 'dzin ma dang /_sa 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes la sogs pa btsun mo stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur to/_/mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te byang 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]chub sems dpa' lo bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te ma la bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che zhig sbyin par bya'o snyam 
[\[22b.2\]]nas phal po che byin no/_/mtshan mkhan gyis gal te byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga shin tu 
[\[22b.3\]]yang mang du byin te 'di ltar yang 'di la mngon par dga' bas rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/_kye kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur bar shoms 
[\[22b.4\]]shig dang /_der zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/_/zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la bsgo ba/_kye kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang der zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/_/lha 
[\[22b.5\]]bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po myur du bshams te byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bcibs 
[\[22b.6\]]pa bzang po bshams lags kyis/_lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/_
[\[22b.7\]]sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing /_lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba de'i skra se ba/_ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/_sgur 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing /_lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba de'i skra se ba/_ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/_lha mi 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_lha mi 'di ring 
[\[23a.2\]]por mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas de rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rga ba'i chos dang /_rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_lha yang rga ba'i chos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig_/pho brang nyid du 
[\[23a.3\]]'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas nga rga ba las ma 'das so zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/_/kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir sgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du byon nas nga yang rgas pa las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces 
[\[23a.4\]]mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/'dir smras pa/_dar yol rgas shing sgur la mgo skya ba/_/lag na 'khar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas/_/'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes grag ces/_/de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[23a.5\]]zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/_skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' 'am/_lha ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs pa na/_
[\[23a.6\]]mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing /_lus 'dar zhing mchi la de'i skra se ba/_ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kha lo 
[\[23a.7\]]sgyur ba mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing /_lus 'dar zhing 'gro la de'i skra se ba/_ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]des 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas lha de ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/des 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rga 
[\[23b.2\]]ba'i chos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha yang rga ba'i chos dang /_rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/des 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig_/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/
[\[23b.3\]]'di ltar pho brang du phyin nas nga rga ba las ma 'das so zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/_/lha gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te/_de nas rga ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems 
[\[23b.4\]]te/_mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyis tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang /_gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 
[\[23b.5\]]'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che zhig byin la ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che byin te ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung 
[\[23b.6\]]bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/_/'dir smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba'i tshig de thos pa dang /_/gzhon nu la ni yab de dogs bzhin du/_/de tshe slar dga' nags su mi 'gro'i phyir/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lngar bcas mang du byin/_/de nas chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal 
[\[23b.7\]]gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la kye kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang de la nga zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kye kha lo sgyur ba 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig_/de la nga zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[24a.2\]]shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags na/_lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed 
[\[24a.3\]]mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/_skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam 
[\[24a.4\]]chung ba dbang po nyams pa/_skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/_lha 'di ni bro nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba bro nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_lha mi 'di gang gis 'gum par 'gyur ba'i gnas de mchis te/_lha 'di ni bros thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/
[\[24a.5\]]kha lo sgyur ba nga yang nad kyi chos dang nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_lha yang snyun gyi chos dang snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig_/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar pho brang du phyin nas nga nad las ma 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don de nyid bsam 
[\[24a.6\]]par bya'o/_/kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/_der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/'dir smras pa/_mi ni lus rid skya bo rbab rbab po/_/
[\[24a.7\]]rang dbang med pa'i nad thebs 'dir gzigs nas/_/nad las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces/_/de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]byung ngam/_/skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/_/lha ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na/_mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/_/skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/_/
[\[24b.2\]]gzigs nas kyang bdag la bka' stsal pa/_kha lo sgyur ba mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/_skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha 'di ni bro nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/des 'di skad ces 
[\[24b.3\]]gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mi 'di gang gnod pa 'dis 'gum pa'i gnas mchis te/_lha de ni bros thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/des 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba nga yang nad kyi chos dang 
[\[24b.4\]]nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha yang snyun gyi chos dang snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/des 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig_/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin 
[\[24b.5\]]nas nga nad las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas nga yang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram 
[\[24b.6\]]ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/'dir smras pa/_de tshe dga' nas bdag ngor mi gzhug phyir/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang /_/reg bya yid du 'ong ba gtso rnams kyi/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yang 
[\[24b.7\]]byin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe/_kha lo sgyur ba la bka' stsal pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]pa dang /_khyogs khyer ba dang /_mdun nas me sgron thogs pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang /_bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin du 'brang ba zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_
[\[25a.2\]]kha lo sgyur ba ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres pa dang /_khyogs khyer ba dang /_mdun nas me sgron thogs pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang /_bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin du 'brang ba 'di ci yin/_lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/_/
[\[25a.3\]]kha lo sgyur ba shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_lha mi 'dis slan chad sdug pa'i pha ma mi mthong zhing bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las bgyid pa dang /_/zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang ma lags la de dag gis kyang slan chad 'di mi mthong bas lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/_/
[\[25a.4\]]kha lo sgyur ba nga yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_lha yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig_/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas nga 'chi ba las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i 
[\[25a.5\]]don de nyid bsam par bya'o/_/kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang 'chi ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/'dir smras pa/_tshe zad pa yis 
[\[25a.6\]]'du shes bral gyur cing /_/sems med mi yi ro zhig gzigs nas ni/_/'chi las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces/_/de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/'dir smras 
[\[25a.7\]]pa/_grong khyer dam pa dpal ldan yid 'ong der/_/lha yi lhar gyur sgron ma dang mtshungs pa/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga pos kun dgyes pa/_/mig stong dga' ba'i tshal na gnas pa bzhin/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya dgos te 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas de rnams kyis mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa/_lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa zhig khyim nas khyim dang /_khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro 
[\[25b.2\]]ba zhig sprul to/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa lag 
[\[25b.3\]]pa na lhung bzed thogs pa zhig khyim nas khyim dang /_khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba mi skra bregs shing lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /_khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la 
[\[25b.4\]]'di'i gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba ci yin/_lha de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_lha rab tu byung ba de ni dul ba legs pa dang /_yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /_don spyod pa 
[\[25b.5\]]legs pa dang /_chos spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang /_kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba ste/_lha 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes 
[\[25b.6\]]bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta 'di rab tu byung ba gang na ba de logs su sgyur cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas shing rta de rab tu byung ba gang na ba der bsgyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub 
[\[25b.7\]]pas rab tu byung ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye mi khyod ci'i phyir skra bregs shing lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /_khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la khyod kyi gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba yin/_des 'di 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu bdag ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/_/kye mi khyod ji ltar na rab tu byung ba zhes bya/_/gzhon nu bdag gis dul ba legs pa dang /_yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /_don spyod pa legs pa dang /_chos 
[\[26a.2\]]spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas/_skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/_/kye mi 
[\[26a.3\]]khyod kyis dul ba legs pa dang /_yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /_don spyod pa legs pa dang /_chos spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa 
[\[26a.4\]]yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba legs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig_/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas don 'di kho na bsam 
[\[26a.5\]]par bya'o/_/kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir sgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/_der pho brang du gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa kye ma'o bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung 
[\[26a.6\]]bar bya'o snyam pa'i don de nyid dgongs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos rmi lam rmis pa dbang po'i tog lhung ba dang /_shAkya rnams phyag dar gyis khengs pa dang /_sa ldog 
[\[26a.7\]]pa dang /_dpal khyim nas byung ba dang /_phyi rol na skad cig cing ngu zhing dgod pa la bdag nyid lta ba dang /_nyi ma gang nas shar ba de nyid nas nub pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpas de gsan pa dang /_dgongs pa nga ni shAkya rnams kyi dbang po'i tog gi gnas yin pa dang /_
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]nga grong khyer nas 'byung na dpal 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang rmi lam rmis pa dpal gyi mal khri chag pa dang /_pha'i rgyud chad pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpas de gsan pa dang /_de de bzhin te/_nga ni grags 'dzin ma'i dpal gyi gnas su 
[\[26b.2\]]gyur pa dang /_zas gtsang ma'i pha'i rigs rgyud kyi gnas su gyur pas nga rab tu byung na shAkya rnams kyi rigs rgyud chad par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mkhan rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du gal te gzhon nu zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[26b.3\]]por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/gal te de yi bzang po gzigs bzhed na/_/de slad dgung bdun bar du srungs shig dang /_/mi dbang gdugs ni bdal bar gyur pa lta'i/_/rin chen sna bdun 'byung bar the tsom med/_/khyod sras 
[\[26b.4\]]rin chen bdun po yi/_/dbang phyug gi ni rgyal por 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho la ni thug pa'i sa/_/chad pa med pas skyong bar 'gyur/_/'on te sa ni spangs nas su/_/bsnyengs med nags su bzhud na ni/_/thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas/_/'gro ba sgrol ba mdzad 
[\[26b.5\]]par 'gyur/_/zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang zas gtsang dang /_zas dkar dang /_bre bo zas dang /_bdud rtsi zas bzhi lhan cig gcig tu tshogs nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[26b.6\]]shAkya thub pa la gal te zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis de lta bas na bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhag bdun gyi bar du bsgrims te bsrung bar bya zhing grong khyer yang legs par bsrung bar bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[26b.7\]]de rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer ra ba rim pa bdun dang /_'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo 'phar lcags las byas shing sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te/_sgo phye na de'i sgras dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu grag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi na bud med yid 'phrog pa/_gzugs bzang ba rnams dang gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo rnams kyi spyod pas bsnyen bkur byed du bcug go/_/skas shin tu che ba spor rung ba mi lnga brgyas bteg pa byas so/_/
[\[27a.2\]]chibs bsngags ldan gyi sa phyogs ni zangs ma'i glegs bus g.yogs shing gser gyi sil dkrol gyi dra ba btags pas bskor to/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi skyes pa med par zhugs nas/_pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_khar rnga dang /_sgra 
[\[27a.3\]]snyan la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad dag nye bar len cing 'byor pa chen pos bzhugs so/_/mtshan mo ni rgyal po zas gtsang yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang shar sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go/_/lho phyogs na ni bre bo zas so/_/nub phyogs na ni zas dkar ro/_/byang phyogs 
[\[27a.4\]]na ni bdud rtsi zas so/_/grong khyer gyi dbus kyi 'dram po byed pa ni shAkya ming chen dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'o/_/de shar sgor song nas smras pa/_su zhig mel tse byed/_su zhig mel tse byed/_rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_kho bo mel tse byed 
[\[27a.5\]]do/_/lha mel tse mdzod cig_/mel tse mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur zhes smras te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'jig rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs/_/gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song /_/'di ni mi nyal rtag tu mkhas/_/de bas ma nyal mel tse byos/_/lho 
[\[27a.6\]]sgor song nas smras pa/_su zhig mel tse byed/_su zhig mel tse byed/_bre bo zas kyis smras pa/_kho bo mel tse byed do/_/lha mel tse mdzod cig_/mel tse mdzad dang /_khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'jig rten gnyid 
[\[27a.7\]]log ro dang mtshungs/_/gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song /_/gnyid log 'chi bdag dbang du song /_/de bas ma nyal mel tse byos/_/nub sgor song nas smras pa/_su zhig mel tse byed/_su zhig mel tse byed/_zas dkar gyis smras pa/_kho bo mel tse byed do/_/
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]lha mel tse mdzod cig_/mel tse mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gnyid log pa ni rtag tu myos/_/myos 'gyur bre bos 'thungs pa nyal/_/dgon pa nags su nyal ba 'dras/_/de bas ma nyal mel tse byos/_/byang sgor 
[\[27b.2\]]song nas smras pa/_su zhig mel tse byed/_su zhig mel tse byed/_bdud rtsi zas kyis smras pa/_kho bo mel tse byed do/_/lha mel tse mdzod cig_/mel tse mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ri nyal ri sul nyal ba bzhin/_/rgya 
[\[27b.3\]]mtsho'i chur ni nyal ba dang /_ljon shing rtse la nyal ba bzhin/_/de bas ma nyal mel tse byos/_/dbus kyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag tu song nas smras pa/_su zhig mel tse byed/_su zhig mel tse byed/_srungs ma rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag mel tse bgyid do/_/
[\[27b.4\]]mel tse byos shig_/mel tse byas dang legs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_chos spyod chos ma yin ma spyod/_/bden par smros shig [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ma smra/_/mun pa chen por 'jug par 'gyur/_/de bas ma nyal mel tse byos/_/de nas nam 
[\[27b.5\]]nangs nas shAkya ming chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/_lha dgung sangs lags te/_dgung bdun la dgung gcig ni thal dgung drug ni lus so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_legs kyis zhag drug 'das nas gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur bar gyur na bdag 
[\[27b.6\]]cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin 'dong ngo /_/de bzhin du dgung gcig lus so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_mi dbang shAkya'i sras po thub pa 'di/_/bdag nyid chen po pha rol phyin drug rdzogs/_/thugs 
[\[27b.7\]]rnams dgyes par mdzad pa dka' thub tshal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su gshegs par bzhed/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag la gzhan dag gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ni skyes pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir grags 'dzin ma dang /_
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]sa 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes dang /_bud med drug khri spangs nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gzhi de las kha zer bar 'gyur du 'ong gis ma la bdag gis grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam nas des grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad 
[\[28a.2\]]pa dang grags 'dzin ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_nam nangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i snyan du gsol lo snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_bud med dang 
[\[28a.3\]]bdag khyim nyal ba'i/_/tha ma deng gi 'di yin te/_/phyin cad khyim du bud med dang /_/nga ni lhan cig mi gnas so/_/de nas bud med de rnams gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mos ngal zhing lci la dub nas kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la gos dang lag pa dag lhug par btang nas bla 
[\[28a.4\]]ba'i tshig byung rgyal du rdol zhing gnyid log go/_/byang chub sems dpas bud med de dag thams cad kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la gos dang lag pa dag lhug par btang nas/_bla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du rdol zhing gnyid log pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang btsun mo'i 
[\[28a.5\]]'khor la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba 'khrungs pa dang tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_rlung gi shugs kyis pad ma'i tshal ltar sa gzhi 'dir/_/lag pa dag dang rkang pa brkyang nas 'gyel 'gyur te/_/skra rnams zhig cing 
[\[28a.6\]]mdoms dang rkub kyi phyogs snang ba/_/shAkya'i sras kyis gzigs nas rang bzhin skyo bar 'gyur/_/tshul dang bral ba'i bud med na chung tshogs 'di dag_/dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin 'drar mthong nas/_/sems can byis pa'i spyod yul la ni deng dga' na/_/sems 
[\[28a.7\]]dang blo gros dran dang bral ba yin nam ci/_/'dod pa tha chad 'dam dang mda' mdung dug me 'dra/_/rmi lam lta bu yin te tshwa chu'i ro dang mtshungs/_/'dod pa phung byed rtsod dang sdig pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/mtha' ngan sbrul gyi kha 'dra bdag gis spang bar bya/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]dpa' gzims mal chen po la gzims pa na/_mtshan mo de nyid la rmi lam lnga rmis pas chen po nyid gzims mal du byas shing ri rab ri'i rgyal po dbu rten du bcug_/phyag g.yon pa shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug_/phyag g.yas pa nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug_/
[\[28b.2\]]zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa dang /_'greng ba zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i rigs lte ba nas byung nas nam mkha'i bar du 'phags te 'dug pa dang /_bya kun nas dkar la mgo nag pa rnams kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas pus mo'i lha nga la thug pa'i bar du lta ba dang /_bya sna tshogs 
[\[28b.3\]]phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs nas mdun du kha dog gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_mi gtsang ba'i ro'i steng nas bdag nyid mi gtsang bas ma gos par 'chag pa'o/_/de lta bu rmis nas kyang thugs dgyes te dgongs pa nga'i rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis pas ring po mi thogs pa kho nar bla na med pa'i 
[\[28b.4\]]ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/grags 'dzin mas kyang rmi lam du mthong ba bdag gi so kun lhags pa dang /_dung gi dpung pa chag pa dang /_zla ba sa la lhung ba dang /_skar ma rnams ni ngu ba'o/_/grags 'dzin mas kyang rmi lam rmis pa de byang chub sems 
[\[28b.5\]]dpa' la gsol pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_khyod kyi so ni kha nang gnas/_/zla ba 'di ni mkhar gnas kyis/_/yid kyi gdung ba bsal nas ni/_/dogs med bde bar gnyid log cig_/de nas grags 'dzin ma 'di snyam du sems te/_rmi lam 
[\[28b.6\]]'jigs pa rmis pa na/_/bdag yid dogs dang bcas par 'gyur/_/deng gi mtshan mo sdug pa dang /_/'bral bdag tu mi 'gyur grang /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ji ltar rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on 
[\[28b.7\]]kyang rkyen gyis bsgrub par bya dgos te/_'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nags kyi spre'u 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]ni spyod yul rgyu 'dra zhing /_/yan par 'dug pa'i rte'u dang 'dra ba'i thugs/_/gal te 'dod pa'i yon tan las bzlog na/_/de las shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba gzigs/_/blo gros bzang po bzhengs shig bzhengs/_/sa ni spangs te bzhud mdzod 
[\[29a.2\]]la/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes nas ni/_/'gro ba dag ni bsgral bar mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa ni/_/kau shi ka ma mthong ngam/_/nga ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bdag po rgyas bskor ltar/_/mi ni mthu ldan gzhu mtshon ral gri thogs/_/rta glang shing rta dpung tshogs 
[\[29a.3\]]mang po yis/_/grong khyer ser skya kun nas yongs su bskor/_/zas gtsang la sogs shAkya'i tshogs 'di dag_/glang chen rta zhon legs par go bgos lus/_/mi sdug sna tshogs lag na mtshon thogs te/_/khyams dang rta babs khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhi nang gnas/_/
[\[29a.4\]]pho brang dang ni khyim sgo dang /_/de bzhin grong khyer sgo dag kyang /_/bcad nas gtan pa dam bcug ste/_/de bzhin kun nas bsrungs par gyur/_/ru dung pa Ta ha sgra rnga sgra yis/_/khyams dang rta babs khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nang gnas shing /_/glang chen rta dmag 'bad pa'i skye bo'i 
[\[29a.5\]]tshogs/_/rgyun du nga mi gtang phyir srung bar byed/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_des pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dang /_/sdug bsngal gyis gdungs 'jig rten 'di dang yang /_/khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs mdzod la/_/khab dag spangs te nges par 'byung bar 
[\[29a.6\]]mdzod/_/ji ltar khyod ni bgegs med par/_/deng nyid nags su gshegs 'gyur ba/_/bdag cag tshangs sogs bcas pa yi/_/lha rnams kyis ni de bzhin bgyi/_/byang chub sems dpas legs so zhes gsungs nas thugs dgyes par gyur to/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang 
[\[29a.7\]]po brgya byin gyis gnyid kyis myos par byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen la bsgo ba/_grogs po byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas babs kyis skas long shig_/des skas blangs pa la byang chub sems dpa' babs pa dang de nas brgya byin gyis brda byas 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]ma thag tu zhabs 'bring ba 'dun pa gang na ba der gshegs na ji tsam na 'dun pa gnyid stug pos non par gzigs nas byang chub sems dpas bsgrims te bslang nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs pa/_'dun pa longs kye khyim nas myur bar ni/_/nga yi rta pho rin chen bsngags 
[\[29b.2\]]ldan long /_/sngon gyi rgyal bas longs spyad dka' thub tshal/_/thub rnams dgyes pa mdzad par nga gshegs so/_/'dun pa gnyid log pa'i mig phye nas smras pa/_lha khyod skyed mos tshal gyi dus ma bab/_/des pa khyod dang 'ga' yang 'khon ma mchis/_/khyod la dgra bo su yang ma mchis 
[\[29b.3\]]na/_/dgung phyed khyod la bcibs pa ci zhig bgyi/_/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_'dun pa khyod kyis lan 'ga' yang /_/nga yi tshig ni ma bcag na/_/nga yi deng dus tha ma la/_/nga yi tshig 'di ma gcag shig_/'dun pas gsol pa/_gzhon nu mtshan mo 'di ni 'jigs pa dang 
[\[29b.4\]]'jigs su rung ba mchis pas bdag bcibs pa mi len no/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_lan dang yang lan gyis gdon mi za bar skye bos da par 'gyur gyis bdag nyid song la rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan sta gon bya'o snyam nas de nas nyid kyis pho brang gi sgo phye nas 
[\[29b.5\]]rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan gzung bar brtsams pa na mjing kyog byed la phar bros tshur bros shing 'dug tu mi btub bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pa mnga' ba/_skrag pa rnams dbugs 
[\[29b.6\]]'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs nas gsungs pa/_bsngags ldan tha ma yi ni khur long ste/_/dka' thub nags su ma thogs nga skyol cig_/byang chub thob nas myur du 'gro ba kun/_/bsam gtan rnam thar char gyis tshim par bya/_/chos nyid kyis dud 'gro yang gdams na 
[\[29b.7\]]phyi lang mi byed pas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan mi g.yo bar 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thugs dgyes pa skyes te rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan bstad do/_/ji tsam na shAkya ming chen 'dram po byed pa skye bo nyul zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]gshegs par chas pa mthong ngo /_/de nas skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas smras pa/_gzhon nu 'di ci mdzad/_ming chen 'gro'o gzhon nu 'di ni rigs pa ma lags so/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_ming chen 'di nyid rigs pa yin te/_
[\[30a.2\]]gang gi phyir ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa des na dang ci khyim na 'dug phod dam/_'di ni nges te dka' thub kyi tshal du 'gro'o/_/gang zhig 'bar ba'i khyim chen las/_/mkhas rnams 
[\[30a.3\]]myur du 'byung ba la/_/legs min smra bar mi 'os kyi/_/de ni bsngags par 'os nyid yin/_/de bzhin rgan da 'chi ba yis/_/rab 'bar srid pa'i gzeb las ni/_/'byung bar 'dod gyur gang yin la/_/'dir ni mi rigs ci zhig mthong /_/de ltar gsung drag pos spyos pa 
[\[30a.4\]]dang /_ming chen gdong las mchi ma char bzhin du 'bab cing cho nge 'debs pa la zhugs te kyi hud/_deng du rgyal po zas gtsang dang /_/shAkya dag ni thams cad kyis/_/yang dang yang du bsam pa yi/_/re ba 'bras bu med par gyur/_/deng du rgyal po zas gtsang ni/_/sras kyi 
[\[30a.5\]]mya ngan gyis gdungs pa/_/lag bsgreng bzhin du sdug bsngal zhing /_/mi bzad sgra ni 'byin par 'gyur/_/sa 'tsho grags 'dzin [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes/_/de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa'ang /_/don grub dang ni bral ba yis/_/shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[30a.6\]]smras nas/_de dngangs pas grags 'dzin ma bslang ste smras pa/_don grub 'di ni shes gyur gyis/_/khyim thab sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas/_/sdug bsngal nyam thag du ma 'ong /_/khyim thab sdug pa de zlog shig_/khyed kyi khyim thab gshegs gyur 'di ni mthong dka' ste/_/
[\[30a.7\]]khyod kyis 'di ltos khyim thab mthong ba'i tha ma yin/_/kyi hud phongs pa bdag gis mtshan mo khus btab kyang /_/sus kyang lan ma ster bas bdag gis ma nyes so/_/des ni de ltar khus btab kyang /_/'di ltar lha rnams byin brlabs kyis/_/dgon par 'o dod bos pa bzhin/_/
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]'ga' yang sad par ma gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gang bdag gis yab la ma bltas par 'gro ba ni nga'i tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no snyam nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid 
[\[30b.2\]]kyis non par gyur to/_/de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te ji ltar nga 'jig rten thams cad kyi phar gyur cing 'jig rten gyi bla ma dang /_'jig rten gyi thu bo yin mod kyi de ltar na yang pha dang ma ni skyes bu'i slob dpon du gyur pa dang /_lhar gyur pa dang /_tshangs par gyur pa yin zhing shin tu 
[\[30b.3\]]phan pa byed pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas yab kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de bskor ba lan gsum mdzad nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/bdag kyang yid la brtser ldan zhing /_/bdag kyang nye du rnams la dga'/_/'on kyang 'khor ba rang bzhin ngan/_/'di mthong nas ni mchi ba lags/_/gal 
[\[30b.4\]]te rgan da 'chi ba dang /_/sdug pa'i gnyen bral las byung ba'i/_/gnod byed sdug bsngal ma mchis na/_/khyod ni spong bar su zhig byed/_/gang phyir mi 'dod bzhin du ni/_/rab che gnyen gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_/mdza' bshes chung ma dbang phyug rnams/_/yun mi ring bar 'khor bar 'gyur/_/de bas ma 
[\[30b.5\]]chags yid kyis ni/_/'khor ba las ni rnam grol phyir/_/brtser ldan nye du spangs nas ni/_/skye bo med nags bstan pa lags/_/lus can 'du ba nges par ni/_/mthar ni 'bral 'gyur nyid lags pas/_/bdag ni rjes su dgongs nas ni/_/rmongs pas thugs ngan ma mdzad cig_/
[\[30b.6\]]ces gsungs nas chas so/_/de nas ming chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma bslang ste smras pa/_don grub 'di ni bzhud lags kyis/_/sa bdag de ni zlog par mdzod/_/sras kyi mya ngan gyis thebs nas/_/sdug bsngal gyis gdungs bshums 'gyur mchi/_/ma stes te de 
[\[30b.7\]]yang gnyid ma sad do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu myu gu dang /_mang ku ra dang /_'od zer can dang /_lo ma gyon pa ste bzhi la smras pa/_grogs po dag khyed rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' gdeg par nus sam/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_shin tu yang nus 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]lags so/_/khyed rnams la stobs ci tsam yod/_myu gus smras pa/_bdag gis ni sa la ri ji snyed yod pa de phrag pa gcig tu thogs te nyam nga ba chung ngus 'gro nus pa de tsam gyi stobs yod do/_/mang ku ras smras pa/_bdag gis kyang sa la chu ji snyed 
[\[31a.2\]]yod pa de thams cad phrag pa gcig tu thogs nas 'gro nus so/_/'od zer can gyis smras pa/_bdag gis kyang sa la rdul ji snyed yod pa de thams cad phrag par thogs te nyam nga ba chung ngus 'gro nus so/_/lo ma gyon pas smras pa/_bdag gis kyang sa la rtswa dang shing dang 
[\[31a.3\]]yal ga dang lo ma ji snyed pa de thams cad phrag pa gcig tu thogs te nyam nga ba chung ngus 'gro nus so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po dag stobs 'di dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' gdeg par nus kyis de nas myu gu dang /_mang ku ra dang /_'od zer can 
[\[31a.4\]]dang /_lo ma gyon pa ste/_bzhis chibs rin po che bsngags ldan khyer te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' ci la bzhugs/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te 'di rnams ni bdag cag gis byang chub 
[\[31a.5\]]sems dpa' bteg ste/_bar snang la khyer ro zhes dregs pa skye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_de rnams kyis bsgul bar yang ma nus nas ngo mtshar skyes te gsol pa/_gzhon nu bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems 
[\[31a.6\]]dpa' rnams la stobs 'di 'dra ba mnga' bar ma 'tshal to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chibs rin po che bsngags ldan la bcibs te 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus chibs rin po che bsngags ldan dang 'dun 
[\[31a.7\]]pa steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags so/_/de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bskor cing dong ste g.yas phyogs nas gzugs na 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang spyod lam zhi ba dang /_g.yon phyogs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyis rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas lha'i rol mo'i khyad par sna tshogs dang /_mdun nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa rang rang gi spyod lam gyis dong ngo /_/nam mkha'i ngos la 
[\[31b.2\]]gnas pa'i lha brgya stong du mas ni byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor ro/_/a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i phye ma dang /_/lha'i me tog man dA ra 
[\[31b.3\]]bas kyang gtor to/_/lha'i rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs kyang brdungs so/_/gos rnams kyang gtor ro/_/'dir smras pa/_mkha' la lha rnams ga zha'i sgra chen 'byin byed la/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis gos kyi g.yab mo 'debs byed cing /_/kha cig byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[31b.4\]]ni stod byed de/_/nam mkha' la ni rol mo brgya phrag sgyur bar byed/_/kha cig dag ni sgo rnams 'byed byed cing /_/me tog man dA ra bas 'thor bar byed/_/kha cig dag ni bcibs pa'i rkang 'dzin cing /_/bde bar gshegs la rtog cing rjes bzhin 'brang /_/kha cig dag kyang 
[\[31b.5\]]g.yas nas rjes bzhin 'brang /_/g.yon nas 'gro ba dag kyang rjes bzhin 'brang /_/brgya byin de bzhin tshangs par bcas pa dang /_/lus ngan bdag nyid shul ni mtshon par byed/_/zla ba nya ba rgyu skar tshogs kyis ltar/_/bdag nyid chen po lha tshogs mdun bdar 
[\[31b.6\]]nas/_/dka' thub nags ni thub rnams dgyes byed pa/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su thugs dgyes gshegs/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bsngags ldan la dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir gsungs pa/_ma skyo ma skyo stobs ni gzung bar gyis/_/'gro don dal 
[\[31b.7\]]ba gcig ni de ring long /_/mi ring byang chub thob nas 'gro ba rnams/_/bsam gtan rnam thar gyis tshim byed par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpag tshad bcu gnyis su bzhud nas nang par grong khyer dpe med du byon to/_/de nas lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]byung nas 'di slar yang rang gi grong khyer du 'jug par mi 'gyur ram snyam pa la sku thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa yi/_/lam gyi mchog ni ma thob par/_/grong khyer ser 
[\[32a.2\]]skya'i gzhir ni slar/_/nga ni 'jug par mi bya'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas rang rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/byang chub sems dpas chibs las babs te rgyan bkrol nas 'dun pa la bka' stsal 
[\[32a.3\]]pa/_'dun pa rgyan dang rta khyer la slar song shig_/'dir smras pa/_kha lo sgyur khyod nga yi rta 'di dang /_/rgyan 'di rnams kyang gnyen pa dag la byin/_/nga ni 'dod pa rgya chen spangs nas su/_/da lta 'di nyid du ni rab 'byung bya/_/'dod pa 'di ni spu gri'i so 'dra zhing /_/me 
[\[32a.4\]]'obs 'bar dang mtshungs shing mtha' ngan pa/_/'jig rten phan phyir snying rjes nga spangs te/_/dgon par song nas khyim du phyir mi ldog_/de nas 'dun pa gdong la mchi ma char bzhin 'bab pas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol pa/_seng ge stag gis gtams pa dang /_
[\[32a.5\]]phyugs rdzis gtams pa'i nags tshal du/_/'ba' zhig sku gnyen dang bral bas/_/'phags pa ji ltar spyod par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_skye dgu 'di ni skye na gcig pu skye/_/de bzhin 'chi na'ang gcig pu 'chi bar 'gyur/_/'di ni gcig 
[\[32a.6\]]pus sdug bsngal myong 'gyur gyi/_/'khor ba la ni grogs yod ma yin no/_/'dun pas gsol pa/_kyi hud gzhon nus sdug bsngal ma gzigs te/_/zhabs 'jam glang chen rta la chibs goms pa/_/sa gzhi rtswa dang rdo bas gtams rtsub par/_/ji ltar zhabs kyis 
[\[32a.7\]]gshegs shing nags su rgyu/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_'chi bdag 'jigs pa de ni lan 'ga' yang /_/skyid la med min bde bar goms la min/_/mgon bcas la min rigs btsun la ma yin/_/dpa' dang btsun min skye bo dga' la min/_/rga bas 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]'chi bdag 'jigs pa dag_/bskyed nas 'ong bar 'gyur zhes grag_/don ma byas shing ma brtsams par/_/'chi bar yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_'dun pas gsol pa/_rgyal po bgres po ni sras kyi mya ngan gyis 'grongs par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang byang chub 
[\[32b.2\]]sems dpa' byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'dun pa'i tshig thugs la ma bab bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas ud pal sngon po 'dra ba'i ral gri shubs nas phyung nas gtsug phud bregs te/_steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 
[\[32b.3\]]gyis blangs nas bkur sti chen po byas te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer nas gtsug phud kyi mchod pa chen po btsugs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te gzhon nu ni rgyal rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'di bzlog par mi nus so snyam 
[\[32b.4\]]nas dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la gsungs pa/_khyod kyis bsngags ldan pho brang gi nang du ma bkri shig_/de skad ces gsungs pa dang /_'dun pa skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan khrid de yang dang 
[\[32b.5\]]yang du byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing song ste ser skya'i gzhir phyin pa dang der ca co skyes te ji tsam na rgyal po zas gtsang ma la smras pa/_lha gzhon nu byon gyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir yang sgra gsang chen po bsgrags so/_/rta'i rgyal po 
[\[32b.6\]]bsngags ldan pho brang gi nang du zhugs pa dang /_btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis bsngags ldan gyi mgul du 'jus te ngu bar brtsams so/_/bsngags ldan yang dbugs khong du song ste de nyid du dus byas so/_/shi nas de sgra can gyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa 
[\[32b.7\]]zhig gi rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis drang srong ngan spong gi bsti gnas su gshegs pa dang /_de'i tshe drang srong ngan spong gi bu lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de lta bu de byang chub sems dpas 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gzigs nas gsungs pa/_drang srong chen po ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des gsol pa/_bdag gi bsti gnas 'di na shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu chags pa las 
[\[33a.2\]]de rnams snga mkho bzhin du ma gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_drang srong chen po gang gi mthus bsti gnas 'di na shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bur ldan pa de rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste 
[\[33a.3\]]dka' thub kyi nags su gnas pas so/_/gal te des rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par ma gyur na skyed mos tshal 'di de'i yin pa zhig_/de skad ces gsungs pa dang /_drang srong ngan spong gi bus 
[\[33a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' la brtag par brtsams so/_/de nas gzugs bzang zhing zhi ba'i cha byad du mthong nas yun ring du brtags te ngo mtshar skyes nas gsol pa/_kye rab tu byung ba de khyod kho nam lags grang /_byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_drang srong 
[\[33a.5\]]chen po de ltar nges so/_/de nas ngan spong gi bu ya mtshan skyes pa'i mig bgrad de bltas nas byang chub sems dpa' thog mar gdan la spyan drangs te/_me tog dang /_'bras bu bstabs so/_/grong khyer dpe med na khyim bdag phyug pa dang /_nor mang la longs spyod che ba 
[\[33a.6\]]zhes bya ba nas de la khye'u bcu btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_/de dag thams cad kyang rab tu byung nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/ji tsam na bdag nyid chen po de rnams la ma rgan mos sha na'i gos dag cig byin pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[33a.7\]]yum mkhyen par mdzod cig_/rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_shi ba mthong nas kun tu skyo ba'i yid kyis nags su song nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'gyur te/_de bas na bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gnas par mi nus pas na bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/sha na'i gos 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras la khyed kyis phul cig_/bdag nyid chen po de ni bla na med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud par 
[\[33b.2\]]'gyur la khyed kyis kyang 'bras bu chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/rgan 
[\[33b.3\]]mo des kyang 'chi kar gos de dag bu mo la gtad nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras so/_/de'i bu mo de yang nad kyis thebs te 'chi bar shes nas des kyang shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas shing de la gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de la khyod kyis 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras la phul 
[\[33b.4\]]cig ces gsol ba btab bo/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des de dag shes nas blangs te/_de nas rngon pa rgas 'khogs pa lta bu zhig tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas de dag bgos te/_lag pa la mda' gzhu thogs 
[\[33b.5\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i lam kar bsdad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang rim gyis lam der byon nas rngon pa lag na mda' gzhu thogs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang mi de la gsungs pa/_kye nang rje sha na'i 
[\[33b.6\]]gos 'o ni dag ni rab tu byung ba la 'tsham pa yin gyis ka shi ka'i ras phran 'di dag khyer la 'o ni dag nga la byin cig_/des gsol pa/_gzhon nu bdag la gzhan dag khyod kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bkrongs nas ka shi ka'i ras phran gyi gos 'di dag blangs so zhes gzhi des 
[\[33b.7\]]g.yar 'chi bar 'gyur lags pas bdag 'di dag mi 'bul lo/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_kye nang rje nga ni mthu ji lta bu dang ldan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis shes te su zhig gis nga bkrongs par nus/_khyod kyis nga bkrongs par su zhig yid ches kyis bag tsha ba med par 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]byin cig_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas sha na'i gos dag phul te ka shi ka'i ras phran rnams blangs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang sha na'i gos dag 'tsham par ma gyur pa dang /_de 'di snyam 
[\[34a.2\]]du dgongs te kye ma'o sha na'i gos rnams bdag gi sku dang 'tsham par gyur cig snyam nas tshig smras ma thag tu sha na'i gos de dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang 'tsham par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[34a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_da ni bdag rab tu byung zin gyis 'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzo'i gnas dang /_las 
[\[34a.4\]]kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas des shing kar bI ra'i lo ma las lhung bzed byas nas spyod lam zhi bas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi na 'dug pa des 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa 
[\[34a.5\]]dang /_lta ba dang /_rnam par lta ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_chos gos snam sbyar dang /_lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas bsod snyoms spyod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po'i khab na rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig gnas pa 
[\[34a.6\]]la rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam de lta bu ni 'ga' yang med do snyam mo/_/'dir smras pa/_ji ltar mig can 'gro ba ltar/_/rab tu byung ba bsgrags par byas/_/'dis ni brtag par mdzad nas su/_/rab tu byung ba yang dag bzhed/_/khyim gnas 'di ni sdug 
[\[34a.7\]]bsngal te/_/'di ni rdul gyi gnas yin zhing /_/rab tu byung ba bar snang ltar/_/mkhyen nas de tshe rab tu byung /_/rab tu byung nas sku yis ni/_/sdig pa'i las ni spangs pa dang /_gsung gi sdig pa spangs nas ni/_/'tsho ba kun nas dag par mdzad/_/de nas ma 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\](]ged+hA [,]ga d+hA [)]yi ni/_/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs nas/_/mgon po shes bzhin dran ldan pa/_/bsod snyoms phyir ni gshegs pa der/_/bzo sbyangs ma ga d+hA yi bdag_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di na 'dug pas mthong /_/mthong nas sems dang de nas ni/_/blon po rnams la 
[\[34b.2\]]'di skad smras/_/mtshan mchog gis ni rgyas gyur cing /_/kho lag phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/gnya' shing gang du lta ba yi/_/'di la shes ldan dag ltos shig_/spyan mi 'deg la yid gzhungs shing /_/dman pa'i rigs las ma 'khrungs 'di/_/gang du gnas par 
[\[34b.3\]]gshegs 'gyur ba/_/rgyal pos pho nya rjes bzhin btang /_/de nas pho nya la bsgo ba/_/dge slong de ni gar 'gro zhing /_/gang du gnas ni btab pa yi/_/rjes bzhin du ni 'brang bar gyis/_/de ni bsod snyoms gshegs pa na/_/sgo drug legs par bsdams 
[\[34b.4\]]nas ni/_/shes bzhin dran dang ldan pa yis/_/lhung bzed myur du gang bar mdzad/_/bsod snyoms spyad pa byas nas kyang /_/thub pa grong khyer phyir byung nas/_/skya bseng la ni mngon gshegs te/_/de la gnas ni btab par gyur/_/gnas btab pa ni shes nas 
[\[34b.5\]]kyang /_/pho nya gcig gis bsdad byas nas/_/gzhan ni myur du slar log ste/_/rgyal po la ni tshig smras pa/_/rgyal po chen po dge slong de/_/seng ge'am stag gi phru gu dag_/ri sul dag na gnas pa ltar/_/skya bseng gi ni steng na gnas/_/pho nya rnams kyi tshig thos 
[\[34b.6\]]nas/_/sa bdag shing rtar zhugs nas ni/_/de ni blon pos yongs bskor nas/_/myur ba kho nar dong bar gyur/_/bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sar zhon te/_/de ni bzhon pa la babs nas/_/rkang gis nye bar song nas ni/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong /_/
[\[34b.7\]]rgyal po 'dug nas dgyes pa dang /_/mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gsol nas/_/de ni ma khengs mi brlang bar/_/don 'di dag ni rab smras so/_/dge slong lang tsho dang po la/_/bab par yang dag gnas gyur cing /_/'di 'dra gzi brjid ldan pa la/_/bsod snyoms 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]spyod par mdzes ma lags/_/khang pa nyams dga' dag dang ni/_/bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/longs spyod mchog ni khyod gsol na/_/nyid kyi gdung ni zhu yis gsungs/_/rgyal po gangs ri nye ba na/_/yul gyi ljongs ni nor dag dang /_/'bru dag 
[\[35a.2\]]gis ni gang gyur pa/_/ko sa la zhes grags pa yod/_/bu ram shing pa nyi ma'i rus/_/shAkya dag ni de na gnas/_/rgyal po nga ni rgyal rigs te/_/nga ni 'dod pa'i don mi gnyer/_/sa 'di ri dang bcas shing rgya mtshor bcas/_/rin chen kun dang ldan pa 'byor gyur kyang /_/
[\[35a.3\]]mi ni nams kyang ngoms par mi 'gyur te/_/so ga tsha dus shing gi mi bzhin no/_/'dod pa rnams ni sha khon 'brel ces gsungs/_/mi dbang rgal bar dka' zhing 'dam rdzab 'dra/_/sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan 'jigs pa yi/_/rtsa ba'i gtso ste blo ngan rnams 
[\[35a.4\]]kyis bsten/_/rgyal po ngas ni byung ma thag tu yang /_/'dod pa rnams la mi dga'i blo bskyed na/_/'jigs byed chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa dag_/bor ba de ko slar yang ci ltar blang /_/rtse mo sna tshogs yangs par gyur pa yi/_/lhun po gangs can rlung gis bskyod srid kyi/_/nga 
[\[35a.5\]]yi blo ni thar pa la rten pa/_/'dod pa'i shugs kyis bskyod par mi nus so/_/'jig rten 'di ni 'dod par bying gyur nas/_/'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khyam pa la/_/mi dbang nga skyabs yin te gzhan med pas/_/'jigs pa che las de ni thar bar bya/_/'dod pa rnams 
[\[35a.6\]]kyi nyes dmigs mkhyen/_/mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba gzigs/_/spang phyir gang du nga yi yid/_/dga' bdag tu 'gro bar bya/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gsol pa/_kye rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/_des gsungs pa/_bla na med pa 
[\[35a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_kye rab tu byung ba gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la yang dgongs shig_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_de 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]bzhin du bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang ha cang yang mi ring bar drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas der gshegs so/_/de nas spyod pa dang gnas pas bsam gtan la brtson par gnas te/_de rnams gang gi tshe rkang pa gcig 
[\[35b.2\]]gis nyin thun gcig 'greng ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' thun gnyis su bzhugs so/_/gal te de rnams gdung ba lnga'i sbyor bas nyin thun gcig 'dug pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas kyang sbyor ba des thun gnyis su bzhugs so/_/de nas de rnams ya mtshan skyes nas dge 
[\[35b.3\]]sbyong 'di ni chen po zhig go zhes smras pa/_dge sbyong chen po dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas de rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/_/de na kha cig gis gsol pa/_brgya byin nyid do/_/kha cig gis 
[\[35b.4\]]gsol pa/_bdag cag ni tshangs pa nyid do/_/kha cig gis gsol pa/_bdag cag ni bdud nyid do/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_drang srong 'di dag ni slar yang ltung ba/_lam log par zhugs pa'o/_/lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar 
[\[35b.5\]]nus pa ma yin/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par nus pa ma yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas lam de nyid nus pa med par mkhyen nas/_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur 
[\[35b.6\]]la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/ring 'phur gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du kho bo tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gau tam bdag la mi bde ba med kyis ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_ring 'phur 
[\[35b.7\]]khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig rang gi mngon par shes pas rtogs par gyur/_des gsol pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gau tam ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dad pa de la ni nga yang dad la/_sgyu rtsal 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]shes kyi bu ring 'phur la brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab yod pa ltar bdag la yang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yod pas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 
[\[36a.2\]]de snyed mngon sum du byas te/_ci'i phyir bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag mngon sum du mi bya snyam nas de nas byang chub sems dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i 
[\[36a.3\]]phyir dang /_gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtod par gnas te/_gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/_rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar chos de dag mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to/_/
[\[36a.4\]]chos de mngon sum du mdzad nas yang sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/ring 'phur khyod kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon 
[\[36a.5\]]sum du byas sam des 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma mad de bdag gis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag mngon sum du byas so/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ring 'phur bdag gis kyang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 
[\[36a.6\]]bar gyi chos de dag rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma de ltar na khyod kyi ji tsam pa bdag gi yang de tsam la/_bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la 'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra bar thos kyis tshur spyon/_'o skol 
[\[36a.7\]]gnyi gas 'khor 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do/_/de'i rtogs pa dag la yang dga' ba dang /_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]mgu bar gyur to/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas lam de nus pa 
[\[36b.2\]]med par rig nas/_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/lhag spyod gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/des gsol pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma bdag 
[\[36b.3\]]la mi bde ba med kyis khyod ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig_/khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig mngon sum du byas/_tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rangs byed kyi bu lhag 
[\[36b.4\]]spyod dad pa la ni bdag kyang dad la/_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab ni bdag la yod na rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis 'du 
[\[36b.5\]]shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di snyed cig mngon sum du byas na bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag ci'i phyir mngon sum du mi bya snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[36b.6\]]dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gcig pu dben pa/_bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtod par gnas te/_gcig pu dben par bag yod pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar chos de mngon sum du mdzad 
[\[36b.7\]]par gyur to/_/chos de mngon sum du mdzad nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/lhag spyod khyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du chos 'di dag rang gis 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]mngon sum du byas sam/_tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma mad lags te/_bdag gis 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag mngon sum du bgyis so/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_tshe dang ldan pa lhag spyod bdag gis 
[\[37a.2\]]kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gis mngon sum du byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma de ltar na khyod kyi ji tsam pa bdag gi yang de tsam la/_bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la 'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra bar 
[\[37a.3\]]thos kyis tshur spyon/_'o skol gnyi gas tshogs 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rangs byed kyi bu/_lhag spyod byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do/_/de'i shes pa rnams la 
[\[37a.4\]]yang dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[37a.5\]]dpas lam de yang nus pa med par rig nas gshegs so/_/de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyi 'khor gsum dang /_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi 'khor gnyis te drang srong lnga byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brangs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lnga 
[\[37a.6\]]po dang lhan cig gang gA'i lho phyogs na lteng rgyas 'od srung gi sde'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te byon nas de phan tshun 'chag pa na phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa/_nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/_chu klung nai rany+dza nA bsil bar 'bab pa/_gse gu can 'jug 
[\[37a.7\]]ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon po dang /_shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma'o sa phyogs 'di ni dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/_chu 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]klung nai rany+dza nA bsil bar 'bab pa/_gse gu can 'jug ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon po dang /_shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig ste/_kye ma spong ba don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bus nags khrod 'dir brten na spong ba bya bar nus 
[\[37b.2\]]so/_/bdag spong ba don du gnyer ba yin pas/_ma la bdag gis kyang nags khrod 'dir rten la spang bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nags khrod du zhugs te shing gi drung du zhugs nas/_tshems la tshems gtad/_ljags rkan la bcar nas/_thugs 
[\[37b.3\]]kyis thugs mngon du bzung /_mngon du bsdams/_shin tu mngon du bsdams so/_/de thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung /_mngon du bsdams shin tu mngon du bsdams pas/_ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rngul byung bar gyur te/_dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas 
[\[37b.4\]]mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phyin ka log tu bcings/_mngon du bsdams/_shin tu mngon du bsdams na de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rngul byung ba de bzhin du de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' tshems la tshems gtad/_ljags rkan la bcar te/_thugs kyis 
[\[37b.5\]]thugs mngon du bzung /_mngon du bsdams/_shin tu mngon du bsdams pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/des 
[\[37b.6\]]rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub 
[\[37b.7\]]pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang /_rlung thams cad spyi bo'i nang du song nas de'i dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/_/dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba'i spyi bor lcags kyi phur pa rnon po btab na/_de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin tu 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/_brtson 'grus ba rtsams pa yin/_sku ma sbyangs pa ma yin 
[\[38a.2\]]gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin 
[\[38a.3\]]pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[38a.4\]]par brtsams te/_de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba bgags pas rlung thams cad snyan gnyis kyi 
[\[38a.5\]]bu gnas rgyus par gyur to/_/dper na mgar bas sbud pa bus na rlung thams cad kyi rgyun grwa gnyis kyi bu gnas rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na rlung thams cad kyi rgyun snyan gnyis kyi bu gnas 
[\[38a.6\]]rgyus par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis lhag par yang rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[38a.7\]]par bya'o snyam mo/_/des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/_shin tu rgyas par gyur te/_dper na mgar ba mkhas pas sbud pa bus na gang bar gyur/_shin tu gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 
[\[38b.2\]]bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/_shin tu rgyas par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du 
[\[38b.3\]]dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_/de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[38b.4\]]pa na/_zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang /_de'i tshe dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/_/dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung 
[\[38b.5\]]ba'i mgo phreng bas yang nas yang du bcings na/_de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum 
[\[38b.6\]]pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/de lhag par rnam par bam 
[\[38b.7\]]pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]pa dang /_de'i tshe khong du khong gi tshor ba mi bzad pa skyes so/_/dper na ba lang gi shan pa mkhas pa'am/_ba lang gi shan pa'i slob ma mkhas pas ba lang bsad pa'i gri rnon pos ba lang gi lto dral na de'i khong du khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i 
[\[39a.2\]]tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na khong du khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs 
[\[39a.3\]]te ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/de lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs 
[\[39a.4\]]nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa na de'i tshe sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/_/dper na mi shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phyin ka log tu 
[\[39a.5\]]bzung ste me dong gi nang du sbyangs na/_de'i lus la lus kyi gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi 
[\[39a.6\]]brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi bza' ba bsgrub par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha rab tu mang po'i sems kyis 
[\[39a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po gal te khyod mi'i kha zas kyis 'dzem par mdzad/_ngo tsha bar mdzad/_smod par mdzad na/_bdag cag gis 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas lha'i mdangs bsgrub par bgyis khyod kyis bdag gir mdzod cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te bdag gis mi'i kha zas mi bza' bar dam bcas la bdag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du lha rnams 
[\[39b.2\]]kyis lha'i mdangs bsgrubs nas de bdag gir byed pa ni bdag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]yin la/_bdag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gang yin pa de ni bdag gi log pa yin no/_/bdag gi log pa gang yin pa de'i rkyen gyis ni 'di na sems can kha cig lus zhig ste shi nas ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba 
[\[39b.3\]]sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis lha rnams kyi tshig ni thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs la kha zas nyung ba dang cung zad chang chung bza' ba'am yang na mon sran sde'u yi khu ba'am/_'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba'am/_yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras 
[\[39b.4\]]bu'i khu ba btung ngo snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe lha rnams kyi tshig thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs nas zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba'am/_yang na mon sran sde'u yi khu ba'am/_'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba'am/_
[\[39b.5\]]yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras bu'i khu ba gsol lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba na/_yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad kun tu zhum ste/_skam zhing sku dpal chung bar gyur to/_/dper na sdum bu a 
[\[39b.6\]]si ta'i sdong bu dang /_ka li ka'i sdong bu 'jum/_kun tu 'jum pas sha chung zhing skams par gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba na/_yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad zhum/_kun 
[\[39b.7\]]tu zhum ste/_skem zhing sku dpal chung bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba na/_dbu la dbu'i pags pa rnyings kun tu rnyings te/_'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur to/_/dper na ku 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]ba rtsa ba nas bcad na/_rnyis kun tu rnyis pas 'khums la 'bar 'bur du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba na/_dbu la dbu'i pags pa rnyis kun tu rnyis te 'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin te/_brtson 'grus brtsams 
[\[40a.2\]]pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba na/_spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song zhing shin tu phug tu song ste zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang ngo /_/dper na khron 
[\[40a.3\]]pa zab mo'i chur skar ma'i gzugs brnyan phug tu song zhing shin tu phug tu song ste/_zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bar gtam du bya ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba na/_spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song /_shin tu phug tu song ste/_
[\[40a.4\]]zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang yang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba na/_de'i tshe rtsib ma'i bar mtho dman can du gyur te/_
[\[40a.5\]]dper na rtswa khang lo gnyis sam gsum lon pa'i phyam dgu bo mtho dman du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba na/_rtsib ma'i bar mtho dman can du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la 
[\[40a.6\]]sogs pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_cung zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba na/_sgal pa'i tshigs 'di lta ste/_skra'i lan bu lta bur gyur to/_/mjug do ni 'di lta ste/_rnga mo'i rkang pa lta bur gyur to/_/de lan 'ga' ldang bar 'dod na kha sbub 
[\[40a.7\]]tu 'gyel la/_lan 'ga' 'dug par 'dod na gan rkyal du 'gyel lo/_/de ro stod la brten nas ro smad 'jog par byed/_ro smad la brten nas ro stod 'jog par byed do/_/de phyag gnyis kyis sku la byugs te/_de'i phyag gnyis kyis sku la byugs yongs su byugs pa de'i tshe ba spu rnams drung rul bas sa 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]la lhags par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis til 'bru gcig gis zas bza' bar bya'o zhes te des til 'bru gcig gi zas gsol to/_/de til 'bru gcig gi zas gsol ba na yan lag dang nying lag thams cad zhum kun tu zhum ste/_
[\[40b.2\]]skem zhing sku dbal chung bar gyur to/_/til 'bru gcig gis ji lta bar 'bras bu gcig dang /_sran go la 'bru gcig dang /_rgya sran 'bru gcig dang /_mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig dang /_mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig dang /_rtswa'i gding ba la mnal bar mdzad do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis dka' ba spyod pa'i gnas 
[\[40b.3\]]skabs de thos nas nyi ma re re zhing rtog pa nyis brgya lnga bcu gtong bar byed do/_/rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis kyang nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/_/de dag nyi ma re re zhing de gnyis la myur ba myur bar gtam skyel bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di 'dra ba'i dka' ba spyod de/_/til 'bru gcig dang /_'bras 
[\[40b.4\]]'bru gcig dang /_sran go la 'bru gcig dang /_rgya sran 'bru gcig dang /_mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig dang /_mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gi zas gsol zhing rtswa'i gding ba la mnal to zhes smra'o/_/de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bu'i mya ngan gyis non pas lhag par dang ka na zhing mig mchi mas brnangs te 
[\[40b.5\]]gdungs nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas par rtswa'i gding ba la nyal bar byed do/_/grags 'dzin mas kyang de thos pa dang /_khyim thab kyi mya ngan gyis non to/_/til 'bru gcig za ba dang /_de'i rum mi bde ba de nyid du zhu bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te lam 'di yang 
[\[40b.6\]]shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_/ma la bdag gis kha zas shin tu ngan pa bza' bar bya'o snyam ste des kha zas shin tu ngan pa gsol bar 
[\[40b.7\]]mdzad do/_/de la zas phal pa ni 'di yin te be'u byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i 'o ma 'thung ba gang yin pa de rnams kyi gcin dang lci ba yin no/_/de ji srid de'i sku las mdangs de yal bar ma gyur pa de srid du zas gnyis pa mi gsol te/_/yal nas kha zas phyi ma gsol bar mdzad do/_/dur khrod chen por gshegs 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]nas kyang mi ro dbu rten du bcug zhabs la zhabs bzhag ste/_snang ba'i 'du shes dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes yid la mdzad pas glo g.yas pas mnal bar mdzad do/_/de'i tshe grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams dang /_grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma rnams lhags nas shing bus de'i snyan gnyis 
[\[41a.2\]]kyi bu gar 'dzugs par byed rna ba gnyis ka nas 'dren par byed cing 'di skad ces kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za la ltos/_kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za la ltos zhes smra bar yang byed do/_/de'i tshe phyag dar dang bong rdog dang /_gseg mas kyang 'thor bar byed do/_/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni grong khyer gyi gzhon 
[\[41a.3\]]nu rnams sam/_grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma de rnams la ngan sems skyed pa'am sdig pa'i tshig dbyung bar mi dgongs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub chen po la dka' ba spyod pas na/_dge sbyong chen po dge sbyong chen po zhes mtshan du gyur te/_de ltar lo drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad par mdzad do/_/
[\[41a.4\]]de nas lha gsum zhig byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der lhags te/_de nas lha gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nag po zhig go/_/gnyis pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ni nag po ma yin gyis/_'on kyang sngo bsangs zhig go/_/gsum pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[41a.5\]]'di ni nag po yang ma yin/_sngo bsangs kyang ma yin gyi dmar smug zhig go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sku mdog bzang por snang ba ni thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe gsum zhig gsan pa 'di lta ste/_shing rlon pa chu can 
[\[41a.6\]]zhig chu nas phyung ste/_nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang /_de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'dir 'ongs nas des de la gtsub stan byas te/_gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang 'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 'dod 
[\[41a.7\]]pa rnams la lus dang sems kyis thag sring bar mi gnas kyi de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_'dod pa la chags pa dang /_'dod pa la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa la zhen pa dang /_'dod pa la 'chums pa dang /_'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]gnas pa ma yin pas lus dang sems kyis thag sring bar mi gnas pa rnams kyi ni de dang 'dra'o/_/de rnams bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi 'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_
[\[41b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin te/_de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba dang po yin no/_/dper na shing rlon pa chu can zhig chu nas phyung ste nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang /_de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas de la 
[\[41b.3\]]des gtsub stan byas te gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang 'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus kyis spong bar gnas kyi sems kyis ma yin pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa la 'dun 
[\[41b.4\]]pa dang /_'dod pa la chags pa dang /_'dod pa la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa la zhen pa dang /_'dod pa la 'chums pa dang /_'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te gnas pa yin no/_/de rnams bdag nyid la gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba 
[\[41b.5\]]yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi 'on kyang de rnams shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin te/_de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gnyis pa yin 
[\[41b.6\]]no/_/'di lta ste/_shing skam khong stong chu med pa zhig chu dang thag ring por skam la bzhag pa dang /_de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas des de gtsub stan byas te/_gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na yang 'di ltar shing de skam zhing khong stong yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang 'bar du 
[\[41b.7\]]btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang sems kyis thag bsring bar gnas pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_'dod pa la chags pa dang /_'dod pa la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa la zhen pa dang /_'dod pa la 'chums pa dang /_'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te de mi gnas pa yin no/_/de rnams bdag nyid la gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi 'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus/_mthong bar nus/_bla 
[\[42a.2\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus te/_de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gsum pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_/gang su dag sdug bsngal spong bar brtson par gnas pa de thams 
[\[42a.3\]]cad ni 'di tsam du zad de/_de las lhag pa yang med/_de'i gong na yang med na lam 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs 
[\[42a.4\]]te shes par nus pa dang /_mthong bar nus pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa'i lam de gang yin snyam na de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag yab shAkya zas gtsang gi khyim na gnas pa'i tshe zhing las kyi mtha'i drung du song nas shing 'dzam bu'i 
[\[42a.5\]]grib ma la 'dug ste 'dod pa las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa de mngon par dran te/_de ni lam yin/_de
