[\[42a.6\]]ni bsgrub pa yin/_shes par nus pa yin/_mthong bar nus pa yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa yin na/_de la bdag gis bskyed du yang 'di ltar rid cing nyam chung la zhan pas sla ba ma yin te ma la bdag gis ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /_
[\[42a.7\]]ci bder dbugs dbyung ba dang /_ci bder 'bras can dang /_zan dron gyi kha zas rags pa bza' zhing lus mar sar dang til mar gyis byugs la chu 'jam pos lus bkru bar bya'o snyam ste/_de ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /_ci bder dbugs 'byung ba dang /_ci bder 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]'bras can dang /_zan dron gyi zhal zas rags pa gsol zhing sku til mar dang mar sar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad do/_/de nas rim gro ba de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni sdom pa lhod pa/_bya ba mang pa mang pos 'tsho ba 
[\[42b.2\]]spong ba nyams par gyur pa yin te/_'di da ltar 'bras chan dang zan dron gyi kha zas mang du za la lus zhun mar dang /_til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed de 'dis da ni cung zad kyang thob par ma nus so snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' bor te dong ba las 
[\[42b.3\]]rim gyis bA rA Na sIr phyin nas drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis lus kyi stobs dang mthu dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed nas rim gyis sde can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so/_/de ni grong khyer sde can zhes bya ba nai rany+dza 
[\[42b.4\]]nA'i chu bo'i 'gram na bzhugs pa dang /_bram ze lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi grogs bshes su gyur pa de sde can gyi grong khyer na gnas pa dang /_des byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa mdzad pa mthong nas/_grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs 
[\[42b.5\]]ma gnyis la smras pa/_khyed gnyis kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras mtshan mkhan gyis gal te rab tu byung bar ma gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de thos sam/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bdag cag rnams kyis kyang gal te de 'khor 
[\[42b.6\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na bdag cag de'i btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab lags so/_/bram ze lhas smras pa/_bdag nyid chen po de ni dka' thub kyis lus gdungs pas spong ba las bzhengs na khyed gnyis kyis de la thog ma kho nar bsod snyoms phul cig 
[\[42b.7\]]dang /_de khyed cag gnyis kyi yun ring po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas thos pa dang /_ba stong bzhos so/_/bzhos nas kyang ba lnga brgya la blud do/_/ba lnga brgya bzhos nas nyis brgya lnga bcu la blud do/_/nyis 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]brgya lnga bcu bzhos nas kyang brgya la blud do/_/brgya bzhos nas lnga bcu la blud do/_/lnga bcu bzhos nas nyi shu la blud do/_/nyi shu bzhos te me spar nas shel las byas pa'i snod kyi nang du blugs nas 'o thug bskol bar brtsams pa na/_bram ze rnams kyis 
[\[43a.2\]]bsams pa/_'dir nges par bag ma len tam bag ma gtong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas bram ze mang po 'dus par gyur pa dang /_'o thug stong du bsgres pa bskol ba na bum pa bzang po dang /_dpal be'u dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pa'i mtshan ma dag byung ba snang ba dang /_
[\[43a.3\]]kun tu rgyu nye 'gro zhes bya bas mthong nas bsams pa/_'o ma'i thug pa 'di sus 'thungs pa des ni bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis bslang ngo snyam mo/_/de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni dka' thub 
[\[43a.4\]]kyis sku lus nyam chung zhing sku la sbrebs pa dang /_skyems pas nyen pa yin la byang chub sems dpa' 'o thug gsol na bla na med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud par 'gyur na/_bram ze 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis brkam pa dag 'dir 'dus par gyur pas gal te byang chub sems 
[\[43a.5\]]dpa' la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_ri spos kyi ngad ldang nas lha'i sman blangs te de shin tu gzugs bzang ba'i bram ze zhig tu mngon par sprul nas 'o thug de skol ba'i steng du 'dug ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis der sman mthu bskyed pa zhes bya ba blugs so/_/de 
[\[43a.6\]]nas dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa bskol nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod nyid rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras de yin nam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa de ni nga'i mkhan po yin te nga ni de'i slob ma yin 
[\[43a.7\]]no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa blangs so/_/blangs nas kyang dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma gnyis la smras pa/_sbyin pa 'dis khyed gnyis ci zhig don du gnyer gang gi don du yon bsngo bar bya/_de gnyis 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]kyis smras pa/_bsod pa phul ba'i bsod nams ci mchis pas/_/grags dang ldan pa don rnams kun grub pa/_/mi yi mchog gyur blo mchog ldan pa de'i/_/don kun myur du shin tu grub gyur cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung nai rany+dza nAr zhugs 
[\[43b.2\]]nas sku khrus mdzad de/_rgal bar bzhed pa dang /_sku nyam chung ba nyid kyis rgal bar ma spyod pa na lha rnams kyis ardzu na'i yal ga btud pa dang de la 'jus nas byang chub sems dpa' rgal bar mdzad de chos gos man bas nas chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na bzhugs so/_/
[\[43b.3\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar bzhugs par rig nas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa yol gor blugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' la bstabs so/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang gsol nas yon bsngo bar mdzad do/_/
[\[43b.4\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na phan tshun du bzhugs pa'i sa btsal ba dang /_ci tsam na ri brag chen po me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig gzigs nas de de la 'dzegs te phyogs dben zhing gsal ba'i sa phyogs su 
[\[43b.5\]]skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/bzhugs ma thag tu ri de nyid du snyil to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te 'dir rgyu ci zhig yod na ri snyil bar gyur/_cing 'ong ba la lha rnams mngon par mi dga'am 'on te bgegs 'ga' zhig 
[\[43b.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur snyam mo/_/lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas gsol pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad kyis gzung bar rngo mi thogs pa ni gnyis te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa gang lags pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa gang 
[\[43b.7\]]lags pa ste/_khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa lags so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas ma lags te/_'on kyang mdun du bzhud cig dang /_de na rdo rje'i gdan mchis te/_der ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]cad bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cing thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhas lam bstan pa bzhin gshegs pa na de'i zhabs bzhag sar pad ma dag byung bar gyur to/_/rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las kyang chu bab nas pad 
[\[44a.2\]]ma'i rdzing dag byung bar gyur to/_/gom pa bor nas mnan pa na sa chen po 'di khar ba'i snod bzhin du sgra 'byin par brtsams so/_/bya tsa sha dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la skor ba byed do/_/rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang dal bu dal bus rlung 
[\[44a.3\]]gtong bar byed do/_/char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang char pa cung zad 'bebs par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga la 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan ma bzang po byung bar gyur pas deng nyid bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye 
[\[44a.4\]]shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na klu'i rgyal po dus can zhes bya ba long ba zhig gnas te/_der de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i gnas zhig byung bar gyur te/_de sangs rgyas byung ba na mig thob par gyur la/_yongs 
[\[44a.5\]]su mya ngan las 'das pa na slar long bar 'gyur ro/_/de sa'i sgra grag pas gnas nas byung ba dang rgyang ring po kho na nas byang chub sems dpa' sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan la/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/_'od 
[\[44a.6\]]'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer dang /_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa mthong ngo /_mthong ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod par brtsams pa/_dga' ba'i dbyangs kyis 
[\[44a.7\]]kun gang ba'i/_/sa yi sgra ni thos nas kyang /_/klu yi gnas nas byung nas su/_/phyogs kun du yang lta bar byed/_/brang gis 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste/_/klu yi rgyal po mthu chen gyis/_/nai rany+dza nA'i ngogs su ni/_/'jig rten 'dren pa gshegs pa mthong /_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i mthu yis ni/_/klu yis mig ni thob gyur te/_/sems ni dga' zhing yid mgu nas/_/des ni 'di skad tshig gsol to/_/bdag gis sngon ni mthong ba yi/_/sangs rgyas mthu chen de rnams dang /_/thub pa khyod ni mthong gyur na/_/de dang 
[\[44b.2\]]tha dad dbyer ma mchis/_/thub pa ji ltar thog mar ni/_/g.yas pa'i zhabs ni 'degs pa las/_/khyod ni sangs rgyas deng gyur nas/_/'jig rten gyi ni yon gnas 'gyur/_/ji ltar chos gos man bas pa dang /_/nai rany+dza nA'i chu bsil la/_/ji lta bur ni 'jug pa las/_/
[\[44b.3\]]de ring khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/ji ltar rab brtan 'gros su gshegs pa dang /_/ba lang khyu mchog 'gying ba ltar gshegs pas/_/skyes bu khyu mchog chos 'dzin rnams kyi mchog_/deng 'dir khyod ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar mkha' la tsa sha brgya phrag gis/_/
[\[44b.4\]]khyod sku rgya chen rgya chen mdzad de la/_/lding zhing skor bar bgyid par gyur pa las/_/mi mchog deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dri zhim rlung ni ldang ba dang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bya yi tshogs kyang mi skrag la/_/ljon shing rlung gis g.yos par ma gyur pas/_/mi mchog deng ni sangs 
[\[44b.5\]]rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar btsun pa khyod kyi zhal gyi 'od/_/dri med gser 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba de/_/rnam par mdzes shing kha dog ldan pas na/_/mi mchog deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po dus can gyis yang dag par 
[\[44b.6\]]bstod nas rdo rje'i gdan logs su gshegs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te rtswa'i gding ba la 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang /_de la rtswa'i dgos pa byung bar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes nas ri 
[\[44b.7\]]spos kyi ngad ldang las shing bal gyi 'da' ba ltar reg na bde ba'i rtswa khur cig blangs nas rtswa 'tshong bkra shis kyi cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te byang chub sems dpa'i spyan snga na sdod do/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtswa'o ni dag nga la phul cig_/
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gus pa dang bcas pas phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtswa 'tshong bkra shis las rtswa bzhes te lha dang mi rnams kyi yid sdud par byed pa'i spyod lam gyis 'gro 
[\[45a.2\]]ba rnams dad par mdzad cing lha rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam nas byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshegs te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba lta bu'i rdo rje'i gdan la brten zhing nges pas nyid kyis rtswa rnams ma 'khrugs pa dang /_
[\[45a.3\]]stug srab med par bkram nas thugs bskyed cing tshig tu yang gsung ba/_ji srid sdug bsngal kun gyi mtha'i/_/zag zad yang dag ma thob pa/_/de srid srog ni mthar gyur kyang /_/skyil krung 'di ni gzhig mi bya/_/zhes gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i 
[\[45a.4\]]gdan la 'dzegs te brang gis 'gro'i rgyal po gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba lta bu'i skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang dran pa mngon du bzhag nas bzhugs so/_/bzhugs pa'i mod kho na la bdud sdig can gyi gnas g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas bdud 
[\[45a.5\]]sdig can 'di snyam du sems te ci'i phyir nga'i gnas g.yos snyam pa dang /_ci tsam na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya zas gtsang gi bu rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug gis ji tsam 
[\[45a.6\]]bdag gi yul las ma 'das kyi bar du de la bgegs bya'o snyam du bsams nas phrin yig skyel ba skra gyen du 'greng la sha na'i smad g.yogs bgos pa zhig gi kha dog tu mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rtabs par smras pa/_grong khyer ser 
[\[45a.7\]]skya'i gzhi ni lha sbyin gyis mnan/_pho brang ni bcom/_shAkya rnams ni kha btag na/_khyod ci'i phyir gnas btab ste 'dug_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes pa 'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/_/de la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni grags 'dzin ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes dang /_sa 'tsho ma la'o/_/gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ni lha sbyin la'o/_/rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam 
[\[45b.2\]]par rtog pa ni de'i rjes su 'tsho ba'i shAkya rnams la'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ci'i phyir bdag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes snyam na/_ji tsam na bdud sdig can 'di lta ste/_dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs 
[\[45b.3\]]pa gzigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes te/_'di lta ste nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems med pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/_/yang bdud kyis smras pa/_
[\[45b.4\]]khyod ci'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug_/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_khyod kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes ga la thob/_byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_sdig can khyod 
[\[45b.5\]]kyis re zhig mchod sbyin gcig byas pas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par gyur na ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_
[\[45b.6\]]mig dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_dbyig dang /_gser la sogs pa yongs su btang nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te ngas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur ba de srid re skan/_de skad ces 
[\[45b.7\]]bka' stsal pa dang bdud kyis smras pa/_re zhig ji ltar bdag gi mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur ba'i bdag gi dpang ni khyod yin na/_ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa grangs 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_dbyig dang /_gser la sogs pa yongs su btang bar khyod la 
[\[46a.2\]]dpang su yod/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang /_dra bas 'brel pa dang /_bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/_skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas sa la reg par 
[\[46a.3\]]mdzad nas ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_dbyig dang /_gser la sogs pa 
[\[46a.4\]]yongs su btang ba'i nga'i dpang ni sa 'di yin no/_/de nas sa'i lhas sa brtol nas thal mo sbyar te skad phyung ba/_sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin yin no zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /_bdud sdig can cang mi smra bar gyur te zhum zhum por 
[\[46a.5\]]gyur/_bag 'khums par gyur/_spyi bo smad nas spobs pa med la sems khong du chud cing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis zas gtsang gi bu la de ltar byas kyang glags ma rnyed kyis/_ma la 'di la bdag gis yang 
[\[46a.6\]]bgegs shig bya'o snyam nas dpung mchog dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_ra dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_ma he dang /_phag dang /_khyi dang /_'ug pa dang /_ne'u le dang /_spre'u dang /_wa la sogs pa 'dra ba/_ral gri dang /_mda' 
[\[46a.7\]]bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_mdung thung dang /_gzhu dang /_zhags pa dang /_dgra sta dang /_lcags kyi dbyug pa la sogs te mtshon cha rnams 'phyar ba 'jigs su rung ba rnams dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' kun nas yongs su bskor 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]nas gnas shing bdud sdig can rang nyid gzhu rna drung du bkang nas 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rnam pa du ma can/_mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dang chas pa de rnams gzigs nas dgongs pa re zhig skyes pa phal pa zhig dang lhan cig 'thab par rtsom na yang 
[\[46b.2\]]de'i gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyor bar byed na 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug 'di la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyis/_ma la bdag gis gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyar bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabs la dgongs par brtsams so/_/bdud kyang 'byung 
[\[46b.3\]]po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas 'khor lo dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_mda' la sogs te mtshon cha rnams dbab par brtsams so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shel las 
[\[46b.4\]]byas pa'i gzhal yas khang mngon par sprul pa dang /_mtshon cha thams cad gzhal yas khang de'i steng du 'bab pa dang /_gzhal yas khang gi sgras bdud kyi sde thams cad skrag nas kun tu 'byer bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi thun dang po la rtag tu 
[\[46b.5\]]bya ba dang /_'grus skyong dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pas bzhugs so/_/de nam gyi thun dang po la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na de rdzu 
[\[46b.6\]]'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar mdzad de gcig tu gyur cing mang por gyur la/_mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /_snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur pa ye shes gzigs pas nyams su myong bar mdzad do/_/skus rtsig pa dang /_ri dang /_ra ba la 
[\[46b.7\]]yang thad kar gshegs par mdzad de/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /_byi'u zul mdzad de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu'i rgyun la yang mi nyams par gshegs te/_dper nas la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]la skyil mo krung gis gshegs par mdzad de/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang phyag gis nom zhing nyug par mdzad de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang sgyur bar 
[\[47a.2\]]mdzad do/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas/_ma la bdag gis rgyang ring po kho nar 'dug la sgra dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas des 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/
[\[47a.3\]]byang chub sems dpas kyang de bsgrib pa'i phyir dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du shing ka dam pa'i tshal sprul pas des na sgra de rdugs pas mi grag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon 
[\[47a.4\]]par shes pa la sems mngon du bzhag nas des na lha dang mi rnams kyi sgra gang dang gang dag thos par 'dod pa de dag mnyan par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa bzhag pa na de'i lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa 
[\[47a.5\]]mi las 'das pas sgra gnyis po mi rnams kyi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyi dang /_gang dag ring ba dang /_gang dag nye ba yang gsan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug las 
[\[47a.6\]]bdag la su dag ni gnod par sems su dag ni ma yin zhes de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam nas de nam 
[\[47a.7\]]gyi gung thun la sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na de'i thugs kyis sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag gi rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa'i yid ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_'dod 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_zhe 
[\[47b.2\]]sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bral ba dang /_bsdus pa dang /_rnam par g.yengs pa dang /_zhum pa dang /_rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_nye bar ma zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang mnyam par ma bzhag 
[\[47b.3\]]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_ma bsgoms pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_sems rnam par ma grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems la shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes yang 
[\[47b.4\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdud kyi mngag gzhug pa 'di rnams las su dag tshe rabs gzhan na mar 'brel pa'am/_phar 'brel pa'am/_su dag gshed ma'am/_phyir rgol ba'am/_
[\[47b.5\]]dgrar gyur pa de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon sum du byas pa'i mngon par shes pas yin no snyam nas/_de nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes 
[\[47b.6\]]su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs te/_'di lta ste/_skye ba gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun dang /_
[\[47b.7\]]brgyad dang /_dgu dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_skye ba brgya dang /_skye ba stong dang /_skye ba brgya stong dang /_skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /_skye ba stong phrag du ma dang /_skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_'jig pa'i bskal 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]pa dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'jig pa dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma rjes su dgongs te/_bdag sngon 
[\[48a.2\]]sems can 'di dag gi nang na gnas pa na ming ni 'di zhes bya/_/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig nyams su myong /_tshe ni 'di srid cig lon/_yun ni 'di srid cig 'dug 'dug_/tshe 'di 
[\[48a.3\]]srid cig lon te gnas/_de nas bdag shi 'phos te che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas kyang shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas pa/_yul phyogs dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su 
[\[48a.4\]]dgongs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te bdud kyi mngag gzhug 'di rnams las su dag ni ngan song du 'gro/_su dag ni ngan song du mi 'gro ba de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te 'chi 'pho 
[\[48a.5\]]dang skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pas yin no snyam ste/_/de nam gyi thun tha ma la 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na des lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das 
[\[48a.6\]]pas gzigs na sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_dman pa dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can rnams la ji lta ba bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ba/_ji lta ba bzhin du rab 
[\[48a.7\]]tu mkhyen te/_/shes ldan dag sems can 'di zhes bya ba 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag gi dang /_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan te/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba ste/_log par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de rnams dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par lhung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shes ldan dag sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi dang /_yid kyi legs par spyod 
[\[48b.2\]]pa dang ldan te/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs shing yang dag par lta ba ste/_yang dag par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas/_shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams su skye bar 
[\[48b.3\]]'gyur ro zhes rab tu mkhyen to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te rtag tu bya ba dang 'grus skyong dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la sgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su 'thun pas bzhugs te/_de nam gyi thun tha ma 
[\[48b.4\]]la zag pa zad pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/_des 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/
[\[48b.5\]]'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong na 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing /_srid pa'i zag pa dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems 
[\[48b.6\]]rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes de nyid du yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so 
[\[48b.7\]]zhes thugs su chud par gyur cing de ltar bcom ldan 'das nam gyi thun tha ma la bdud 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang bcas pa las byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon par rgyal te bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyi lag pa nas gzhu shor ba 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan rtse mo thur du lta ba dang /_gnas g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'byung po'i 'khor bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang bcas par sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid la gcags te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song 
[\[49a.2\]]ste/_sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la pham par gyur pas sems pa la zhugs te mdas sa la 'dri zhing gnas par gyur to/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo sred ma dang /_dga' byed ma dang dga' spyod ma zhes bya ba bdud gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[49a.3\]]so/_/yab khyod ci phyir thugs mi dgyes/_/ci yi phyir na 'di ltar bzhugs/_/gang gis khyod la gnod byed pa'i/_/skyes bu gang la rjes su sems/_/gsungs shig de ni 'dod chags kyi/_/zhags pas nags nas glang po bzhin/_/bcings nas bdag cag 
[\[49a.4\]]'tshal te mchi/_/de ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_skyes bu 'dod chags rab bral te/_/chags pas legs par dgug mi nus/_/bdud kyi yul 'das de yi phyir/_/nga ni shin tu mya ngan byed/_/de nas sred ma dang /_dga' byed ma dang /_dga' 
[\[49a.5\]]spyod ma ste/_bdud kyi bu mo gsum po sprin las byung ba'i glog bzhin du gzi brjid rab tu 'bar zhing rang gi gnas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[49a.6\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyi bu mo gsum gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa 
[\[49a.7\]]yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye dge sbyong khyod kyi 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs 
[\[49b.2\]]par ma mdzad do/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum phyogs gcig tu song ste phan tshun smra zhing kun tu bgros pa/_shes ldan spun zla dag skyes pa rnams kyi bud med la sred pa ni tha dad pa yin pas/_ma la bdag cag gis gzhon nu ma mdog mdangs brgya phrag dang /_gos dang /_
[\[49b.3\]]kha dog brgya phrag dang bcas par mngon par sprul zhing bu btsas ma myong ba dang /_lan gcig btsas pa dang /_lan gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_lan bzhi btsas par mngon par sprul zhing bud med bar ma'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul la dge sbyong gau ta ma gang na ba 
[\[49b.4\]]der nye bar 'gro bar bya'o/_/phyin nas kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma la 'di skad ces dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur byed cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod la rim gro ba bgyid do/_/zhes smra bar bya'o/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po gzhon nu'i mdog brgya stong du mar bdag 
[\[49b.5\]]nyid mngon par sprul cing gos kha dog brgya phrag dang bcas pa nas ji srid du bud med bar ma'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[49b.6\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro ba bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs 
[\[49b.7\]]yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis de skad gsol kyang /_lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs par ma mdzad do/_/
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum phyogs gcig tu song nas phan tshun 'di skad ces smra ste/_/spun zla dag 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i skyes bu dag 'di lta bu'i thabs mang pos nye bar bsten cing gnas na de'i sems g.yengs par 'gyur ba'am/_snying 'gas 
[\[50a.2\]]par 'gyur ba'am/_kha nas khrag dron po skyug par 'gyur ba'i gnas de ni yod na dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni 'u bu cag la/_sems gtod par mi byed kyis skyes pa rnams kyi bud med la sred pa ni tha dad pa yin gyis/_ma la bdag cag bud med rgan mo'i tshul brgya phrag tu 
[\[50a.3\]]mngon par sprul la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i gan du 'gro na de lta na ni dge sbyong gau ta ma bdag cag rnams la 'dun pa skyed pa yang srid par 'gyur gyis zhes smras te bdud kyi bu mo gsum po bud med rgan mo'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song 
[\[50a.4\]]ste/_snga ma bzhin du bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i bar du gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do/_/de nas bcom 
[\[50a.5\]]ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_'di dag ni rang nyid kyis rgan mo'i dngos por byas pa yin gyis ma la ngas kyang 'di rnams nyid kun tu skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir rgan pa 'di nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi bu mo rgan mor byin gyis brlabs so/_/
[\[50a.6\]]de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po rgan pa de mi snang bar bya bar 'dod kyang mi snang bar bya bar ma nus so/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs shing gzugs kyis ngo tsha ba bzhin du rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/_sgur po phyam dgu po ltar 
[\[50a.7\]]kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar bzhin du bdud sdig can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu 'dod chags rab bral te/_/chags pas legs par dgug mi nus/_/bdud kyi yul 'das de yi phyir/_/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]nga ni shin tu mya ngan byed/_/ces bdag cag rnams la gsung ba ni yab mad de/_gang zhig gzhan sems rmongs byed pa/_/bdag cag gis ni ma byas pa'i/_/rnam pa de ni yod min na/_/de lta na yang dbang ma gyur/_/tha mar gzugs ni 'di 'dra ba/_/byas nas de gan nyer 
[\[50b.2\]]song na/_/ji ltar rgan pa nyid gnas pa/_/de ltar de yis byin gyis brlabs/_/de bas yab kyis bdag cag rnams/_/rgas pa 'di ni mi snang mdzod/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_khyed rnams gzugs kyis dregs nas ni/_/sprin gyi tshogs las glog bzhin du/_/gzi brjid 
[\[50b.3\]]rab tu 'bar ba dang /_/spro ba'i nga rgyal gnas pas song /_/dpa' chen de gan phyin pa dang /_/rlung gis shing bal bzhin du brlag_/gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i/_/sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byed pa/_/ri bo sen mos rko ba dang /_/so yis lcags ni 'cha' 
[\[50b.4\]]ba dang /_/pad ma gzhon nu'i sdong bu yis/_/ri bo gzhig par 'dod pa yin/_/gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i/_/sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byar 'dod/_/rgya mtsho brkos par gyur nas ni/_/zab pa'i gting tshol 'dod pa yin/_/gang zhig chags kun 
[\[50b.5\]]mthar 'byin pa'i/_/sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byar 'dod/_/rlung ni zhags pas 'ching ba dang /_/zla ba mkha' las dbab pa dang /_/rgya mtsho lag pas 'chu ba dang /_/gangs can la ni rgal ba dang /_/snang zhing sreg bcas 'bar ba yi/_/me la 'khyud par 'dod pa 
[\[50b.6\]]yin/_/gang zhig dka' ba byed 'dod pa/_/de ni 'di ltar 'gyur ba yin/_/ji srid thub pa de nyid la/_/skyabs su 'gro bar gyis shig dang /_/de nyid rgan pa'i gzugs 'di ni/_/don gzhan du ni byed par 'gyur/_/de ni thugs rje cher ldan pas/_/nges par khyed kyis sel bar 
[\[50b.7\]]'gyur/_/'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu rnams dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_khyed rnams kyi rga ba'i dngos po mi snang bar byed pa de ni 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid las gzhan dag gang yang ma mthong ste khyed rnams song la bcom ldan 'das de nyid mnyes par gyis shig_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 
[\[51a.2\]]logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byis pa ji lta ba 
[\[51a.3\]]dang /_rmongs pa ji lta ba dang /_mi gsal ba ji lta ba dang /_thabs mi mkhas pa ji lta bar ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyi ba mnyes par ma bgyis pa ni nongs lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das nongs pa gzung 
[\[51a.4\]]du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bzod par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[51a.5\]]kyis de rnams rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad do/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po rang gi gzugs nyid rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur pa dang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 
[\[51a.6\]]la rang gi skyes bu rnams kyis lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_gzhon nus bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so/_/de thos pa dang nyi ma de nyid la grags 'dzin ma la yang khye'u zhig btsas so/_/bdud rtsi zas la yang khye'u zhig btsas so/_/de nyid kyi nyin mo zla ba yang sgra gcan 
[\[51a.7\]]gyis zin to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_rangs pa rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/_/de nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog por nye bar bshams/_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang por dpyangs/_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan ni bsgreng /_me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram nas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang sum mdo rnams su yang 
[\[51b.2\]]sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs so/_/de nas grong khyer gyi shar sgor dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_ngan pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_slongs mo pa rnams la yang sbyin pa dag gtong ngo /_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_
[\[51b.3\]]dbus kyi sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag gtong bsod nams dag byed do/_/grags 'dzin ma'i bu'i ming 'dogs par byed de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa/_'di btsas pa na zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pas de bas na khye'u'i ming sgra gcan zin zhes gdags so zhes btags 
[\[51b.4\]]so/_/bdud rtsi zas kyi yang de bzhin du sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams dag byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes bu'i ming 'dogs par byed do/_/nye du dag gis smras pa/_gang gi tshe 'di btsas pa na grong khyer thams cad dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir khye'u'i ming 
[\[51b.5\]]kun dga' bor gdags so zhes btags so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_grags 'dzin ma'i bu gang yin pa 'di ni shAkya thub pa'i bu ma yin no zhes smras pa grags 'dzin mas thos nas yi chad par gyur to/_/de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i phang tshad kyi 
[\[51b.6\]]pha bong la bskyon nas rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du 'dug ste bden pa gsol ba btab pa/_gal te 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin na de bzhin du rdzing 'dir pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur cig_/ji ste ma yin na bying bar gyur cig ces smras nas chur bor ba dang /_
[\[51b.7\]]de shing bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis ya mtshan du gyur pa de thos nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te/_byang chub sems dpa' rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du dong na/_ji tsam na sgra gcan zin bzang po byang 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]chub sems dpa'i phang tshad kyi pha bong la zhon nas shing bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du chu na 'phyo ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_rangs pa rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes te de ma thag tu rdzing der zhugs nas gzhon 
[\[52a.2\]]nu sgra gcan zin bzang po pang du blangs nas langs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon par btul nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur to/_/'jig 
[\[52a.3\]]rten 'di thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/_'di ltar 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba'i snang bas snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de dag kyang 
[\[52a.4\]]de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas der sems can gang dag skyes pa de rnams kyis snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta 
[\[52a.5\]]zhig ces ngo shes par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad do/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis shig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[52a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad na de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul 
[\[52a.7\]]gyis/_ma la bdag cag der song la tshigs su bcad pa re res mngon par bstod do/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha de gnyis kyis 'di lta ste skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums te brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ste bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis kyis tshangs ris 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]kyi 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis las gcig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_ded dpon g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba po/_/sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 
[\[52b.2\]]'jig rten gzigs/_/rin chen chos ni 'tshal bar 'gyur mchis kyis/_/bde gshegs chos kyi mchog ni bshad du gsol/_/cig shos kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_nga rgyal bcom zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba/_/sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten 
[\[52b.3\]]gzigs/_/bco lnga lon pa'i dgung zla nya ba ltar/_/khyod kyi thugs ni shin tu rnam dag lags/_/zhes gsol nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_'jig 
[\[52b.4\]]rten 'dod pa'i bde gang dang /_/lha yul byung bde gang yin pa/_/sred pa zad pa'i bde de la/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/khur khyer ba ni sdug bsngal te/_/khur bor ba ni bde ba yin/_/khur ni lci ba rnam bor nas/_/gzhan dag blang bar mi bya'o/_/sred pa thams cad rnam 
[\[52b.5\]]spangs shing /_/'dus byas thams cad zad nas ni/_/dngos po thams cad yongs shes na/_/slar yang srid par mi 'ong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba sku nyams su bstar ba las skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par 
[\[52b.6\]]mdzad pa na de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul lo/_/de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po gnyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig dong ba na lam de nyid du zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po'i sngon gyi grogs po dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_
[\[52b.7\]]mdza' bshes su gyur pa'i lha zhig yod pa 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba sku nyams 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]su bstar nas skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad pa na de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis de la tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po gnyis kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug na/_de ni tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po de gnyis 
[\[53a.2\]]kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur gyis ma la bdag rang gis 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms 'bul du gzhug pa'i phyir brtson par bya'o/_/snyam nas de na lha des shing rta dang /_tshong pa thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas tshong pa 
[\[53a.3\]]ga gon dang /_bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshong pa tshong pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba sku nyams su 
[\[53a.4\]]bstar ba na skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad de de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis/_de la khyed kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms phul na de ni khyed kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong pa 
[\[53a.5\]]ga gon dang /_bzang po gnyis 'di snyam du sems te sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/_chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir 'di ltar lhas kyang 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir brtson par byed do snyam nas nang 
[\[53a.6\]]par sngar langs te sbrang rtsi dang 'da' gu mang du khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang pos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[53a.7\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du 'dir bdag cag gis sbrang rtsi dang 'da' gu mang du 'tshal te mchis kyis bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]bdag gis phyag gis bsod snyoms bzhes na dper na mu stegs can bzhin du 'gyur bas de ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis ma la bdag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms gang du bzhes pa bsam par bya'o snyam 
[\[53b.2\]]pa na/_bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du lhung bzed du bsod snyoms bzhes lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs shing ye shes 
[\[53b.3\]]gzigs pa bskyed na/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms lhung bzed du bzhes par gyur nas/_de na bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi dgongs pa byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhes bcom ldan 
[\[53b.4\]]'das la lhung bzed kyi dgongs pa 'byung bar rig nas ri brag can zhig la rdo ba las byas pa'i lhung bzed mi ma yin pas byas shing mi ma yin pas zin par byas la gsal ba gtsang ba dri mi zhim pa med pa bzhi khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[53b.5\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi mkho ba byung bar bdag cag gis 'tshal nas ri brag can zhig 
[\[53b.6\]]la rdo las rdo'i lhung bzed mi ma lags pas bgyis shing mi ma lags pas bgyis pa gsal ba gtsang ba dri nga ba ma mchis pa bzhi 'dir 'tshal te mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs 
[\[53b.7\]]te/_gal te bdag gis rgyal po chen po gcig las lhung bzed gcig bzhes na gsum gyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te gnyis las na ni gnyis kyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te gsum las na ni gcig gi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis ma la bdag 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]gis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes la lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes te/_lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong 
[\[54a.2\]]pa ga gon dang /_bzang po las srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms bzhes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshong pa dag khyed tshur sangs rgyas la skyabs su deng shig chos la skyabs su deng 
[\[54a.3\]]shig_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la yang skyabs su deng shig_/btsun pa bdag cag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun gang lags pa de 
[\[54a.4\]]la yang skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po'i sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/_gang gi don du sbyin pa btang /_/de yi don du 'gyur ba ste/_/bde ba'i don du sbyin btang na/_/de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin/_/bsod nams rnam 
[\[54a.5\]]smin bde ba dang /_/bsam pa yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/myur du zhi ba dam pa yi/_/mya ngan 'das pa rtogs par 'gyur/_/pha rol las byung gnod pa ni/_/lha dang bdud kyi ris dag gis/_/bsod nams kho na byed pa na/_/bar chad bya bar mi nus so/_/gal te 'phags pa'i 
[\[54a.6\]]shes rab phyir/_/gtong ldan de ni 'bad byed na/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed pa dag_/rnam par mthong zhes reg par 'gyur/_/de nas tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[54a.7\]]la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po las bsod snyoms bzhes nas chu klung nai rany+dza nA gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]do/_/de na sbrang rtsi yang rlung slong la 'de gu yang rlung slong ba des na bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs so/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[54b.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_'di lta ste/_dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir 
[\[54b.3\]]bdud sdig can 'di nye bar 'ongs so snyam du dgongs nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can ji srid nga'i nyan thos mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/_pha rol gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams chos bzhin gyis tshar gcod nus pa/_rang gi smra ba gsal 
[\[54b.4\]]bar byed nus pa/_dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams byung bar ma gyur pa dang /_nga'i tshangs par spyod pa rgya chen po skye bo mang po dang /_lha dang mi'i bar la rgya cher yang dag par legs par rab tu ma bstan gyi bar du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 
[\[54b.5\]]'da'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o snyam du bsams nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la 'gyod pas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[54b.6\]]rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas shing 'dzam bu zhes bya bas 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa gang yin pa de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra chen po'i tshal yod de/_de nas kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i a ru ra blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin 
[\[54b.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bser ma'i snyun nad kyi snyun gyis thebs 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]par bdag gis 'tshal nas shing 'dzam bu zhes bgyi bas 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa gang lags pa de dang ha cang mi ring ba na a ru ra chen po'i tshal mchis te/_de nas bdag gis kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i a ru ra 'dir 'tshal te mchis kyis de bcom 
[\[55a.2\]]ldan 'das gsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang /_bser ma dang 'thun par 'gyur zhing bser ma'i snyun nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang /_rlung dang 'thun par gyur nas rlung nad kyi snyun nye bar zhi bar gyur to/_/de na 
[\[55a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das shin tu bzod cing lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to/_/de na bcom ldan 'das ji tsam dgyes kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing gi drung du brten te skyil mo krung bcas nas/_
[\[55a.4\]]sku drang por bsrang ste/_dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas su zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par gyur to/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par rig 
[\[55a.5\]]nas gnas nas mngon par 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun po 'di la bser bar 'gyur du 'ong /_tsha ba dang sbrang ma dang /_sha sbrang dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pas sku la gnod par 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la 
[\[55a.6\]]lan bdun du dkris te steng du mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun gyi dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags pa med par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las lus phral te/_dpung rgyan dang /_rna rgyan dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan 
[\[55a.7\]]sna tshogs dang /_byug pas byugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun po 'di la bser bar ma gyur tam/_tsha ba dang /_sbrang ma dang /_sha sbrang dang /_bser ma dang /_
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]gdugs dang /_sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas sku la reg par ma gyur tam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bden pa'i dga' ba bde ba yin/_/chos thos pa la lta ba dang /_/srog chags rnams la sdom pa yis/_/'jig rten 'tshe ba med pa 
[\[55b.2\]]bde/_/'jig rten 'dod chags bral ba dang /_/'dod pa rnams la rgal ba bde/_/nga 'o nga rgyal thul ba gang /_/de nyid bde ba'i dam pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs nas/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs te 
[\[55b.3\]]byon pa dang /_rtswa'i gding ba bshams pa nyid la skyil mo krung bcas sku drang por bsrang nas/_dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs te skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad cing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_
[\[55b.4\]]lugs dang mi 'thun pa 'di nyid la gzigs par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_'di yod pas 'di yod/_'di skyes pas 'di skye ba 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang 
[\[55b.5\]]gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 
[\[55b.6\]]'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste 'di med na 'di med la/_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_
[\[55b.7\]]ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[56a.2\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun po de nyid 'das par mdzad nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_de'i 
[\[56a.3\]]tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/gang tshe chos rnams rgyu dang bcas shes pa/_/de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 
[\[56a.4\]]'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/gang tshe sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas shes pa/_/de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/gang tshe tshor ba zad pa thob gyur pa/_/de nas 
[\[56a.5\]]de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/gang tshe rkyen rnams zad pa thob nas ni/_/de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan 
[\[56a.6\]]pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/gang tshe zag pa zad pa thob gyur nas/_/de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/'jig rten kun tu snang bar 'dug pa ni/_/ji ltar bar snang nyi ma shar 
[\[56a.7\]]ba bzhin/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/bdud kyi sde rnams rnam par bcom gnas te/_/sangs rgyas kun tu sbyor las rnam par grol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag gis chos zab mo zab 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]par snang ba/_mthong bar dka' zhing khong du chud par dka' ba/_rtog ge pa rnams kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/_zhib mo/_mdzangs pa'i mkhas pa dang /_rig pas rnam par shes par bya ba rtogs te/_de bdag gis gzhan la smras kyang gzhan gyis de mi shes pas des bdag dub par 
[\[56b.2\]]'gyur/_ngal bar 'gyur/_sems la spro ba med pa kho nar 'gyur bar zad pas/_ma la bdag gcig pu dgon pa'i nags stug por mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam ste/_/de na bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa 
[\[56b.3\]]la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa la ma yin no/_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ma rung ngo /_/kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ma rung ste/_gang gi phyir de ltar brgya lam na/_lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang /_
[\[56b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba ni dper na u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin bcom ldan 'das de da ltar thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa la ma yin pas ma la bdag der song la de la gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo/_/de nas tshangs pa mi 
[\[56b.5\]]mjed kyi bdag pos dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums nas brkyang ba'am/_brkyang nas bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas tshangs pa mi 
[\[56b.6\]]mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_ma ga d+har ni sngon chad chos byung ba/_/dag pa ma lags dri mar bcas par rtogs/_/bdud rtsi chos kyi sgo ni phye mdzod la/_/dri ma med pas rtogs pa bshad par mdzod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[56b.7\]]bcad de bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa ngas ni tshegs chen gyis/_/skyon rnams bcom nas rtogs gyur pa/_/srid dang chags pas dkris rnams kyis/_/chos 'di legs par rtogs mi 'gyur/_/rgyun las bzlog phyogs 'gro ba'i lam/_/zab cing shin tu mthong dka' ba/_/mun pa'i 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]phung pos bsgribs pa yi/_/'dod chags zhen pas mthong mi 'gyur/_/btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon po dang /_dbang po 'bring po dang /_dbang po rtul po dang /_drang sla ba dang /_gdul sla ba dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[57a.2\]]pa chung ba dang /_rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa dper na/_ud pa la 'am/_pad ma 'am/_ku mu da 'am/_pad ma dkar po dag chab nas skyes shing chab nas chen por gyur te/_chab nas 
[\[57a.3\]]'phags te kha cig ni chab dang mnyam/_kha cig ni chab kyi nang du nub cing mchis pa de bzhin du btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la yang dbang po rnon po dang /_/dbang po 'bring po dang /_dbang po rtul po dang /_drang sla ba dang /_gdul sla 
[\[57a.4\]]ba dang /_nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /_rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur bas chos rin po che 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis kyis/_bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/_
[\[57a.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te ma la nga nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la blta bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig 
[\[57a.6\]]rten la gzigs pa dang /_'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon po dang /_dbang po 'bring po dang /_dbang po rtul po dang /_drang sla ba dang /_gdul sla ba dang /_nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /_rdul chung ba'i rang bzhin yod do/_/de dag 
[\[57a.7\]]dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po gzhol bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bdud rtsi sgo mo dag ni dbye bar bya/_/nyan pa su 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]'dod som nyi sol cig dang /_/tshangs pa mi rnams la ni gya nom chos/_/klan ka mi btsal mdo tsam bshad par bya/_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad par 'gyur ro/_/e ma bde bar gshegs pas chos 
[\[57b.2\]]bstan par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/_dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du 
[\[57b.3\]]mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te ngas su la thog mar chos bshad par bya snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/_de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob 
[\[57b.4\]]dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod la rtogs pa dam pa dag la yang yi rangs shing dad par gyur pa yin no snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu gum nas dgung bdun lags so/_/bcom 
[\[57b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs pa la zhugs te ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur shi nas zhag bdun lon no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_e ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur shi ba de ni te por ma stes so/_/e ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 
[\[57b.6\]]'phur shi ba de ni shin tu te por ma stes te chos 'dul ba 'di ma thos so/_/gal te 'dis chos 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[57b.7\]]'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod la rtogs pa dam pa dag la yang yi rangs shing dad par gyur to snyam mo/_/bcom 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ma dang sum srod la gum lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa la zhugs te ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod srod la shi bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[58a.2\]]'di snyam du dgongs te/_e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod shi ba de ni te por ma stes so/_/e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod shi ba de ni shin tu te por ma stes te chos 'dul ba 'di ma thos so/_/gal te nges chos 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo/_/de nas bcom 
[\[58a.3\]]ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo/_/de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te ma la ngas lnga sde'i dge slong de rnams la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/_de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson par gnas 
[\[58a.4\]]pa dang bla ma dang /_gus pa dang /_sdug pa dang bcas pas gnas pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lnga sde'i dge slong rnams da ltar gang na 'dug snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas lnga 
[\[58a.5\]]sde'i dge slong rnams bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi gnas na 'khod pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas bA rA Na sI'i ka shi'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/de'i tshe kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam de nyid 
[\[58a.6\]]du lam du zhugs par gyur te/_kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gros bcom ldan 'das lam nas gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni dang /_bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag_/pags pa'i mdog ni gsal na/_tshe dang 
[\[58a.7\]]ldan pa gau ta ma khyod kyi ston pa ni gang /_khyod su las brten te rab tu byung /_khyod su'i chos la dga'/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_nga dang 'dra ba yod min pas/_/nga la slob dpon 'ga' med de/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas nga gcig 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pu/_/yang dag byang chub dam pa thob/_/thams cad zil mnan 'jig rten kun mkhyen la/_/'di ni chos kun gyis ni nga ma gos/_/thams cad spangs shing sred bral rnam grol te/_/rang gis mngon par shes nas su la rten/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi'i ston pa pa po/_/thams 
[\[58b.2\]]cad mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun ldan pas/_/nyid kyis byang chub rtogs nas rab gsungs pa/_/mi mnyam mtshungs pa med na su la rten/_/nga ni 'jig rten dgra bcom ste/_/'jig rten bla med nga yin pas/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/nga ni rgyal ba bdud zil gnon/_/tshe dang 
[\[58b.3\]]ldan pa gau ta ma rgyal ba zhes gsung ngam/_gang gis zag pa zad thob pa/_/rgyal ba nga 'drar shes par bya/_/sdig pa'i chos ni ngas bcom pas/_/de bas nyer 'gro nga rgyal ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma gang du bzhud/_/bA rA Na sIr gshegs nas ni/_/ngas ni chos kyi rnga 
[\[58b.4\]]brdung zhing /_/'jig rten ma bskor gang yin pa/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/'jig rten chags pa las rgal ba'i/_/kun mkhyen sangs rgyas zhi gyur pa/_/'jig rten bsgral ba ma byas par/_/skyes bu dam pa grags mi srid/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma 
[\[58b.5\]]rgyal ba legs so zhes gsol nas/_kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa bA rA Na sIr byon to/_/de'i tshe lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na 'khod do/_/lnga sde'i dge slong 
[\[58b.6\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang phan tshun nas ched du bsams te legs par 'dug nas khrims su bcas pa/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma mi brtan pa/_bya ba mang ba/_mang pos 'tsho ba/_spong ba nyams pa deng 'bras 
[\[58b.7\]]can dang zan dron gyi kha zas la mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed cing 'ong gis de bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang de la smra bar mi bya/_/phyag mi bya/_ldang bar mi bya/_langs te stan bstab par mi bya'o/_/gzhan du na stan nar 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]mkho nar bting ba la tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma stan yod kyis ji ste 'dod na 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o zhes bcas so/_/bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la gzigs pa'i phyir nye bar gshegs pa de lta de ltar lnga sde'i dge slong 
[\[59a.2\]]rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid dang /_dpal dang /_bkur sti ma bzod nas stan las langs te kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan shom mo/_/kha cig ni zhabs bkru ba'i chu dang zhabs kyi rten dag mtha' gcig tu 'jog par byed do/_/kha cig ni bsu ste na bza' 
[\[59a.3\]]chos gos dag blangs nas 'di skad ces shes ldan gau ta ma tshur spyon/_shes ldan gau ta ma byon pa legs so/_/shes ldan gau tam gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma skyes bu blun po 'di rnams kyis 
[\[59a.4\]]khrims bcas nas rang gis bshig go snyam du mkhyen nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan nas rjod/_gdung nas rjod/_tshe dang ldan pas rjod pas kun tu rjod par byed do/_/de nas bcom 
[\[59a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas rjod pa dang /_gdung nas rjod pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pas rjod pas kun tu ma rjod cig_/khyed la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa 
[\[59a.6\]]ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag gang la la lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa dang /_gdung nas brjod pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pas brjod pa'i 
[\[59a.7\]]kun tu rjod pa de ni skyes bu blun po de la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma khyod kyis re zhig sngon gyi tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_dka' bar spyad pa des mi'i chos bla ma 'phags 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]pa'i khyad par thob par nus sam/_shes pa'am/_mthong ba dang reg par gnas pa cung zad kyang ma thob nad ltar khyod mi brtan zhing bya ba mang la mang pos 'tsho zhing spong ba nyams pas da khyod 'bras can dang zan dron gyi kha zas la mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang til mar gyis byugs nas chu 
[\[59b.2\]]'jam pos lus khrus byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dge slong khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mdog dang dbang po rnams gsal ba sngon las tha dad du bya ba gzhan lta mthong ngam/_de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma de de bzhin no/_/de nas 
[\[59b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rab tu byung bas ni mtha' 'di gnyis la bsten par mi bya/_bsnyen par mi bya/_bsnyen bkur mi bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i bsod nams kyi rjes su brtson pa/_dman 
[\[59b.4\]]pa ngan pa/_tha chad ma rabs gang yin pa dang /_bdag nyid dub pa la rjes su brtson pa/_sdug bsngal ba 'phags pa'i ma yin pa gnod pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o/_/khyed kyis mtha' 'di gnyis la mi rten par dbu ma'i lam mig byed pas/_ye shes byed pa/_nye bar zhi 
[\[59b.5\]]bar 'gyur ba/_mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba yod de/_dbu ma'i lam gang zhe na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i dag 
[\[59b.6\]]dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la shes par bya ba 'dis shes par mdzad spyod pas bcom 
[\[59b.7\]]ldan 'das lnga sde'i dge slong rnams las gnyis la snga dro gdams ngag 'bogs pa na/_gsum grong khyer du bsod snyoms la 'jug ste/_gsum gyis bsgrubs pa gang yin pa des drug car 'tsho bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das lnga sde rnams kyi dge slong gsum la phyi dro gdams 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]ngag 'bogs pa na/_gnyis grong khyer du bsod snyoms la 'jug ste/_gnyis kyis bsgrubs pa gang yin pa des lnga sde 'tsho bar byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni snga dro'i dus kho nar gsol ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge 
[\[60a.2\]]slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i 
[\[60a.3\]]chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon 
[\[60a.4\]]ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas yongs su shes par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos 
[\[60a.5\]]rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa des ngas mngon par shes pas spang bar bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 
[\[60a.6\]]sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 
[\[60a.7\]]'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas bsgom par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa de ngas mngon par shes pas yongs su shes so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon 
[\[60b.2\]]par shes pas spangs so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas mngon 
[\[60b.3\]]sum du byas so zhes tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas bsgoms so 
[\[60b.4\]]zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i mig ma skyes/_shes pa ma yin/_rig 
[\[60b.5\]]pa ma yin/_blo ma yin/_rtogs pa ma skyes pa de srid du lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang tshangs pa dang bcas/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang mir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang nges par 'byung ba dang mi ldan pa dang /_rab tu grol ba dang /_phyin ci log 
[\[60b.6\]]dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par ma gyur cing /_dge slong dag ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar ma shes so/_/dge slong dag ngas gang nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la de ltar lan gsum du 
[\[60b.7\]]bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i mig skyes shing shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang rtogs pa skyes pa de nas nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang tshangs pa dang bcas/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang mir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang nges 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]par byung ba dang ldan pa dang /_rab tu grol ba dang phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par gyur cing /_dge slong dag ngas de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar shes so/_/chos kyi rnam 
[\[61a.2\]]grangs de bka' stsal pa na/_tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya dang /_lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kau N+Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal 
[\[61a.3\]]lags so/_/kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_kun shes sam/_bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so/_/kun 'tshal lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas chos kun shes pas de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya zhes [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su btags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[61a.4\]]kauN+Di n+yas chos kun shes so zhes sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams sgra sgrogs par byed de/_grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bA rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa dge sbyong dang /_bram ze'am/_
[\[61a.5\]]lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i rigs mngon 
[\[61a.6\]]par 'phel zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyangs bsgrags so/_/sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams kyi sgra thos nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul 
[\[61a.7\]]dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grags so/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sgra sgrogs par byed de/_/
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bA rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par 
[\[61b.2\]]'ga' tsam yang ma bskor ba/_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i ris mngon par 'phel zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyangs 
[\[61b.3\]]bsgrags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bA rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa bskor bas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su btags so/_/de 
[\[61b.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'di dag yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog 
[\[61b.5\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_skye ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_rga ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_na ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_'chi ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[61b.6\]]mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal ba dang /_gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal ba dang /_mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba ste/_de yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags 
[\[61b.7\]]pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par 'dod pa ste/_de spang ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de nyid ma lus par spangs pa dang /_bor ba dang /_bsal ba dang /_zad pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gags pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang nub pa ste de mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i 
[\[62a.2\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_
[\[62a.3\]]yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te de yang bsgom par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lnga sde'i dge slong 
[\[62a.4\]]lhag ma rnams la ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gcig dang gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong lnga sde'i lhag ma rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gzugs ni 
[\[62a.5\]]bdag ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gal te gzugs bdag yin na gzugs la gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing /_gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gang gi phyir gzugs 
[\[62a.6\]]bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir gzugs la gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam pa yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni bdag ma yin 
[\[62a.7\]]no/_/dge slong dag gal te rnam par shes pa bdag yin na rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gang gi phyir rnam par 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]shes pa bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rtag 
[\[62b.2\]]gam mi rtag_/btsun pa mi rtag lags so/_/mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/_sdug bsngal ma yin/_btsun pa sdug bsngal lags so/_/mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ci ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni 
[\[62b.3\]]bdag go/_/bdag ni 'di yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag_/btsun pa mi rtag lags so/_/mi 
[\[62b.4\]]rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/_sdug bsngal ma yin/_btsun pa sdug bsngal lags so/_/mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ci ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go/_/bdag ni 'di yin no/_/'di ni bdag 
[\[62b.5\]]gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_dge slong dag de lta bas na gzugs gang yin pa de ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i 'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom
