[\[62b.6\]]pa'am/_gang dag thag ring ba'am/_gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin/_bdag ni de ma yin de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na tshor ba 
[\[62b.7\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ji snyed pa gang ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i 'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom pa'am/_gang dag thag ring ba'am/_gang dag thag 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin/_bdag ni de ma yin/_de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di bdag 
[\[63a.2\]]ma yin bdag gi ma yin par lta ste/_de de ltar lta ba na 'jig rten na ci yang len pa med do/_/len pa med pa na yongs su gdung ba med do/_/yongs su gdung ba med na bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/
[\[63a.3\]]srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma rnams kyis len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de'i tshe dgra bcom pa lnga dang drug pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bA rA 
[\[63a.4\]]Na sI'i 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i bu grags pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_de nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed pas lus snyom lus dub/_lus rgud pas myur 
[\[63a.5\]]du gnyid log par gyur to/_/bud med de rnams kyang lus snyom/_lus dub/_lus rgud pas gnyid log par gyur to/_/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa mtshan mo gnyid sad pa na bud med de dag thams cad brdol zhing sgren mor byung la skra zhig_/lag pa brkyang ste byung rgyal du bla ba mthong ngo /_/
[\[63a.6\]]mthong nas kyang de dag gis chung ma la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa ma la chen po las babs te/_rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig gyon nas nyal khang gi sgo gang na ba der song ste/_phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so/_/grogs po bdag 
[\[63a.7\]]ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /_de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so/_/grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /_de'i 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa grong khyer gyi sgo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so/_/grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /_de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye 
[\[63b.2\]]nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'bab chu gnod pa can de gang na ba der song ba na/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'ong ba la 
[\[63b.3\]]yang dang yang du bzhengs shing 'chag pas 'chag go/_/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pas bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na 'chag pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dge sbyong bdag ni gtses so/_/dge sbyong bdag ni nyams so zhes skad 
[\[63b.4\]]ngan phyung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu tshur shog_/gnas 'di ni khyod la 'tshe ba med pa yin/_'di ni nyams pa med pa yin no/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa rin po che'i lham 
[\[63b.5\]]brgya stong ri ba zung cig po 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram du phud nas 'bab chu gnod pa can rgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[63b.6\]]kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khrid de nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gang na ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par 
[\[63b.7\]]bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams 
[\[64a.2\]]rgya cher bshad do/_/gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs 
[\[64a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam de rgya cher bshad do/_/dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du 
[\[64a.4\]]bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rtogs so/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i 
[\[64a.5\]]bu grags pa chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs 
[\[64a.6\]]pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos 
[\[64a.7\]]dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/bran mo zhig de nyid kyi mtshan mo gnyid log pa las sad na/_gzhon nu grags pa 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]mal chen po na mi snang bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/gzhon nu grags pa ni rang gi mal chen po na mi gda' lags so/_/de nas khyim 
[\[64b.2\]]bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhon nu nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam/_g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol tu khrid par ma gyur grang snyam du sems shing phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa dag bkye nas rang nyid mi lag na sgron ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu gnod pa can 
[\[64b.3\]]gang na ba de logs su song ba dang /_khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig phud pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhon nu ni nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol du 
[\[64b.4\]]ma khrid kyi 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig phud pa las na gzhon nu 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs 'di nyid las rgal bar ma gyur grang /_'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig bor 
[\[64b.5\]]ro snyam du bsams nas 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs de nyid las rgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyang ring po nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te ci nas kyang ngas rdzu 
[\[64b.6\]]'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du 
[\[64b.7\]]mdzad pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu mdzad do/_/de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]ci ga gzhon nu grags pa gzigs sam/_khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang /_stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/_/de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/_gdon mi 
[\[65a.2\]]za bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu grags pa gzigs par gyur te 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do zhes bka' stsal to snyam 
[\[65a.3\]]du rig nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_khyim bdag rigs 
[\[65a.4\]]kyi gtso bo la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa grags pa yang 
[\[65a.5\]]rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar brtul nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du ni chos spyad de/_/
[\[65a.6\]]dul zhing yang dag sdom pa tshangs spyod la/_/'byung po kun la chad pa spangs pa ni/_/de ni bram ze dge sbyong dge slong yin/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug dang bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug pa 
[\[65a.7\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gzhon nu grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu tshur shog_/khyod kyi ma lus ngal zhing lus dub pas smre sngags 'don gyis khyim du 'dong /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag ji 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]snyam du sems/_gang gis mi slob pa'i shes pa dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs pa de ji ga khyim pa khyim na gnas pa'am sogs 'jog gi longs spyod kyis 'dod pa la 
[\[65b.2\]]longs spyod par 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/khyim bdag ji ltar khyod kyis slob pa'i shes pa dang /_slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtog pa de bzhin du 
[\[65b.3\]]gzhon nu grags pas mi slob pa'i ye shes dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs so/_/btsun pa gzhon nu grags pas gang gis na mi slob pa'i shes pa dang mi slob pa'i 
[\[65b.4\]]lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das slad bzhin du 'brang ba'i dge sbyong grags pa dang /_thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung 
[\[65b.5\]]ste rigs kyi gtso bo gang na ba der gshegs na legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[65b.6\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs man bas/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos bsnams te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan 
[\[65b.7\]]pa grags pa dang /_khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du bsu ba'i phyir bar sgo na sdod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/_bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su 
[\[66a.2\]]gsol zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[66a.3\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi 
[\[66a.4\]]gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i rjes su 
[\[66a.5\]]bsngags pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/_/gang gi tshe de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par 
[\[66a.6\]]nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam de rgya cher bshad do/_/dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog 
[\[66a.7\]]med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rtogs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tsom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi 
[\[66b.2\]]bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so/_/bdag cag ni mngon par 
[\[66b.3\]]'phags lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir 
[\[66b.4\]]zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das gdan 
[\[66b.5\]]la bde bar bzhugs pa dang /_gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' bdag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' bdag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[66b.6\]]kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[66b.7\]]gtam gyis yang dag par ston/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_
[\[67a.2\]]lag [{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni 
[\[67a.3\]]mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir da ltar gyi rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa re zhig shin tu gzhon pa/_shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang /_kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas 
[\[67a.4\]]khyim med par rab tu byung gis/_ma la bdag cag gis kyang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/_dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_
[\[67a.5\]]lnga pa gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams bA rA Na sI nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs 
[\[67a.6\]]gcig tu 'khod nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa gang po dang /_dri ma med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa legs par 
[\[67a.7\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/_de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/_rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na gang gi 
[\[67b.2\]]phyir rigs kyi bu de dag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/_tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do/_/
[\[67b.3\]]tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang /_bcu gcig pa ni bcom 
[\[67b.4\]]ldan 'das so/_/bA rA Na sI na grong mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa ste grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_/rigs 
[\[67b.5\]]kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing /_chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma 
[\[67b.6\]]yin te/_gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa ste grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams ni re zhig shin tu gzhon pa/_shin 
[\[67b.7\]]tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/_ma la bdag cag kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]mo/_/de nas grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag bA rA Na sI nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong 
[\[68a.2\]]mi'i gtso bo'i khye'u lnga bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par 
[\[68a.3\]]spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/_de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtod par 
[\[68a.4\]]gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag snga ma bzhin du ji srid sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug cu dang /_
[\[68a.5\]]drug cu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin 
[\[68a.6\]]no/_/dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/_dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing 
[\[68a.7\]]deng la khyed gnyis shig ni gcig tu ma 'gro zhig_/nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su 'dug nas de nyan thos rnams la 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]'di skad ces chos ston te/_/dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/_/dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/_dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya 
[\[68b.2\]]ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/_nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer gyis/_ma la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste/_dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/_
[\[68b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/_ma grol grol bar 'du shes na/_/ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems/_/bdag nyid dge sbyong ma bkrol bas/_/'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin/_/de nas 
[\[68b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te/_'di lta ste dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi/_/'ching ba gang yin kun las grol/_/bar chad byed 
[\[68b.5\]]pa khyod bcom par/_/sdig can de ltar shes par gyis/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems kyis bdag shes so snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[68b.6\]]'das kyis lan gnyis su yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/_/dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/_
[\[68b.7\]]dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der gshegs so/_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bA rA Na sIr ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang grong khyer sde can du byon to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[69a.2\]]'das ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing zhig gi drung du brten te nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol du nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' 
[\[69a.3\]]bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so/_/de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras bal gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der dong ba dang /_drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/_dad 
[\[69a.4\]]par 'os pa/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_thugs mchog tu dul ba/_zhi ba dang /_dul ba dang ldan pa/_gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing zhig gi drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 
[\[69a.5\]]lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ga bud med gcig gzigs sam/_gzhon nu dag bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'ong /_btsun pa 'di na bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi slad rol du bud med kyis bgyis 
[\[69a.6\]]pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid dga' dgur spyod par bgyid de/_de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na/_bud med gcig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshol lags so/_/gzhon nu dag ji snyam du 
[\[69a.7\]]sems/_bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang /_bdag nyid tshol ba gang gdam/_btsun pa bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyis/_bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de gdam lags so/_/gzhon nu dag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang khyed la chos bshad do/_/
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la

[\[69b.3\]]tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tsom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 
[\[69b.4\]]'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag cag bcom 
[\[69b.5\]]ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs 
[\[69b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs man bas/_
[\[69b.7\]]lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas grong khyer sde can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/_de nas bcom 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/_de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na 'dis mar gsar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas 
[\[70a.2\]]bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/_/grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom 
[\[70a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/_bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol/_zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 
[\[70a.4\]]de nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_
[\[70a.5\]]dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas/_mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/_/de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[70a.6\]]btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi 
[\[70a.7\]]gsung bas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag rang gi lag nas 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu 
[\[70b.2\]]mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[70b.3\]]'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ngas yul ma ga ng+hA 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo/_/de'i tshe lteng 
[\[70b.4\]]rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma ga ng+hA'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai rany+dza nA'i chu klung gi 
[\[70b.5\]]'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'di ma ga ng+hA'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin 
[\[70b.6\]]du ste/_ma la ngas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dbang du bya ste 'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas ga na ba der gshegs so/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung 
[\[70b.7\]]ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po tshur spyon/_dge sbyong chen po byon pa legs so/_/dge sbyong chen po yun ring po zhig lags na 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]gang nas 'khor 'dir byon/_dge sbyong chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang /_bcom ldan 'das lhan cig 
[\[71a.2\]]mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung 
[\[71a.3\]]gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi me khang du nga zhag gcig cig 'dug go/_/dge sbyong chen po bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis na/_'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyod tho btsams par 'gyur du mchi'o/_/'od srung khyod kyis re zhig gnang bar gyis shig 
[\[71a.4\]]dang tho btsams par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong chen po gal te khyod la mtho mi 'tsham na dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas me khang gi phyi rol du zhabs bsil 
[\[71a.5\]]nas me khang gi nang du zhugs te/_nyid kyis rtswa'i gding ba bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs so/_/klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khros pa'i mthus dud 
[\[71a.6\]]pa phyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa phyung ngo /_/klu gdug pas khro ba'i mthus 'bar bar byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[71a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg par byed do/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]tu gyur nas sreg pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma 'di ltar mdzes pa klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur gyur grang /_kyi hud nyon mongs bdag gi tshig ma nyan to snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga lteng rgyas 
[\[71b.2\]]'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas phyas spyad kyis ma la ngas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bur mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/_des kyang de'i lus la gnod par mi byed cing de dul bar byas nas lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/_
[\[71b.3\]]lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/_des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bu mngon par 
[\[71b.4\]]'du mdzad de/_de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste/_lteng rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der bsnams te gshegs so/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[71b.5\]]dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig_/'od srung gson no/_/dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na bsnams te byon pa ci/_'od srung klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster ba de ngas btul nas lhung bzed du bcug nas 
[\[71b.6\]]khyer te 'ongs so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag cag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti 
[\[71b.7\]]gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod pa re re'i me thab gsum gsum ste/_/me thab stong lnga brgya yod do/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par 'dod 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]na me spar bar ma nus so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod par 
[\[72a.2\]]'tshal na zhugs de spar bar rngo ma thogs lags so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste 
[\[72a.3\]]phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na/_me de spar bar rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge 
[\[72a.4\]]sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung me spar bar 'dod dam dge sbyong chen po spar du gsol/_de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to/_/de nas lteng 
[\[72a.5\]]rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi/_bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyad nas me gsad par 'dod na gsad par ma nus so/_/
[\[72a.6\]]de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum 
[\[72a.7\]]pa'i rngo ma thogs lags so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_/'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_/bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong 
[\[72b.2\]]chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung me de bsad dam/_dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/_de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od 
[\[72b.3\]]srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na spar bar 
[\[72b.4\]]ma nus so zhes bya ba nas/_bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no snyam mo/_/de bzhin du yongs su spyad nas gsad par 'dod na zhes bya ba nas/_bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na 
[\[72b.5\]]lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgrims kyang 
[\[72b.6\]]gsad par ma nus so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 
[\[72b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_dge sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]dang /_gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgrims na zhugs dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung me de zhi bar bya'am/_dge sbyong 
[\[73a.2\]]chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba 
[\[73a.3\]]yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[73a.4\]]gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_dge 
[\[73a.5\]]sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi yod do snyam mo/_de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[73a.6\]]na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'dir bdag ma dang sum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce 
[\[73a.7\]]gcig tu gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod do/_/'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]bzhi mchis so snyam mo/_/'od srung cing me la yongs su spyod dam/_nga me la yongs su mi spyod de/_mkhas pa kun nas nyon mongs las/_/sems ni yongs su zlog byed kyi/_/me 'am yang na chu dag la/_/yongs bsten yon tan ci zhig yod/_/de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum 
[\[73b.2\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te lhags nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi po lta 
[\[73b.3\]]bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya 
[\[73b.4\]]byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po 
[\[73b.5\]]de dag pas ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/_dge sbyong chen po rdzu 
[\[73b.6\]]'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[73b.7\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_de dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas/_me'i phung po chen po lnga po de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/_dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che 
[\[74a.2\]]mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/_/de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab bo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te gal te mag d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong 
[\[74a.3\]]chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyis/_kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral 
[\[74a.4\]]pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do/_/de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti chen po byung nas/_bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung 
[\[74a.5\]]ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang 'di snyam du sems te/_zhag bdun po 'di la bdag la rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang /_bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis kye 
[\[74a.6\]]ma da ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug go snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so/_/lteng rgyas 'od 
[\[74a.7\]]srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po byon tam/_'od srung 'ongs so/_/dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du bzhud lags/_'od srung 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]khyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no bar shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis 
[\[74b.2\]]kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam sems pa ma yin nam/_/nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo /_/'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/_'od srung khyod kyi mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin 
[\[74b.3\]]nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go 
[\[74b.4\]]snyam du sems pa ma yin nam dge sbyong chen po de lta lags so/_/nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no/_/dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar longs spyad du gsol/_de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po 
[\[74b.5\]]rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang bdag gis khyod la 
[\[74b.6\]]chos dang 'thun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom 
[\[74b.7\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_'od srung de'i phyir song shig nga yang 'ong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas 
[\[75a.2\]]gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la 
[\[75a.3\]]bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po byon tam/_'od srung 'ongs so/_/dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/_'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/_ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag 
[\[75a.4\]]na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig_/dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 
[\[75a.5\]]'tshal lags so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa 
[\[75a.6\]]de dang /_ha cang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra'i nags dang /_bil ba'i nags dang ka pid tha'i nags dang /_skyu ru ra 'i nags kyang de bzhin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 
[\[75a.7\]]bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po byon tam/_'od srung 'ongs so/_/dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 
[\[75b.2\]]'bras lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig_/dge slong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che 
[\[75b.3\]]zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i 
[\[75b.4\]]dgos pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang /_de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste chu bab pa de 
[\[75b.5\]]la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu bab pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_chu 'di sngon ni med na chu 'di da ltar gang nas byung snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral 
[\[75b.6\]]pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i chab cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[75b.7\]]chu 'di sngon ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa na nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]shes nas nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i mdun du lag pas sa la bsnun pa las de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad de/_/'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[76a.2\]]'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram 
[\[76a.3\]]gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas/_rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar bzhed pa na shing ardzu na gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo /_/de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par gyur te/_de la bcom ldan 
[\[76a.4\]]'das kyis gzung nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo /_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni dud par ma 
[\[76a.5\]]gyur na/_ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di da su zhig gis btud snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag 'dir bsti gnas 
[\[76a.6\]]na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_/ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyur nad su zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung 'dir phye ma red nang 
[\[76a.7\]]du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te lus khrus byas nas/_rdzing lag pas 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas shing ardzu na 'di dag gang na ba de logs su lag pa brkyang ba dang /_de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di dud par gyur te/_de la ngas 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo /_/'od srung 'di ni ardzu na lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[76b.2\]]lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/_de nas bcom 
[\[76b.3\]]ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas ri brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song 
[\[76b.4\]]ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga'i phyag dar 
[\[76b.5\]]khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang /_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[76b.6\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo /_/
[\[76b.7\]]mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ye ma mchis na/_rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig 
[\[77a.2\]]gis 'tshal te mchis snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes so/_/de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/_phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag gang du bkru snyam pa dang /_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes 
[\[77a.3\]]nas/_brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/_ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/_/nga 'di 
[\[77a.4\]]snyam du dgongs te/_ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang /_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs te byin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[77a.5\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/_ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo/_/'od srung rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di 
[\[77a.6\]]snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe nai rany+dza nA'i chu cher 
[\[77a.7\]]zug nas bab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i steng na rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad do/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po brug pas khyer 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]bar ma gyur gyur grang /_ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal snyam du bsams nas shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa bla 
[\[77b.2\]]gab med pa na 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po gson nam/_'od srung gson no/_/dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/_'od srung 'jug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[77b.3\]]'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji ltar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag nas shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar 
[\[77b.4\]]chu la 'jug par de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[77b.5\]]thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung ral pa can khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/_dgra bcom pa'i 
[\[77b.6\]]lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po bdag legs par 
[\[77b.7\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar ba dag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/'od srung khyod kyi 'khor la bltas sam/_dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so/_/'od srung de'i phyir 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]re zhig 'khor la ltos shig_/'dir khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes nyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i 
[\[78a.2\]]khye'u dag shes par gyis shig_/bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/_shes ldan dag ci byed/_mkhan po bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po la brten nas lags pas gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan 
[\[78a.3\]]sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang /_'khar ba dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_blugs gzar 'di da ga chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du 'or cig_/
[\[78a.4\]]mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_'khar ba dang /_ril pa spyi blugs dang /_blugs gzar rnams chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du bor nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lteng rgyas 
[\[78a.5\]]'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po 'di ltar bdag cag gis bdag cag gi bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyis lags so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[78a.6\]]skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas lags te bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/'od srung 
[\[78a.7\]]tshur shog_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad cig_/de nyid kyis che dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang /_des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/_/de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi spun chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung gnyis 'khor nyis brgya 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i mjug gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/_/chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun gyis g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_'khar ba dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_blugs gzar de dag chu klung nai rany+dza nAs khyer 
[\[78b.2\]]ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po'am/_chom rkun nam/_me'am chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang /_ma la bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo 
[\[78b.3\]]snyam mo/_/de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang /_bcom 
[\[78b.4\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/_/chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung gis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od 
[\[78b.5\]]srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'od srung 'di mchog yin la de mchog ma yin nam/_'od srung dag 'di ni mchog yin te de ni ma yin no/_/de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma 
[\[78b.6\]]yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_rjed par byas/_mchod par 
[\[78b.7\]]byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyis ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/khyod kyis 'khor la bltas 
[\[79a.2\]]sam/_dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so/_/'od srung dag de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig_/'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/_shes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no/_/de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /_g.yA 'od srung spun rang gi bsti 
[\[79a.3\]]gnas gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig_/kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/_shes ldan dag ci byed/_mkhan po dag bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de 
[\[79a.4\]]thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags pas gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/_bdag cag kyang mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus da yin par shes par gyis shig_/de nas chu klung 
[\[79a.5\]]'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/_dge sbyong chen po bdag cag 
[\[79a.6\]]legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/'od srung dag tshur sheg_/tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig_/de nyid kyis tshe dang 
[\[79a.7\]]ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong po de dag rab tu byung ba snyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/_ga ya gang na ba 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ga yAr byon nas ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon gyi ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms 
[\[79b.2\]]par mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyi gdan gyi nang du mi snang 
[\[79b.3\]]bar gyur cing shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_'chag pa dang /_bzhengs pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_mnal bar mdzad do/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad de/_me'i ting nge 
[\[79b.4\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad do/_/'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog go/_/cho 'phrul zung du ston par mdzad de 
[\[79b.5\]]sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/_sku'i stod las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/_/sku'i stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/_sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /_
[\[79b.6\]]nub dang /_byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/_de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul 
[\[79b.7\]]gyi cho 'phrul yin no/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/_dge slong dag khyod kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o/_/khyod kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o/_/'di ni rtog cig_/'di ni ma rtog cig_/'di ni yid la byos shig_/
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'di ni yid la ma byed cig_/'di ni spongs shig_/'di ni ma spang zhig_/'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par gyis te mnos shig_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 
[\[80a.2\]]'phrul ni 'di yin te/_dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no/_/dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/_dge slong dag mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing mig gi 
[\[80a.3\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no/_/dge slong dag rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi 
[\[80a.4\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin 
[\[80a.5\]]no/_/gang gis kun tu 'bar ba 'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ba/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa ste 
[\[80a.6\]]sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o/_/de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam 
[\[80a.7\]]par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/_shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong 
[\[80b.2\]]ser skya'i bsti gnas dang /_ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang /_ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te/_khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba rin po che sna bdun 
[\[80b.3\]]dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che 
[\[80b.4\]]yin no/_/de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dpa' ba rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 
[\[80b.5\]]bda' ba med la chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[80b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang ma gad+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ma gad+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen 
[\[80b.7\]]par mdzad du gsol/_bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thos so zhes bya 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/lha de khum shig_/lha ches gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o/_/grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/_grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_lha de khum shig_/lha 
[\[81a.2\]]ches gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra zhig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_/gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[81a.3\]]skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par gyur na de'i nyan thos su khas blang 
[\[81a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug nas smon pa'i gzhi lnga la smon par byed de/_kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[81a.5\]]rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das byung ba dang de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang /_nye bar song ba na des kyang bdag la 
[\[81a.6\]]chos bshad pa dang /_bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang /_bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[81a.7\]]dag ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po de steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug nas/_smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon par byed de/_kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar gong 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]ma bzhin no/_/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho bdag cig ljongs rgyu ba na/_shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang /_ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshan 
[\[81b.2\]]mkhan dang ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[81b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de ga yA na ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_
[\[81b.4\]]srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo 
[\[81b.5\]]sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag cag 'di na lha'i yul na rgyu ba na/_shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas/_'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_
[\[81b.6\]]de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_de ga yA na ga yA'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge 
[\[81b.7\]]slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_lha de dag la bkur sti mdzod cig dang /_de lta na lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur ro/_/
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mi zhig la bsgo ba/_kwa'i nang rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la song nas kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba_
[\[82a.2\]]chung ngam/_'tsho'am/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang /_bde ba dang /_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_
[\[82a.3\]]bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs 
[\[82a.4\]]can snying po las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mi des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[82a.5\]]la ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam zhes bya ba nas/_reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du ste snyun gsol lags so/_/kye mi khyod dang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs 
[\[82a.6\]]can snying po bde bar gyur cig_/btsun pa ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas/_'di skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang /_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[82a.7\]]gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das cad 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom 
[\[82b.2\]]pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs cig tu ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_yul ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa gang na ba der gshegs so/_/
[\[82b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/_ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa na bzhugs so/_/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge 
[\[82b.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa gang na ba der gshegs te/_
[\[82b.5\]]ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa na bzhugs so/_/zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang shing rta bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/_rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /_rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen pos rta dang shing rta brgya stong snyed dang lhan cig 'khor brgya 
[\[82b.6\]]phrag du ma dang rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na/_de'i shing rta'i 'khor lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyur to/_/des bsams pa bdag gis las skyon can cung zad cig byas par ma gyur grang
