[\[82b.7\]]snyam mo/_/lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyod pa gang yin pa de dag btson ra na 'dug gis de dag thon cig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na gdon no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]bcug go/_/yang rgyal po phyir byung bar brtsams pa na de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go/_/des yang bsams pa/_bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te des na bdag la ltas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo/_/lha de rnams kyis 
[\[83a.2\]]yang smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'dus kyang kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba dag na las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa de dag sbron cig_/rgyal pos yul de na 
[\[83a.3\]]gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyang bkug go/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang /_zhabs 'bring ba rta pa'i tshogs khri brgyad stong dang /_ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/_bcom 
[\[83a.4\]]ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo /_/de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/_bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/_/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can 
[\[83a.5\]]snying pos thag ji tsam nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u kha dang /_gdugs dang /_ral gri dang /_nor bu'i rnga yab dang /_lham khra bo rnams phud do/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan 
[\[83a.6\]]ma lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de de rang gi ming nas phyung ste lan gsum du gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs 
[\[83a.7\]]gzugs can snying po lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/_/rgyal po lags so/_/rgyal po de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no rgyal 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no/_/rgyal po yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[83b.2\]]byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /_
[\[83b.3\]]yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'khod do/_/kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cang mi smra bar phyogs 
[\[83b.4\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_ci dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la 
[\[83b.5\]]spyad dam/_'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la spyod snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la tshigs su 
[\[83b.6\]]bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rmas pa/_lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir ci mthong na/_/me spangs nas ni brtul shugs 'di dag spyod/_khyod kyis ji ltar me yi mchod spangs pa/_/don de 'od srung nga la smra bar gyis/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa/_'di na 
[\[83b.7\]]kha cig zas skom de bzhin ro/_/'dod pa dag dang bud med kho na smra/_/de dag phung po'i dri mar rab mthong ste/_/des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs min/_/khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang /_/de bzhin ro la yid ni mi dga' na/_/lha mi 'jig rten la 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]ci khyod kyi yid/_/dga' ba yin nam 'od srung dri yis smros/_/phung po ma mchis zhi ba ci ma mchis/_/'dod sred ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis/_/gzhan gyis mi bkri'i go 'phang mchog mthong ste/_/des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs 
[\[84a.2\]]min/_/go 'phang mi nyams mchog ni ma mthong bas/_/mchod sbyin brtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis/_/grol snyam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te/_/dmus long gyur nas skye shi'i rjes bzhin mthong /_/skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs bshad pa/_/go 'phang 
[\[84a.3\]]'dus ma byas te bzod mthong na/_/thub pa gau tam rnam par 'dren khyod ni/_/skye bo phal chen don brtson bden la zhugs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis rtogs pa legs rtogs te/_/khyod kyis nyes par bsams ma yin/_/rab tu phye 
[\[84a.4\]]ba'i chos rnams las/_/gtso bo gang yin de blangs so/_/'od srung 'khor skyo bskyed cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs 
[\[84a.5\]]kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/_snga ma bzhin du phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[84a.6\]]btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa 
[\[84a.7\]]lags so/_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/_/'od srung de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/_/khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/_/'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/_/khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/_/'od srung khyod rang gi stan ji 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]lta ba la 'dug shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po ni lteng rgyas 'od srung ral 
[\[84b.2\]]pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la mi spyod kyi lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nyid ni dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod do snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gzugs la skye ba yang yod/_
[\[84b.3\]]'jig pa yang yod/_de'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la skye ba yang yod/_'jig pa yang yod de/_/de'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa yang rig par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po yang 
[\[84b.4\]]rigs kyi bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas gzugs de yongs su shes so/_/rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas rnam par shes pa de yongs su 
[\[84b.5\]]shes so/_/rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len na mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[84b.6\]]shes pa yongs su shes na bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len na mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/_mi 'dzin/_lhag par mi gnas/_mngon par zhen par mi byed na 
[\[84b.7\]]tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o/_/rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len mi 'dzin/_lhag par mi gnas/_mngon par zhen par 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]mi byed na tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te gzugs bdag ma yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[85a.2\]]bdag ma yin na/_'o na bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_skye ba po'am/_gso ba po'am/_gang zag gam/_shed las skyes sam/_shed bu'am/_byed pa po'am/_byed du 'jug pa po'am/_shes pa po'am/_kun nas shes pa po'am/_slong 
[\[85a.3\]]ba po'am/_kun nas slong ba po'am/_smra ba po'am/_kun nas smra ba po'am/_tshor ba po'am/_kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa gang gis de dang der dge ba dang /_sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam 
[\[85a.4\]]par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la 
[\[85a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bdag bdag ces bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas btags pa'i rjes su ltung ba yin te/_'di la bdag ce'am/_bdag gi med kyi dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing 'gag pa na yang sdug bsngal 
[\[85a.6\]]'di 'gag go/_/skye ba na 'du byed rnams skye zhing 'gag pa na'ang 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_rgyu de dang rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug go/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba 
[\[85a.7\]]thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'dogs par mdzad de/_/dge slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa'i mi las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba nas/_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]zhes bya bar mkhyen to zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag ngas de ltar mkhyen cing de ltar gzigs pas nga 'di skad ces bdag gam/_sems can nam zhes bya ba nas tshor ba po zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_gang nam yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur 
[\[85b.2\]]zhing da ltar yang yod pa ma yin pas gang gis de dang der sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no zhes mi gsung ngo /_/
[\[85b.3\]]de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_'di yod pas 'di yod/_'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_
[\[85b.4\]]ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi 
[\[85b.5\]]dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'di med pas 'di med la/_'di 'gags pas 'di 
[\[85b.6\]]'gag par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched 
[\[85b.7\]]drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gags te/_/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo/_/mya ngan las 
[\[86a.2\]]'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal 'gag ste/_rgyun bcad pas mi 'byung zhing nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas 'gags pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/_/dge slong dag de la yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[86a.3\]]'das pa gang zhe na/_gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba/_de ni bsil bar gyur pa/_de ni nub pa ste/_dge slong dag zhi ba'i gnas ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_phung po thams cad spangs pa sred pa zad pa 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gags 
[\[86a.4\]]pa mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rtag gam mi rtag_/btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so/_/
[\[86a.5\]]mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/_sdug bsngal ma yin/_btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so/_/mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ci ga 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no/_/bdag ni 'di yin 
[\[86a.6\]]no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag_/btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so/_/mi 
[\[86a.7\]]rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam sdug bsngal ma yin/_btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so/_/mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ci ga 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no/_/bdag ni 'di yin no/_/
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang ci yang rung /_'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i 'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom 
[\[86b.2\]]pa'am/_gang dag thag ring ba'am/_gang dag thag nye ba yang rung ste/_de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no/_/bdag ni 'di ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/rgyal po 
[\[86b.3\]]chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed gang ci yang rung ba dang /_rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i 'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan 
[\[86b.4\]]pa'am/_gya nom pa'am/_gang dag thag ring ba'am/_gang dag thag nye ba yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no/_/bdag ni 'di ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[86b.5\]]blta bar bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong ba ni gzugs la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yid byung na 'dod chags 
[\[86b.6\]]dang 'bral lo/_/'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos 
[\[86b.7\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang /_lha brgyad khri dang /_ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tsom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_
[\[87a.2\]]ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon 
[\[87a.3\]]par 'phags so/_/bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/
[\[87a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na/_
[\[87a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[87a.6\]]cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan 
[\[87a.7\]]da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na mu stegs yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba skyes nas ring po ma lon par de rnams kyi ston pa dus byas par gyur pa dang /_de rnams kyi nang na nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis tshogs yongs su sdud pa 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]dang /_tshogs kyi 'dren par gyur pa gang yin pa de yongs su 'dren pa na de gnyis kyis 'di ltar yu bu cag las gcig gis bdud rtsi sngar rnyed kyang de gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o zhes dam bca' ba byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos/_
[\[87b.2\]]lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa dang /_cung zad lta ba dang /_rnam par lta ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_snam sbyar dang /_chos gos dang /_lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms 
[\[87b.3\]]la zhugs so/_/de'i tshe na kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba zhig gi phyir spyod yul du zhugs pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa dang /_cung zad lta ba dang /_rnam par lta ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_snam sbyar dang /_chos gos dang /_
[\[87b.4\]]lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag ring po kho nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po'i khab 'dir rab tu byung ba ji snyed lhags shing gnas pa dag las 'di lta ste/_rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod 
[\[87b.5\]]lam 'di lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad 'ga' yang ma mthong gis ma la bdag de'i gan du song ste/_dge slong khyed kyi ston pa ni gang yin/_gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung /_su'i chos la ni dga' zhes dri'o snyam du rig nas lam po che rub pa zhig na 'gro ba dang ldog pas shas 
[\[87b.6\]]cher sdod cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin/_gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung /_su'i chos la ni dga'/_tshe 
[\[87b.7\]]dang ldan pa shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba zhig yod de/_/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]sangs rgyas nas kho bo'i ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das de yin no/_/kho bo de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo /_/kho bo de'i chos la dga'o/_/dge slong de'i phyir chos ston cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ni na gzhon pa dang /_rab tu byung ba gsar pas de'i phyir kho bos 
[\[88a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par sla ba ma yin te/_'on kyang 'di ltar de'i don bstan par bya'o/_/dge slong kho bo la ni don dgos kyi chig ni shin 
[\[88a.3\]]tu mang pos kyang ci bya ste/_khyod kyis don mang yang rung nyung yang rung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /_/de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang /_/de bzhin 
[\[88a.4\]]gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/_/de skad gsung pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang /_chos 
[\[88a.5\]]thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tsom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas ro stod 
[\[88a.6\]]bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/_/sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa/_/'chi med mya ngan med 
[\[88a.7\]]pa yi/_/go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs/_/tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/_tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan dka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o/_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]pa dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la lan gsum bskor ba byas te song nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ngo /_/kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal thag ring po 
[\[88b.2\]]kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rnam par dngas/_bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag pags pa'i mdog ni yongs su dkar na khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed dam/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[88b.3\]]rnyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir chos ston cig_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /_/de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/_/de skad 
[\[88b.4\]]gsung pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/_/tshe dang ldan pa da dung yang lan cig rjod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa brjod par bya'o/_/chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /_/zhes pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes 
[\[88b.5\]]chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tsom las rgal ba dang /_
[\[88b.6\]]gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[88b.7\]]bcad pa smras pa/_skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/_/sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa/_/'chi med mya ngan med pa yi/_/go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs/_/tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan dka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog_/bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir je 'khor la blta bar bya ste/_bdag cag lta bu mi grags pa 
[\[89a.2\]]dang ldan pa/_shes par gyur pa dag gis 'khor la blta ba ni legs pa yin no/_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u rnams shes par gyis shig_/kho bo cag gnyis ni bcom ldan 
[\[89a.3\]]'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed na khyed cag ji ltar byed/_mkhan po gnyis bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad mkhan po gnyis las brten nas 'tshal ba lags na/_gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[89a.4\]]sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/_bdag cag kyang mkhan po gnyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u rnams de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga 
[\[89a.5\]]bcu lnga bcu dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho nas gzigs 
[\[89a.6\]]so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyod kyis grogs po'i tshogs yongs su sdud pa/_tshogs yongs su 'dren pa/_tshogs kyi mdun nas 'ong ba 'di lta ste/_nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis mthong ngam/_btsun 
[\[89a.7\]]pa mthong ngo /_/'di gnyis ni nyan thos zung dang /_zung gi mchog dang /_zung bzang por gyur te/_gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur la/_cig shos ni shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong zhig gis 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_ston pa dgongs yul mtha' yas pa/_/skyes bu'i dbang po mkhyen mthar byon/_/bcom ldan srid pa mthar mdzad pas/_/grogs po nye rgyal pang nas skyes/_/'od ma'i tshal du ma phyin par/_/de ltar mchi ba gzigs gyur nas/_/
[\[89b.2\]]tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni/_/'di gnyis nga yi nyan thos kyi/_/zung mchog 'gyur zhes des bstan te/_/gcig ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog_/cig shos shes rab ldan pa yi/_/mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad/_/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /_
[\[89b.3\]]pang nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_
[\[89b.4\]]bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung zhing dge slong dag tshur shog_/tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig 
[\[89b.5\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang /_snam sbyar gyon par gyur te lag na lhung bzed thogs pa skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas 
[\[89b.6\]]par gyur to/_/yang smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag 
[\[89b.7\]]snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/_/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/_/yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/_/phyin chad ci zhig 
[\[90a.2\]]bkri bar bya/_/des dge slong rnams spa gong zhing mi dga' ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_phyi dro bsod snyoms mi len pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su 
[\[90a.3\]]phab nas/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/_sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge 
[\[90a.4\]]slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/_lhung bzed dang chos gos dag thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag 
[\[90a.5\]]yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lags pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang /_de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag 
[\[90a.6\]]gi/_grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/_/yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/_/phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/_/zhes mchi nas des bdag cag rnams spa gong zhing mi dga' ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa ma mchis par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[90a.7\]]dge slong dag rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams la 'di skad ces/_'di la dpa' chen bde gshegs dag_/dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de/_/de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la/_/mkhas pa su zhig mi bzod byed/_/ces brjod na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]rnams kyi rlom pa tsam mam/_spobs pa tsam gang yan pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag 
[\[90b.2\]]yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi_/
[\[90b.3\]]grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/_/yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/_/phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/_/de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_'di na dpa' chen bde gshegs dag_/dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de/_/de dag chos kyis khrid 
[\[90b.4\]]mdzad la/_/mkhas pa su zhig bzod mi byed/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam mam/_spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[90b.5\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/_lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring ba rgyal po zas 
[\[90b.6\]]gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ste/_pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang 
[\[90b.7\]]ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/_lha khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_'char ka 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]gang gi tshe/_gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dga' ba spyod pa de'i tshe kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so/_/zhes smra'o/_/da ni kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i 
[\[91a.2\]]mi btang na 'ga' yang phrin yig khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/_'char kas smras pa/_lha bdag mchis te bka' mchid 'tshal la slar mchi'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang de'i bstan pa phun sum 
[\[91a.3\]]tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/_/'char kas smras pa/_lha slar mchis lags so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa/_lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su/_/
[\[91a.4\]]khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te/_/nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du/_/rgyal ba ljon shing la bsten na/_/de nyid khyod kyi slob ma yi/_/yal ga lcug ma 'phel 'gyur bas/_gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar 'gyur/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan/_/gzhan 
[\[91a.5\]]yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na/_/bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te/_/bu gcig yul mis 'bras bu yongs su spyad pa thob gyur na/_/de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med/_/gang tshe thog ma bltam 
[\[91a.6\]]pa na/_/nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni/_/shin tu che dang phan gdags zhes/_/khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad pas na/_/khyod kyis zhi gnas de brnyes na/_/bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la/_/thugs brtses rjes su gzung mdzod de/_/gshegs 
[\[91a.7\]]par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/_/zhes spring ba'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba'i 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]yi ge lags so/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bklags so/_/bklags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang /_'char kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam/_
[\[91b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'char ka 'dong ngo /_/'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang bdag gi mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[91b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing /_/sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/_/gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/_/gang zhig 
[\[91b.4\]]yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing /_/sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/_/gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis/_bkri/_/gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing /_/'jig rten ma bcom [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yod 
[\[91b.5\]]min pa/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/_/gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/_/lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mchi ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rig par bgyi'o/_/'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di 
[\[91b.6\]]lta bu ma yin no/_/'char kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung shig_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[91b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang /_yum dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_bla ma'i gnas lta bu 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]rnams kyis chos dang 'thun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog pas/_'char kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[92a.2\]]shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu byung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas kun tu 
[\[92a.3\]]spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas/_'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/_deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya bdag go/_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa 
[\[92a.4\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so/_/
[\[92a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'char ka song la khyod mod kho nar rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgor sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te nang du spyon cig zer na 'jug par bya'o/_/zhugs nas gal te shAkya'i dge slong 
[\[92a.6\]]gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na/_yod do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na/_'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas 
[\[92a.7\]]par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes 'dri na/_mi bzhugs so/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dri na/_dgon pa'am/_gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]par bya'o/_/gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o/_/gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na/_byon no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/ji srid cig na byon zhes 'dri na/_zhag bdun 
[\[92b.2\]]lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa song shig_/sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te/_/lha rnams bsams pas 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin bsam gtan 
[\[92b.3\]]pa rnams kyi/_/sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir song ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa 
[\[92b.4\]]drag po skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_ci shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/_shes ldan dag yod do/_/de rnams kyis 
[\[92b.5\]]rgyal po la smras pa/_shAkya'i dge slong mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_nang du thong shig_/de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/_'char ka rab tu byung ngam/_lha rab tu byung ngo /_/khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam/_
[\[92b.6\]]'di ci yin/_'char kas smras pa/_lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no/_/zhes bka' stsal nas chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo /_/rgyal 
[\[92b.7\]]pos yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/_de'i don du chur btsags pa dang /_'bras bu btags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang /_dul bar gnas pa 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho gas yongs su longs spyod do/_/rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/_'char ka ci gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba yin nam/_'char kas smras pa/_lha bdag gi 
[\[93a.2\]]dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so/_/dper ji lta bu ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no/_/rgya mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no/_/nam mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_'char 
[\[93a.3\]]ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'am/_lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad kyang 'di 'dra'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang brgya la nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /_chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar phyung ste smras pa/_'char ka gzhon nu don thams 
[\[93a.4\]]cad grub pa byon nam/_'char kas smras pa/_lha byon no/_/dus ji tsam na dgung bdun lon na'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis/_rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang 
[\[93a.5\]]byi dor byos shig_/'char kas smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gang du bzhugs/_'char kas smras pa/_dgon pa'am/_gtsug lag khang du'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_
[\[93a.6\]]'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa 
[\[93a.7\]]gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /_khang phran drug cu brtsig tu chug shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /_
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]khang phran drug cu brtsig tu bcug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/_maud gal gyi bu song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom na/_khyod cag 
[\[93b.2\]]las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs 
[\[93b.3\]]te/_yab sras gdan 'dzom na/_khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/_grol ba 'khor grol ba/_dbugs phyin pa/_'khor dbugs phyin pa/_
[\[93b.4\]]rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/_khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_glang po che glang po'i phrug gu'i 
[\[93b.5\]]tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_sman pa mkhas pa nad 
[\[93b.6\]]pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_dpa' bo ru pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[93b.7\]]rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/_zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/_yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]kyis bskor ba lta bu/_rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs 
[\[94a.2\]]kyis bskor ba lta bu/_rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/_sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/_glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pasku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad 
[\[94a.3\]]bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[94a.4\]]gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer 
[\[94a.5\]]ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang gyo mo dang /_gseg ma rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_dri shin tu zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams/_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs te/_gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ta ka nas gang yang n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar 
[\[94a.6\]]gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/_sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go/_/de nas 'bab chu ro hi ta ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed do/_/kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed do/_/kha cig ni khrus byed do/_/ser skya'i 
[\[94a.7\]]gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/_kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/_ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]dam/_'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na shAkya'i nga rgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs 
[\[94b.2\]]nas ltog po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/_de lta brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te des de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas nga zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[94b.3\]]'das kyis thugs mnyam par bzhag na/_shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_'chag pa dang /_bzhengs pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_mnal ba mdzad do/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug 
[\[94b.4\]]par mdzad de/_me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog dag 
[\[94b.5\]]go/_/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/_/sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/_sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad de/_/sku'i stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/_sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[94b.6\]]snyoms par zhugs so/_/shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang /_nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa de bsdus te ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so/_/dge slong 
[\[94b.7\]]rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]gyi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni 
[\[95a.2\]]dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi 
[\[95a.3\]]srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams mi gang lhag tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni dge slong rnams sa la'o/_/rgyal 
[\[95a.4\]]po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang /_dge slong mang po mthong nas de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/_'char ka 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na de la gzhon nu gang 
[\[95a.5\]]yin/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags so/_/srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/_/'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags/_/'di ni dgongs pa 
[\[95a.6\]]bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/_/dri med btsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang de gzigs shig_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/_blo 
[\[95a.7\]]gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/_/kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/_/bltam pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang /_/'dzam bu'i grib mas sku las ma 'das pa'o/_/de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]gtugs pa mthong nas de ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci'i tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag da gdod kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i 
[\[95b.2\]]zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/_gang gi tshe na gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa nas chen po g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/_'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang /_zla 
[\[95b.3\]]ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur nas sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas/_shes ldan dag 
[\[95b.4\]]sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta/_shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so/_/gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhing las 
[\[95b.5\]]kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba zag pa med pa dang 
[\[95b.6\]]mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/_shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/_/shar phyogs su 'bab/_shar phyogs su bab kyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo 
[\[95b.7\]]mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/_'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so/_/de bas na 'di skad ces/_blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/_/kun spyan zhabs 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/_bltam pa'i tshe na sa 'di g.yos pa dang /_/'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas 
[\[96a.2\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las/_/yab kyi khab na bzhugs 
[\[96a.3\]]pa las/_/dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas rnams su/_/ji lta bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi yi bdag po gang du ni/_/khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba/_/'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus/_/thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad/_/
[\[96a.4\]]rgyal pos gsol pa/_ba so gser gyi rtsa ba can/_/shin tu bde ba bting ba yi/_/khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las/_/gding ba la ni ji ltar ma na la/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po rnam grol gnas mal ni/_/dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi/_/me tog 
[\[96a.5\]]bkram par chags med cing /_/yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na/_/glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa/_/tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la/_/zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[96a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang /_/yang dag rtsol ba'i gzhol ba yis/_/sa kun rnam par rgyu na yang /_/nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i/_/na bza' mnabs nas mdzes pa las/_/
[\[96a.7\]]ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos man bas pa/_/ji ltar khyod kyi sku yis bzod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes/_/nga yi bgo ba snam sbyar te/_/de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams/_/nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur/_/rgyal po zas 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]gtsang gis gsol pa/_'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhang pa nas/_/du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las/_/'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni/_/phal pa gsol ba ji ltar mgul du mchi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zas kyi 
[\[96b.2\]]sred pa thams cad spangs nas ni/_/nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i/_/nga yi chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi/_/'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir spyod do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i/_/rgun skyems kha ra'i 
[\[96b.3\]]chab gsol na/_/rnyog pa can la dri nga ba'i/_/chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na/_/bdag la 'thung ba thams cad ni/_dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa/_/chab kyi ro mchog nga 'thung ngo /_/rgyal 
[\[96b.4\]]po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang /_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs/_/da ltar gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa/_/blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ji ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[96b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_gau tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa/_/dri ma bag chags bcas par yang spangs pas/_/nga ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te/_/nga la 'di na 'jigs pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu 
[\[96b.6\]]yid 'ong bar/_/khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na/_/gcig pu khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par/_/thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gau tam chos kyi mtsho phran dri med pa/_/tshul khrims 
[\[96b.7\]]'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/_/de la reg pa'i yon tan mi bkru na/_/lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni/_/gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/_/rnyog pa can la dri nga ba/_/chab 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gau tam dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med/_/bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/_/de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus na/_/lus mi gsher bar pha 
[\[97a.2\]]rol rab tu rgal/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yis/_/tsan dan gyis ni sku bkrus shing /_/ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzes pa las/_/de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshul 
[\[97a.3\]]khrims nga yi rgyan yin te/_/tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin/_/gser dang nor bu rna cha dag_/rmongs skyes nga la ci zhig bya/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod/_/gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye/_/yid 'byung ba yang ga 
[\[97a.4\]]las skye/_/zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gis nga ni khyod gsod dang /_/gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang /_/gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag_/nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya/_/rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste/_/gal te 
[\[97a.5\]]'di gsum yod min na/_/nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i/_/yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba/_/legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs/_/khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/_/
[\[97a.6\]]ji lta bur yang ma gos so/_/de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas/_/drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni/_/thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_/bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_gang 
[\[97a.7\]]bdag gi bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]pa mdzad de/_de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so/_/lha sbyin nga rgyal las nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas khro bas kun 
[\[97b.2\]]nas dkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed pa shes na/_bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig_/de la shAkya rnams kyis gshe ba'i tshig gis smras pa/_lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul 
[\[97b.3\]]che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugs 
[\[97b.4\]]pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro/_/ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[97b.5\]]'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro/_/'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/_
[\[97b.6\]]kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/_kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas 
[\[97b.7\]]la skyabs su song /_kha cig gis ni chos la/_kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste 'khor de dag phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/_da lta ni mis mchod kyis lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyi/_/
[\[98a.2\]]char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad de/_/mi bzad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di/_/drangs te thar pa'i lam la sbyor bar mdzod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig_/'di ltar rdzu 'phrul 
[\[98a.3\]]che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go/_/rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/_ha cang zhum pa dang shin tu dga' ba'o/_/de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin tu dga' ba yod kyis 
[\[98a.4\]]ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang shin tu dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la soms shig btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud 
[\[98a.5\]]gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[98a.6\]]btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/_maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[98a.7\]]maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/_rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/_'di lta ste/_'chag pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal bar byed do/_/me'i 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/_/'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_/dkar 
[\[98b.2\]]po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog dag go/_/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed do/_/lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/_/lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs 
[\[98b.3\]]par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te stan bshams 
[\[98b.4\]]pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[98b.5\]]mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mthu che ba dag gsum rig dang /_/sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang /_/zag zad dgra bcom gang yin pa/_/thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu 
[\[98b.6\]]'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/_kye ma 
[\[98b.7\]]brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na/_lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad do snyam pa dang /_chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/_srog chags grog spur rnams kyi sems 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na/_brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po rnams kyi sems 
[\[99a.2\]]kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/_srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes/_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom 
[\[99a.3\]]ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba/_bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[99a.4\]]lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig_/kau shi ka khyod kyi gsung mchog tu bzang ngo /_/zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha'i dbang 
[\[99a.5\]]po brgya byin las mnyan te n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to/_/de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhi na 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang 
[\[99a.6\]]dang /_lus ngan po ste/_shar sgo na ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub 'khor dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/nub phyogs na ni mig 
[\[99a.7\]]mi bzang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'o/_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs 
[\[99b.2\]]so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po nang du zhugs pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 
[\[99b.3\]]'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo /_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig rgyal po chen po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song 
[\[99b.4\]]ba dang /_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig_/'phags skyes pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags 
[\[99b.5\]]skyes po'o/_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/_der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par 
[\[99b.6\]]sdod cig_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig_/mig mi bzang gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo /_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/_der mir gyur pa 'jug tu 
[\[99b.7\]]mi dbang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus mthong nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig_/rnam thos kyi bus smras 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o/_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/_der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de bdag gis blta'o snyam 
[\[100a.2\]]pa'i 'dod pa skyes so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na khrag dron po skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis de la 
[\[100a.3\]]thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang /_de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas 
[\[100a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta 
[\[100a.5\]]bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa bdag la phas ma 
[\[100a.6\]]bgyis mas ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lha rnams kyis ma lags/_sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/_sdug pa dang /_rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[100a.7\]]kyis bdag la mdzad de/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_/ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/_bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag go/_/yang gsol pa/_pha la lan du phan gdags pa/_/dam pa'i bus ni 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]bgyi ba gang /_/khyod kyis bdag la mdzad lags te/_/sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis/_/khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las/_/drangs te mtho ris thar pa las/_/bsgrim mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te/_/khyod kyis dga' ba mdzad pa legs/_/mgon po byams pa khyed kyis ni/_/bdag 
[\[100b.2\]]gi tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar/_/mtho ris rnyed pa srid pa yi/_/longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[100b.3\]]ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang 
[\[100b.4\]]bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig_/ci'i slad du/_ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[100b.5\]]spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so/_/gang gi gdugs la lags/_de ring kho na'o/_/bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa de'i nyi ma la shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/_/de bzhin du bre bo zas la 
[\[100b.6\]]rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri drug stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/_/de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal 
[\[100b.7\]]srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/_/gal te de ltar gyur nad su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag_/de rnams kyis smras 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]pa/_shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas 
[\[101a.2\]]nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags na/_da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' dang sham thabs 
[\[101a.3\]]man bas/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_rgyal po zas gtsang gi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la 
[\[101a.4\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' 
[\[101a.5\]]bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan 
[\[101a.6\]]pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo bar mdzad pa/_sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis/_/shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa yi/_/yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni/_/rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs 
[\[101a.7\]]so/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/_nyi 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na dka' thub drag pa'i brtul zhugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam 
[\[101b.2\]]du sems te/_'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las des bsams pa shAkya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/_de nas shAkya thams cad bsogs te smras 
[\[101b.3\]]pa/_shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu byung bar ma gyur na ji ltar 'gyur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/_g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur na/_
[\[101b.4\]]khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/_lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam/_rab tu byung shig_/ci thams cad dam/_khyim re nas re re'o/_/bka' bzhin 'tshal/_rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyim 
[\[101b.5\]]re nas/_re re rab tu byung shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/_/bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang ming chen no/_/ming chen ni zhing blas kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no/_/ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed dga' bar 
[\[101b.6\]]byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/ming chen la mas smras pa/_bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu phyung shig ces bsgos/_khyod rab tu byung shig_/des smras pa/_bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis/_khyod kyi bu sdug pa dang bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin 
[\[101b.7\]]pa de rab tu phyung shig_/bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig_/yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags mod/_de ring la cung zad kyang ma bskur dang /_ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro/_/bu de bzhin du byas te yid ches par bya'o/_/des gzeb stong pa rdze'u yis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te rgya skegs la rgyas btab nas/_bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/_gal te de na ci 
[\[102a.2\]]yod ces 'dri ba dang /_ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig_/des de khyer nas song ba dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/_des bsams pa/_rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de deng 
[\[102a.3\]]ci'i phyir zas kyis phangs par bya/_de'i zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes des rdze'u de rnams sran tshod dang /_tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa'i zas kyis bkang ngo /_/ji tsam na mngag gzhug mas der khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu mo 'o ni na ci 
[\[102a.4\]]yod/_des smras pa/_gzhon nu ci yang ma mchis so/_/ma 'gags pas bsams pa/_bdag la ma byams na 'di stong par ci ste bskur gdon mi za bar 'di ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re zhig blta'o zhes ji tsam na kha phye ba dang /_skyed 
[\[102a.5\]]mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/_de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so/_/de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma la zas kyi phud bskur nas spring ba/_yum gdugs re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu bskur ba'i rigs 
[\[102a.6\]]so/_/des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/_/des ming chen la bstan nas bu mthong ngam/_yum mthong lags so/_/khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po'i sems can mi'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/_
[\[102a.7\]]des smras pa/_yum de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung /_mi ldan yang rung /_bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo /_/zhes ji ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu 'byung bar khas len du ma btub bo/_/de nas des ma 'gags pa la 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]smras pa/_bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams la khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgo na/_khyod ci rab tu byung ngam/_'on te khyim par 'dug_/des smras pa/_yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/_nyes dmigs ci 
[\[102b.2\]]mchis/_khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis/_nyes dmigs ci mchis/_bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs na mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyim par 'dug 
[\[102b.3\]]ste legs par bskyangs na lha dang mi 'thob bo/_/ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'thob bo/_/yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas de bas na khyim na gnas 
[\[102b.4\]]pa mi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_bu legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo /_/de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pi bang len te/_/pi bang 
[\[102b.5\]]len pa na rgyun chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to/_/ma 'gags pa pi bang len pa la byang ba yin pas des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de sgor bsdad de sgo srungs kyi mi la smras pa/_kye nang rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na 
[\[102b.6\]]sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig_/sgo srungs song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa/_lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab sgo na sdod cing mchis so/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog_/shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong shig_/de nang du zhugs 
[\[102b.7\]]pa dang /_rgyal pos 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste smras pa/_khyod 'ongs nas ci srid lon/_des smras pa/_gang gi tshe khyod pi bang len pa na rgyun chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so/_/de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas des smras pa/_khyod pi bang len pa la byang ba yin no/_/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]ldan gyis smras pa/_gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs/_ma 'gags pas smras pa/_lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig par bsgo bas de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig_/rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rgyal 
[\[103a.2\]]pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ste gros bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob shig_/de de nyid du gnas btab bo/_/mal 'cha' bas rims bag gi dri can gyi gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram pa'i mal du ma 'gags 
[\[103a.3\]]pa nyal ba dang /_de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams su myong nas smras pa/_ci 'di'i 'og tu rdo phre'u yod dam/_de rnams kyis brtag pa brtsams pa na me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/ma 'gags pa mtshan mo 
[\[103a.4\]]mi bde zhing nyal nas nam langs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ma 'gags pa ci ga bde bar gnyid log gam/_des smras pa lha bde bar gnyid ma log go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci'i phyir ma 'gags pas smras pa/_/lha rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting 
[\[103a.5\]]bar me tog sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus snad lags so/_/rgyal pos la 'cha' ba bkug nas khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting ste ci bya/_mal 'cha' bas smras pa/_lha bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags/_/rgyal pos dkor pa bkug 
[\[103a.6\]]nas smras pa/_khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya/_des smras pa/_lha bdag la thag pas gtad pa lags so/_/rgyal pos thag pa bkug nas smras pa/_khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri can gyi gos 'bul/_thag pas smras pa/_lha snam 
[\[103a.7\]]bu 'thag pa'i 'phro cung zhig lus pa na/_bdag rims kyis thebs bzhin bgyis pa lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/_des smras pa/_tsha ba'i reg pa nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri lags so/_/rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]skyes te smras pa/_shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAkya'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no/_/de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/_gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na/_lha sbyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur te/_de shAkya rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/_
[\[103b.2\]]ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la lha sbyin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/_lha sbyin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na/_khyod ci byed/_lha sbyin gyis bsams pa/_gal te rab tu mi 'byung 
[\[103b.3\]]ngo zhes smras pa dang /_shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu byung bar mi 'gyur gyis de la thabs zhig bsham par bya ste bslu'o/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa/_ji 
[\[103b.4\]]ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams so snyam nas smras pa/_khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug_/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa/_'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yin gyis dam 'char 
[\[103b.5\]]bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs bu la bris nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig_/bzang ldan dang /_nam gru dang /_
