[\[103b.6\]]ma 'gags pa dang /_lha sbyin la sogs te shAkya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyis thos par gyis la rab tu dga' bskyed cig ces bsgo'o/_/lha sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas/_gal te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 
[\[103b.7\]]nges par rab tu 'byung bar shes par gyur pa dang bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig_/de ni gal te rab tu ma byung na [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam/_ci rab tu byung la bdag rab 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]tu byung bzhin du rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas des grong khyer de gseg ma dang gyo mo bsal/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[104a.2\]]bsgreng /_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag_/me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed du bcug go/_/de nas shAkya brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo na seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/_shAkya 
[\[104a.3\]]mo dang /_shAkya gzhon nu ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang skar khung khol ma can dang /_skar khung dang /_stegs bu dag la 'dug go/_/shAkya rnams kyi 'byor pa la lta bar 'dod pa'i skyes pa'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_
[\[104a.4\]]bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su 'dug go/_/shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/_su dag gis ni thugs byung bar 'gyur brtag pa'i bram ze mtshan mkhan dang /_ltas mkhan dag bkug go/_/shAkya rnams do shal dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan 
[\[104a.5\]]dang /_rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang /_ma dag la bltas nas/_so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/_shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung ba mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_re zhig 'dis ni mnyes par byed 
[\[104a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nam gru dang /_ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ba na/_de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to/_/de nas lha sbyin phyir byung ste/_de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong 
[\[104a.7\]]nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/ko ka li ka dang /_khan dra drab bya dang /_ka ta mo ra ka dang /_rgyal dang /_rgya mtshos sbyin rnams phyir byung ba na/_bong bu'i skad grag nas de 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang /_de glang po che las babs te 
[\[104b.2\]]blangs so/_/de yang de rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bzang ldan dang /_nam gru dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams skyed mos tshal du dus ston la 
[\[104b.3\]]'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te ngas shAkya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung na kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur/_kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed 
[\[104b.4\]]par mi 'gyur te/_mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la/_dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma pa yin pas/_mal ngas thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen 
[\[104b.5\]]par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams 
[\[104b.6\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba/_de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na skra 'breg par btang nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'breg pa na/_de ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag cing skad 'dzer cing 
[\[104b.7\]]dbugs brtsegs pas skra 'dreg par byed do/_/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/_nye bar 'khor ci'i phyir du/_de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur dal bus tshig re re nas smras pa/_lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]pa mi phal ba rnams la yang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig_/khyed kyis spangs te gson pa bas na gum mi bsngo'o/_/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/_nye bar 'khor khyod kyis jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te chog gis mya ngan ma 
[\[105a.2\]]byed cig_/ngas ji ltar mi phal che ba rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas des phyogs gcig tu ras gcig bting nas shAkya'i gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig_/'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la 
[\[105a.3\]]bkur sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog shig_/de rnams kyi se mo do dang /_do shal dang /_mgul rgyan dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_rna rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan 
[\[105a.4\]]pa'i rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so/_/nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams kyi mthar gyis skra bregs te de rnams khrus la dong ba dang /_des bsams pa/_re zhig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang /_lang tsho la bab cing chung ma 
[\[105a.5\]]dang ldan la mdzod dang /_bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu byung na bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo 
[\[105a.6\]]las rgal ba dang /_sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la 
[\[105a.7\]]gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]so/_/nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi phyir da ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang /_lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la 
[\[105b.2\]]bang mdzod dang /_bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/_bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las 
[\[105b.3\]]rgal ba dang /_sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang /_'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rigs snying 
[\[105b.4\]]por byed pa ma yin/_rus snying por byed pa ma yin/_rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/_thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/_'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni/_/rgyud dang rus la rtog mi 
[\[105b.5\]]mdzad/_/'das nas yun ring lon pa yi/_/las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad/_/gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rdzogs par 'dod na tshur bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[105b.6\]]'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/des khas blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[105b.7\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lags na thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong tshur shog_/tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar skra byi ba dang /_snam sbyar gyon pa dang /_lag pa lhung bzed dang bya ma bum gyis brel ba dang skra dang kha 
[\[106a.2\]]spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang /_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir 
[\[106a.3\]]gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_/shAkya rab tu byung ba'i rnams ni rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byed pas/_shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so/_/de nas des gdong 
[\[106a.4\]]bteg ste gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang gdud par bgyi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu nga rgyal spang pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/_'di rgan gyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa 
[\[106a.5\]]chog la thud cig_/des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/_sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/_shar phyogs mtho nanub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs 
[\[106a.6\]]mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur te/_de ltar thams cad kyis rim bzhin du gtugs so/_/lha sbyin gyis ma btud pa dang 
[\[106a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis thud cig_/des gsol pa/_bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes de 'dud du ma btub ste der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lha sbyin gyis bcag go/_/
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/_shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/_
[\[106b.2\]]thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/_gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/_shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/_thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon 
[\[106b.3\]]gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/_bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang /_thog ma gang yin pa dang /_rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang /_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/_tshur bdag cag 
[\[106b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la don de nyid zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba 
[\[106b.5\]]der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po 
[\[106b.6\]]'dun khang du 'tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/_shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/_
[\[106b.7\]]shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/_thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/_bdag cag gis shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/_thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_shAkya rnams 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/_tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar 
[\[107a.2\]]bgyi'o snyam nas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/_thog ma ni gang lags/_rgyu ni ci zhig lag lags/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[107a.3\]]'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs na/_mu stegs can dang /_kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge slong gau ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lung ston pas bdag nyid stod par byed do zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas 
[\[107a.4\]]'di yod pas nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs par nus pa su yod snyam mo/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal 
[\[107a.5\]]gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu nga ro rgyab bsnyung bas re zhig de bas la gyis khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi 
[\[107a.6\]]smra bas khas blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas snam sbyar bltab ste sngas su bcug nas/_glo g.yas pas phab ste/_zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang /_dran 
[\[107a.7\]]pa dang /_shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag gis sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang /_thog ma gang yin pa dang /_
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]rgyu ni ci yin pa dang /_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong 
[\[107b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang /_thog ma gang yin pa dang /_rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang /_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang 
[\[107b.3\]]yin pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/_gau tam dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing 'jig 
[\[107b.4\]]rten zhig nas/_sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/_de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po mnyams shing ma tshang ba med pa yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_kha dog bzang pos gnas 
[\[107b.5\]]pa/_rang gi 'od can/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur zhing mtsho gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung 
[\[107b.6\]]gis pris ma chags pa dang /_mkhregs pa dang /_khebs par byed do/_/dper na 'o ma bskol ba grang bar gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang /_mkhregs pa dang /_khebs pa de bzhin du sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gis mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis 
[\[107b.7\]]pris ma chags pa dang /_mkhregs pa dang /_khebs par byed do/_/sa'i bcud de ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na mar sar lta bu'o/_/ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/_/gau ta ma dag 'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags shing 'jig rten chags na/_de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad las zad bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams 
[\[108a.2\]]dang skul ba mnyam par 'ong zhing de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/_dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/_yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa rang gi 'od can/_mkha' la 'gro ba/_dga' 
[\[108a.3\]]ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/_rgyu skar rnams kyang med/_skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam yang med/_mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang med/_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_dus 
[\[108a.4\]]tshigs dang /_lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do/_/skyes pa dang bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi gzhan du na sems can sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed 
[\[108a.5\]]de/_/ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/_/ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/_/sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed de/_ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred la/_ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de 
[\[108a.6\]]ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de rnams kyis kyang mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar rtsom ste/_ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/_/ji lta ji ltar sred pa de/_lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/_/gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i 
[\[108a.7\]]bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe/_de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang lci ba zhugs par gyur to/_/de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]mun pa byung ba na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyu skar dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam dang /_mtshan mo dang /_nyin mo dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_dus tshigs dang /_lo 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[108b.2\]]rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/de rnams las zas la ches nyung zad du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par 'gyur te/_kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi 
[\[108b.3\]]rnam pa gnyis mngon te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/_kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no/_/khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod do/_/kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid 
[\[108b.4\]]blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag sa'i bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/_kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyis 
[\[108b.5\]]zas zhim po [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang /_tshig dang /_tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces/_kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/_kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra 
[\[108b.6\]]zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang /_sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/_smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de'i don ni mi shes so/_/gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi sa'i bcud de nub pa na/_sa'i zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum 
[\[108b.7\]]tshogs pa byung bar 'gyur te/_kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na dong ka'i me tog lta bu'o/_/ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/_/dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/_/de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/de rnams las kha zas la 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/_/kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to/_/zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/_kye sems can kho 
[\[109a.2\]]bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i zhag nub par gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag sa'i zhag de nub par gyur 
[\[109a.3\]]pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/_kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar byed do/_/dper na da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba 'ba' zhig gis reg pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang /_tshig dang /_
[\[109a.4\]]tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces e ma'o kyi hud e ma'o kyi hud ces smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa zhag de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur kyang smras pa 
[\[109a.5\]]'di'i don ni 'di yin smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi shes so/_/gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyis zhag de nub pa na/_myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper 
[\[109a.6\]]na shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog lta bu'o/_/ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/_/de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/_/
[\[109a.7\]]kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to/_/zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no/_/kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/_kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]du gsod par byed do/_/kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/_mdun nas phar song /_
[\[109b.2\]]mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/dper nad ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la drag po'i tshar bcad pas tshar bcad par 'dod pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang /_tshig dang /_tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su zlos shing 'di skad du/_mdun nas 
[\[109b.3\]]phar song /_mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang /_tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces mdun nas phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang /_smras pa 
[\[109b.4\]]'di'i don ni 'di yin smras pa/_'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so/_/gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas/_ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa/_sbun pa med pa/_shun pa med pa/_
[\[109b.5\]]dag pa gtsang ma skye ste/_de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/_nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas/_/brngas shing brngas kyang slar skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon no/_/de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/gang nas 
[\[109b.6\]]sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur te/_kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o/_/kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o/_/de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa 
[\[109b.7\]]rnams dang /_skyes pa'i dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su blta'o/_/ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so/_/ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar zhen no/_/ji lta ji ltar zhen pa 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]de lta de ltar log par zhugs so/_/sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sa dang /_bong ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mos gtor nas 'di skad ces/_sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya 
[\[110a.2\]]ba ma yin pa byed do/_/sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis/_kwa'e sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o/_/dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams bag ma blangs pa na phye ma dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_gos dang /_
[\[110a.3\]]'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ba na sas gtor cing bong ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams kyis kyang gtor nas kyang 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha 
[\[110a.4\]]chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do/_/sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed kyis/_kwa'e sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes bya ba smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/_/gau ta ma dag de ltar na sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /_sngon 
[\[110a.5\]]gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar chos su 'dod do/_/'dul bar 'dod do/_/sngon smad par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar bsngags par bya bar 'dod do/_/de rnams kyis de zhag gcig cig spangs pa/_nas zhag gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_
[\[110a.6\]]bdun du yang spangs so/_/gang na sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de rnams khang pa brtsig pa la brtson par byed do/_/'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do/_/'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin 
[\[110a.7\]]pa spyad do zhes zer bas khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags te/_gau ta ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no/_/de yang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/_de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin no/_/
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs ka/_nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang nang par sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas sems can snyom las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par gyi sA lu nub blangs so/_/de nas sems can gzhan zhig gis sems can 
[\[110b.2\]]de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig_/kho bos ni nang par gyi sA lu nub blangs so/_/de nas sems can de 'di 
[\[110b.3\]]snyam du sems te/_kye ma de ni legs so/_/kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang /_zhag gsum gyi dang /_zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/_des zhag gnyis kyi dang /_zhag gsum gyi dang /_zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu 
[\[110b.4\]]blangs so/_/de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/de nas sems can des sems can de la skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig_/kho bos ni zhag 
[\[110b.5\]]gnyis kyi dang /_gsum gyi dang /_zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs zin no/_/de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma de ni legs so/_/kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/_ma la bdag gis zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig gi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/_des zla ba 
[\[110b.6\]]phyed dang /_zla ba gcig gi sA lu blangs so/_/gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru sogs 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang /_sbun pa dang /_shun pas yog par gyur to/_/brngas shing 
[\[110b.7\]]brngas nas nga phyir mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/_sA lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to/_/de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas shes ldan dag bdag cag sngon yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/_dbang po ma nyams shing 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]ma tshang ba med pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/_rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/_nam mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/_bdag cag la sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_
[\[111a.2\]]dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/_/bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos te/_gang gi tshe bdag cag gis sa'i bcud la kham gyi rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe bdag cag gi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang /_lci ba nyid du zhugs par gyur 
[\[111a.3\]]te/_kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de ni nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/_/bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to/_/bdag cag las kha zas la ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog 
[\[111a.4\]]bzang por gyur/_kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/_kwa'e sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog 
[\[111a.5\]]ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/_/sa'i bcud de nub pa nas zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_
[\[111a.6\]]dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/_bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/_kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha 
[\[111a.7\]]dog ngan par gyur te/_zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/_/kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/_kwa'e sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to/_/sa zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/_bdag cag de za 
[\[111b.2\]]zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/bdag cag rnams las kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/_kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/_/kha dog 
[\[111b.3\]]rnam pa gnyis yod pas/_kwa'e sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu 
[\[111b.4\]]gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/_/myu gu'i tshal de nub pa na ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa/_sbun pa med pa/_shun pa med pa/_dag pa gtsang ma skye ste/_de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/_nang brngas nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas brngas shing brngas kyang slar 
[\[111b.5\]]yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/_bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/gang nas bdag cag gis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru sogs 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma 
[\[111b.6\]]dang /_sbun pa dang /_shun pas yog par gyur to/_/brngas shing brngas na yang slar mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/_sA lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas/_ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams 
[\[111b.7\]]bcad la/_'di ni khyod kyi'o/_/'di ni nga'i 'o zhes mu thug bre bar bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas zhing bgos te mtshams su mu thug bres so/_/gau ta ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du mu thug bre ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no/_/de yang 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin pas de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni chos kyi mchog yin no/_/de nas sems can zhig gis rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs so/_/sems can gzhan dag gis sems can des rang 
[\[112a.2\]]gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kwa'e sems can khyod/_rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang zhes de phar drangs tshur drangs nas ci tsam na 'khor mi'i nang 
[\[112a.3\]]du khrid de/_shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par len to zhes spyos so/_/de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kwa'e sems can khyod/_rang gi sA lu yod 
[\[112a.4\]]bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang /_kwa'e sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig_/de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag sems can 'dis bdag sA lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs 
[\[112a.5\]]nas ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas spyos so/_/de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di smras so/_/kwa'e sems can khyod kyis sems can la sA lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs nas ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas ci'i phyir spyo/_/kwa'e 
[\[112a.6\]]sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig_/de nas sems can de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag sA lu'i phyir phar 'dren tshur 'dren cing ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du spyo ba yang snang bas/_ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la bdag cag gi nang na 
[\[112a.7\]]sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/_lhag par blta na sdug pa/_lhag par mdzes pa/_lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos dang /_des bdag cag chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams ni chad pas 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]gcod par 'gyur/_phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur te/_bdag cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las de la chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus te/_de rnams kyi nang nas lhag par 
[\[112b.2\]]gzugs bzang ba/_lhag par blta na sdug pa/_lhag par mdzes pa/_lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/_'di skad ces kye sems can khyod tshur shog_/kho bo cag las chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas 
[\[112b.3\]]chod cig_/phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan thogs shig_/kho bo cag gi zhing dag la 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no/_/de de rnams la chad pas gcad par bya ba la ni chad pas gcod/_phan gdags 
[\[112b.4\]]par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog shas dbul te/_skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur zhing skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur bas mang pos bkur ba mang pos bkur ba zhes grags so/_/
[\[112b.5\]]zhing de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na nyams pa las skyob par byed pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so/_/chos kyis skye dgu mgu bar byed cing tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/_shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so/_/
[\[112b.6\]]gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sems can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya ste/_gau ta ma dag rgyal po 'od mdzes kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming tshur shog_/tshur shog ces bya bar 
[\[112b.7\]]gyur to/_/'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya ste/_gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i tshe mi rnams kyi ming sme ba can sme ba can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag dge ba'i bu dge mchog ces bya ste/_gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge mchog gi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sprin mgrin 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]sprin mgrin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ste/_gau ta ma dag rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming ta la'i rkang ta la'i rkang zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bor sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing 
[\[113a.2\]]shin tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/_ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/_/de smin nas brtol ba dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis 
[\[113a.3\]]kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_spyi bo las skyes pas spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang /_de thams cad kyi nu ma la 'o ma zag nas re res nga las nu nga las nu zhes smras pas nga las nu nga 
[\[113a.4\]]las nu zhes bya bar grags so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe mi rnams sems par byed/_'jal bar byed/_nye bar rtog par byed de/_de rnams bsams gzhal nye bar brtags nas bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad 
[\[113a.5\]]pa dag byed du 'jug pas des na/_de rnams yid las skyes yid las skyes zhes bya bar grags so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po drug po 'di dag ni tshe tshad med cing tshe dpag tu med pa yin no/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu'i brla g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam 
[\[113a.6\]]zhing shin tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/_ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/_/de smin nas brtol ba dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[113a.7\]]kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_brla g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]pa'i brla g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/_ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/_/de smin nas brtol ba dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa skyes 
[\[113b.2\]]bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_brla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes nye mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug 
[\[113b.3\]]go/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/_ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/_/de smin nas brtol ba dang /_khye'u gzugs 
[\[113b.4\]]bzang ba/_/blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_rkang pa g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung du 
[\[113b.5\]]yang gling gnyis la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/_ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang gnod pa 
[\[113b.6\]]mi skyed do/_/de smin nas brtol ba dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes ldan nye mdzes ldan zhes bya bar 
[\[113b.7\]]gyur to/_/gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung du yang gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/_/gau ta ma dag de ltar na rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi bu 'od mdzes so/_/'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba'o/_/dge ba'i bu dge 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]mchog_/dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags so/_/gso sbyong 'phags kyi bu nga las nu'o/_/nga las nu'i mdzes pa'o/_/mdzes pa'i nye mdzes pa'o/_/nye mdzes kyi mdzes ldan dang /_nye mdzes ldan dang /_bzang po dang /_legs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_
[\[114a.2\]]btang ba dang /_btang bzung dang /_yan lag dang /_yan lag shing rta dang /_ngan spong dang /_skal ldan shing rta dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_rgya mtsho'i bu dang /_rgya mtsho chen po dang /_sha ku ni dang /_sha ku ni chen po dang /_ku sha dang /_nye ba'i ku sha dang /_ku 
[\[114a.3\]]sha chen po dang /_legs mthong dang /_legs mthong chen po dang /_rab thob dang /_rab thob chen po dang /_rab tu sgra bsgrags dang /_rab tu sgra bsgrags chen po dang /_'od byed dang /_rtul phod pa dang /_lhun po ldan dang /_lhun po yod dang /_'od zer dang /_
[\[114a.4\]]'od zer ldan dang /_'od zer yod dang /_kun nas 'od zer ro/_/gau ta ma dag kun nas 'od zer gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yul gru 'dzin du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste/_dgra 'dul bar 
[\[114a.5\]]byed pas dgra 'dul dgra 'dul zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong yul dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ngo /_/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste/_/
[\[114a.6\]]ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed pas na ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri drug stong yul bA ra Na sIr byung ste/_de rnams 
[\[114a.7\]]kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong kim pi la'i grong khyer du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshangs byin ces bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]de dag rgyal po tshangs byin gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong glang po che'i grong khyer du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po glang pos byin zhes bya ba 'byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dang rgyal po glang pos byin gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_
[\[114b.2\]]sum cha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga stong yul rdo 'jog tu byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bal bu can zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po bal bu can gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer brang gis nyal du byung ste/_de rnams 
[\[114b.3\]]kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshan po che 'dul zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po tshan po che 'dul gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal byin zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/
[\[114b.4\]]gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal byin gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer kan+ya kub dzar byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal sde zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal sde'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i 
[\[114b.5\]]rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer tsam par byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po klu'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po klu'i lha'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer ta la'i phreng du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal 
[\[114b.6\]]po mi'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mi'i lha'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri nyis stong grong khyer tam lar byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha'i bu dang /_
[\[114b.7\]]tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer ba so'i grong du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po blo gros bzang po'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mun sel zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mun sel gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer bA rA Na sIr byung ste/_
[\[115a.2\]]de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya 
[\[115a.3\]]ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po stong yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/_/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dka' thub spyod ces bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po dka' thub spyod kyi bu dang /_
[\[115a.4\]]tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i gdong zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i gdong gi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum 
[\[115a.5\]]yang grong khyer bA rA Na sIr byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i bdag po'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang grong khyer dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal 
[\[115a.6\]]pos 'dzin zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal pos 'dzin gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grong khyer mi thi lar byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po lha chen po'i 
[\[115a.7\]]bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer mi thi lar drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad de/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba byung ngo /_/mu khyud las 'bying ba dang /_sra ba'i mu khyud dang /_rko ba 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]dang /_nye bar rko ba dang rko ba yod dang kun nas rko dang /_gya nom snang dang /_thos pa'i sde dang /_chos kyi sde dang /_rtogs pa dang /_rtogs pa chen po dang /_rtogs pa'i sde dang /_mya ngan med dang /_mya ngan bral dang /_brtan pa'i sde dang /_rga bas sbyar dang /_glen bsad 
[\[115b.2\]]dang /_skya reng dang /_phyogs kyi bdag po dang /_rdul can dang /_bde byed dang /_kun dga' dang /_me long gdong dang /_skyed pa dang /_kun nas skyed pa dang /_skye bo'i khyu mchog dang /_bza' btung can dang /_bza' btung mang po can dang /_mi thub pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[115b.3\]]gyis mi thub pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_shin tu gnas pa dang /_stobs chen dang /_stobs chen zhon dang /_legs pa'i blo gros dang /_brtan pa zhon dang /_gzhu bcu pa dang /_gzhu brgya pa dang /_gzhu dgu bcu dang /_gzhu rgyal dang /_gzhu bkra dang /_gzhu 
[\[115b.4\]]sra dang /_shing rta bcu pa dang /_shing rta brgya pa dang /_shing rta dgu bcu pa dang /_shing rta khra bo dang /_shing rta rgyal dang /_shing rta sra ba'o/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po shing rta sra ba'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bdun khri bdun stong grong khyer 
[\[115b.5\]]kun tu snang bar byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po kr-i ki zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i tshe ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 
[\[115b.6\]]'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ma 'ongs pa na byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab nas 
[\[115b.7\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po kr-i kA'i bu legs skyes so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po legs skyes kyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/_de rnams 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po rna ba can la bu gnyis te/_gau ta ma dang /_b+ha ra dwa dza'o/_/de gnyis las gau ta ma ni mngon par 'byung bar dga'o/_/b+ha ra dwa dza ni rgyal srid la mngon par dga'o/_/de pha chos dang chos 
[\[116a.2\]]ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por gyur te/_bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas 'dir ci'i dus la bab ce na/_khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 
[\[116a.3\]]'byung bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab pa/_yab mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag ni dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_bu gang gi phyir 
[\[116a.4\]]mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang sbyin sreg sreg par byed pa dang /_dka' thub dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni 'di'i ched yin te/_nga 'das na rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung /_des smras pa/_yab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin 
[\[116a.5\]]pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo mi thogs so/_/de lta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig_/rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ngo /_/de'i tshe bsti gnas zhig na drang srong mdog gnag ces bya ba gnas so/_/de nas gzhon nu gau ta ma rgyal pos 
[\[116a.6\]]gnang nas/_dga' zhing mgu la dga' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_drang srong mdog gnag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis bdag rab tu phyung 
[\[116a.7\]]shig_/des de rab tu phyung ngo /_/drang srong mdog gnag ni 'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_chu 'thung bas de yang drang srong gau ta ma drang srong gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rna ba can shi nas gzhon nu b+ha ra dwa dza pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]byed du bcug go/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na drang srong gau ta mas mkhan po la smras pa/_mkhan po dgon pa'i gnas na zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs kyis grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu rung gis grong ngam/_dgon pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis 
[\[116b.2\]]ni mdor na dbang po bsrung ba yin gyis/_khyod song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byos la 'dug shig_/mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/_drang srong gau ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te gnas so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na 
[\[116b.3\]]smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang /_skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba gnas te/_des de la dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag skur ro/_/des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las/_yang mi gzhan zhig kA ra ShA pa Na lnga brgya 
[\[116b.4\]]thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas/_bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog_/des bsams pa/_gal te bdag song na kA ShA pa Na lnga brgya yang mi 'thob la khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te/_gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni legs pa ma yin no snyam nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la 
[\[116b.5\]]smras pa/_song la pad ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mchid nas re zhig bdag skabs ma mchis te slad kyis mchi'o zhes smros shig_/des de'i gan du song nas smras so/_/mi de yang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas de de dang dga' mgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo /_/des bsams 
[\[116b.6\]]pa/_nam tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems kyang bsrung bar nus so snyam nas des yang bu mo de la bsgo ba pad ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na skyed mos tshal gang du mchi zhes smros shig_/des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang /_
[\[116b.7\]]des smras pa/_khyod kyi skad cig la skabs med/_skad cig la skabs yod ce'am/_bu mo de de dang regs mi 'phrod pa zhig pas/_des smras pa rje'i sras skabs ma mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyi/_de khyod kyi gos dang rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]dga' mgur spyad do/_/de'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyis kun nas dkris pa skyes te/_de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/_bu mo song la bzang mo pad ma'i rtsa lag na re skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog 
[\[117a.2\]]shig ces byos shig_/des song nas bzang mo la smras nas/_de nas de skyed mos tshal du song ba dang /_skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/_khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa rigs sam/_des smras pa/_
[\[117a.3\]]rje'i sras de ni bdag gis nongs te 'on kyang bud med ni rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig_/de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsad do/_/de nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas jo mo bsad do/_/jo mo bsad do zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton 
[\[117a.4\]]pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po kun gyis thos nas brgyugs pa dang /_de ji tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong gau ta ma gnas so/_/de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas ral gri khrag can drang srong gau ta ma'i mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs de nyid kyi nang du 
[\[117a.5\]]zhugs so/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen po des ral gri khrag can mthong nas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo gsad do zhes de nas drang srong gau ta ma de bskor te/_mi bzod pa bskyed nas smras pa/_kwa'e rab tu byung ba drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/_des 
[\[117a.6\]]smras pa/_ci byas/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bsad do/_/des smras pa/_kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed do zhes des zhi bas smras kyang skye bo'i tshogs des lag pa phyin ka log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/_lha rab 
[\[117a.7\]]tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bkum lags so/_/rgyal po rnams ni mi rtog pa yin pas/_des smras pa/_gal te de ltar gyur na rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyis gsal shing la gshon cig_/de rab tu byung ba de me tog 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]ka ra bI ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam po che dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te/_grong khyer gyi lho phyogs 
[\[117b.2\]]kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal shing la gshon no/_/de'i mkhan po mdog gnag de dus dus su de'i bsti gnas su 'gro ba yin pas ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas des phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na de gsal 
[\[117b.3\]]shing la gshon pa mthong nas de skad mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/_kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig_/des kyang skad mi gsal zhing yi chad la gnad du bab pa'i gnod pa'i tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/_
[\[117b.4\]]mkhan po gzhan ci lags las lags mod/_des smras pa/_bu rma phyung ba'am/_gnod pa zhig ma byas grang /_mkhan po bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ni ma yin no/_/bu ji ltar shes/_mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis gson cig_/bden pa dang /_
[\[117b.5\]]bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ma yin na/_bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa 'di gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig_/bdag nyid chen po de lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas tshig 
[\[117b.6\]]smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/_/kun tu drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to zhes sgra grags pas de'i ming gser mdog ces bya bar gyur to/_/de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to/_/de nas drang srong gau ta 
[\[117b.7\]]mas smras pa/_mkhan po bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang /_skye ba ni gang /_tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig lag lags/_des smras pa/_bu bram ze rnams khye'u med pa la 'gro ba med do zhes zer na khyod kyis bu 'ga' ba skyed pa lta yod dam/_mkhan po yab kyis rgyal srid 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na bdag gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/_bdag gi bu skye ba lta ga la mchis/_bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par gyis shig_/mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas da ni bdag gi 
[\[118a.2\]]gnad rnams chad cing tshigs rnams bye ste/_'gum pa gcig tu dran par bas na ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/_de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas des rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog 
[\[118a.3\]]pa dang /_de nas char pa dang rlung grang mo reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/_des sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so/_/gang gi tshe des 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan 
[\[118a.4\]]cig lhung ngo /_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi ste/_bdag sems pa dang /_'jig rten sems pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o/_/khu ba'i thigs pa de 
[\[118a.5\]]gnyis sgo nga gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang /_khye'u gnyis shig byung nas de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der de gnyis zhugs so/_/de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/_nyi ma'i 'od 
[\[118a.6\]]zer gyis drang srong gau ta ma gdungs nas shi'o/_/de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na/_sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/_de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gseb tu zhugs 
[\[118a.7\]]pa las ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo /_/des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /_drang srong gau ta ma'i bu yin par gyur nas/_de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/_des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun gsos te/_de de 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]gnyis kyi ming btags pa nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas de bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas des na nyi ma'i rigs nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/drang srong gau ta ma'i bu yin pas ming gnyis pa la ni gau ta ma gau ta 
[\[118b.2\]]ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes yan lag skyes bya bar gyur to/_/bu ram shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan 
[\[118b.3\]]zhig na rgyal po b+ha ra dwA dza bu med par shi nas/_blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_de'i gcen po gau ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste 
[\[118b.4\]]rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro/_/de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste phyin pa dang /_rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po gau ta ma gang du mchis/_des smras 
[\[118b.5\]]pa/_khyed cag kho nas bsad do/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi dran na ji ltar bsad/_kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o ma nongs so/_/des de rnams dran par byas pa dang /_smras pa/_drang srong 
[\[118b.6\]]chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smos pa yang bsgrags pa ma yin gyis zhog shig_/des sdig pa'i las ci dang ci byas/_'di dang 'di'o/_/skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do/_/de ltar 
[\[118b.7\]]ci mngon/_des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /_de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma legs kyi/_bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes de rnams de skad du smra bar byed pa na/_khye'u de gnyis kyang drang 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]srong gi drung du 'ongs so/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/_des smras pa/_de kho na'i bu'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/_'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/_des 
[\[119a.2\]]byung ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/_blon po rnams kyis de thos te mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/_de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de yang bu med par shi'o/_/de 
[\[119a.3\]]nas cig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma 
[\[119a.4\]]ni rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/_skar mda' gdong dang /_lag rna dang /_glang po che 'dul dang /_rkang gdub can no/_/dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de 
[\[119a.5\]]lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 
[\[119a.6\]]'dug_/lha gal te de lta na nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na/_ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di dag yod nang la su zhig bu mo ster bar 
[\[119a.7\]]'gyur/_lha dgongs shig dang /_bdag cag gis btsal lo/_/ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa btsun mo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa de mi rnams kyis brtags te/_rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas/_
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po de la rig par byas pa dang rgyal pos bsgo ba/_khug shig_/de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go/_/gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal 
[\[119b.2\]]mthong nas smras pa/_lha bkra shis par gyur cig_/bkra shis par gyur cig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed ci gsol/_rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du sras mo slang ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[119b.3\]]'thab rir bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa lta na sbyin no/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal mchis la lha la snyan du gdas par gsol lo zhes de rnams dong 
[\[119b.4\]]nas/_rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shis ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/_nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin no/_/lha don 'di la 
[\[119b.5\]]nges pa ma mchis te/_re zhig btsun mo blangs la lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang /_dgyes pa dang /_dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod cig_/de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/_/spyi ma mchis par 'gyur ba sus 'tshal/_rgyal pos 
[\[119b.6\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la longs shig_/de rnams dong nas bsu ste/_ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur 
[\[119b.7\]]spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgya dam/_dgu 'das pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]pa zhig btsas so/_/btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal 
[\[120a.2\]]srid dga' zhes bgyi'o/_/khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed drag par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos 
[\[120a.3\]]nas/_des de la pho nya btang ste/_tshig rtsub po dang chas pa'i spring yig bskur ba/_khyed kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/_gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des 
[\[120a.4\]]sdod cig_/kho bo 'o nir 'ongs nas yul 'khor phur mar brlag go/_/rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pas des thos nas skrag ste/_blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de rnams 
[\[120a.5\]]kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/_nu bo rgyal srid kyis dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no/_/de 
[\[120a.6\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po de ni stobs dang bzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar yul phur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la/_gzhon nu de 
[\[120a.7\]]rnams ni spyug tu gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug_/lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/_lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas skyon ma mchis pa dang /_nongs pa ma mchis pa 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]yang spyugs la skyon mchis pa dang /_nongs pa bgyis pa ni gzhag go/_/rgyal pos btang snyoms su bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/_des na rgyal po 
[\[120b.2\]]gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/_ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog por nye bar bzhag_/dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/_me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig 
[\[120b.3\]]byed du bcug go/_/de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de'i byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo /_/blon po rnams skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang gzhon nu rnams kyis dris 
[\[120b.4\]]pa/_'di su'i skyed mos tshal de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i lags so/_/de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig_/ci'i phyir slar ldog_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i skyed mos tshal yin na 'dir 
[\[120b.5\]]'jug tu ga la rung /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis/_de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so/_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha skyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis lha gzigs 
[\[120b.6\]]pa'i dus la bab lags so/_/rgyal po chas pa dang skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra thos so/_/thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gzhon nu rnams so/_/
[\[120b.7\]]gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so/_/blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lha bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams spang bar gsol/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams spyug par chad pa dang rgyal po'i rkang 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig mchi na de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos bsgo nas/_de rnams chas pa na/_de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi 
[\[121a.2\]]mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so/_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgom bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[121a.3\]]de lta na sgo chod cig_/de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram na/_drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag byas te/_gnas btab 
[\[121a.4\]]nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho ba byed cing dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed do/_/lang tsho dang dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen te/_sha bri ngan pa skya bo bseng bseng por gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan 
[\[121a.5\]]zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/_khyed cag ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng por gyur/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so/_/des smras pa/_rang rang gi sring mo spongs la mas dbyen gyi sring 
[\[121a.6\]]mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dug shig_/drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ngam/_shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor ba rnams kyis rung ngo /_/de nas de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' 
[\[121a.7\]]ba dang mgu ba skyes te/_mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de rnams dang de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na bu pho dang /_bu mo dag btsas te de 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]rnams chen por gyur pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas drang srong ser skya sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o/_/drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/_bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid 
[\[121b.2\]]du ma btub pas so/_/drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig_/bdag cag gzhan du mchi na/_'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag cag la phog shig_/shes ldan dag rung ngo /_/drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa 
[\[121b.3\]]yin pas des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/_chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so/_/drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang bas ser skya'i gzhi ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de rnams 
[\[121b.4\]]der 'phel bar gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen por gyur te/_dogs pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to/_/lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang /_de rnams der dong ste grong khyer cig shos brtsigs nas lhas bstan lhas 
[\[121b.5\]]bstan ces bya bar gyur to/_/de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag spyugs pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chung ma ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis de lta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs 
[\[121b.6\]]mnyam pa las chung ma blang bar mi bya ste gcig kho nas chog shes par bya'o/_/de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma len gyi chun ma ni mi len to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_
[\[121b.7\]]kye grong pa dag gzhon nu de rnams da ltar gang na 'dug_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig la spyugs pa las de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste rang rang gi sring mo spangs te/_mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_dga' dgur spyod par bgyid do/_/de rnams rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_
[\[122a.2\]]dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na bu pho dang /_bu mo dag btsas so/_/grong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod dam lha rngo thogs lags so/_/de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pos ro stod bsrangs nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_ched du brjod pas 
[\[122a.3\]]ched du brjod pa/_kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no/_/kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/_kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no/_/kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes byas 
[\[122a.4\]]pas de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de rnams dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro/_/de yang bu med par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/_/de yang bu med 
[\[122a.5\]]par shi nas lag rna rgyal por gyur to/_/de yang bu med par shi nas glang po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to/_/de yang bu med par shi nas rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur to/_/de'i bu gnas 'jog go/_/gau ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal 
[\[122a.6\]]pos khyim gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang /_shing rta brgya pa dang /_shing rta dgu bcu dang /_shing rta khra bo dang /_shing rta rgyal dang /_brtan pa'i 
[\[122a.7\]]shing rta dang /_gzhu bcu pa dang /_gzhu brgya pa dang /_gzhu dgu bcu pa dang /_gzhu rgyal dang /_gzhu bkra dang /_gzhu brtan no/_/gau ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/_seng ge'i 'gram dang /_seng ge'i sgra'o/_/gau ta ma dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]nang na seng ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags so/_/gau ta ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/_zas gtsang dang /_zas dkar dang /_bre bo zas dang /_bdud rtsi'i zas so/_/bu mo gtsang ma dang /_dkar mo dang /_bye mo ma dang /_bdud rtsi ma'o/_/zas gtsang 
[\[122b.2\]]la bu gnyis te/_/bcom ldan 'das dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/_/zas dkar la bu gnyis te/_tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang /_shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no/_/bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/_ming chen dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o/_/bdud rtsi zas 
[\[122b.3\]]kyi bu gnyis te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha sbyin no/_/gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rab sad do/_/dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can no/_/bre bo ma'i bu ni bzang len no/_/bdud rtsi ma'i bu ni dge 'phel lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra gcan 'dzin 
[\[122b.4\]]yin te/_gau ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi rgyud/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin du rdzogs/_srid pa'i breng rgyud chad/_'khor ba zad de da ni yang srid pa med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen 
[\[122b.5\]]nas bzhengs te bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu legs so legs so/_/maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras 
[\[122b.6\]]pa yang khyod legs so/_/maud gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang /_des ni de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[122b.7\]]slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig_/zung shig_/lhogs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]kyi gtam ni don dang ldan chos dang ldan pa nas tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing bklag pa'i rigs so/_/
[\[123a.2\]]de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/_rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po seng 
[\[123a.3\]]ge 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/_'bras dang /_bu 
[\[123a.4\]]ram shing gi phreng dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/_/grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo 
[\[123a.5\]]legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/_'bras dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/_bu gcig pa la 
[\[123a.6\]]sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/_/rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_yul gyi bzang mo lum bi nI zhes bya ba yod do/_/lhas bstan na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs 
[\[123a.7\]]su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bya sna tshogs skad 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do/_/lum bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/_/des smras pa/_lha kun dga' ra ba 'di 
[\[123b.2\]]bdag la stsal du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_da kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/_gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum bi nI'i 
[\[123b.3\]]ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas/_de'i ming lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po seng ge 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod 
[\[123b.4\]]do/_/rgyal po legs par rab sad la yang yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/_/ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur 
[\[123b.5\]]spyod pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang 
[\[123b.6\]]pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/_the tsom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin nam/_'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/_/de'i btsas pa'i 
[\[123b.7\]]btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas/_bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_sum mdo dang /_bzhi mdo 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te/_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o/_/gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi 'o na ci zhe na las sna
