[\[124a.2\]]tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas/_de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes btags so/_/bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de la mtshan 
[\[124a.3\]]mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/_/yang de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_blta 
[\[124a.4\]]na sdug pa mdzes pa/_kha dog bzang mo rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/_sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so/_/de'i btsas 
[\[124a.5\]]pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/_bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_sgyu 'phrul bas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes btags so/_/de yang bskyed 
[\[124a.6\]]bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang /_de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/_de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/rgyal po legs par rab 
[\[124a.7\]]sad kyis rgyal po seng ge 'gram la pho nya btang ste/_bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dang /_sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/_de la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /_de ni stobs 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /_de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis 'di gnyis las 
[\[124b.2\]]gang bzhed pa/_gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig_/seng ge 'gram gyis slar spring pa/_gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/_'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas/_gang la skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[124b.3\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /_de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de re zhig 'dod do/_/cig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o/_/des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o/_/
[\[124b.4\]]de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bseng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa cig yod nas shAkya rnams 'dus te/_rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/_lha skya ba seng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol/_des smras pa/_shes 
[\[124b.5\]]ldan dag kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so/_/lha gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/_dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa gcig bslangs pa'i dam pa de sbyin pa lta na gtang ngo /_/de 
[\[124b.6\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gtsang la bsngo nas des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom/_rab tu bcom ste rmeg btang ngo /_/de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas rgyal 
[\[124b.7\]]po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg btang lags pas bdag cag glo ba dga' na/_gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig dbul lo/_/shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa sus 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so/_/lha ci khrims 'dral lam/_des smras pa/_lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi dral bar mi bya na/_'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa gcig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chun ma blang ba yin no/_/
[\[125a.2\]]lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig_/de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas/_kho bos tshogs brtags zin gyis bu mo cig shos kyang bkri shig_/des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri ste/_gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyi ga blangs so/_/
[\[125a.3\]]ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas/_ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du bcug ste/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_
[\[125a.4\]]rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun med cing /_nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/_'bras dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/_bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo 
[\[125a.5\]]sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas/_rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs 
[\[125a.6\]]par mdzad do/_/rigs la gzigs pa dang /_yul la gzigs pa dang /_dus la gzigs pa dang /_rgyud la gzigs pa dang /_bud med la gzigs pa ste/_rgya cher mdo snga ma dang sbyar ro/_/mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[125a.7\]]A tsar+ya d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D302}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+hi k+ShA pra re dzu sU tra nA ma/_bod skad du/_dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]mdo zhes bya ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po pad ma rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/_de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[125b.2\]]'khor stong phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs cig go/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'phags pa nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba dbang po dul ba/_thos pa dang ldan pa/_shes rab zab pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 
[\[125b.3\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la lhag par mos shing mchog tu 'dzin par gnas pa rang gi stan las langs te/_/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo snying gar sbyar ba byas te/_
[\[125b.4\]]'dzum dmul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'khor ba'i 'dam nas pad ma ltar byung ba'i/_/skyob mdzad ri bo lta bur mi bskyod thub pa'i sku/_/dpe byad rgyan gyis brgyan cing mtshan gyi me tog mdzes/_/blta bas mi ngoms rab mchog 
[\[125b.5\]]khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis bdag cag 'dir 'dus 'di dag la/_/dge slong 'ba' zhig gnas pas dge slong gi/_/ngo bo dbye dang sgra 'jug ched bya ba/_/bzhi po 'di dag thub pas gsung du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs rab dgyes te/_/
[\[125b.6\]]nye bar 'khor la spyan gzigs 'di skad gsungs/_/legs par nyon cig bu khyod nye bar 'khor/_/ngas ni khyod kyi sems rangs bya phyir dang /_/dge slong rnams la phan phyir de bshad do/_/dge slong zhes bya chos kyi rgyal mtshan te/_/dge slong zhes bya rdo rje srog shing 
[\[125b.7\]]yin/_/dge slong zhes bya sdug bsngal spangs pa ste/_dge slong zhes bya rgyal ba'i sras po yin/_/dge slong zhes bya nyon mongs srog bcad de/_/dge slong zhes bya thar pa'i tshal 'gro'o/_/dge slong rang gi ngo bo bsdams pa ste/_/rtsa ba bzhi sogs nyis brgya lnga bcu 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]pa/_/ched du bya ba rnam dag tshul khrims yin/_/dbye ba ming gi dge slong gang yin dang /_/rtags tsam 'dzin dang yang dag dge slong ste/_/sgra 'jug rnam par zad phyir dang /_/dge ba slong dang zas slong dang /_/zhi bar gnas dang lam zhugs dang /_/legs 
[\[126a.2\]]par 'tsho dang chags spangs dang /_/yid 'ong phyir na dge slong ngo /_/dge slong zhes bya brgyan pa ste/_/rgyan spangs rgyan gyis legs par brgyan/_/chags spangs chags pa chen pos spyad/_/byug pa khrus dang bza' ba dang /_/rgyan dang gos dang kha dog dang /_/
[\[126a.3\]]rta dang glang po khyogs sogs kyi/_/bzhon pa bla med de yang bzhon/_/de dag 'byor pa dge slong ste/_/de dag mi 'byor dge slong min/_/de nas nye bar 'khor de yis/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/_/ci de bde bar gshegs pa yis/_/skad byings rtogs par 
[\[126a.4\]]dka' ba gsungs/_/de nyid bde bar gshegs pa yis/_/tshig gi mun pa tshig gi ni/_/mar mes gsal bar mdzad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gser la sogs pa 'jig rten rgyan/_/rab tu spangs pas snying rje yi/_/rgyan gyi mchog 
[\[126a.5\]]gis brgyan par bya/_/'jig rten ma yin bslab pa yi/_/gos gyon gos mchog bzang po yin/_/ga pur la sogs ma yin pa'i/_/tshul khrims byug pa mchog gis byug_/dkar dmar la sogs ma yin pa'i/_/dad pa'i kha dog rnam par mdzes/_/'jig 
[\[126a.6\]]rten ma yin brtson 'grus kyi/_/bzhon pa bla med mgyogs pa'i mchog_/bsam gtan chos spyod zas mchog ni/_/'bras chan pas ni ro mchog ldan/_/dge 'dun tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang /_/zhi gnas stan la rab tu spyad/_/de dag ldan zhing phyir mi ldog_/de 
[\[126a.7\]]ni yang dag dge slong yin/_/gtso bo gsum dang 'khor lngar ldan/_/drang srong snod bcas 'khar gsil ldan/_/lus ngag yid gsum rnam par bsdams/_/rang gi spyod pa brtul zhugs bstan/_/de yang yang dag dge slong yin/_/de gnyis thar pa'i grong khyer 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]la/_bsnyen pas thar pa'i bde ba'i mchog_/yang dag ma yin gnyis shos ni/_/lhung gzed la sogs rab 'bar bas/_/dmyal bar khro chu lta bur ni/_/bskal pa stong phrag bzhi ru 'tshed/_/la la'i tshul khrims bde ba ste/_/la la'i tshul khrims sdug bsngal 
[\[126b.2\]]rgyu/_/tshul khrims ldan pa bde ba'i mchog_/tshul khrims 'chal ba sdug bsngal yin/_/shin tu legs par tshul khrims gang /_/bsdams pas mi de mdzes pa'i gzugs/_/'dul ba la ni nye bar gnas/_/tshul khrims bslab pa rang yid ches/_/mi de 
[\[126b.3\]]nyi ma gcig la yang /_/bsod nams phung po dpag med pa/_/sog cing sangs rgyas 'bras bu skrun/_/rang gis rang la bslus 'debs shing /_/bslab pa la ni mi gnas shing /_/bde bar gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin/_/gzugs tsam la ni brten nas 
[\[126b.4\]]su/_/nga ni dge slong yin zer ba/_/glang smyon sna ral btags pa'am/_/sbrum ma skyur rtsi 'thungs pa ltar/_/mi de nyi ma gcig la yang /_/sdig pa'i sa bon dpag med dang /_/rang la gnod pa sna tshogs pa/_/byed par 'gyur ba kho na yin/_/gang zhig bslab la mi 
[\[126b.5\]]gnas shing /_/bder gshegs rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa bas/_/bslab pa mi gnas skad cig la/_/gzugs por khyim par gnas pa bzang /_/bslab pa mi gnas rtags 'dzin pa/_/'jig rten pa ni thams cad kyi/_/snying du sdug par mi 'gyur zhing /_/kun gyi tshig gi 
[\[126b.6\]]ngan snod sa/_/dper na sdong po bzang po la/_/yun ring yal ga 'khrung ba bzhin/_/mi de rtags tsam yun ring na/_/kha na ma tho'i gtam 'phel dang /_/sdig pa'i las rnams 'phel bar bshad/_/tshul khrims 'di ni bde ba'i mchog_/tshul khrims 'di 
[\[126b.7\]]ni thar pa'i lam/_/tshul khrims 'di ni yon tan zhing /_/tshul khrims 'di ni sangs rgyas rgyu/_/tshul khrims 'di ni rab mchog yin/_/mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du srungs/_/srog la bab kyang tshul khrims ni/_/gtong ba mi mkhas blun po yin/_/srog chad 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]phyi mar skye ba ste/_/tshul khrims phyi nas de ltar min/_/de bas nye bar 'khor sogs kyis/_/'di nyid la ni brtan par zung /_/de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/_nye bar 'khor la sogs pa dge slong de de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon 
[\[127a.2\]]par bstod do/_/dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so//[ {D303}]@#/_rgya gar skad du/_shI la saM yuka ta sU tra/_bod skad du/_tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo/_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[127a.3\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[127a.4\]]te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag shes pa ni 'grib/_srog ni chad/_tshe'i 'du byed ni nges par 'joms par 'gyur na/_ci'i phyir brtson 'grus dang /_brtul ba brtan pos sgrub par mi byed/_mi'i 
[\[127a.5\]]lus ni shin tu rnyed par dka' na de thob nas des rnyed pa'i rgyal ba'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yang rnyed na thar pa'i don dang mi 'thun pa dag gis bslus te sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/_dge slong dag srog dang bral zhing shi ba ni sla'i/_/tshul khrims nyams pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/de 
[\[127a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_srog dang bral ba ni tshe 'di nyid kyi skye ba zad par 'gyur gyi/_tshul khrims nyams shing zhig pa ni skye ba 'bum phrag brgya'i bar du rigs dang bral zhing bde ba spangs te/_rnam par ltung ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de phyir ston pas tshul khrims 
[\[127a.7\]]rab bsngags bshad/_/tshul khrims ldan pas sangs rgyas 'byung dang phrad/_/tshul khrims ldan pa rgyan rnams kun gyi mchog_/tshul khrims 'byor ba dri dang byug pa yin/_/tshul khrims ldan pa dga' ba kun gyi gnas/_/tshul khrims ldan pa gdung ba 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]sel ba'i chu/_/tshul khrims ldan pa 'jig rten kun gyis bstod/_/tshul khrims dag gis 'gro ba dam pa mnos/_/ji ltar sbrul gdug klu chen nag po yang /_/tshul khrims can la gnod med gzhan ci smos/_/tshul khrims ldan pa'i dge slong 'od dang ldan/_/tshul 
[\[127b.2\]]khrims ldan pa grags 'gyur bde ba thob/_/tshul khrims ldan pa mtho ris 'gro ba'i rgyu/_/tshul khrims bsrungs pas mya ngan 'da' thob 'gyur/_/ji ltar mig med gzugs mthong mi rung ltar/_/de bzhin tshul khrims med na chos mi mthong /_/ji ltar rkang med lam 'jug ga 
[\[127b.3\]]la nus/_/de bzhin tshul khrims med na thar mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar bum pa bzang po rin chen snod/_/de bzhin tshul khrims chos rnams skyed pa'i gzhi/_/ji ltar bum chag rin chen snod mi rung /_/de bzhin tshul khrims ral bas chos kun gtugs/_/dang po tshul khrims med par gyur pa 
[\[127b.4\]]des/_/phyi nas mya ngan 'das pa thob snyam 'am/_/sna dang rna rdum la sogs gang yin pa/_/de la me long dag ni dgos mi 'gyur/_/rna bas ma thos mig sngar ma mthong bzhin/_/bstan srung mi de mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/thos mang thos ldan thos srung mtho ris nyid/_/
[\[127b.5\]]bud med bsten du ga la rung /_/rgyal po'i pho brang ga la dga'/_/dbu ba snying po ga la yod/_/longs spyod rtag pa ga la yin/_/bud med dag la rung ba med/_/rgyal srid dag la dga' ba med/_/dbu ba dag la snying po med/_/longs spyod 
[\[127b.6\]]dag la rtag pa med/_/longs spyod dag ni 'bab chu bzhin/_/gru de ci 'dra khyim de 'dra/_/me tog ci 'dra gzugs de bzhin/_/srog ni chu bur 'dra ba yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_/dge slong de dag yi rangs 
[\[127b.7\]]te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]{D304}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pany+tsA pat+ti ni kA ya shu b+hA shu b+ha pha la pa rI k+Sha sU tra/_bod skad du/_ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[128a.2\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu 
[\[128a.3\]]gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag bslab pa'i chos gang dag bsrung ba 
[\[128a.4\]]dang /_sbed pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba dang /_'da' bar mi byed pa dang /_de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang /_rab tu ston pa ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang lha'i tshe dang /_lha'i kha dog dang /_lha'i 
[\[128a.5\]]stobs dang /_lha'i bde ba dang /_lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing lha'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lo lnga brgya gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po yang 
[\[128a.6\]]sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag bslab pa'i chos gang dag mi srung ba dang /_mi sbed pa dang /_yongs su mi skyong ba dang /_
[\[128a.7\]]de dag las 'da' bar byed pa dang /_'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang /_rab tu mi ston pa de ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang sdug bsngal drag pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo stong ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 
[\[128b.2\]]tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag so sor bshags pa'i chos gang dag srung ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba dang /_'da' bar mi byed pa dang /_de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang /_rab tu ston pa de ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 
[\[128b.3\]]su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang lha'i tshe dang /_lha'i kha dog dang /_lha'i stobs dang /_lha'i bde ba dang /_lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing lha'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[128b.4\]]slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lo stong gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo stong ni dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag so 
[\[128b.5\]]sor bshags pa'i chos gang dag mi srung ba dang /_mi sbed pa dang /_yongs su mi skyong ba dang /_de dag las 'da' bar byed pa dang /_'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang /_rab tu mi ston pa de ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen po thig nag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag 
[\[128b.6\]]der yang sdug bsngal drag pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/nyes byas kyi ltung ba brtag pa'o/_/dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag 
[\[128b.7\]]sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo nyis stong ni mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag ltung byed kyi chos gang dag srung ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba dang /_'da' bar mi byed pa dang /_de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang /_
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]rab tu ston pa de ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtshe ma'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang lha'i tshe dang /_lha'i kha dog dang /_lha'i stobs dang /_lha'i bde ba dang /_lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing lha'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_
[\[129a.2\]]ro dang /_reg bya dang /_lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lo nyis stong gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu 
[\[129a.3\]]brtsis pa'i lo nyis stong ni dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag ltung byed kyi chos gang dag mi srung ba dang /_mi sbed pa dang /_yongs su mi skyong ba dang /_de dag las 'da' bar byed pa dang /_'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang /_rab tu mi ston pa de 
[\[129a.4\]]ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang sdug bsngal shin tu drag pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed kyi ltung ba brtag pa'o/_/dge slong dag 'dzam 
[\[129a.5\]]bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag sbom 
[\[129a.6\]]po'i chos gang dag srung ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba dang /_'da' bar mi byed pa dang /_de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang /_rab tu ston pa de ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro dga' ldan gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang lha'i tshe dang /_lha'i kha dog dang /_
[\[129a.7\]]lha'i stobs dang /_lha'i bde ba dang /_lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing lha'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lo bzhi stong gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]po ngu 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong ni dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag sbom po'i chos gang dag mi srung ba dang /_mi sbed pa dang /_yongs su mi 
[\[129b.2\]]skyong ba dang /_de dag las 'da' bar byed pa dang /_'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang /_rab tu mi ston pa de ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang sdug bsngal shin tu drag pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid 
[\[129b.3\]]du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/sbom po'i ltung ba brtag pa'o/_/dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/_/zla ba bcu gnyis 
[\[129b.4\]]la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo brgyad stong ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag lhag ma'i chos gang dag srung ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba dang /_'da' bar mi byed pa dang /_de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang /_rab tu ston pa de ni lus 
[\[129b.5\]]zhig nas bde 'gro 'phrul dga'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang lha'i tshe dang /_lha'i kha dog dang /_lha'i stobs dang /_lha'i bde ba dang /_lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing lha'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_lha'i g.yog 
[\[129b.6\]]'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lo brgyad stong gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen po'i nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo brgyad stong ni dmyal 
[\[129b.7\]]ba ngu 'bod chen po'i tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag lhag ma'i chos gang dag mi srung ba dang /_mi sbed pa dang /_yongs su mi skyong ba dang /_de dag las 'da' bar byed pa dang /_'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang /_rab tu mi ston pa de ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]ba chen po ngu 'bod chen por skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang sdug bsngal shin tu drag pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/lhag ma'i ltung ba brtag pa'o/_/dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi 
[\[130a.2\]]rnams kyi lo brgya phrag bcu drug gang yin pa de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo stong phrag bcu drug ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i 
[\[130a.3\]]tshad do/_/dge slong dag pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi po gang dag srung ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba dang /_'da' bar mi byed pa dang /_de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang /_rab tu ston pa de ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 
[\[130a.4\]]su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang lha'i tshe dang /_lha'i kha dog dang /_lha'i stobs dang /_lha'i bde ba dang /_lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing lha'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[130a.5\]]dge slong dag gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lo stong phrag bcu drug gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo khri drug stong ni dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 
[\[130a.6\]]tshe'i tshad do/_/dge slong dag pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi po gang dag mi srung ba dang /_mi sbed pa dang /_yongs su mi skyong ba dang /_de dag las 'da' bar byed pa dang /_'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang /_rab tu mi ston pa de ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen 
[\[130a.7\]]po tsha bar skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yang sdug bsngal shin tu drag pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'i ltung ba brtag pa'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na/_gang de dag bstan bcos thos 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]pa rnams kyis bdag la phan par bya ba dang /_snying brtse ba dang /_snying rje ba dang /_don 'dod pa dang /_phan pa tshol bas snying brtse ba 'dis khyed cag rnams kyis 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong dag dgon pa dang /_shing drung dang /_khang stong dang /_ri khrod dang /_ri phug dang /_pa la pun dzA b+h+ya 
[\[130b.2\]]ba ka sha dang /_dur khrod dang /_nags 'dab dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas te 'di dag nges par bsam par bya'o/_/dge slong dag bag yod par gyis shig_/ci nas kyang phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba de ltar ma byed cig_/'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[130b.3\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya dz+nyA 
[\[130b.4\]]na shrI gub ta dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//_//[{D305}]@##/_/bod skad du/_mchog tu gdags pa'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[130b.5\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par dbyar gnas par dam bcas te bzhugs so/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[130b.6\]]slong dag 'di gsum na mchog tu gdags pa yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang /_chos mchog tu gdags pa dang /_dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o/_/de la sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/_sems can rkang med 
[\[130b.7\]]rnams sam/_rkang gnyis rnams sam/_rkang bzhi rnams sam/_rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]rnams sam/_gzugs can rnams sam/_gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/_'du shes can rnams sam/_'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/_'du shes yod pa yang ma yin/_
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to/_/sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la 
[\[131a.2\]]mngon par dga' ba yin te/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/_mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu 
[\[131a.3\]]gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to/_/chos la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de 
[\[131a.4\]]dag ni/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni/_rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/_mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_'di ni 
[\[131a.5\]]chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/_tshogs sam/_'dus pa'am/_mang po'am/_'khor gang yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan 
[\[131a.6\]]thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par bstan to/_dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/_mi rnams kyi nang du 
[\[131a.7\]]mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]mchog tu gdags pa'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D306}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bi muk+ta mArga d+hu tagu Na ni rde sha nA ma/_bod skad du/_rnam par grol ba'i lam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[131b.2\]]gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas de ltar tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa spyod pa sgrub par 'dod pa/_yon tan don du gnyer bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya'o/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs 
[\[131b.3\]]pa ni rnam grangs du mas 'dod pa chung ba nyid dang /_chog shis pa nyid dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa rgyas pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_dgang sla ba nyid dang /_rig par gnas pa nyid dang /_yongs su zhen pa rab tu gcod par 'gyur zhing /_'di ni tshul khrims legs 
[\[131b.4\]]par bsrungs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang /_'phags pa'i rigs snang bar 'gyur la/_yon tan gyi mchog da ga la yang snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gsum la gos dang ldan pa gnyis te/_phyag dar khrod pa nyid dang /_chos gos gsum

[\[133a.1\]]ce na/_'gron du song nas rang gi las nyams pa dang /_gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa dang /_mi 'thun pa dang phrad pa dang /_'dug na nyam nga ba'i nyes dmigs kyang mthong /_bsod snyoms pa nyid kyi yon tan dag kyang mthong nas 'di skad du deng slan chad

[\[134a.1\]]'dug kyang lhung bzed kyis chu blangs nas yang mi za ba yin no/_/zas kyi mtha' pa zhes bya ba ni za ba na kham gyi tha ma mid nas yang mi za ba yin no/_/stan gcig pa la ni lan gnyis su 'dug ste za ba spong ba yin no/_/zas kyi mtha' ni chu dang sman ma

[\[136a.1\]]yon tan dag yin no/_/dur khrod ji lta bur ni gnas par bya/_dur khrod pa ni gang yin/_gang gis ni dur khrod pa nyid 'jig ce na/_dang por ni rtag tu sreg pa dang /_du ba dang /_'bar ba dang /_du ba yod pa de lta bu'i dur khrod du gnas par bya la/_de

[\[136a.3\]]chur bed dang /_mon sran gre'u'i bza' ba bsten par mi bya/_lhung bzed sbyin par mi bya/_khyim du 'dug par mi bya/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs lhags na khri'u dang /_chos gos dang /_ril ba blangs te song na sreg pa nas ha cang yang mi ring ba/_rdo rgyang gis sleb tsam gyi

[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]pa nyid 'di 'jig ce na/_gzhi ji bzhin pa ni brkam chags kyi gnas mal spong ba yin te/_brkam chags kyi gnas mal spong ba zhes bya ba ni snga na 'dug pa bslang nas gnas mal len par mi byed do/_/brkam chags kyi gnas mal len pas ni gzhi ji bzhin pa nyid 'jig 
[\[136b.2\]]go/_/ji ltar cog pu pa nyid yang dag par len zhe na/_nyal na rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_le lo'i dbang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs kyang mthong /_cog pu pa nyid kyi yon tan dag kyang mthong nas 'di skad ces/_deng slan chad nyal ba spong ste/_cog pu pa nyid yang 
[\[136b.3\]]dag par zhes yang dag par len to/_/de la cog pu pa nyid kyi yon tan ni 'di dag yin te/_le lo'i gzhi yongs su spong ba dang /_lus la chags pa dang /_ser sna yongs su spong ba dang /_'phres pa'i bde ba la ma chags pa dang /_btsal ba nyung ba dang /_gnyid 
[\[136b.4\]]chung ba dang /_rnal 'byor dang 'thun pa dang /_lus kyi gnas rgya skye ba dang /_skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa nyid dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul can te/_de lta bu la sogs pa ni cog pu pa nyid kyi yon tan dag yin no/_/cog pu pa ni gang yin/_gang gis ni cog pu pa nyid 
[\[136b.5\]]'di 'jig ce na/_cog pu pa ni nyal ba spong ba yin no/_/nyal ba khas len pas ni cog pu pa nyid 'jig go/_/de la phyag dar khrod pa nyid kyi skabs phye ba ni phyag dar khrod pa nar mar spyod pa la gal te khyim bdag dag gis chos gos gso ras sam/_ras bal gyi ras 
[\[136b.6\]]sam/_mon dar ram/_la ba dag byin par gyur na skabs phye bas blang bar bya ste/_phyag dar khrod pa nyid nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos gos gsum pa nyid kyi skabs phye ba ni kha bkang ba'i re ba yod na gos lhag zhag bcur 'chang ba dang /_gnas mal srung ba'i phyir 
[\[136b.7\]]gding ba dang /_steng du gding ba dang /_nad kyi rkyen g.yan pa dgab pa dang /_gdong phyis kyi gos dang /_dbyar gyi ras chen dang /_gzhan gyi rung ba bcol ba skabs phye bas blang bar bya ste/_chos gos gsum pa nyid nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/bsod snyoms pa nyid kyi 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]skabs phye ba ni bskos pa'i zas dang /_tshul shing gi zas dang /_zla ba phyed pa'i zas dang /_gso sbyong ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi zas dang /_gtsug lag khang gi zas skabs phye bas yongs su longs spyad par bya ste/_bsod snyoms pa nyid 'jig par mi 
[\[137a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/'on kyang nyes dmigs su lta bas ni yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/_/mthar chags su rgyu ba nyid kyi skabs phye ba ni khyim gyi sgo na glang po che'am/_rta 'am/_khyu mchog gam/_khyi'am/_'thab pa'am/_ngo tsha bar 'gyur ba de lta bu gzhan mthong nas thod 
[\[137a.3\]]rgal du rgyu ba dang /_zas bzar mi rung ba'i khyim 'am/_lhung bzed khas sbubs pa'am/_slong bar grags pa'i khyim rgal nas rgyu ba dang /_slob dpon nam/_mkhan po'am/_glo bur ba'am/_lhan cig rgyu na skabs phye bas thod rgal du yang rgyu bar bya ste/_mthar 
[\[137a.4\]]chags su rgyu ba nyid nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/stan gcig pa nyid kyi skabs phye ba ni zas za ba na glang po che'am/_rta'am/_khyu mchog gam/_sbrul lam/_thog 'bab pa'am/_mkhan po'am/_slob dpon nam/_glo bur pa 'ongs pa mthong nas/_gal te 
[\[137a.5\]]langs par gyur na skabs phye bas yang bza' bar bya ste/_stan gcig pa nyid 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/zas chog pa pa nyid dang /_zas phyis mi len pa nyid la ni skabs phye ba med do/_/dgon pa pa nyid kyi skabs phye ba ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i las kyi ched dam/_
[\[137a.6\]]lhung ba las bslang ba'i ched dam/_chos mnyan pa'i ched dam/_gso sbyong bya ba 'am/_dgag dbye bya ba 'am/_na ba'am/_nad pa'i bya ba 'am/_mngon par mi shes pa'i mdo kun chub par bya ba 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu'i rkyen yod na skabs phye bas grong mthar 
[\[137a.7\]]gnas par bya ste/_dgon pa pa nyid 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/shing drung pa nyid skabs phye ba ni rkyen de lta bu'am/_khyim du zhugs pa las char gyis non na/_de nyid du skya rengs shar yang shing drung pa nyid nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/dgon pa pa'i skabs phye ba ji snyed pa ni shing drung pa nyid 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]dang /_bla gab med pa nyid dang /_dur khrod pa nyid la yang blta bar bya'o/_/gzhi ji bzhin pa nyid kyi skabs phye bas ni rkyen de lta bu yod la gzhan gyis gnas mal rnyed na rjes su gnang ngo /_/cog pu pa la ni skabs phye ba med do/_/kha cig na re sna'i dpyad byed na skabs phye 
[\[137b.2\]]bar bya ste/_cog pu pa nyid nyams par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gsum po de dag ni mdor bsdus na brgyad kho nar 'gyur te/_chos mngon pa las ji skad du sbyangs pa'i yon tan ni brgyad do zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/gal te de ji lta bu yin zhe na/_
[\[137b.3\]]zas chog pa pa nyid dang /_stan gcig pa nyid ni zas phyis mi len pa nyid kyi nang du 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzung ba'i mtha' pa ni bdag nyid kyi rang skal cig len pa yin te/_de lta bas na zas chog pa pa nyid kyi nang du 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 
[\[137b.4\]]lan gnyis su mi za ste/_de lta bas na stan gcig pa nyid du 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/shing drung pa nyid dang /_bla gab med pa nyid dang /_dur khrod pa nyid ni dgon pa pa nyid kyi nang du 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dgon pa pa ni dgon pa'i spyil bu dang /_yang 
[\[137b.5\]]thog la sogs pa byed na las la dga' ba nyid dang /_/yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_chags pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas shing drung ngam/_bla gab med pa'am/_dur khrod du gnas so/_/de lta bas na brgyad kho nar 'gyur la brgyad po de dag kyang dgon pa pa nyid dang /_
[\[137b.6\]]phyag dar khrod pa nyid dang /_bsod snyoms pa nyid dang gsum gyis rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na sbyangs pa'i sgo gsum rdzogs par byed na/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' 
[\[137b.7\]]bo la brten nas dga' bo nam zhig dgon pa dang /_phyag dar khrod pa dang /_ngan ngon gyis 'tsho 'dod pa rnams la ni lta ba med pa mthong zhig gu zhes gsungs so/_/de la sbyangs pa'i yan lag ni ci zhig yin/_sbyangs pa'i chos ni du zhig yod/_ci spyod pa'i gang zag dag 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan par dga'/_sbyangs pa'i yan lag ni du zhig_/mthar thug pa ni du zhig_/ci sbyangs pa'i de nyid sbyangs pa smra ba yang de yin nam zhe na/_de la sbyangs pa'i yan lag ces bya ba ni gzhi bcu gsum po de dag gi spong ba gang yin pa 
[\[138a.2\]]de ni sbyangs pa'i yan lag yin no/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan cir brjod par bya zhe na/_dge bar brjod par bya'o/_/sbyangs pa'i chos du zhe na/_sbyangs pa'i chos ni gnyis te/_ma chags pa dang /_gti mug med pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du phyag dar khrod pa gang 
[\[138a.3\]]yin pa de ni 'dod pa chung ba nyid la brten/_chog shes pa nyid la brten/_yo byad bsnyungs pa nyid la brten/_rab tu dben pa nyid la brten/_'dis chog pa nyid la brten nas phyag dar khrod par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/rnam pa gcig tu ni ma chags pas rjes 
[\[138a.4\]]su gnang ba 'tsham par bsten pas 'dod pa'i bsod snyoms kyi rjes su brtson pa'i slu ba sel la/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gti mug med pa ni yo byad bsnyungs par 'tsham par bsten pas bdag nyid dub pa'i rjes su brtson pa'i slu ba sel te/_de lta bas na sbyangs pa'i chos 
[\[138a.5\]]ni gnyis te/_ma chags pa dang /_gti mug med pa yin no/_/de la 'dod pa chung ba nyid dang /_chog shes pa nyid dang /_rab tu dben pa nyid ni ma chags pa yin no/_/yo byad bsnyungs pa nyid dang /_'dis chog pa nyid ni gti mug med pa nyid yin no/_/de 
[\[138a.6\]]la ma chags pas ni spang ba'i gzhi bcu gsum la chags pa sel la/_gti mug med pas ni gzhi de dag nyid la nyes dmigs mi shes pa sel to/_/yang ci spyod pa'i gang zag rnams sbyangs pa'i yon tan sten par dga' zhe na/_'dod chags spyod pa dang /_gti 
[\[138a.7\]]mug spyod pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan sten par dga'i/_zhe sdang spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/ci'i phyir 'dod chags spyod pa dang /_gti mug spyod pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan sten gyi/_zhe sdang spyod pa'i ma yin zhe na/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan sten pa ni/_bsgrub dka' ba yin pas 'dod chags 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]spyod pa bsgrub dka' ba la brten nas 'dod chags rnam par gnon par 'gyur la/_gti mug spyod pa yang sbyangs pa'i yon tan sten pa yang dag par blangs pa yo byad bsnyungs pa la brten nas rtag tu bag yod par 'gyur zhing bag yod na gti mug rnam par gnon par 
[\[138b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na 'dod chags spyod pa dang /_gti mug spyod pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan sten par dga'o/_/zhe sdang spyod pa ni bsgrub dka' na mkhris pa'i nad la drod bag byin pa bzhin du phyir zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/_de lta bas na zhe sdang spyod pa ni sbyangs pa'i yon 
[\[138b.3\]]tan bsten par dka' ba yin no/_/gzhan dag na re zhe sdang spyod pa ni dgon pa pa nyid dang /_shing drung pa nyid la dga'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dgon pa dang /_shing drung na gnas na de dag tu mi 'dod pas gtse ba'i nyes pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro/_/sbyangs pa'i yan 
[\[138b.4\]]lag ni dus kyi mthar thug pa ni du zhig ces bya ba ni/_sbyangs pa'i yan lag gsum po shing drung pa nyid dang /_bla gab med pa nyid dang /_dur khrod pa nyid ni zla ba brgyad kyi mthar thug par bya ste/_dbyar ni g.yogs par gnas par bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo /_/ci 
[\[138b.5\]]sbyangs pa de nyid sbyangs pa smra ba yang de yin nam zhes bya ba ni sbyangs pa yin la sbyangs pa smra ba yin pa yang yod/_sbyangs pa ma yin la sbyangs pa smra ba yin pa yang yod/_sbyangs pa yin la sbyangs pa smra ba ma yin pa yang yod/_sbyangs pa yang ma yin sbyangs pa smra ba yang ma yin pa 
[\[138b.6\]]yang yod do/_/de la sbyangs pa yang yin/_sbyangs pa smra ba yang yin pa yang yod ces bya ba ni dgra bcom pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/sbyangs pa ma yin la sbyangs pa smra ba yin pa yang yod ces bya ba ni dgra bcom pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang 
[\[138b.7\]]dag par blangs pa dang mi ldan pa'o/_/sbyangs pa yin la sbyangs pa smra ba ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba ni slob pa'am/_so so'i skye bo sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/sbyangs pa yang ma yin sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba yang ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]ni slob pa'am/_so so'i skye bo sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs pa dang mi ldan pa'o/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid ni ci yin/_mnog ni ci yin/_nye bar gnas pa ni ci yin zhe na/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid ni 'dod pa chung ba nyid 
[\[139a.2\]]do/_/mnog ni chog shes pa'o/_/nye bar gnas pa ni yo byad bsnyungs pa'o/_/rnam pa gcig tu na mtshan nyid ni ma 'bags pa'o/_/mnog ni nyes dmigs med pa'o/_/nye bar gnas pa ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'o/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi thog ma ni gang yin/_bar ma ni 
[\[139a.3\]]gang yin/_tha ma ni gang yin zhe na/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi thog ma ni yang dag par len pa'o/_/bar ma ni sten pa'o/_/tha ma ni rab tu dag pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i lam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa zhes bya ba ste kun nas btus pa gsum pa rdzogs so//_
[\[139a.4\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D307}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_A yu pa r+yAn+ta sU tra/_/bod skad du/_tshe'i mtha'i mdo/_dkon 
[\[139a.5\]]mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[139a.6\]]slong dag khyed sems can rnams kyi tshe'i mtha' thos par 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus la bab lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi tshe'i mtha' bstan pa bcom ldan 'das las thos 
[\[139a.7\]]nas dge slong dag 'dzin par bgyid lags so/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni ring na bskal pa gcig ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag dud 'gro 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni ring na bskal pa gcig ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[139b.2\]]rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lnga brgya thub ste/_de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo khri lnga stong yod de/_/bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar rab tu che ba'i lus 'greng zhing /_/mchu dang mig 
[\[139b.3\]]skams shin tu sdug bsngal ba/_/rang gi skras yog kha gdangs gnam du lta/_/sna ni khab ltar rab tu phra ba dang /_/rus gong 'dra lus gcer bu rang skras yog_/gzugs mi sdug pa 'greng zhing thod pa thogs/_/bkres dang skom dang ngal bas rab gzir gang /_/cho 
[\[139b.4\]]nges 'debs shing kun tu rgyug pa dag_/nyam thag skad 'byin sdug bsngal tshor ba myong /_/phan tshun phrag dog ser sna 'dir bsten cing /_/'dir ni sdig pa'i las dag byas pa yis/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten du ni de dag skyes/_/dge slong dag shar kyi lus 'phags kyi 
[\[139b.5\]]mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga brgya ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ste/_bar ma 
[\[139b.6\]]dor 'chi ba ni med do/_/rgyu gang gis sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong thub la bar mdor 'chi ba ni med ce na/_dge slong dag byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni bdag gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la tshe nges pa yod cing 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang khyad par du 'gro ba ste/_phyi 
[\[139b.7\]]ma la mtho ris su nye bar 'gro'o/_/dge slong dag rgyu des na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong thub la bar ma dor 'chi ba ni med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_dbul bas sdug bsngal sems can dag_/gzhan 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]gyi nor la smon par byed/_/de dag dam pa ma bsten pas/_/gzhan gyi mngag gzhug ngan cing dman/_/longs spyod dag dang ldan pa yi/_/phyug cing nor mang sems can ni/_/nor dang 'bru dang skye bor ldan/_/de dag dam pa sten pa yin/_/bsod nams phyug 
[\[140a.2\]]pas nyer 'tsho ba'i/_/dge ba'i las ni 'dir byas pas/_/'byor pa chen po phun sum tshogs/_/lha bzhin du ni dga' bar byed/_/lkog gyur gang yin mi snang ste/_/mngon sum 'di la blta bar byos/_/gang zag kha cig 'jig rten na/_/bde ldan sngon byin 'bras bu 
[\[140a.3\]]yin/_/byang phyogs gling gi mi rnams ni/_/bdag gi med cing yongs 'dzin med/_/dpag bsam las byung gos sten pa/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/de dag grang dang tsha ba med/_/de dag la ni nad med cing /_/gzugs dang kha dog phun sum tshogs/_/de ni 
[\[140a.4\]]sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/byang phyogs gling na mnyams shing /_/ma grugs dag cing gtsang ba dang /_/shin tu dkar ba'i sA lu skye/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/nor bu 'od byed 'bar ba yis/_/de rnams rtag tu mdzes pa dang /_/de dag zas ni 'ju byed gang /_/
[\[140a.5\]]de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/de dag la ni tshod ma dang /_/sran tshod kyang ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med/_/kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa'i/_/sA lu dag ni rtag tu za/_/zas ni lan cig byin pa yis/_/stan las ma langs bar du ni/_/zad mi shes par sder la yod/_/de ni sngon byin 
[\[140a.6\]]'bras bu yin/_/ku ba'i 'bras bu 'dra ba dang /_/bcad kyang yal ga las skyes te/_/brngas nas btso mi dgos par za/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/de dag 'bab chu bsil ba dang /_/'thungs kyang lto la mi gnod pa'i/_/yan lag brgyad ldan chu la yod/_/de ni sngon 
[\[140a.7\]]byin 'bras bu yin/_/rol mo'i ljon shing gang dag gis/_/de dag rtag tu rtse zhing dga'/_/yid ni rtag tu bde dang ldan/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/de dag rol mo'i ljon shing bzang /_/gos kyi ljon shing mang po dang /_/spos kyi ljon shing phun sum tshogs/_/de ni sngon byin 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'bras bu yin/_/spos dang me tog rol mo dang /_/de bzhin du ni gos rnams kyang /_/gang dag ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/_/de dag de bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ne'u gsing dag ni sngon po la/_/shing bal lta bur rab 'jam pa/_/gang du de dag rtag rtse ba/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras 
[\[140b.2\]]bu yin/_/de dag la ni khro med cing /_/ser sna dang ni phrag dog med/_/phan tshun dag tu rtse byed pa/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/mtshan mo thun tshod dang po la/_/skad cig tsam zhig char 'bebs cing /_/rdul rnams med par byed pa ste/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/de 
[\[140b.3\]]dag yongs su 'dzin med pas/_/ma dang bur yang mi shes shing /_/sdug bsngal med pas mya ngan med/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/ma dag gis kyang rang gi bu/_/lam stong dag tu bor te 'gro/_/mthe bo las ni 'o ma 'dzag_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/de dag 
[\[140b.4\]]gang yang ngu ba med/_/shi na yang ni bor te 'gro/_/bya dag gis ni gling 'phyag pa/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/khor yug tu ni 'obs kyis bskor/_/glu gar yid du 'ong ba yis/_/gang du rtse zhing dga' bar byed/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/mi yi tshe ni 
[\[140b.5\]]lo stong po/_/zad pa dag tu byas nas ni/_/bar ma dor ni 'chi med pa/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/dpal ni rgyas par spyad nas su/_/mi yi lus ni bor nas kyang /_/lha yi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_/de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin/_/dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[140b.6\]]gi mi rnams la ni yar 'phel ba dang /_mar 'grib pa yod de/_dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni tshe lo dpag tu med par yang 'gyur/_tshe lo brgyad khri pa dang /_tshe lo brgya pa dang /_tshe lo bcu par yang 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams 
[\[140b.7\]]kyi da ltar gyi tshe'i tshad ni lo brgya pa yin no/_/dge slong dag da ltar ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams las ring du 'tsho ba gang yin pas legs par bde bar gnas na lo brgya 'am/_lo brgya las [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig lhag par thub bo/_/dge slong dag 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs ni bcu myong bar 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]'gyur te/_gnas skabs dang po ni zhan cing gan rkyal du nyal ba ste byis pa yin no/_/gnas skabs gnyis pa ni rtse ba'i rang bzhin can te gzhon nu yin no/_/gnas skabs gsum pa ni 'dod pa la spyod pa ste/_lang tsho la bab pa yin no/_/gnas 
[\[141a.2\]]skabs bzhi pa ni spro ba dang ldan zhing nyams stobs dang ldan pa yin no/_/gnas skabs lnga pa ni stobs dang ldan zhing shes rab dang ldan pa yin no/_/gnas skabs drug pa ni dpyod pa'i rang bzhin can te dran pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/gnas skabs bdun pa ni chos lugs 
[\[141a.3\]]khong du chud pa yin no/_/gnas skabs brgyad pa ni rgyal pos bkur zhing rgan rabs su bkur ba yin no/_/gnas skabs dgu pa ni rgas shing 'khogs pa ste rgan po yin no/_/gnas skabs bcu pa ni tshe'i mthar thug pa ste 'chir nye ba yin no/_/dge slong dag lo brgyar 'tsho 
[\[141a.4\]]bas gnas skabs bcu po de dag myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag lo brgyar 'tsho ba ni dus tshigs sum brgyar 'tsho ste/_dgun gyi dus tshigs brgya dang /_dpyid kyi dus tshigs brgya dang /_dbyar gyi dus tshigs brgya rnams so/_/dus tshigs sum brgyar 'tsho ba ni zla ba 
[\[141a.5\]]bcu gnyis phrag brgyar 'tsho ba ste/_dgun bzhi dang /_dpyid bzhi dang /_dbyar bzhi rnams so/_/zla ba bcu gnyis phrag brgyar 'tsho ba ni zla ba phyed nyis stong bzhi brgyar 'tsho ste/_dgun brgyad dang /_dpyid brgyad dang /_dbyar brgyad rnams so/_/zla ba phyed nyis stong bzhi 
[\[141a.6\]]brgyar 'tsho ba ni nyin zhag sum khri drug stong du 'tsho ste/_dgun bcu gnyis dang /_dpyid bcu gnyis dang /_dbyar bcu gnyis rnams so/_/nyin zhag sum khri drug stong du 'tsho ba ni bar chad du gyur pa ma gtogs par zan bdun khri nyis stong za'o/_/de la 'di dag ni zan bar 
[\[141a.7\]]chad du 'gyur ba yin te/_'khrugs nas ma zos pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar gyur pas ma zos pa dang /_phongs pa byung nas ma zos pa dang /_bsnyung ba byas te ma zos pa dang /_ma rnyed pas ma zos pa dang /_rnyed kyang ma zos pa dang /_gnyid log nas ma zos pa dang /_ra ro ste 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]ma zos pa dang /_rab tu myos pas ma zos pa ste/_zos pa gang yin pa dang /_ma zos pa gang yin pa de dag gcig tu bsdoms na ma'i nu zho 'thung ba gtogs par za ma bdun khri nyis stong du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong de ltar ngas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi tshe yang bshad 
[\[141b.2\]]dus tshigs dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_nyin zhag dang /_zan dang /_zan bar chad du gyur pa yang bshad pa yin no/_/dge slong dag mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/
[\[141b.3\]]zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya ste/_de mi'i lo ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag dgu yod de/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag 
[\[141b.4\]]gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe tshad ni lo de lta bu brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ste/_de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum drug khri nyis stong 
[\[141b.5\]]yod de/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_lus kyis nyes par spyad byas shing /_/ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang /_/yid kyis nyes par spyad byas shing /_/gang zhig nyes pa gzhan ldan pa'i/_/las 
[\[141b.6\]]de dag gis yang sos kyi/_/dmyal ba dag tu skye 'gyur te/_/lo ni bye ba phrag stong du/_/btags shing bcom yang yang 'tsho'o/_/phan tshun khon dag chags pa yi/_/mi rnams gsod pa'i mi dag ni/_/las de dag gis yang sos kyi/_/dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[141b.7\]]dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo stong thub bo/_/
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang /_sa ya phrag drug yod de/_/bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_sems 
[\[142a.2\]]can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo stong thub bo/_/de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag sa ya nyi 'bum dgu khri drug stong rtsa bcu gnyis yod de/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de 
[\[142a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_pha ma dag dang sangs rgyas dang /_/nyan thos rnams la 'khu byed pa/_/de dag thig nag skye 'gyur te/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig mi brtson 'jog pa dang /_/mi rnams mdza' ba'i dbyen byed pa/_/thig nag tu ni skye bar 'gyur/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra 
[\[142a.4\]]ba yang de bzhin te/_/las de yis ni thig nag gi/_/dmyal ba rnams su de dag skye/_/dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_'thab bral ba'i lha 
[\[142a.5\]]rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo nyis stong thub bo/_/de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang /_lo khri bzhi stong yod de/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla 
[\[142a.6\]]ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo nyis stong yod de/_de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag sum 'bum drug khri brgyad stong rtsa gcig yod de/_/bar 
[\[142a.7\]]ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_mi dge'i las rnam gsum byas shing /_/las dge rnam gsum ma byas te/_/las de dag gis bsdus 'joms kyi/_/dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/ba lang ra lug ma he dang /_/
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bya gag phag rnams dang /_/de bzhin srog chags gzhan gsod pa/_/bsdus gzhom dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin pa de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la 
[\[142b.2\]]lo gcig ste/_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo bzhi stong thub ste/_de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang lo sa ya phrag drug yod de/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi nyin 
[\[142b.3\]]zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong thub ste/_de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag sa ya gnyis dang /_bye 
[\[142b.4\]]ba phrag dgu 'bum bzhi khri bzhi stong dang /_bye ba phrag brgyad yod de/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_'jigs su rung la drag shul can/_/lag pa gnyis ni khrag gis bskus/_/sdig pa'i las ni spyod 
[\[142b.5\]]pa yis/_/rtag tu ngu 'bod 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gzhal lugs g.yo dang sgyu byed mi/_/skye bo dag ni yid phyung bas/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sgra 'byin cing /_/yun ring du ni 'bod sreg 'gyur/_/dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi 
[\[142b.6\]]nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo brgyad stong thub ste/_de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag nyis brgya sum cu dang /_lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod de bar ma 
[\[142b.7\]]dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]brtsis pa'i lo brgyad stong yod do/_/de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag sa ya gsum dang /_bye ba phrag lnga 'bum khri nyis stong drug cu rtsa drug yod de/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_
[\[143a.2\]]blta ba'i thibs pos khebs gyur cing /_/sred pa'i g.yog pas g.yogs pa dag_/sdig pa'i chos ni spyod pa yis/_/ngu 'bod dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/yid gcugs nyams pa'i mi dag ni/_/ba spu slong zhing 'bar ba yis/_/bskor ba'i khyim du nang chud nas/_/ngu 'bod chen 
[\[143a.3\]]por sreg par 'gyur/_/gtams pa brnogs pa'i mi dag ni/_/ral gri yis ni lus gtub cing /_/bya rgod bya rog 'ug pa khyis/_/'gul bzhin du ni za bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/
[\[143a.4\]]nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo khri drug stong thub bo/_/de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag drug dang /_lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig yod de/_bar ma 
[\[143a.5\]]dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/_/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo khri drug stong 
[\[143a.6\]]yod do/_/de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba sa ya phrag brgyad dang /_bzhi 'bum dang /_lo bye ba phrag khri drug stong lnga brgya sum cu yod de/_/bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_dge slong bram ze dge ba dang /_/de 
[\[143a.7\]]bzhin du ni pha ma las/_/gang zhig rtag tu gdung byed pa/_/de ni tsha bar skye bar 'gyur/_/'dir ni gang zhig gdung ba yis/_/skye bo mang po gdung byed pa/_/las de dag gis tsha ba yi/_/dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag khyed chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]tshe'i mtha' nyan par 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus la bab lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das las dge slong dag gis gang chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i mtha' bstan pa thos nas dge slong 
[\[143b.2\]]dag 'dzin par bgyid lags so/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_'di la til yul ko sa la'i khal bcu tshad nyi shu shong ba'i khal bcu tshad nyi shu pa til gyis byur bur gang bar gyur pa de las mi la 
[\[143b.3\]]la zhig brgya 'das shing til 'bru gcig bor te/_til khal bcu tshad nyi shu shong ba'i khal bcu tshad nyi shu pa de thabs 'dis myur du yongs su zad cing gtugs par gyur kyang /_dge slong dag chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni de lta ma yin par nga smra'o/_/
[\[143b.4\]]chu bur can gyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar chu bur rdol gyi gcig yin no/_/chu bur rdol gyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar so thams thams kyi gcig yin no/_/so thams thams kyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar kyi hud zer gyi gcig yin no/_/kyi hud zer gyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar a cu zer gyi gcig yin 
[\[143b.5\]]no/_/a cu zer gyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar ud pa la ltar gas pa'i gcig yin no/_/ud pa la ltar gas pa'i nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar pad ma ltar gas pa'i gcig yin no/_/pad ma ltar gas pa'i nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar pad ma ltar gas pa chen po'i gcig yin no/_/lha sbyin 
[\[143b.6\]]gyi phyogs dge slong ko ka li kas dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu la zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pas rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen po pad ma ltar gas pa chen por skyes so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na de'i phyir 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sdong dum 
[\[143b.7\]]tshig pa la yang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya na rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ltar dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_mi zhig skyes par gyur pa na/_/
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]gang gis bdag ni gcod byed pa'i/_/kha nas sta re'i tshig 'byung ba/_/nyes par smra bas smra ba ni/_/gang dag smad bya stod byed cing /_/skye bo bstod bya smod byed pa'i/_/sdig gang bde ba mi myong ba'i/_/sdig de de yi kha na sogs/_/gang 'dir rgyan pos bdag 
[\[144a.2\]]nor yal/_/'di ni sdig pa chung ngu ste/_/gang zhig bde gshegs sdang sems bskyed/_/'dir ni sdig pa de che'o/_/ngag dang yid kyis kyang ni sdig byas shing /_/gang zhig 'phags la smod pa dmyal 'gro ste/_/stong phrag brgyar ni chu bur rdol nas su/_/chu bur can du sum cu rtsa 
[\[144a.3\]]drug go/_/sdig pa'i sems kyis bden par mi smra ba/_/bdag nyid brlag cing dmyal bar 'phen par byed/_/de yid dri mas ma rnyogs par byed de/_/kha na ma tho med pa de bzod do/_/dge slong dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed gcig 
[\[144a.4\]]yin te/_/bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_'bras bu yid 'ong mtho ris su/_/skye 'gyur dge ba spangs nas ni/_/'dir ni mi sdug las byas pas/_/rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur/_/dge sbyong bram ze dge 
[\[144a.5\]]ba dang /_/pha dang ma yang de bzhin te/_/gang yang bla ma gzhan gsod pa/_/rab tu tsha bar de 'tshed do/_/dge slong dag dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/mi gti mug can lhas byin gyis dge 'dun 'thun pa phye ba 
[\[144a.6\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_dge slong ma dgra bcom pa bsad pas rang gi lus de nyid kyis dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa der skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_'phags pa rnams 
[\[144a.7\]]kyis bstan pa yi/_/chos kyis 'os par 'tsho rnams la/_/sdig pa'i lta ba la brten nas/_/blo ngan gang zhig smod byed pa/_/tsher can 'od ma'i 'bras bu ltar/_/de ni 'bras bu rlag par byed/_/dge bar 'gyur ba brjod bya ste/_/sdig pa can dag mi brjod do/_/dge ba 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]smras na legs par 'gyur/_/sdig pa smras na sreg 'gyur bas/_/gal te smra na dge ba smra'i/_/sdig pa smras na rlag par 'gyur/_/byis pa rnams ni sdig smra ste/_/'phags pa rnams ni ma yin no/_/'dir ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba yi/_/las ni shas cher byas pas na/_/las de 
[\[144b.2\]]dag gis mnar med pa'i/_/dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi che'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed de/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa'i bzhi cha gsum thub ste/_bar 
[\[144b.3\]]ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gnyis thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag tshad med 'od 
[\[144b.4\]]kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskul pa brgyad thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag dge chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bcu drug thub 
[\[144b.5\]]ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni 
[\[144b.6\]]yod do/_/dge slong dag sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa nyis brgya rtsa lnga bcu thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'bras 
[\[144b.7\]]bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa lnga brgya thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ni bskal pa nyis stong thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag shin tu mthong gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi stong thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag gya nom snang gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad stong thub ste/_bar 
[\[145a.2\]]ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa khri drug stong thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag nam mkha' mtha' yas skye du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa nyi khri ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod 
[\[145a.3\]]do/_/dge slong dag rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi khri ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa drug khri ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba 
[\[145a.4\]]ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag de ltar dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar 
[\[145a.5\]]de dag ni dge slong dag srid pa'i rtse mo dang /_de dag ni srid pa'i rtse mo yin no/_/de dag ni srid pa 'byung ba yin te/_de dag ni 'gro ba lnga'i sems can rnams 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'chi ba dang /_skye bar snang ngo /_/srid pa'i 'byung bas chog shes par gyis 
[\[145a.6\]]shig_/nga ni srid pa mngon par sgrub pa chung ngu la yang /_tha na de'i skad cig tsam yang bsngags pa mi mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_srid pa mngon par sgrub pa ni sdug bsngal yin pa'i phyir te/_dper na mi gtsang ba ni nyung ngu yang mi zhim na mang po lta ci smos/_de ltar de 
[\[145a.7\]]bzhin du nga ni srid pa mngon par sgrub pa chung ngu la yang tha na de'i skad cig tsam yang bsngags pa mi mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag srid pa mngon par sgrub pa ni sdug bsngal yin pa'i phyir ro/_/so so'i skye bo byis pa thos pa dang mi ldan pa de dag ni 'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor ba 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]gang du yang dang yang du dmyal ba rnams dang /_yang dang yang du dud 'gro rnams dang /_yang dang yang du ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su kun tu rgyug kun tu rab tu rgyug go/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na de'i phyir 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_srid pa rgyun chad par bya ba gang 
[\[145b.2\]]yin pa la brtson par bya zhing srid pa mngon par mi bsgrub par bya'o/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_
[\[145b.3\]]tshe'i mtha'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sing ha dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban de dge ba'i dpal gyis bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[145b.4\]{D308}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a yuHpat+ti ya thA kA ro pa ri pr-i ts+tshA sU tra/_bod skad du/_tshe 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur ba zhus pa'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das na 
[\[145b.5\]]grong khyer chen po ser skyar khyim bdag thams cad 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/_'khor lnga brgya dang bcas par gshegs pa las/_de'i tshe shAkya dga' skyes zhes bya ba dar la bab pa/_gnyen gyi skye bo thams cad la rab tu 
[\[145b.6\]]gces pa/_mi thams cad kyis bkur ba'i gnas su gyur pa zhig tshe 'phos pa'i phung po'i drung na de'i bu dang /_chung ma dang /_spun dang /_g.yog 'khor rnams kyis rta'i tshogs dang /_glang po che'i tshogs dang /_gos dang /_rgyan sna tshogs pa yang bsags/_gser 
[\[145b.7\]]dngul dang /_mu tig dang /_shel la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa yang bsags/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba ro zhim po mngar ba sna tshogs pa yang bsags te/_smre sngags 'don cing dga' skyes la gsol lo zhes mchod pa byed pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsams 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]pa/_'di ltar tshe 'phos pa la mchod cing gsol pa dang /_rjed pa ni bram ze dag gi smrang las zer na 'di dag la sman pa dang bde ba ci yod pa bcom ldan 'das la dri'o snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces 
[\[146a.2\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can tshe 'phos pa ji ltar 'gyur ba'i don zhu bar 'tshal na skabs dbye bar ci gnang /_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' pa/_kye rgyal po chen po ci dang ci bzhed pa zhus shig dang /_rgyal po chen po'i 
[\[146a.3\]]sems rangs par bshad par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po zas gtsang mas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di nas tshe pha rol tu 'phos pa'i sems can rnams pha rol tu skye ba de lha rnams 
[\[146a.4\]]kyang lhar skye'am/_de bzhin du mi dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dmyal ba rnams kyang mi dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dmyal ba rnams su tshe 'phos par rigs ma 'dres par so sor skye'am/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang lha rnams nas tshe 'phos 
[\[146a.5\]]pa mi la sogs pa gzhan rnams su skye'am/_de bzhin du mi dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dmyal ba rnams nas tshe 'phos na yang lha la sogs pa gzhan rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sems can thams cad 'di nas tshe 
[\[146a.6\]]'phos nas ye med par gyur te/_me shi ba'i thal ba bzhin du gyur nas skye bar ye ma mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sems can thams cad 'di nas tshe 'phos nas pha dang /_mes po dang /_yang mes la sogs pa thog ma med pa nas bzung ba'i bar du brgyud 
[\[146a.7\]]pa'i ris 'thun pa rnams 'jig rten pha rol tu skye ba mi len par 'dir ci spyad pa bzhin 'grogs te gnas so/_/zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchis na de ltar lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di na phyug dregs rgyags pa rnams pha rol tu yang phyug dregs rgyags 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]par 'gyur ram/_'di na dbul rgud nyam chung ba rnams pha rol tu yang dbul rgud nyam chung bar 'gyur ram/_'on te de gnyis mi 'dra bar phan tshun bsnol mar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di na rta dang /_glang po che la sogs pa zhon pa dang /_'di na gos gyon pa dang 
[\[146b.2\]]rgyan thogs pa dang /_'di na zas bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang ldan pa rnams shi 'phos nas pha rol tu yang de bzhin du zhon pa dang /_gyon pa dang /_za zhing 'thung ngo zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchi na de ltar lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di nas shi 'phos pa 
[\[146b.3\]]la pha ma'am/_spun nam/_bu la sogs pa nye ris rnams kyis bza' ba dang /_btung ba nyung ngu nyung ngur gtang ba'am/_bsngos pa yang bskal pa mang po'i bar du zad par mi 'gyur bar za zhing 'thung ngo zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchi na de ltar lags sam/_bcom ldan 
[\[146b.4\]]'das gzhan yang sems can 'di nas tshe 'phos pa na pha ma'am/_spun nam/_bu la sogs pa la gtam byas te tshig ci smras pa dang /_gzugs byad ci 'dra ba dag tshe 'phos nas phyis pha ma'am/_spun nam/_bu la sogs pa la sngon tshe ma 'phos pa'i dus na gtam byas pa 
[\[146b.5\]]la sogs pa smra ba dang /_gzugs byad dag ston te/_mthong ba dang thos pa yod ces 'jig rten pa dag mchi na de ltar lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye rgyal po chen 
[\[146b.6\]]po 'di nas shi 'phos nas lha rnams lhar skye ba la sogs pa 'dri ba ltar ma lags te/_/lha rnams tshe 'phos pa yang lhar skyes nas 'gro ba ris gzhan rnams su mi skye ba lags pa nas de bzhin du mi la sogs pa 'gro ba gzhan rnams kyang tshe 'phos nas 'gro ba gzhan dang gzhan 
[\[146b.7\]]rnams su mi skye bar rang rang gi snga ma'i ris rnams su skye ba lags na ni/_kye rgyal po chen po mi rnams dang po lha las gyur pa lags la/_ngan song gsum po rnams ni mi rnams kyis mi dge ba spyad pa las gyur pa lags pa'i phyir gang lha la sogs pa tshe 'phos pa de 'gro 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]ba ris gzhan dang gzhan rnams su skye ba lags so/_/kye rgyal po chen po gzhan yang rgyal po chen pos gsungs pa ltar lags na ni/_da ltar gyi 'gro ba ris drug po rnams mang ba dang nyung ba rnams ji ltar yod pa bzhin du dus thams cad du de ltar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[147a.2\]]rigs na/_mi rnams las mi dge ba spyad pa mang ba'i rgyus ngan song gsum po rnams phyir zhing mang ba la gzigs/_kye rgyal po chen po gzhan yang da ltar gyi dgra bcom pa 'di dag ni mi las gyur pa lags na/_'gro ba ris so sor ma 'dres par yang ris so sor skye ba ni 
[\[147a.3\]]mi rigs so/_/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par yang mi rigs so/_/kye rgyal po chen po de'i phyir na las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dbang gis mtho ris dang ngan song la sogs par ris tha dad par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal po chen po rgyal po chen pos lha rnams tshe 
[\[147a.4\]]'phos nas mi la sogs pa gzhan rnams su skye'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa dris pa ni de de bzhin lags te/_de de ltar lags so/_/kye rgyal po chen po rgyal po chen pos sems can thams cad tshe 'phos nas ye med par gyur te me shi ba'i thal ba bzhin du skye ba ye ma 
[\[147a.5\]]mchis sam zhes gsungs pa ni de ltar ma lags te/_kye rgyal po chen po dper na sa bon yod na 'bras bu 'byung ste/_tshe 'di sa bon lta bu las tshe phyi ma 'bras bu lta bu yod do/_/kye rgyal po chen po nyi ma shar nas khad kyis nub ste smag tu gyur pa las yang nang par 
[\[147a.6\]]'char ba bzhin du tshe 'di 'phos nas yang skye ba phyi ma len no/_/kye rgyal po chen po tshe 'phos nas phyi mar skye ba ye ma mchis na 'gro ba rnams zad pa'i rigs so/_/kye rgyal po chen po phyi rol gyi rtswa dang shing rnams kyang dus kyi dbang gis bskams pa de yang phyir skye'o/_/
[\[147a.7\]]de bzhin du sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa dus 'gyur ba dang 'dra ba'i dbang gis skye ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir na rgyal po chen po tshe phyi ma nges par yod par mkhyen par mdzod cig_/kye rgyal po chen po rgyal po chen pos sems can thams cad 'di nas 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]tshe 'phos nas pha dang /_mes po dang /_yang mes la sogs pa thog ma med pa nas bzung ba'i bar du gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ris 'thun pa rnams 'jig rten pha rol na skye ba mi len par 'di na ci spyod pa bzhin 'grogs te gnas so zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchi na/_
[\[147b.2\]]de de ltar lags sam/_zhes gsung ba ni/_kye rgyal po chen po 'di na pha dang bu la sogs pa gcig la gcig snang ba ni gzugs dngos po can gcig la gcig snang gi/_/sems gcig gis gcig mthong ba ni ma yin te/_gzugs kyi phung po 'dir zhig ste 
[\[147b.3\]]med na/_pha rol na sems gcig la gcig ji ltar snang ste 'grogs/_tshe 'phos pa'i pha dang /_mes po dang /_yang mes la sogs pa da ltar tshe ma 'phos pa'i bu tsha gzugs yod pas kyang mi mthong na pha rol tu tshe 'phos pa'i lus med pas pha dang /_mes po dang /_
[\[147b.4\]]yang mes la sogs pa gzugs med pa ji ltar mthong nas 'grogs/_kye rgyal po chen po gzhan yang 'di na pha dang /_bu dang /_spun mang po 'grogs pa'i dus na yang gzugs so sor snang ba las ma gtogs pa rang gi sems kyang rang gis mi mthong na spad dang spun gyi 
[\[147b.5\]]sems gcig gis gcig lta ga la mthong na/_tshe 'phos nas ji ltar mthong ste/_pha rol na spad dang /_spun dang /_mes po dang /_yang mes la sogs pa ji ltar snang nas 'grogs/_kye rgyal po chen po thog ma med pa'i dus na de bas snga ba med pa'i mes po dang /_da lta'i bu 
[\[147b.6\]]tsha rnams pha rol na 'grogs na da lta mi'i rus dang /_rigs dang /_phyogs dang /_ris mi gcig pa tha dad pa mang po ji snyed pa rnams so sor dgrar gyur pa rnams dang /_gnas gang na 'dug pa dang /_rus rigs gcig pa dang /_skad dang cha lugs ma thos pa dang ma 
[\[147b.7\]]mthong ba dag kyang thog ma mes po gcig las gyes pa yin na da ltar spad dang /_spun dang mes po la sogs pa 'grogs mi 'grogs kyi mtshams spun dang spad gang la gzung /_dang po mes po nas bzung ste da ltar spun dang spad kyi bar du brgyud pa rnams kyang da ltar gyi spad 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]dang spun 'dra bar so so na brtse zhing gdung bar 'dra na gang gang ni 'grogs/_gang gang ni mi 'grogs/_da ltar gyi mi rnams so so nas bdag cag gi mes po 'di yin no/_/zhes phyogs dang ris bzung ste/_bdag cag 'di dang pha gcig gi bu'o zhes 
[\[148a.2\]]phyogs dang ris su bcad na de dag gis mes po zhes so sor bzung ba de kun gyi yang pha dang /_mes po dang /_yang mes dang /_zhe mes nas dang po'i mes po la thug gi bar du brgyud pa ni da ltar so sor na bdag cag gi mes po zhes bzung ba yin na 'jig rten pa dag 
[\[148a.3\]]smra ba ltar 'di nas tshe 'phos nas skye ba mi len par pha rol na spad dang spun 'grogs na da ltar rus rigs dang /_phyogs mi gcig pa dang /_dgrar gyur pa kun kyang phyogs gcig nas 'grogs dgos so/_/kye rgyal po chen po da ltar gyi tshe 'di gzugs can dngos por 
[\[148a.4\]]snang ba yang mun pa dang /_phag na 'dug pa dag gcig gis gcig mi mthong na tshe 'phos pa'i sems can gzugs med pas gcig gis gcig ji ltar mthong nas 'grogs par 'gyur/_kye rgyal po chen po da ltar gyi sems can gzugs dang ldan pas kyang mi mthong ba'i 
[\[148a.5\]]gnas yul mi gcig pa dang /_gnas tha dad pa dag la rang gi gzugs snang bar ston mi nus na tshe 'phos nas ji ltar gzugs snang bar ston nus/_kye rgyal po chen po 'jig rten pa kha cig gis grags pa dang rnyed pa dag btsal ba'i phyir bzlas pa'i gtam gyis gzhan 
[\[148a.6\]]slu bar byed pa la gsan par mi rigs so/_/kye rgyal po chen po rgyal po chen pos 'di na phyug dregs rgyags pa rnams pha rol du yang phyug dregs rgyags par 'gyur ram/_'di na dbul rgud nyam chung ba rnams pha rol du yang dbul rgud nyam chung bar 'gyur ram/_'on te 
[\[148a.7\]]de gnyis mi 'dra bar phan tshun snol bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni/_kye rgyal po chen po sems can rnams tshe ma 'phos pa'i skye ba 'di la yang la la skyes ma thag tu phyug dregs rgyags par gyur pa las lo lnga bcu dang drug cu nas 'khogs pa'i bar du dbul rgud nyam 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]chung ba yang yod/_la la skyes nas gzhon dar ba'i tshe la dbul rgud pa las lo lnga bcu dang drug cu nas 'khogs pa'i bar du phyug dregs rgyags pa dag yod na tshe 'phos nas phyug dbul mi rtag pa lta ci smos/_kye rgyal po chen po dper na 'jig rten na rtswa dang shing la sogs 
[\[148b.2\]]pa dro ba dang brlan pa'i rkyen tshogs pa'i tshe ni lo ma dang 'dab ma rgyas par 'gyur la/_grang zhing rlan med pa'i rkyen gyis skams par 'gyur ba bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis ni phyug dregs rgyags par 'gyur la/_rku 'phrog dang /_ser sna'i dbang gis ni dbul rgud 
[\[148b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal po chen po sbyin pa rgyun ma chad pas tshe rabs nas tshe rabs su phyug dregs rgyags pa yang yod/_phyogs cha dang sbyin pa la 'gyod pa byas pas tshe 'ga' dang /_tshe stod smad la dbul rgud pa yang yod/_dus thams cad du rku 'phrog dang ser 
[\[148b.4\]]sna dag la gnas pas tshe rabs nas tshe rabs su dbul rgud pa yang yod/_rku 'phrog dang ser sna la 'gyod pa byas pas tshe 'ga' 'am/_tshe stod smad la phyug dregs pa yang yod do/_/kye rgyal po chen po sbyin pa'i rkyen gyis dbul rgud pa yang mi 'byung ngo /_/ser sna'i dbang 
[\[148b.5\]]gis phyug dregs pa yang mi 'byung ngo /_/phyug dregs pa dang dbul rgud pa 'di gnyis tshe snga phyi la rje ba yang ma lags so/_/kye rgyal po chen po rgyal po chen pos 'di na rta dang /_glang po che la sogs pa zhon pa dang /_'di na gos gyon pa dang /_rgyan thogs pa dang /_'di na zas 
[\[148b.6\]]bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang ldan pa rnams tshe 'phos nas pha rol tu yang de bzhin du zhon pa dang /_gyon pa dang /_za zhing 'thung ngo zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchi na de de ltar lags sam zhes gsungs pa ni/_kye rgyal po chen po mi rnams tshe 'phos pa'i tshe las dge 
[\[148b.7\]]sdig gang spyad pa bzhin mtho ris dang ngan song dag tu skye ba len te/_/rgyal po chen po 'jig rten pa dag mchi ba ltar ma lags so/_/tshe 'phos pa 'di'i cha lugs ltar snang ba ni bar snang gi khams 'di na dri za'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]mthar thug pa med pa yod do/_/dri za 'chi ka ma'i sems la nye bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rigs yod de/_/des dri za'i zas btsal ba'i phyir tshe rabs snga ma'i lus dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_cha lugs lta bu dag sprul par byed de/_tshe 'phos pa 
[\[149a.2\]]de'i cha lugs dang gtam dag byed cing sprul pa ston pa yang yod do/_/kye rgyal po chen po 'di la gzhan yang yod de/_/dri za las ma gtogs pa gzhan yang gnod sbyin dang /_sha za dang /_'byung po la sogs pas tshe 'phos pa'i pha'am/_bu'am/_spun la
