[\[149a.3\]]sogs pa bslu ba'i phyir mi ma yin pa des 'jig rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis tshe 'phos pa'i gtan tshigs dang /_sa mal dang /_lo rgyus dag shes par byas nas mi ma yin pa de'i byin gyis pha ma la sogs pas mthong ba dang /_rmi lam du 'byung ba yang yod do/_/kye rgyal 
[\[149a.4\]]po chen po 'di la gzhan yang yod de/_/spad dang spun la sogs pa yun ring por lhan cig pa'i bag chags rtas pas mthong ba dang rmi lam du snang ba yang yod de/_dper na mi zhig gis da ltar tshe ma 'phos pa'i rang gi pha ma'am/_spun zla'am/_bran khol lam/_
[\[149a.5\]]gzhan su yang rung ba dag dang 'grogs pa dang /_longs spyod kyi bde ba'am/_dgra rkun dang /_'thab rtsod la sogs pa bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal gang yang rung bdag rmis na mi des rmis pa bzhin du gang rmis pa'i pha ma'am/_spun zla'am/_bran khol lam gzhan 
[\[149a.6\]]su yang rung ba rmi lam na snang ba des tshor ba yod na ni rmis pa de bden pa yin na des rmis pa'i pha ma'am/_spun zla'am/_bran khol lam/_gzhan su yang rung ba rmi lam na snang ba de bden par ji ltar bzung /_kye rgyal po chen po tshe ma 'phos pa yang gcig gis rmis 
[\[149a.7\]]pa gcig gis mi tshor na tshe 'phos pa'i rmis pa tshe 'phos pa de yin par ga la 'gyur te bag chags rtas pa yin no/_/kye rgyal po chen po bag chags lags pa'i dpe ni gzhan yang mchis te/_mi zhig sngon tshe stod la mchis pa'i mkhar dang /_khang pa dang /_grong gang yin pa zhig 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]bor te/_yul gzhan zhig tu tshe smad la 'dug pa na sngon gyi grong de yang zhig ste/_sngon mi 'dra ba las mi des sngon gyi khang pa'i dbyibs dang rgya ci 'dra ba ma zhig pa/_ma 'dra mas pa rmis na grong dang khang pa de la sems yod na ni khang pa de'i sems snang du rung na khang 
[\[149b.2\]]pa dang grong des rdo bems po yin na mi des rmis pa de ci'i phyir bag chags rtas pa ma yin/_de bzhin du tshe 'phos pa'i dan rtags dang bcas pa yang khang pa ma zhig pa rmis pa dang 'dra ste/_tshe 'phos pa'i sems kyang las gar 'thun par skye ba blangs zin na de snad du 
[\[149b.3\]]btub bam/_kye rgyal po chen po de'i phyir bag chags mthu rtas pa'i dbang gis tshe 'phos pa'i gtan tshigs dang /_cha lugs mthong ba dang rmis pa yin no/_/de bzhin du ral gri la sogs pa'i go mtshon thogs pa dang /_gos dang /_rgyan la sogs pa gyon pa 
[\[149b.4\]]dang /_rta dang /_glang po che la sogs pa zhon par snang ba dang rmi lam du 'byung ba yang bag chags snang ba yin te/_khang pa'i dpe bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/kye rgyal po chen po rgyal po chen pos 'di nas shi 'phos pa la pha ma'am/_spun nam/_bu la sogs pa nye ris 
[\[149b.5\]]rnams kyis bza' ba dang /_btung ba nyung ngu nyung ngur gtad pa dang /_bsngos pa yang bskul pa mang po'i bar du zad par mi 'gyur bar za zhing 'thung ngo zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchis na de ltar lags sam/_zhes gsungs pa ni kye rgyal po chen po gling bzhi pa nas 
[\[149b.6\]]stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad na bza' ba dang btung ba nyung ngu nyung ngus dus thams cad dang /_
[\[149b.7\]]bskal pa mang por za ba'i sems can gzigs sam/_gsan nam/_kye rgyal po chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la ci bsams pa'i 'dod pa 'byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la yod pa yang sngon bskal pa mang por bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pas 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]bsags pa las byung ba yin te/_gnam nas babs pa dang /_glo bur du byung ba ni ma yin na bza' ba dang btung ba nyung ngu de bskal pa mtha'i bar du mi zad pa de rigs lags sam/_kye rgyal po chen po tshe ma 'phos pa'i pha spad dang /_spun gcig 
[\[150a.2\]]la gcig 'brel par 'dzin pa phan par 'dod pa rnams da ltar ma shi ba lus dang ldan pa yang gcig yul gzhan du song na de la pha ma'am/_bu'am/_spun gang yang rung bas zas skom mang por sbyin no gsol lo zhes bsngos pa yang yul gzhan du song ba'i rmi lam du 
[\[150a.3\]]yang mi 'byung na dngos por za zhing 'thung ba lta ga la yod/_tshe 'phos nas lus dang bral ba la bsngos zhing gtad pa za zhing 'thung ba lta ga la yod/_kye rgyal po chen po tshe 'phos nas sems lus dang bral ba des bu dang spun la sogs pas gtad pa'i zas dang /_
[\[150a.4\]]skom dngos po can 'di dag sems dngos po med pa gzugs med pas ji ltar bdag po byed par 'gyur/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bza' ba dang bca' ba ni lus yod pa'i yan lag gi rtsol ba la rag lus na sems la lus kyi yan lag de'i rtsol ba yod dam/_rgyal po 
[\[150a.5\]]chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na tshe 'phos pa la 'di na phan 'dogs pa'i bza' btung dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_rgyan gtong ba 'di dag la don ma mchis pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal 
[\[150a.6\]]po chen po tshe 'phos pa des las gang spyad pa'i rnam par smin pas 'gro ba ris tha dad pa gang du skye ba len pa de la mi dge ba dang ma 'brel pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur ba'i las dge ba sna tshogs pas bstangs na mtho ris dang thar par yang skye la/_gal te skye ba 
[\[150a.7\]]blangs pa zhig la bsod nams su 'gyur ba'i las dge ba zhig gis bstangs na skye ba blangs pa des nor rnyed pa dang /_lo legs pa dang /_'dod pa'i longs spyod 'phel ba dang /_'gro ba gzhan thams cad kyis mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur ba'i phan pa yod kyi/_tshe 'phos pa skye ba 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]mi len par gshin gyi 'jig rten yod nas bza' btung dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dag bdag por byed pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal po chen po 'jig rten pa dag gang gis mthong ba dang /_pha ma la sogs pas rmi lam du rmis te/_tshe 'phos pa las bsngos 
[\[150b.2\]]pas gshin de bza' btung gis mgu'o/_/bzhon pa zhon no/_/gos gyon no/_/rgyan thogs so/_/zhes smra zhing de ltar snang ba de yang bza' btung gis mi mgu'o/_/bzhon pa med do/_/gos mi gyon no/_/rgyan mi thogs so/_/zhes smra zhing de ltar snang ba 
[\[150b.3\]]dag dri za 'chi ka'i sems la nye bar 'jug pa dang /_mi ma yin pa dag gis de ltar snang bar byed pa yod do/_/kye rgyal po chen po rgyal po chen pos sems can dag 'di nas tshe 'pho kha na pha ma'am/_spun nam/_bu la sogs pa la gtam byas pa dang /_tshig 
[\[150b.4\]]ci smras pa dang /_gzugs ci 'dra ba dag de tshe 'phos nas phyis pha ma dang /_spun nam/_bu la sogs pa la de sngon tshe ma 'phos pa'i dus na gtam byas pa la sogs pa smra ba dang gzugs byad ston te/_de lta bu mthong ba dang ston pa yod ces 'jig rten pa dag mchi na/_
[\[150b.5\]]de ltar lags sam ma lags zhes gsungs pa ni/_kye rgyal po chen po smra ba ni lus yod pa'i kha lce la brten nas smra ba lags na tshe 'phos pa'i lus ni 'dir bzhag na sems gzugs med pa de ji ltar smra/_de ste shi ba de la lus yod do/_/zhes zer ba ni skye ba blangs pa 
[\[150b.6\]]yin te/_de la pha ma dgos pas gshin gyi 'jig rten yang med do/_/kye rgyal po chen po de lta bu'i tshe ma 'phos pa'i mtshan ma dang dan rtags 'jig rten pa gang dag smra ba ni dri za khyab byed ces bya ba'i rigs yod pas byed de/_dper na rlung chen pos thang dang klung yangs 
[\[150b.7\]]pa dag tu dus gcig tu rlung ldang ba bzhin du 'chi 'pho ba thams cad kyi sems la khyab par byed pa'i rigs dri za bi tsa na zhes bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin smra 'dod kyi rigs dang /_'byung po bar hi ni ta kun tu rtogs 'dod ces bya ba dag gis bsgrubs nas mi ma yin pa de dag 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gis shi ba des sngon ji ltar gtam byas pa dang /_cha lugs kyi dan rtags dag 'jig rten pa dag bslu ba'i phyir ston cing smra ba dag yin no/_/de'i tshe lha sbyin de na 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa de la yid ma ches nas/_
[\[151a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma sems can tshe 'phos nas cir 'gyur ba'i dan rtags pha rol na yod pa dang med pa bka' stsal pa/_de gau ta mas thog ma su la gsan/_dus nam gyi tshe mkhyen par mdzad/_gsan pa dang mkhyen par 
[\[151a.3\]]mdzad pa'i grogs po ni su lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha sbyin ngas ni rang gi lus btang ba la sogs pa dka' ba mang po dag bskal pa grangs med par spyad de sgrib pa thams cad ni sbyangs/_tshogs chen 
[\[151a.4\]]po yang dag par bsags pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob ste/_'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba dang /_da ltar gyi dus na phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa na shes bya gang dag ci yod pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i shes bya thams cad 
[\[151a.5\]]la mi mkhyen par gyur pa gang yang med de/_dper na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nyi ma shar ba de khad dang rim gyis shar ba ma yin te/_dus gcig tu gsal bar shar ba bzhin du shes bya thams cad skad cig ma gcig la mkhyen pa'i phyir nga ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[151a.6\]]pa'i ye shes mnga' ba zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa la yang lha sbyin yid ma ches nas thams cad mkhyen pa mnga' ba de nyams sad pa'i phyir 'dzam bu gling 'di na shing gi rigs tsan dan dang /_blag sha dang /_seng ldeng la sogs pa shing tha dad pa brgya stong 
[\[151a.7\]]bye ba dag bcad de/_so sor bsregs nas thal ba'i phur ma byas nas rang gis mi nor bar bya ba'i phyir thal ba la shing gang dang gang gi ming yi ger btags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]khyod la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' na/_'di shing gang gi thal ba 'di shing gang gi thal ba lags zhes mthar chags su thal ba'i phur ma thams cad bstan pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis shing gang gi thal ba yin pa ma nor bar 'di ni tsan dan gyi thal ba'o/_/
[\[151b.2\]]'di ni blag sha'i thal ba'o/_/'di ni seng ldeng gi thal ba'o/_/zhes thal ba'i phur ma thams cad ma nor bar bshad pa las/_lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bar yid ches par gyur te/_tshe 'phos pa cir 'gyur bar 
[\[151b.3\]]gsungs pa bden par bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bstod do/_/bcom ldan 'das ni kun mkhyen lags/_/shing mang thal ba'i bye brag rnams/_/ma gzigs ma gsan nges par mkhyen/_/tshe 'phos ci 'gyur gsungs pa nges/_/zhes bstod 
[\[151b.4\]]nas spobs pa med par gyur to/_/de'i tshe shAkya ming chen de na 'dug pas tshe 'phos pa cir 'gyur bka' stsal pa la yid ma ches nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshe 'phos pa'i sems can rnams cir 'gyur ba gsungs pa de 
[\[151b.5\]]mngon sum du gzigs sam 'on te gzhan zhig la gsan pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ming chen nga'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mi gzigs pa ni 'jig rten na med de/_/skyu ru ra rlon pa lag mthil du bzhag na lag 
[\[151b.6\]]pa'i bye brag thams cad gsal ba de bzhin du dus gsum gyi shes bya la ngas ma gzigs pa ci yang mi mnga' ste/_thos pa la brten pa ni ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_shAkya ming chen gyis thams cad gzigs pa de bden [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]nyams sad pa'i phyir ser 
[\[151b.7\]]skya'i grong khyer chen por song ste/_khyim ji snyed yod pa la 'bras kyi phur ma re re blangs te/_rang gis 'bras kyi phur ma mi gang la blangs pa mi nor bar bya ba'i phyir shAkya gang la blangs pa'i ming rnams bris te/_'bras phur ma'i nang du bcug nas 'bras kyi phur ma glang po che'i 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]khal longs pa cig dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis thams cad gzigs na 'bras kyi phur ma 
[\[152a.2\]]'di dag mi dbye bar shAkya gang gang gi 'bras gang gang lags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig ces gsol nas/_glang po che'i khal gyi 'bras kyi phur ma rnams drung du bzhag pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras kyi phur ma re re blangs shing 'di shAkya dga' byed 
[\[152a.3\]]kyi'o/_/'di shAkya ka ya'i 'o/_/'di shAkya 'dod sred kyi'o/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'bras phur ma re re la shAkya 'di yi'o/_/zhes ming ma nor bar rim par rdzogs par gsungs pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis thams cad gzigs 
[\[152a.4\]]pa la shAkya ming chen la sogs pa thams cad yid ches te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe 'phos pa cir 'gyur ba bshad pa ni nges so snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/_sangs rgyas spyan gyis thams cad gzigs/_/'jig rten pa ltar [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi 
[\[152a.5\]]mnga'/_/shA kya'i grong khyer ji snyed pa'i/_/'bras kyi phur ma ma nor mkhyen/_/sems can tshe 'phos pha rol na/_/ji ltar snang ba 'jig rten [{]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mad/_/kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces bstod nas 
[\[152a.6\]]spobs pa med de mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas yab rgyal po chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i las mi dge ba dag bgyis pas de'i rnam par smin pa mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ba 
[\[152a.7\]]dag gis ji ltar bgyis na bde ba thob par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye rgyal po chen po sems can gang dag gis mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i las mi dge ba byas pa dag gis sgyu med pa'i sems dang bas rnam 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]par smin pa la yid ches par byas te/_sems thag pa nas bshags na 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i tshe mi dge ba sngar byas pa dag la 'gyod pa bskyed de/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol na sdig 
[\[152b.2\]]pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/mtho ris su yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe phyi ma med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o/_/skye ba len pa ni dbang phyug dang /_'dod rgyal dang /_gyi na la sogs pa dag gis byed par mi blta'o/_/'jig rten pa'i bde ba dang 'khor ba 
[\[152b.3\]]thams cad la chags par mi bya'o/_/kye rgyal po chen po 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'pho ste/_skye ba len pa na rtag pa 'pho ba yang ma yin no/_/chad pa 'gags te med pa yang ma yin no/_/rgyu med pa yang ma yin no/_/rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin no/_/byed 
[\[152b.4\]]pa pos byas pa yang ma yin te/_las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu rkyen pa las skye bar blta'o/_/rgyal po chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams tshe 'phos nas skye ba len pa de de ltar rtag pa yang mi 'pho/_/chad pa yang ma lags/_rgyu med 
[\[152b.5\]]pa yang ma lags/_byed pa pos kyang ma byas/_'jig rten pha rol tu skye ba yang 'grub pa de rtogs par dka' na 'di la 'thun pa'i dpe 'di mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye rgyal po chen po 'di la 'thun pa'i dpe brgyad yod do/_/bla mas kha 
[\[152b.6\]]ton brjod pa slob mas shes pa'i dpe dang /_mar me las mar me 'byung ba'i dpe dang /_me long las gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i dpe dang /_rgya las rgya'i 'bur dang ri mo 'byung ba'i dpe dang /_me shel las me 'byung ba'i dpe dang /_sa bon las myu gu 'byung ba'i dpe dang /_
[\[152b.7\]]skyur zhes brjod pas 'gram chu ldang ba'i dpe dang /_brag ca'i sgra rnams kyi dpes rtogs par bya ste/_kye rgyal po chen po dpe brgyad po 'di dag gis snga ma snga mas ni phyi ma phyi ma rnams 'byung ba yang yod pa ni rtag pa 'pho ba ma yin pa'i dpe'o/_/phyi ma phyi ma ni snga ma snga ma 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]rnams las 'byung bas rgyu med pa las 'byung ba ma yin pa'i dpe dang /_chad pa 'gag pa ma yin pa'i dpe'o/_/kye rgyal po chen po gzhan yang dpe 'di dag ni rkyen gsum gsum tshogs pa las 'byung ste/_bla ma dang slob ma de gnyis dbang po rnams 
[\[153a.2\]]tshang ba las kha ton 'byung zhing smra shes pa'o/_/mar dang sdong bu dang snod tshogs pa las mar me 'byung ngo /_/nam mkha' dang ba dang /_gdong dang me long tshogs pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung ngo /_/rgya dang 'jim pa'i gong bu dang skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba 
[\[153a.3\]]rnams tshogs pa las 'bur dang ri mo 'byung ngo /_/shel dang nyi ma'i 'od dang rtswa shing tshogs pa las me 'byung ngo /_/sa bon dang sa gzhi dang rlan pa rnams tshogs pa las myu gu 'byung ngo /_/tshwa dang tshwa chu 'thung myong ba dang /_skyur zhes brjod pa tshogs pa las 'gram 
[\[153a.4\]]chu ldang ngo /_/mis brjod pa'i sgra dang sgra drag po gzhan med pa dang /_ri brag rnams tshogs pa las brag ca 'byung ste/_de dag ni sems can skye ba ni byed pa pos ma byas te/_las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i dpe'o/_/kye rgyal po chen po gzhan 
[\[153a.5\]]yang bla ma ni tshe 'di'i dpe'o/_/slob ma ni tshe pha rol gyi dpe'o/_/kha ton ni rnam par shes pa nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dpe'o/_/mar me snga ma ni tshe 'di'i dpe'o/_/phyi ma ni pha rol gyi dpe'o/_/mar me snga ma las phyi ma byung ba yang snga ma yod pa ni rtag pa 'pho ba ma yin 
[\[153a.6\]]pa'i dpe'o/_/phyi ma de snga ma las byung ba rgyu med pa las ma byung ba'i dpe'o/_/me long ni tshe 'di yod pa'i sgo nas phyi ma yang yod la/_dngos po yang mi 'pho zhing pha rol yang yod nges pa'i dpe'o/_/rgya ni 'dir las ci spyad pa 'thun par pha rol tu yang skye ba len 
[\[153a.7\]]pa'i dpe'o/_/me shel ni 'gro ba ris mi 'dra ba nas mi 'dra bar skye ba'i dpe'o/_/sa bon ni 'gags nas med par mi 'gyur ba'i dpe'o/_/skyur ni myong ba'i las kyis skye ba len pa'i dpe'o/_/sgra ni rgyu rkyen tshogs nas gnod pa'i rkyen gzhan med na skye ba len te/_
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]gcig pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dpe'o/_/kye rgyal po chen po dpe brgyad po 'di tshang bar ma smos te/_'ga' zhig bstan na dbang phyug dang /_'dod rgyal dang /_gyi na dang /_rgyu med par smra ba dag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i dpe 'di dag kha ton gyi dpes ni 'di'i phung po dang /_
[\[153b.2\]]rnam par shes pa gnyis ma bral bar pha rol tu rnam par shes pa 'pho bar 'gyur zhes smra ba dag dgag pa'i phyir dpe lhag ma rnams bstan to/_/mar me'i dpes ni 'di dang pha rol gnyi gar phung po dus gcig yod do/_/zhes zer ba dag dgag pa'i phyir dpe 
[\[153b.3\]]lhag ma rnams bstan to/_/me long gi dpes ni 'dra ba'i dpe yin pas grum po las grum por skye/_dkar po las dkar por skye'o zhes zer ba dag dgag pa'i phyir dpe lhag ma rnams bstan to/_/rgya'i dpes ni lha 'phos pa lhar skye/_mi 'phos pa mir 
[\[153b.4\]]skye ba la sogs pa nges pa'o zhes zer ba dag dgag pa'i phyir dpe lhag ma rnams bstan to/_/me shel gyi dpes ni mi 'dra ba'i dpe yin pas dge bas ngan song dang mi dge bas mtho ris 'grub bo zhes zer ba dag dgag pa'i phyir dpe lhag ma rnams bstan 
[\[153b.5\]]to/_/sa bon gyi dpes ni shes pa gcig las mang por 'phel lo zhes zer ba dag dgag pa'i phyir dpe lhag ma rnams bstan to/_/skyur gyi dpes ni myong ba'i dpe yin pas lha'i lo rgyus yod pa dag dge ba'i bsod nams ma byas kyang lhar skye'o/_/ngan song gi lo rgyus 
[\[153b.6\]]yod pa dag mi dge ba ma byas kyang ngan song du skye'o/_/zhes zer ba dag dgag pa'i phyir dpe lhag ma rnams bstan to/_/sgra'i dpes ni byed pa po'i dpe yin pas rgyu rkyen las ma byung ngo /_/zhes zer ba dag dgag pa'i phyir dpe lhag ma rnams bstan to/_/de'i phyir dpe 
[\[153b.7\]]brgyad bstan to/_/kye rgyal po chen po tshe zhig ste pha rol tu skye ba med de/_chad pa dang 'gag pa yang ma yin no/_/tshe 'di dngos po rtag pa ma nyams par pha rol tu 'pho ba yang ma yin no/_/tshe 'di la ma bsten par pha rol tu skye ba len pa yang ma yin no/_/bdag gis 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]skye ba 'di blang ngo zhes bsams pas kyang skye ba mi len to/_/bdag gis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa la brten te mtho ris su skye bar bya'o snyam pas kyang ma yin no/_/bdag mtho ris dang ngan song gar 'dod par skye bar bya'o snyam pas kyang ma 
[\[154a.2\]]yin no/_/ci yang ma byas te rgyu rkyen la brten mi dgos par skye'o snyam pas kyang ma yin no/_/phung po 'di zhig ste shi nas ci yang med do zhes smra ba yang ma yin no/_/'dir tshe 'phos nas pha rol na gshin gyi khams su mu chags su mchis pas 'di na ci spyod pa 
[\[154a.3\]]byed de skye ba mi len zhes zer ba yang ma yin no/_/tshe 'di'i rnam par shes pa ma 'gags par rnam par shes pas skye ba len zhes zer ba yang ma yin no/_/'di dang pha rol gnyi gar phung po dus gcig yod ces zer ba yang ma yin no/_/grum po las grum por skye/_
[\[154a.4\]]dkar po las dkar por skye zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang ma yin no/_/lha tshe 'phos pa yang lhar skye'o/_/mi tshe 'phos pa yang mir skye'o zhes zer ba yang ma yin no/_/dge bas ngan song dang mi dge bas mtho ris su 'grub ces zer ba yang ma yin no/_/shes pa 
[\[154a.5\]]gcig las mang po 'phel ba yang ma yin no/_/dge ba ma byas kyang lhar skye ba dang /_mi dge ba ma byas kyang ngan song du skye ba yang ma yin no/_/skye ba ni byed pa pos byas pa yang ma yin no/_/de dag ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na/_kha ton gyi dpe la gang dag gis rnam par shes 
[\[154a.6\]]pa 'di ma 'gags par pha rol tu skye ba len no zhes zer ba'i skyon bsal ba'i phyir sa bon gyi dpe bstan te/_sa bon de ma rul bar myu gu skye na ni bdag tu smra ba dag bden na sa bon de rul nas snga ma las gyur te mi 'dra bar gyur pa las myu gu skye'o/_/mar me'i dpe la 
[\[154a.7\]]gang gis mar me gcig las gcig sbar na gnyi ga yod pas 'di dang pha rol gnyi gar phung po dus gcig yod do/_/zhes zer ba'i skyon bsal ba'i phyir sgra'i dpe bstan te/_brag ca ni mis ma brjod par sgra mi grag ste/_dus gcig tu mi 'byung bas phung po yang dus 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]gcig tu mi 'byung ngo /_/me long gi dpe la 'dra ba'i phyir grum po las grum por skye ba dag dgag pa'i phyir me shel gyi dpe bstan te/_me shel las de dang mi 'dra ba'i me 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/rgya'i dpe ni lha tshe 'phos pa lhar skye/_mi tshe 'phos pa mir skye'o zhes zer ba 
[\[154b.2\]]bsal ba'i phyir kha ton gyi dpe bstan te/_'di'i dpe ni bla ma yin la/_pha rol gyi dpe ni slob ma yin te/_tha dad pas bla ma yang slob ma ma yin/_slob ma yang bla ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/me shel gyi dpe la mi 'dra ba'i dpe yin te/_dge bas ngan song mi dge bas mtho 
[\[154b.3\]]ris so zhes zer ba bsal ba'i phyir mar me'i dpe bstan te/_mar me las mar me mi 'dra ba mi 'byung gi_/mar me las mar me 'byung ba bzhin dge bas mtho ris mi dge bas ngan song ni rigs pa'o/_/sa bon gyi dpe la shes pa 'phel zhes zer ba dgag pa'i phyir rgya'i 
[\[154b.4\]]dpe bstan te/_rgya'i ri mo ci 'dra ba de las 'jim pa'i gong bu la yang ri mo gzhan mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/skyur gyi dpe las gang dag gis lha'i lo rgyus myong ba dag dge ba ma byas kyang skye ba thams cad du lhar skye/_ngan song gi lo rgyus myong ba dag mi dge ba ma byas kyang 
[\[154b.5\]]skye ba thams cad ngan song du skye'o/_/zhes zer ba dag dgag pa'i phyir me long gi dpe bstan te/_me long la bzhin ci 'dra ba snang ba bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu 'dra ba bsnol nas mi 'dra bar sbyor ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro/_/sgra'i dpe la ni byed pa pos byas pa ma yin 
[\[154b.6\]]te/_mis skad ma bsgrags par brag ca mi 'byung ba bzhin du byed pa pos ma byas par sems can rnams mi skye'o/_/zhes zer ba de bas la ba'i phyir skyur gyi dpe bstan te/_sngar 'thungs pa dang za myong bas phyis brjod pas 'gram chu ldang ba bzhin du las dang nyon mongs pa 
[\[154b.7\]]sngar spyad pa'i dbang gis phyis skye ba len no/_/kye rgyal po chen po sems can skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_'di dang pha rol tu 'pho ba dang /_ji ltar 'gyur ba dag ni de ltar mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa la 'khor 'dus 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]pa thams cad yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/'chi 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//bstan pa snga dar ba'i tshe 'gyur ba las skad gsar chad kyis kyang ma bcos pa'o//_//
[\[155a.2\]{D309}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a ni t+ya sU tra/_bod skad du/_mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[155a.3\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag chos bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten thams cad la sdug pa/_dben pa/_
[\[155a.4\]]phangs pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_mngon par dga' bar bya ba'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_dge slong dag nad med pa ni 'jig rten thams cad la sdug pa/_dben pa/_phangs pa/_yid du 'ong bar mngon par dga' bar bya ba'o/_/nad med pa de'i mtha' yang nad yin te/_
[\[155a.5\]]dge slong dag nad ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi sdug pa/_mi dben pa/_mi phangs pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/dge slong dag lang tsho ni 'jig rten thams cad la sdug pa/_dben pa/_phangs pa/_yid du 'ong ba mngon par 
[\[155a.6\]]dga' bar bya ba'o/_/lang tsho 'di'i mtha' yang rga ba yin te/_dge slong dag rga ba ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi sdug pa/_mi dben pa/_mi phangs pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/dge slong dag 'byor pa ni 'jig rten thams 
[\[155a.7\]]cad la sdug pa/_dben pa/_phangs pa/_yid du 'ong ba mngon par dga' bar bya ba'o/_/'byor pa de'i mtha' yang rgud pa yin te/_dge slong dag rgud pa ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi sdug pa/_mi dben pa/_mi phangs pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_mngon par dga' 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/dge slong dag srog ni 'jig rten thams cad la sdug pa/_dben pa/_phangs pa/_yid du 'ong ba mngon par dga' bar bya ba'o/_/srog de'i mtha' yang 'chi ba ste/_dge slong dag 'chi ba ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi sdug pa/_mi dben 
[\[155b.2\]]pa/_mi phangs pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/nad med mi 
[\[155b.3\]]rtag lang tsho rtag ma yin/_/'byor pa mi rtag srog kyang rtag ma yin/_/skye bo mi rtag nyid kyis nyen gyur na/_/'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba ji ltar skye/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[155b.4\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus nas skad gsar cad kyis kyang bsnan nas gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[155b.5\]{D310}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a ni t+ya tA sU tra/_/bod skad du/_mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[155b.6\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang /_mi brtan pa dang /_yid brtan du mi rung ba dang /_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dge 
[\[155b.7\]]slong dag chog gis 'du byed thams cad las sems zlog shig_/dge slong dag ma chags pa dang /_ma zhen pa dang /_rnam par grol bar gyis shig_/gang yang sems can thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad dang /_srog chags thams cad kyi gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]ba yin zhing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_
[\[156a.2\]]longs spyod che ba/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dU r+ya dang /_shang ka shi la dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor dang /_longs spyod mang ba dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba bsags pa mang ba dang /_bran pho dang /_
[\[156a.3\]]bran mo dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba de dag gi gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_
[\[156a.4\]]yul la dbang ba/_mthu thob pa/_sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par rgyal bas gnas pa de dag gi gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi ba yin zhing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang drang srong nags na gnas pa rtsa ba dang /_
[\[156a.5\]]'bras bu za zhing rtsa ba dang 'bras bu la spyod pa/_rtsa ba dang /_'bras bus 'tsho zhing gnas pa de dag gi gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'thab 
[\[156a.6\]]bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams te/_de dag gi gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi ba yin zhing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang gzugs can gyi lha rnams te/_bsam 
[\[156a.7\]]gtan dang po thob pa/_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen te/_de dag gi yang gson pa'i mtha' 'chi ba yin zhing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa'i lha rnams te/_'od 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal ba ste/_de dag gi yang gson pa'i mtha' 'chi ba yin zhing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang bsam gtan gsum pa thob pa'i lha rnams te/_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge 
[\[156b.2\]]dang /_dge rgyas pa ste/_de dag gi gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi ba yin zhing mthar yang 'chi bar 'gyur te/_/skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang bsam gtan bzhi pa thob pa'i lha rnams te/_sprin med dang /_bsod nams 'phel dang /_'bras bu che ba 
[\[156b.3\]]dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams te/_de dag gi gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi ba yin zhing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur 
[\[156b.4\]]ba med do/_/gang yang gzugs med pa'i lha rnams te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar gtogs pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar gtogs pa dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar gtogs pa dang /_'du shes med 'du 
[\[156b.5\]]shes med min skye mched du nye bar gtogs pa'i lha rnams te/_de dag gi gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi ba yin zhing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_/skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_
[\[156b.6\]]khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa de rnams kyang yid du 'ong ba'i lus spong bar byed pa'i chos can 
[\[156b.7\]]no/_/gang yang rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu dang /_tshogs na spyod pa bdag nyid gcig pu 'dul bar byed cing bdag nyid zhi bar byed pa/_bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa de rnams kyang yid du 'ong ba'i lus spong bar byed pa'i chos can no/_/gang yang de 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba/_sku la sred med kyi stobs brtan pa 'dus pa/_seng ge'i 
[\[157a.2\]]sgra yang dag par sgrogs pa de rnams kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sku spong bar mdzad pa'i chos can no/_/dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_rdza mkhan gyis snod rnams byas pa ni so btang ba'am/_so ma btang ba de dag thams cad kyang 'jig pa dang /_mthar zad par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 
[\[157a.3\]]de bzhin du sems can thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad dang /_srog chags thams cad kyi gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin zhing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_skyes nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_/bde bar 
[\[157a.4\]]gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pa gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag_/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/_/skye nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste/_/de bas nye bar zhi ba bde/_/de ltar rab tu 'bar ba la/_/dgar byar ci yod mgur 
[\[157a.5\]]ci yod/_/mun pa'i nang du zhugs gnas pa/_/ci phyir sgron ma tshol mi byed/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo rdzogs so//_//_
[\[157a.6\]{D311}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya saM dz+nyA na e ka da sha ni ra de sha sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa'i mdo/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad 
[\[157a.7\]]kyi nye 'khor shing sA la zung gi tshal na bzhugs te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag na ma 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dge slong gis 'du shes bcu gcig mngon du bya'o/_/bcu gcig gang zhe na/_'di la ma chags pa'i 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]'du shes dang /_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i 'du shes dang /_'khon du 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su dor ba'i 'du shes dang /_'chal ba'i tshul khrims thams cad bshags pa'i 'du shes dang /_tshul khrims thams cad yang dag par blang ba'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[157b.2\]]nyes pa chen po byas pa dag la yang yang ba'i 'du shes dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dag la che ba'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten pha rol dag la 'jigs pa med pa'i 'du shes dang /_'dus byas thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_chos thams cad la bdag med pa'i 'du 
[\[157b.3\]]shes dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam pa'i 'du shes mngon du bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'du shes bcu gcig bstan 
[\[157b.4\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal chems rdzogs so//[ {D312}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bai shA lI pra be sha ma hA sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[157b.5\]]sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[157b.6\]]bo yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul br-i dzir rgyu zhing gshegs te/_yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/_yangs pa'i grong

[\[158a.1\]]'di dag smros shig_/bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/_rang sangs rgyas kyis bsams pa/_dgra bcom pa thams

[\[158b.6\]]chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni 'grub bo/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni 'grub bo/_/gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/_/rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing /_/thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/_/khyed

[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]mdzad de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yis/_/thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/_sems 
[\[159a.2\]]can kun gyi rten gyur cing /_/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/_/gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/_/gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo

[\[159a.7\]]gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog_/khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog_/nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing /_/khyed cag kun tu bde legs 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/_/yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/_/sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cing /_/snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/_/sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/dgra bcom 
[\[159b.2\]]slob pa'i bden tshig gis/_/'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/_/grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/_/bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig_/thams cad nad rnams med par shog_/kun gyis 
[\[159b.3\]]bzang rnams mthong gyur cig_/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing /_/sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[159b.4\]]stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas/_gsang sngags gzhi dag dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/

[\[159b.6\]]cad kyis bsams pa/_nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_chos thams cad kyis bsams pa/_tshangs pas bsams pa/_tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/_'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/_dbang 
[\[159b.7\]]pos bsams pa/_lhas bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/_lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/mun ts+tsha ta/_mun ts+tsha ta/_yams kyi nad rnams zhi bar gyur cig_/ni ra gats+tsha ta/_ni ra gats+tsha ta/_ni ra gats+tsha ta/_ni ra gats+tsha ta/_sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/_lha'i bla ma gshegs shing /_
[\[160a.2\]]dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong /_lha stong phrag du ma dag dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po 
[\[160a.3\]]rnams dang /_lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong /_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ong ste/_de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/_ni ra gats+tsha ta/_ni ra gats+tsha ta/_
[\[160a.4\]]ni ra gats+tsha ta/_ni ra gats+tsha ta/_myur du byer cig_/khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig_/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig_/lus la

[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]rA/_/kang ka rA/_/kang ka rA/_/kang ka rA/_/kang ka rA+o tI ti/_ku ri sho/_kang ka rA/_/kang ka ri shi/_ri ri ri ri ri ri/_ti ri ta phu swa/_/ri phu/_ri phu/_ri phu/_ri phu/_ri phu/_ri phu/_ri phu/_ri phu/_nA thA/_nA nA thA thA/_ri pU/_ri pU/_nA thA thA/_ni ra gats+tsha ta/_ni ra gats+tsha ta/_ri pu/_
[\[160b.2\]]ri pu/_ni ra gats+tsha ta/_pa lA yA ta/_ri pU ri pU/_pa la yA tA/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/_sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/_/byams pa la gnas pa/_thugs rje dang ldan pa/_dga' ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms 
[\[160b.3\]]la gnas pa gshegs kyis/_k+Shi phran ni ra gats+tsha ta swA hA/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang /_chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/gang la 
[\[160b.4\]]ser sna rnams chags pa/_/rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing /_/thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/_/thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing /_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/_/khyed la bde 
[\[160b.5\]]legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/_/thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bu gcig bzhin du rtag 
[\[160b.6\]]bskyangs te/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing /_/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/_/gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' 
[\[160b.7\]]la/_/gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas/_/phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing /_/don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/_/
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing /_/sems can thams cad rab dga' de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/_/sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing /_/bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/_/khyed la bde legs 
[\[161a.2\]]mdzad par 'gyur/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsungs pa/_/thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/_/thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing /_/tshogs 
[\[161a.3\]]kun dbang du mdzad pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/_/brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang /_/'byung po kun kyang bde legs ni/_/khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang /_/lha rnams 
[\[161a.4\]]kyi ni bsams pa yis/_/khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/_/don de de ring 'grub gyur cig_/rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong rnams kyang bde legs shog_/nyin mo bde 
[\[161a.5\]]legs mtshan bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing /_/khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/_/yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/_/sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig_/
[\[161a.6\]]snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/_/sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/_/'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/_/grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/'byung po kun dang khyed cag 
[\[161a.7\]]kun/_/bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig_/thams cad nad rnams med par shog_/kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig_/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing /_/sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]la rtag tu byams byed shog_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po rdzogs so//_/[{D313}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya b+ha dra ka rA trI nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_
[\[161b.2\]]'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe dge 
[\[161b.3\]]slong zhig rgyal po'i khab kyi chu ta po ta'i 'gram na 'dug go/_/de nas lha kha dog mchog dang ldan pa zhig nam sros nas dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chu ta po ta'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par snang bar byas te/_dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[161b.4\]]dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/_lha khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan 
[\[161b.5\]]mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so/_/lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba da ltar su mchis/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyis/_khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la 
[\[161b.6\]]zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung la brtson par gyis shig ces smras nas/_lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong de nang par langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[161b.7\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mdang dgung rmongs nas bdag gi der lha kha dog mchog dang ldan pa zhig bdag ga la ba 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]der mchis te/_chab ta po ta'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par snang bar bgyis nas bdag la 'di skad mchi'o/_/dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/_bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis so/_/lha bdag gis ni mtshan 
[\[162a.2\]]mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/_lha khyod kyis lta mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/_de 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so/_/lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba da ltar su mchis/_
[\[162a.3\]]de 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyis/_khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung la brtson par gyis 
[\[162a.4\]]shig ces smras nas/_lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'di'i don yongs su zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod kyis lha de shes sam/_dge slong des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis 
[\[162a.5\]]lha de ma 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi sde dpon te/_tsan dan zhes bya'o/_/dge slong des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde thos par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[162a.6\]]pa/_dge slong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong chos gsum dang ldan na dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa la rjes su phrad 
[\[162a.7\]]par mi byed pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa la re ba med pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs par gnas pa'i chos can te/_chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsung ngo /_/'das la rjes su phrad mi byed/_/ma 'ongs pa la re ba med/_/'das pa gang yin de 'gags te/_/ma 'ongs de ni ma phyin pa'o/_/gang dag da ltar byung ba'i chos/_/de dang de la rab 
[\[162b.2\]]bltas nas/_/rnam par rtog pas mi 'phrogs par/_/de dag thams cad khong du chud/_/sang tsam shi yang su shes kyis/_/de ring nyid du brtun te bya/_/'chi bdag sde chen de dang ni/_/bdag tu bshes pa ma yin no/_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/'byung po 
[\[162b.3\]]kun dang thams cad kyang /_/bde ba 'ba' zhig grub gyur te/_/thams cad nyon mongs med par shog_/thams cad bzang po mthong gyur te/_/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig_/de ltar gnas shing rab brtson la/_/nyin mtshan snyom las med pas na/_/de phyir mtshan 
[\[162b.4\]]mo bzang po yi/_/mdo sde thub pas rtag tu gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo 'di bshad nas 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/_/ta t+ya thA/_bi ni b+ha ra di/_bi ri ni/_bi 
[\[162b.5\]]ra ni/_bud d+ha ma har tA na d+he/_ma hi ni mi na ni/_ni ni ni ni/_ti ti ti ti/_bi ra ti/_gau ri/_gan d+ha ri/_tsan Da li/_ma tang gi/_pu ka si/_bran+ha ni/_dra mi Di/_dra mi Di/_shA b+ha di/_sa dA lam b+he/_hi nA ma t+ya ma ud ta ra ni/_ma ho la na/_da la b+ha ni/_da lA b+ha dre/_ma hA da lA ni/_
[\[162b.6\]]tsa lA ni/_A b+he tsakra b+ha ki/_ma hA tsa kra b+ha ki/_sha ba ri/_sha ba ri/_ma hA sha ba ri/_b+hu tsid gi ni/_b+hu tsi ring gi ni/_ni mi ni ming gi ni/_ni min d+ha ri b+hu tA ni swAhA/_ta t+ya thA/_e tu tu tu/_na tu mi rni/_ke rni ing ku/_sud ta ri tsa la la/_na ra ta/_na ra ma lu lu/_ga lu lu/_
[\[162b.7\]]a ba tra no ne/_sho ka ni ra/_b+ha ra d+ha sa le/_ta ra kre ta re d+hA tu/_nod tu/_ta la lA lu/_ba ta b+ha ti/_ya b+ha ti ye swA hA/_ta t+ya thA/_a ra kA te/_na ra kA te/_baM su ka/_ba yai ye/_ka po ta ka ba yai ye ta b+ho ta ne swA hA/_dge slong rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]zhig gis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'di'i don dang /_tshig dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_'gro lding ba'i sngags kyi gzhi 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_yid la byed dam/_kun chub par byed dam/_

[\[163a.3\]]'das par nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skyes par yang /_/mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo bklags na/_/skye ba dran dang dgra bcom dang /_/dbang phyug tu yang nges par 'gyur/_/lan cig gis ni gnas kun tu/_/dus min 'chi dang bar ma dor/_/bdag gis 
[\[163a.4\]]bdag la mi sbyor bar/_/dus min 'chi dang chos ma yin/_/sems can thams cad srung zhing sel/_/nad dang mya ngan 'jigs skye dang /_/rmi lam mi shis mya ngan du/_/brjod na dpal du byed par 'gyur/_/gang gis bris te skyes pa dang /_/bud med lus la btags na ni/_/
[\[163a.5\]]skal pa bzang dang gzi brjid dang /_/de yi dpal yang skye bar 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis su/_/mi dge cung zad gang byas pa/_/de dag thams cad bzang po'i mdos/_/dus ma yin par 'chi las skyob/_/rgyal po chu dang me dang glog_/chom po nad dang dgra dag 
[\[163a.6\]]dang /_/g.yul sprod pa dang 'thab par yang /_/bzang po dran na skyob par byed/_/rig pa bzang po 'di dang ni/_/gsang sngags 'di dag rtag brjod na/_/mi dag mi zhum dus kun tu/_/de bas 'di ni yid kyis brjod/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de 
[\[163a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal nas rig sngags 'di dag brjod par bya ste/_rig sngags 'dis bdag 'byor par gyur cig_/ta t+ya thA/_ni mi ni min d+ha re/_te mi ni min d+ha re/_ti mi ti ming ga li/_trai lo ka a 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]ba lo ka ni/_tri shu la d+ha ra Na/_a ku phi ni/_kri mI kri ti/_ki li ki li/_kud to kud to/_kud to kud si/_kurti ku pi ti/_bdag dang sems can thams cad lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig tu 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_dug thams cad dang /_
[\[163b.2\]]rims thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_gdug pas zin pa thams cad dang /_chom rkun thams cad dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_'thab pa dang /_rnyog pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_
[\[163b.3\]]rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba thams cad dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis ngan par spyad pa thams cad dang /_thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig_/srungs shig_/ta t+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_tsi li/_i li/_mi li/_pi sha tsi pA r+Na sha 
[\[163b.4\]]ba ri tsi li tsi li swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_gnod 
[\[163b.5\]]sbyin chen po dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[163b.6\]{D314}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ta mo ba na mu kha nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_mun gyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod 
[\[163b.7\]]pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas de'i tshe ngam grog gsum po zhes bya ba'i ljongs kyi skye bo dag gi nang nas ri khrod kyi grong zhig na/_bram ze la ba can zhes bya ba spun bu 'dod pa'i phyir bram ze'i rdo leb la dka' thub byed de/
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]lha stong phrag brgya la bu slong zhing gsol ba 'debs pa dang la ba can la bu btsas pa ni ming rab mthong zhes btags so/_/nu bo la btsas pa ni dga' bo zhes btags so/_/gang gi nyin mo rab mthong btsas pa de'i nyin mo bram ze lnga brgya la bu lnga brgya btsas te/_de 
[\[164a.2\]]dag rim bzhin du bu cher skyes pa dang /_rab mthong la sogs pa lnga brgya lhan cig tu rig pa dag slob pa na/_rab mthong la sogs pa rig pa'i gnas thams cad kyi pha rol tu son cing thams cad rdzogs par yang dag par byang bar gyur la/_bsod nams kyi tshogs yang 
[\[164a.3\]]dag pa las byung ba'i spyod pa mtshungs pa med pa stong phrag brgya snyed thob ste/_dbang byed pa gang gi dus su bram ze ma Na ba gcig yul dbus nas 'ongs te phyin nas phrad pa dang /_de la gsong por smras te gtam dag kyang byas nas nges par gang nas 'ongs pa yin zhes dris 
[\[164a.4\]]pa dang /_des smras pa yul dbus nas 'ongs pa yin te de yang grong khyer chen po drug go/_/de'i nang dag na tshad ma drug la mkhas shing ltas kyi bya ba drug la thogs pa med par brjod nus pa'i ston pa bco brgyad yod de de na chu klung yang 'bab bo/_/de ma yin pa bsod 
[\[164a.5\]]nams chen po dang ldan pa/_dge zhing shis pa/_'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de na'o zhes byas pa dang /_rab mthong gis sgra de thos pa dang /_ba spu langs yid g.yos rab tu dga' ste der 'gro'o snyam nas/_pha'i gan du song ste 
[\[164a.6\]]phyin nas yab bdag ni yul dbus su mchi'o/_/de nas mu stegs pa dag las rgyal bar bgyi'o/_/mkhas par bgrangs pa dag dang nges par lhan cig smra bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_phas de ltar gnang ngo /_/de nas bsod nams chen po sbyin pas dbang 
[\[164a.7\]]phyug chen po dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la gtong ba chen po can de lha dag gis bsrungs pa zhig pas lha dag nye bar 'ong zhing sngon du 'gro ste/_rab mthong chen po la mchod pa byos shig dang /_phan yon mang po dag gi 'bras bu chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]zhes sgra sgrogs shing song ba dang /_rim gyis lha dang mis mchod pa byas shing mnyan yod du phyin no/_/de nas lam gyis dub pa rta bstis te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 
[\[164b.2\]]'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan pa mdzad de/_de'i 'khor lnga brgya po dag lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa bshig bcom ste/_bden pa mthong ste de nyid du rab tu byung dge slong gi dngos po bzung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom nas dgra 
[\[164b.3\]]bcom pa mngon du byas te dga' bo ni ma gtogs so/_/skye bo mang po kun gyis kyang chos khong du chud do/_/ston pa chen po rab mthong lta ba'i phyir lha la sogs pa dag kyang 'ongs te der phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[164b.4\]]dag dge slong rab mthong 'di ni nga'i dge slong dang dge slong dag gi nyan thos dag la ji ltar lha dang mi mchod pa byed pa de dag gi nang na lha dang mis mchod par bya ba'i mchog ni dge slong rab mthong yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/de nas dus de nyid du mi 
[\[164b.5\]]mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_dri za'i rgyal po dang /_grul bum gyi sde dpon chen po la sogs pa rang rang gi gnas nas song ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[164b.6\]]rab mthong chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de mngon du phyogs thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye btsun pa rab mthong chen po sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i gnas rang sangs 
[\[164b.7\]]rgyas kyi bzhugs gnas/_'dod chags dang bral ba dag gis gnas par bya ba drang srong gi gnas su gyur/_de kho na nyid nges par mkhyen nas 'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]de'i tshe dge slong gsal ba zhes bya ba lha dang mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de'i gnas kyang 'di lags te/_yul dbus las byang phyogs kyi sa mtshams kyi ri dung gi lte ba zhes bya ba ni ri de la rtswa'i rigs dung gi lte ba 'dra ba skye bas dung gi lte ba'i ri zhes bya bar 
[\[165a.2\]]btags par gyur/_ri de dang nye ba na nags shig na klu mo e ni zhes bya ba gnas pas ai ni'i nags zhes bya bar btags par gyur/_de na phug cig yod pa dang nye bar shing pa ti li zhes bya ba skye bas pa ti li'i phug ces btags par gyur pa de nyid du bcom ldan 'das yang 
[\[165a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba/_'khor dgra bcom pa brgyad khri dang gshegs shing thabs cig tu bzhugs par gyur/_dge slong gsal ba yang de nyid na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang rim pa bzhin du mya ngan 
[\[165a.4\]]las 'das/_bstan pa nub nas rang sangs rgyas bdun khri dag mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa dag mnyam du byung ste gshegs shing bzhugs par gyur/_rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das nas drang srong drug khri mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag kyang de 
[\[165a.5\]]nyid du gnas par gyur to/_/btsun pa rab mthong chen po de nas yang bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig na bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i dge slong rab gsal zhes bya ba lha dang mis mchod pa'i 
[\[165a.6\]]mchog tu gyur pa yang de nyid na'o/_/mtshams kyi ri de nyid la rtswa'i rigs ro hi tI zhes bya ba skye bas ro hi tI'i ri zhes bya bar btags par gyur/_klu mo gos med ces bya ba gnas pas gos med kyi nags zhes bya bar btags par gyur/_shing shir sha skye bas shing shir sha'i

[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]gshegs shing bzhugs par gyur/_rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das nas drang srong lnga khri yang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de 'di nyid na gnas par gyur to/_/btsun pa rab mthong chen po de nas yang bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig na yang dag par 
[\[165b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i dge slong chos gsal zhes bya ba lha dang mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yang de nyid na'o/_/mtshams kyi ri de la rtswa rigs b+ha sa b+ha sa zhes bya ba skye bas b+ha sa b+ha'i ri zhes btags par gyur/_

[\[165b.5\]]gyur to/_/'dir ni btsun pa rab mthong chen po sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i dge slong chos ldan zhes bya ba lha dang mis

[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]khri yang de na gnas par gyur to/_/'dir ni btsun pa rab mthong chen po sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo sum khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i dge slong

[\[169a.1\]]po lha dang mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du bdag kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la lha dang mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/des na da ltar lha dang mis mchod pa'i mchog tu

[\[169a.6\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim gang dag na/_pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang /_legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni tshangs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i

[\[169b.1\]]dpon dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas slob dpon dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mor byed pa dang /_legs par mchod pa byed pa dang /_
[\[169b.2\]]legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag khyim gang dag na 
[\[169b.3\]]pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang /_legs par mchod pa byed pa dang /_legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni mi dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas mi dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[169b.4\]]dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang /_legs par mchod pa byed pa dang /_legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni lha dang ldan pa yin no/_/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas lha dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[169b.5\]]phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/pha ma gnyis ni tshangs pa ste/_/de bzhin dang po slob dpon yin/_/bu yi kun sbyin 'os gyur pa/_/mi yang 
[\[169b.6\]]yin la lha yang yin/_/de phyir de gnyis phyag gi gnas/_/dril ba dang ni khrus rnams dang /_/rkang pa dag kyang bsku ba dang /_/yang na zas dang skom rnams dang /_/gos dang mal stan rnams kyis/_/mkhas pa dag gis bkur sti bya/_/pha ma dag la bkur byas pa/_/des na mkhas pa de 
[\[169b.7\]]dag ni/_/'dir yang smad pa med 'gyur la/_/shi na'ang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/pha ma'i mdo rdzogs so//_//_
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]{D316}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya tsa tUHsat+ya sU tra/_/bod skad du/_'phags pa bden pa bzhi'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das dmar bu can gyi grong khyer dang 
[\[170a.2\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can nub mo nye bar rten cing dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga dang khyed cag kho nas 'phags 
[\[170a.3\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ma shes ma mthong /_khong du ma chud/_so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to/_/bzhi po de gang zhe na/_nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes ma mthong /_khong du ma chud so sor ma 
[\[170a.4\]]rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to/_/nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes ma mthong /_khong du ma chud/_so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to/_/nga dang khyed cag kho 
[\[170a.5\]]nas sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes ma mthong /_khong du ma chud/_so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to/_/nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes ma mthong /_

[\[170a.7\]]sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs te/_srid pa'i sred pa de bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/_da ni srid pa gzhan med do/_/ngas sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs te/_/srid 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]pa'i sred pa de bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/_da ni srid pa gzhan med do/_/ngas sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs te/_srid pa'i sred pa de bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/_da ni srid pa

[\[171a.1\]]rab tu bshad par byas/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces
