[\[200a.3\]]ba stong dag tu/_/lus gtsang gos kyang gtsang ba dang /_/dkar po'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/_/stobs dang brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs/_/de ni le lo med pa dang /_/shin tu bsgrub pa thob par 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor 
[\[200a.4\]]ba byas pas ni/_/brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu yang brtan/_/rtsal brtan cis kyang mi tshugs shing /_/don rnams myur du 'grub par byed/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/_/gdangs snyan gsang yang mtho ba dang /_/yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro can/_/gnod pa med cing 
[\[200a.5\]]nad med 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/_/nga nyid kyis ni bstan pa yi/_/gnas der myur du de 'gro zhing /_/shas cher skye ba thob par 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/_/sems kyi tshad med bzhi po dang /_/
[\[200a.6\]]rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i dbang yang 'thob/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang /_/dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang /_/byang chub yan lag 'bras bu 'thob/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/_/mngon shes drug ldan zag pa 
[\[200a.7\]]med/_/nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yi/_/dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/_/'dod chags zhe sdang spangs pa dang /_/'khor rnams thams cad spangs pa yi/_/rang rgyal byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_/mchod 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]rten bskor ba byas pas ni/_/'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs/_/mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang /_/gser gyi sku mdog 'thob par 'gyur/_/lus kyi las kyang bskor ba yin/_/ngag gi las kyang bskor ba yin/_/yid kyi las kyang bskor ba yin/_/smon 
[\[200b.2\]]lam btab pa'ang bskor ba yin/_/'dir ni bskor ba byas pa yis/_/bgrod dka' bde dgur don rnams 'grub/_/'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la/_/bskor ba byas pa'i yon tan gang /_/de ni tshig tsam nyi tshe yis/_/legs par bstan par mi nus so/_/sems 
[\[200b.3\]]can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/_/sha ri'i bus ni zhus nas kyang /_/mchod rten phyag byas yon tan gang /_/'jig rten mgon pos bstan pa yin/_/rta brgya dang ni gser srang brgya/_/drel mo'i shing rta brgya dag dang /_/rgod ma brgya yi shing rta rnams/_/rin chen sna 
[\[200b.4\]]tshogs bkang ba yang /_/bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/kam po dza yi bu mo brgya/_/nor bu rna cha gdub 'khor thogs/_/gser gyi dpung rgyan 'chang ba dang /_/mgrin pa gser gyis legs brgyan pa/_/bskor ba'i gom pa gcig 
[\[200b.5\]]bor ba'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/gangs kyi glang chen brgya snyed dag_/lus chen nam tshong yangs pa dang /_/sna yang gshol mda' 'dra ba'i glang /_/gser dang nor bus brgyan pa yang /_/bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/
[\[200b.6\]]mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa gcig bor ba/_/'dzam bu'i chu klung gser srang 'bum grangs snyed/_/de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/_/mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis 
[\[200b.7\]]'jim gong gcig bor ba/_/'dzam bu'i chu klung gser gyi pho brang 'bum/_/de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/_/mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog sil ma spungs/_/'dzam bu'i chu klung gser snod 'bum bzhag pa/_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/_/mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba thogs/_/'dzam bu'i chu klung gser khal bye ba gnyis/_/de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/_/mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas 
[\[201a.2\]]mchod rten la/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis spos chus dbang bskur ba/_/'dzam bu'i chu klung gser gyi phung po 'bum/_/de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/_/mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis mar me 'bul byed pa/_/'dzam bu'i 
[\[201a.3\]]chu klung gser srang bye ba 'bum/_/de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/_/mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs thogs/_/gser gyi ri bo lhun po tshad 'bum yang /_/de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma 
[\[201a.4\]]yin/_/'di ni dpag med de bzhin gshegs/_/rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/ded dpon bla na med pa la/_/phul ba'i phan yon bstan pa yin/_/bzhugs pa'i tshe na gang gis mchod/_/mya ngan 'das 'og gang gis mchod/_/sems dge ba ni mtshungs 
[\[201a.5\]]'gyur na/_/bsod nams la ni khyad par med/_/de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/_/bsam mi khyab la dad rnams kyis/_/rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/_/mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//_//_
[\[201a.6\]{D322}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pra se na dzi ta gA thA/_bod skad du/_gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gdugs dang cod pan dang /_/rnga yab ral gri nor bu lham bzhag ste/_/thal mo sbyar te legs 
[\[201a.7\]]par phyag 'tshal nas/_/'jig rten mgon po la ni zhu ba zhus/_/phan par dgongs pa thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams mya ngan 'das pa na/_/mchod pa bgyis pas blo mchog ji lta bur/_/srid pa gzhan du mi rnams bde ba 'thob/_/bcom ldan 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]mi yi seng ge snga phyi'i mtha'i/_/chos rnams kun la mngon sum spyad gyur pas/_/kun dga' bzang po yi ni mngon sum du/_/gsal rgyal zhus lan 'di dag bka' stsal pa/_/ji ltar rgyal ba dag la mi rnams kyis/_/mchod pa byas pas srid pa gzhan dag tu/_/rnam smin 'dod 
[\[201b.2\]]pa sna tshogs ci thob pa/_/zhus pa'i don de rgyal pos mnyan par gyis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten rnams dang ni/_/sku gzugs rnams la rdul phran ci song ba/_/de yi grangs snyed de byed mi rnams kyis/_/lha yul sa stengs nges par rgyal srid 'thob/_/gzugs dang 
[\[201b.3\]]gzugs med khams kyi ting nge 'dzin/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i sa mchog kun myong nas/_/tha mar skye dang rgal sogs pa yi/_/sdug bsngal med pa'i sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob/_/su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs byed pa/_/de dag gzugs bzang yid 'ong yon 
[\[201b.4\]]tan ldan/_/dbang po bsdams shing 'od 'bar nyi ma bzhin/_/'jig rten dag na mig tu sdug par 'gyur/_/su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa/_/de yi lus ni dri ma med pa dang /_/pad ma'i snying po lta bur 'jam zhing yangs/_/nad dang mya ngan sdug bsngal 'jigs 
[\[201b.5\]]las thar/_/su zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs byed pa/_/bran du mi skye mngag gzhug skye mi 'gyur/_/dbul bor mi 'gyur rigs dman mi 'gyur zhing /_/dbang po rnams kyang nyams par yang mi 'gyur/_/thub dbang mchod rten byed pa'i mi rnams ni/_/mya ngan yongs 
[\[201b.6\]]med lus kun brtan pa dang /_/longs spyod mchog ldan rin chen mdzod mang ldan/_/dgra yi tshogs rnams kyang ni thub par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten srog shing phul ba yis/_/chos dang rjes 'thun chos la sgrub pa dang /_/tshul khrims thos dang bzod pa'i mchog dang ldan/_/
[\[201b.7\]]'jig rten dag na don kun 'grub par 'gyur/_/mchod rten mchog la gdugs brtsegs phul ba yis/_/lha dang mi yi nang na skye ba dang /_/sred med bu yi lus 'dra lus kun brtan/_/bkur sti bya ba'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur/_/thub dbang mchod rten rdo thal byugs pa yis/_/lha 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]mi'i 'jig rten dag na tshe ring zhing /_/lus sems nad dang mya ngan byed spangs te/_/rtag tu skyid cing nor gyis phyug par 'gyur/_/gser dngul spa ba'i glegs mos g.yogs pa yi/_/thub pa'i dbang po'i mchod rten byas pa yis/_/mi rnams srid pa'i khyad par gzhan 
[\[202a.2\]]dag tu/_/lus mkhregs 'od kyang 'bar zhing mdzes par 'gyur/_/su dag la la mchod rten sku gzugs la/_/dad pa'i sems kyis bla re 'bul byed pa/_/de dag sa steng rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa/_/ma lus gnod med rgyal gcig dbang byed 'gyur/_/bde gshegs 
[\[202a.3\]]mchod rten dag la dga' bzhin du/_/rnam mang rgya chen gdugs ni btags pa yis/_/lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na gdugs 'dra bar/_/lha dang mi yi dbang po lta bur 'gyur/_/mi rnams su dag sku gdung snying po can/_/dri med bsod nams 'byung gnas gyur pa la/_/ba dan 
[\[202a.4\]]mdzes pa sna tshogs 'dogs pa dag_/mthu dang ldan zhing srid gsum mchod gnas 'gyur/_/bde gshegs mchod rten cod pan btags pa yis/_/mi dbang dpal dang lha dbang dpal thob cing /_/bde ba'i mchog kyang nyams su myong gyur nas/_/rnam par grol ba'i cod 
[\[202a.5\]]pan khyad par 'thob/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la dril phul bas/_/tshig btsan grags pa chen po dag dang ldan/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong skye ba dran/_/de dag gis ni rgyan rnams sna tshogs 'thob/_/mkhas pa su dag bde gshegs mchod rten la/_/dad 
[\[202a.6\]]pa'i sems kyis phreng ba 'dogs byed pa/_/gser phreng rin chen mang pos legs spras pa/_/bsod nams las ldan de yi mgo la thogs/_/ston pa'i mchod rten dag la rgyan 'phyang 'dogs/_/de dag do shal rgyan phreng nor bu dang /_/gdu bu dag dang dpung rgyan mchog 
[\[202a.7\]]rnams kyis/_/lus brgyan 'jig rten dag na rgyu bar 'gyur/_/su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/_/sa dang lci bas nyug pa de dag ni/_/lha dang mir skye lus mdog sdug pa dang /_/rnam dag rma med bde dang ldan par 'gyur/_/thub dbang mchod rten byi dor byas pa yis/_/
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]shin tu blta na sdug cing mig tu mdzes/_/byad bzhin bzang zhing pad mo'i mdog dang ldan/_/srid pa'i skyon rnams dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur/_/su dag spos mchog sbyar ba'i 'bru mar gyis/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten nyug byed pa/_/de dag spos kyis mchod cing tsan dan 
[\[202b.2\]]gyis/_/lus byugs nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams gang dag thub dbang mchod rten la/_/spos chu gtsang zhing dang bas khrus gsol ba/_/de dag lus la dri ma med pa dang /_/gdung ba med cing mdog 'jam mya ngan med/_/su zhig sangs rgyas mchod rten sku gzugs khang /_/
[\[202b.3\]]tshon rtsi sna tshogs dag gis mdzes byed pa/_/de ni bde gshegs mnga' ba'i yon tan rnams/_/sna tshogs ldan pa kun gyis brtsegs par 'gyur/_/su dag dpyid ka'i dus su gtsang ma'i chus/_/mchod rten nye 'khor rdul rnams zhi byed pa/_/de la bud med rnams ni dga' bzhin du/_/
[\[202b.4\]]rdul yab gser gyi yu ba can gyis g.yob/_/dkon mchog gsum phyir mi rnams gang dag gis/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pas ni/_/rkang lag sor mo dra bar 'brel ba dang /_/yan lag thams cad kyang ni skyon med 'gyur/_/su dag dkon mchog gsum 
[\[202b.5\]]la me tog dang /_/'bras bu gsar thog byung ba 'bul byed pa/_/de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/_/ro mchog kun thob mi rdzi stobs dang ldan/_/phreng ba me tog rgya chen char rnams kyis/_/su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs la mchod/_/de dag lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du/_/
[\[202b.6\]]cha byad yid 'ong sna tshogs legs par brgyan/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la dri zhim phul/_/bdug spos rgya chen mang po ldan sbyar dang /_/a ga ru yi bdug spos phul ba yis/_/de yi lus kun spos ngad ldan par 'gyur/_/su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/_/dga' bzhin rnga 
[\[202b.7\]]yab rnams ni 'bul byed pa/_/thugs dga' rgyal rnams snying rje rnga yab thogs/_/che ba de la cher yang g.yob par byed/_/shin tu dri med zla ba nya 'dra ba'i/_/me long sdu gu thams cad mkhyen la 'bul/_/de dag tshe rabs brgyud pa rnams su yang /_/lha mi rnams kyis blta bar 'os par 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]'gyur/_/su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/_/mchod pa'i khyad par ci yod ci 'byor pa/_/'tsham par 'bul byed de dag dri med cing /_/mya ngan med pa'i bla med byang chub 'thob/_/mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas mchod rten nam/_/sku gzugs dag la mgos btud 
[\[203a.2\]]gus phyag 'tshal/_/de dag lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyis/_/cher yang che bar bkur ba'i gnas su 'gyur/_/su zhig dad pas thub pa'i mchod rten nam/_/sku gzugs dag la skor ba byed pa de/_/phyi ma'i tshe la dgra chen rnams kyis btud/_/bzang po'i snod 'gyur yon tan 
[\[203a.3\]]rnams dang ldan/_/mi rnams su dag dga' bzhin gus pa yis/_/bla med mchod rten rnams dang sku gzugs la/_/lus kyi las rnams byed pa de dag ni/_/srid pa kun tu mdzod rnams shin tu rgyas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten rol mo'i sgra phul bas/_/zab cing rigs pa'i spobs pa phun 
[\[203a.4\]]sum tshogs/_/yan lag lnga rdzogs yid 'ong tshig dang ldan/_/sgra skad dag gis 'jig rten 'gengs par byed/_/su dag rgyal ba'i gdung ldan stod byed pa/_/de dag gling bu'i sgra dang glu snyan dang /_/sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba thob pa dang /_/so so yang dag rig pa'ang thob par 'gyur/_/mi 
[\[203a.5\]]rnams gang dag rtswa shing so phag gis/_/'jig rten bla ma'i spyi gab rig pas byed/_/yang na gzhan dag byed du 'jug kyang rung /_/de dag 'gro ba rnams kyi skyabs 'drar 'gyur/_/mi rnams gang dag rgyal ba'i gtsang khang byed/_/de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/_/lha dbang gnas 
[\[203a.6\]]'dra'i khang khyim 'od 'bar ba/_/dus tshigs kun tu bde ldan thob par 'gyur/_/mtho ris las bzang 'bras bu'i gnas rnams su/_/bskal par dga' byed rtag tu dga' bzhin du/_/rtsen par byed cing mya ngan med pa dang /_/tha mar zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/gang dag 
[\[203a.7\]]'ja' khugs 'dra ba'i rta babs mdzes/_/thub pa'i chab sgor sbreng byed de dag ni/_/srid pa gzhan du khang khyim sgo dang bcas/_/rnam par brgyan pa rnams ni thob par 'gyur/_/mi rnams gang dag ston pa'i sku gdung khang /_/bsrung phyir dad pas 'obs dang sgo 'dzugs 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]pa/_/de dag tshe rabs gzhan du dgra rnams kyis/_/dpal yon rnams dang dbral bar yong mi nus/_/mi rnams su dag mchod rten rnying pa rnams/_/gzhan gyi ngor byed ma yin rang gi blos/_/ral tshems byed pa'i skye bo de dag ni/_/lus bzang yon tan dam pas brgyan par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[203b.2\]]mchod rten me tog rnying bsal bas/_/'dod chags chags med zhe sdang sdang mi 'gyur/_/gti mug rmongs med lta ngan chags mi 'gyur/_/mi rnams rab tu dga' zhing skyid par 'gyur/_/su dag glang chen dril spyangs spa bar brgyan/_/dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta dag_/ston pa dang ni 
[\[203b.3\]]'phags pa'i tshogs la 'bul/_/de dag bla med theg chen thob par 'gyur/_/skye bo su dag 'jig rten mgon po la/_/rin chen 'bar ba yid dang 'thad pa rnams/_/'bul ba de dag rin chen bdun po dang /_/byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med 'thob/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten la 
[\[203b.4\]]ni gos phul bas/_/bsod nams byams pa'i ngo tsha'i gos gyon te/_/dga' zhing yon tan kun ldan ser sna med/_/mdog kyang 'jam zhing kha dog gser 'drar 'gyur/_/dpe med mchod rten mar me phul ba yis/_/ud pal sngon po kha bye 'dab 'dra'i mig_/gsal zhing sdug la 
[\[203b.5\]]mig gi dkyus ring mdzes/_/dri ma med pa'i lha yi mig dang ldan/_/su dag mchod rten mar me dang rab 'bul/_/de dag mig tu sdug cing mdzod rab rgyas/_/mig gi dkyus ring mthon ka'i mdog dang ldan/_/skyes pa bud med dag gis blta bar 'os/_/mtshan mo thub chen spyan sngar 
[\[203b.6\]]thal sbyar 'khod/_/'byor dang mtshan ma mar me'i sdong bu 'bu 'bul/_/de dag srid pa gzhan du 'bras bur ldan/_/rin chen rags pa'i 'od ldan lus kyang 'thob/_/rgyal la phul ba'i mar me 'chi ba na/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis 'dir ni dga' bzhin du/_/snying po skul bar byed 
[\[203b.7\]]pa de dag ni/_/spyan lnga dag kyang nges par 'thob par 'gyur/_//mi rnams gang dag dge ba'i sems ldan pas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten gzhan gyis byas pa la/_/rjes su yi rangs don de ma byas kyang /_/mdor na de dag gis kyang byas par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims ldan pa phyogs 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]nas lhags pa la/_/su dag dga' bzhin mal stan sbyin byed pa'i/_/mi rnams 'gro ba dag tu 'khor ba na/_/gser gyi khri dang stan gyi mchog rnams 'thob/_/su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi/_/kha zas bzang po dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/_/de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par 
[\[204a.2\]]gnas pa na/_/kha zas kha dog ro la sogs ldan 'thob/_/su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi/_/btung ba rgya chen dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/_/de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na/_/btung ba kha dog ro la sogs pa 'thob/_/su dag 'jig rten bla mas gsungs pa yi/_/dam chos tshul bzang 
[\[204a.3\]]thos nas nyams su len/_/de dag nyon mongs chu rlabs rab 'jigs pa'i/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho myur du rgal bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po dge ba'i las 'di thams cad ni/_/'khor ba'i bde ba sna tshogs smin gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub dam pa yi/_/'bras bu bde blag kho nar thob par 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[204a.4\]]rgyal po dga' mdangs ldan pa yis/_/drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/thub dbang zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_/rgyal po rgyal byed tshal nas byung bar gyur/_/gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//[ {D323}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_e ka gA thA/_/bod skad du/_
[\[204a.5\]]tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dra'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul sa la med/_/'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang yod ma yin/_/lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang yod min phyogs 
[\[204a.6\]]dang phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med/_/ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas pa kun tu yul zhig ga la yod/_/tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs so//[ {D324}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsa tur gA thA/_/bod skad du/_tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 
[\[204a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/skur gyur pa ni thams cad la/_/mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis mnga' ba/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa'i/_/rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdzogs sangs gang du bltams pa dang /_/gang du byang chub la reg dang /_/zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/zag med 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang /_/'chag pa dang ni bzhengs pa dang /_/seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi/_/gnas de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/steng dang 'og dang bar dag dang /_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang /_/sku bcas sku ni med pa 
[\[204b.2\]]yi/_/mchod rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/rkang gnyis dam pa shar dang ni/_/byang gi phyogs char bzhugs pa yi/_/rgyal ba bsten dka' zhes bya ba/_/des ni tshigs bcad 'di gsungs so/_/gang gis tshigs bcad 'di bzhi yis/_/de bzhin gshegs la stod byed pa/_/de ni tshe 
[\[204b.3\]]rabs stong du yang /_/ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs so//[ {D325}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_nA ga rA dza b+he rI gA thA/_/bod skad du/_klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[204b.4\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rab bstan pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i rabs/_/thams cad legs par 'dus nas su/_/shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis nyon/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha yi lha/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/_/
[\[204b.5\]]dge slong rnams ni gcig la gcig_/kha stobs la sogs rnams kyis 'gying /_/dge slong tshig ngan 'don pa da ga_/drang srong chen pos gsan pa na/_/de phyir thub pas dge 'dun rnams/_/bsdus nas 'di skad bka' stsal te/_/khyed cag kha stobs la sogs pas/_/
[\[204b.6\]]gcig la gcig ni 'tshe byed pa/_/khyim nas khyim med rab byung dang /_/de dag 'thun pa ma yin no/_/rtag tu yang dag dga' byed pa'i/_/chos drug gang yin la 'jug pa/_/'di ni khyim nas khyim med par/_/rab tu byung ba rnams dang 'thun/_/sems 
[\[204b.7\]]can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/_/'tshe ba med par ngas bsgoms nas/_/ji ltar byang chub don gnyer ba/_/dge slong nga las 'di nyon cig_/shes rab ldan pa'i mi yis 'di/_/thos nas sdig pa rnam spongs la/_/grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir/_/dge ba'i chos la spyad par gyis/_/sngon gyi 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]spun drung gyur pa yi/_/klu yi rgyal po gnyis byung ba/_/gcig gi ming ni rnga zhes bya/_/gnyis pa nye rnga zhes bya'o/_/gnyis ka srog gcod las ldog cing /_/tshul khrims ldan zhing dbang chen grags/_/klu yi skye gnas la smod cing /_/mi yi srid pa 'dod par 
[\[205a.2\]]gyur/_/tshul ldan mang du thos pa yi/_/dge sbyong bram ze mthong ba dang /_/mi yi tshul du bsgyur nas ni/_/bsnyen bkur dag kyang byed par 'gyur/_/zla ba phyed dang tshes brgyad dang /_/bcu bzhi bco lnga gang yin pa/_/de la yan lag brgyad pa yi/_/gso sbyong la ni legs mnyam 
[\[205a.3\]]'jog_/de gnyis sngon gyi gnas spangs nas/_/yul gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang /_/de dang nye ba'i gnas de na/_/rnga sgra zhes bya'i klu gnas so/_/klu yi skyes mchog spun gnyis po/_/de gnyis 'ong bar des shes nas/_/khengs shing khros pa'i yid kyis su/_/du ba can gyi dbugs 
[\[205a.4\]]'byin cing /_/khyed gnyis chos spyod ma yin te/_/g.yon can tshul ngan 'chos pa'o zhes/_/rnga sgras tshig ni rtsub mo yis/_/yang dang yang du skrod par byed/_/dman pas bskrad pa thos pa dang /_/nye rnga rab tu khros gyur te/_/de tshe phu bo rnga la ni/_/tshig rnams kyis ni go byas pa/_/kye rnga mi yi 
[\[205a.5\]]'jig rten dag 'di na/_/tshig ngan mngon du smra bas gdung byed cing /_/sbal zan chu yi 'gram na skyes pa yis/_/mche ba gdug pas bdag cag skrod par byed/_/'di ni chu nang dud 'gro rnams la 'tshe/_/thang la mi rnams la yang 'tshe bar byed/_/gtso bo gal te bdag la bzod mchis 
[\[205a.6\]]kyang /_/tshig ngan smra la yid ni bzod mi nus/_/deng ni 'di yi grong khyer dang /_/pho brang gnyen 'dun bcas brlag ste/_/rnga sgra gtan nas blangs nas su/_/'di nas bdag cag 'dong bar bya/_/klu yi rgyal po stobs po che/_/de yis nu bo'i tshig thos nas/_/yid la 'bab par byed pa 
[\[205a.7\]]yi/_/tshigs bcad 'di skad smras te bsgo/_/gang gis khyim du nyin zhag 'ga' gnas shing /_/bza' dang btung ba legs par blangs gyur pa/_/de la yid kyis gnod par mi bsam ste/_/byas pa gzo ba skyes bu dam pas bsngags/_/ljon shing gang gi grib ma yis/_/yud tsam 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]zhig kyang legs 'gebs de'i/_/lo ma'ang bcad par mi bya na/_/yal ga ljon shing smos ci dgos/_/nags tshal shing ni bcad dam bsregs kyang rung /_/slar yang skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/lag pa rlon bcad phyir yang mi skye ltar/_/grogs la 'khu bas yun ring bde mi thob/_/
[\[205b.2\]]skye bo ngan pa yun ring mchod byas shing /_/bza' btung zhim po mang pos phan btags kyang /_/des ni nges par grogs po spong 'gyur te/_/glang chen gyis ni ko'u shi'i spyil bu bzhin/_/ji ltar chu 'gram shing ni 'gyel 'gyur ltar/_/mi gang blo ni g.yo zhing 'gyur byed pa/_/de yi mdza' 
[\[205b.3\]]bshes brtan par mi 'gyur te/_/shing shun tshon gyis ras dkar btsos pa bzhin/_/gal te mkhas pas dgra bo dag_/mi dga' bar ni byed 'dod na/_/sems la skyon ni med byas dang /_/de nyid kyis ni der gnod 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang /_/sa rnams bdag gi khur min gyi/_/byas 
[\[205b.4\]]pa mi gzo gang yin pa/_/de ni bdag gi khur chen yin/_/mi gang sems ni mi rgod cing /_/byas pa gzo dang byas pa tshor/_/byas pa chud gzon mi byed pa/_/de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngags/_/chos bde byams pa bde ba ste/_/'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bzhin/_/grogs la 'khu ba med 
[\[205b.5\]]pa dang /_/nga snyems nga rgyal zad pa bde/_/khengs dang zol byed nga rgyal che/_/sdig pa'i grogs po sten pa dang /_/stobs ldan rnams la rgol byed pa/_/de dag rnams kyi grags pa 'jig_/de phyir khengs par mi bya ste/_/khro ba rnam par spang bar bya/_/khengs dang khro ba 'ongs 
[\[205b.6\]]'gyur na/_/grags pa mtha' dag 'jig par 'gyur/_/gang zhig rgan dang byis pa nad pa dang /_/nyam chung thabs stor de bzhin dman pa dang /_/rgyal pos spangs dang skyabs med pa dag la/_/snying brtse med pa de dag mir mi rung /_/rang gi yul 'khor gnas spangs 
[\[205b.7\]]te/_/gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin pa na/_/tshig ngan so sor zlog pa la/_/bzod pa chen po bya dgos so/_/rang gi yul na brnyas bzhin 'dug pa bas/_/mi rnams gzhan gyi yul na gnas kyang rung /_/gang na mi rnams gzhan gyis mi brnyas te/_/rang gi yul 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]yin de dag rang gi mi/_/mi mchog rnams ni brnyas thabs byas pa'i tshe/_/chung ma sdug dang longs spyod rgya chen gtong /_/ngan pa rnams ni de na'ang yongs su 'khyam/_/brnyas thabs byas pa de yang chu bzhin 'thung /_/dar ba rnyed pa dga' ba ste/_/rgud pa mod pa yin 
[\[206a.2\]]pa'i phyir/_/sems can dmas par gyur pa'i tshe/_/kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/_/gal te nor med phyogs nyung ngam/_/mdza' bshes phyogs kyi stobs chung ngam/_/dgra bo phyogs kyi stobs ldan tshe/_/kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/_/mi rnams chos min 
[\[206a.3\]]byed pa dang /_/'dod pa'i longs spyod mngon dga' zhing /_/dad chung ngo tsha med pa'i tshe/_/kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/_/mi rnams khro bar byed pa dang /_/gnod sems mang por gyur pa dang /_/gzhan la'ang gdug pa'i tshul ldan tshe/_/kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/_/
[\[206a.4\]]mi rnams dad pa med pa dang /_/khwa bzhin mu cor smra ba dang /_/sgyu dang g.yo dag byed pa'i tshe/_/kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/_/mi rnams tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_/gtum zhing gzu lums byed pa dang /_/bden pa'i chos dang mi ldan tshe/_/kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 
[\[206a.5\]]'thob/_/mi rnams ngang tshul ngan pa dang /_/log pa'i lta bas bcom pa dang /_/gtum zhing sdang bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/_/ngo tsha med cing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra/_/don med phra ma tshig rtsub dang /_/dbyen dang khyal pa smra ba'i tshe/_/kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/_/ya 
[\[206a.6\]]rabs tshul med shin tu khengs/_/nga rgyal gyis ni 'gying ba dang /_/phrag dog brkam dang tshul nyams tshe/_/kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/_/gang tshe mi yi rus rnams dang /_/rigs rnams shes pa ma yin pa'i/_/mi dang lhan cig 'dug pa na/_/de tshe nga rgyal byar mi rung /_/gzhan 
[\[206a.7\]]gyi yul na 'dug pa dang /_/gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/_/yul gyi phyir dang bde ba'i phyir/_/gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya/_/gzhan gyi yul na gnas pa dang /_/gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/_/sdang bas 'khrug par gyur pa na/_/gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya/_/
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang /_/gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/_/dman pas bskrad par gyur kyang rung /_/shes rab ldan pas de bzod bya/_/kye ma yul log bdag gnas shing /_/mdza' bshes ngan dang phrad pa na/_/byis pa rnams dang 'grogs pa yi/_/gnas su mi ngan rten 
[\[206b.2\]]byed med/_/shes rab ldan pas de bas mas/_/mi shes mi dang 'grogs byed kyang /_/mkhas pas nor dang longs spyod phyir/_/gzu lums kho nar khro mi bya/_/ji ltar thal bas bkab pa'i me/_/rtswa dang shing gis g.yogs pa la/_/rlung rnams kyis ni legs bus na/_/shin 
[\[206b.3\]]tu rab tu 'bar 'gyur te/_/rtswa dang shing de bsregs nas su/_/chen por mched cing 'bar ba yis/_/rtswa dang gel pa mang po dag_/ljon shing chen po sreg pa ltar/_/de bzhin rnam rtog bud shing las/_/byung ba'i khro ba me 'dra bas/_/bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag la/_/phung 
[\[206b.4\]]khrol chen po byed par 'gyur/_/de phyir khro ba byung ba na/_/zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi/_/byams pa'i sems la bsgoms nas su/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis zlog par byed/_/bstod pa byas na mdza' byed la/_/ma bstod mdza' bar mi byed cing /_/mod la yongs su spong byed pa/_/
[\[206b.5\]]de ni byis pa'i mtshan nyid yin/_/gal te 'di na byis pa dag_/sgro gshog btogs pa'i bya lta bur/_/blo spangs shes rab ma 'chal na/_/mkhas pa ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/gang phyir byis pa phal cher ni/_/blo gros spangs shing shes 'tshal ba/_/
[\[206b.6\]]de phyir mkhas pa shes rab can/_/khyad par du ni bde bar 'tsho/_/mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/_/phongs par gyur kyang mi 'khrul 'khrug pa med/_/rjes su gzung phyir phan pa de smra na/_/legs smra yin zhes gzhan gyis cis 
[\[206b.7\]]mi rtogs/_/mkhas pa gzu lums med par gyur pa de/_/de nyid dpyad pa legs par mnyan nas su/_/de ltar rnam par bsams nas rang don dang /_/gzhan gyi don dag legs par spyod par byed/_/mkhas pa rnams ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu tsam 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]gyis/_/sdig pa'i las rnams kun tu spyod mi 'gyur/_/gal te bde dang sdug bsngal ldan gyur kyang /_/rtag tu chos don yongs su gtong ba med/_/blo ldan g.yo sgyu can du mi 'gyur te/_/rmongs par mi 'gyur tshig rtsub khro mi 'gyur/_/
[\[207a.2\]]phongs pa'i gnas na mya ngan mi byed pa/_/gzhan gyis gnad la 'bebs par byed re skan/_/ha cang thal dang ha cang zhum pa yi/_/dman pa'i mi rnams la yang ma yin te/_/bar ma'i gnas la sten par byed pa dag_/de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshan 
[\[207a.3\]]nyid yin/_/ha cang thal ba rtag tu 'khon/_/ha cang zhum pa rtag tu brnyas/_/de phyir de gnyis spangs nas su/_/go 'phang bar ma bsten par bya/_/res 'ga' lkugs pa'am 'on pa lta bur gyis/_/dus la bab nas bdag bzhin du smros/_/res 
[\[207a.4\]]'ga' gangs ri bzhin du bsil bar gyis/_/dus la bab na me lce bzhin du spor/_/res 'ga' rtswa dang 'dra bar zhum par bya/_/dus la bab na ri rab lta bur gyis/_/res 'ga' rgyal po lta bur 'gyur bar bar bya/_/dus la bab na thub 'dra nags su 
[\[207a.5\]]song /_/res 'ga' bkres dang skom pa'ang bzod par bya/_/dus su bde dang sdug bsngal dang du blang /_/nor phyir bran bzhin bkol par mi bya ste/_/khro ba'i dbang du gyur par mi bya'o/_/res 'ga' dga' ba'i glu dang sil snyan gyis/_/rtse zhing sha 
[\[207a.6\]]dang chang yang spyad par bya/_/res 'ga' [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lta bur 'jigs bzhin song /_/dus su gcan gzan bzhin du nyams rtsal bstan/_/dang por dus dang dus min dang /_/bdag nyid stobs ldan stobs med dang /_/dar dang rgud pa brtags nas su/_/de 
[\[207a.7\]]nas don rnams legs par brtsam/_/bzod med rnams la bzod pa dang /_/bzod ldan rnams la'ang bzod par gyis/_/nyam chung rnams la'ang bzod pa dang /_/stobs ldan rnams la rtag bzod gyis/_/'khon gyis 'khon zhir nams kyang mi 'gyur 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]bas/_/bzod med rnams la'ang bzod par byas na legs/_/khros pa rnams la rtag tu dang ba dang /_/gzhan gyi skyon rnams rtag tu bcab par gyis/_/gtso bo rnams kyi tshig ni 'jigs phyir dang /_/'thab zla'i tshig dag 'thab gcugs gyur phyir bzod/_/gang 
[\[207b.2\]]zhig 'og ma'i tshig dag bzod byed pa/_/de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas gsungs/_/gshe dang gya tshom smra ba dang /_/tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/_/blo gros chung ngu mi bzod de/_/pad ma la ni rdo char bzhin/_/gshe dang gya tshom smra ba dang /_/tshig 
[\[207b.3\]]ngan smra bar byed pa la/_/mkhas pa shin tu bzod byed de/_/glang chen me tog char pa bzhin/_/khro ba dang ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dag dang /_/tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/_/mkhas pa shes rab ldan gyur pa/_/gang yin de ni thams cad bzod/_/rdo ba bsregs 
[\[207b.4\]]kyang 'ju mi 'gyur/_/char pa bab kyang 'jig pa med/_/de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/_/mkhas pa nyams par 'gyur ba med/_/gang zhig bden pas gshe byed pa/_/de la mkhas pas bzod par byed/_/bden pa ma yin pa yang 
[\[207b.5\]]bzod/_/de las gzhan pa bstan du med/_/'di ltar skyes bu mkhas pa nor gyi phyir/_/sdug bsngal bzod bya bzod par 'gyur bar bar bya/_/gal te mi bzod mya ngan rnam spangs te/_/gzhan du song na stong phrag rnyed dang 'dra/_/yal ga 
[\[207b.6\]]snyegs la 'ju bar mi bya zhing /_/chags bral sems la chags par mi bya ste/_/bzang zhing sdug pas sa steng gang bas na/_/'jig rten yangs pa gzhan du 'gror zad mod/_/gang na brnyas byed bkur sti mi byed dang /_/smod par byed cing stod 
[\[207b.7\]]par mi byed na/_/mkhas dang blun 'grogs ched ka mi che bas/_/rang rgyal bzhin du ma smra de 'gro rigs/_/gang na skyes bu 'thab la dga' gyur nas/_/g.yo sgyu'i bsam ldan rtag tu glags kyang byed/_/kyal pa dbyen [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig rtsub smra byed pa/_/de 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song /_/gang na mi rnams 'tsho bar byed gyur nas/_/phan tshun gnod la 'bebs par dga' ba dang /_/lus dang ngag yid sdom pa med gyur pa/_/de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song /_/gang na mi 
[\[208a.2\]]rnams phrag dog byed gyur nas/_/gzhan gyi rnyed la rtag tu mi bzod cing /_/sdang ba'i bsam pas rnam rmongs tshul 'chos pa/_/de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/_/gang na mi rnams sdig byed 'dod gyur nas/_/bkur sti 'dod cing 
[\[208a.3\]]tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu byed/_/nang yang ma dag phyi yang ma dag pa/_/de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/_/gang na mi rnams zhe sa med gyur nas/_/ya rabs tshul med khengs shing nga rgyal la ldan/_/byis pas mkhas pa rtag tu brnyas byed pa/_/de tshe 
[\[208a.4\]]bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/_/gang dang gang du bza' btung dang /_/gang du gos rnams rnyed pa dang /_/gang du 'tsho ba der song la/_/chags 'gyur gnas su ma 'dug cig_/lan 'ga' rtsod 'gyur sred pa gang yin spongs/_/rtag khengs 
[\[208a.5\]]mchod med nga rgyal gang yin spongs/_/'bras bu ngan pa'i khro ba gang yin spongs/_/phongs dus mi lta'i grogs po gang yin spongs/_/me yis gang ba'i lam 'dra'i ma rig spongs/_/byas gzo med pa'i gnyen 'dra'i 'dod chags spongs/_/mche ba mi bzad klu 'dra'i 
[\[208a.6\]]chags pa spongs/_/dgra bo mtshon thogs lta bu'i sdug bsngal spongs/_/klu mo lta bu mi bzad chung ma spongs/_/mgo la me 'bar lta bu'i bu rnams thong /_/'go ba'i nad bcas lta bu'i khyim rnams thong /_/btung ba dug chen lta bu'i 'dod pa thong /_/khyim gyi phyir ni 
[\[208a.7\]]gcig btang ste/_/grong khyer don du khyim btang ngo /_/ljongs kyi phyir ni grong khyer te/_/bdag gi don du sa btang ngo /_/mi yi yan lag phyir ni nor btang zhing /_/srog gi don du yan lag gtang bar bya/_/nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog_/thams cad btang gi 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]'dir ni chos srung ngo /_/chos spyod pa la 'jigs skrag med pa nyid/_/chos spyod pa dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/_/chos spyod pa ni 'dod pa'i 'gro bar 'gro/_/chos mi spyod pa shi nas gdung bar 'gyur/_/mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/_/nor zad na yang blo gros mi 'khyim par/_/
[\[208b.2\]]'jig rten dag na ci dgar legs rgyu ba/_/sems can nang na mi yi snying por chud/_/gang zhig dga' bas gzhan la nor sbyin zhing /_/nga rgyal 'tshe ba rnam spangs bden la gnas/_/rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sems ldan de dag ni/_/dpa' bo rtul phod ya rabs thabs ldan yin/_/gang zhig de 
[\[208b.3\]]dang de la legs bslabs pas/_/don rnams kun la mkhas par gyur pa dang /_/des la 'grogs na bde ba de dag ni/_/dam pas legs pa yin zhes bsngags pa mdzad/_/nye rngas smras pa/_rnga khyod la ni phyi phyir zhing /_/'di bdag ni rab tu dad/_/bdag gi lus 
[\[208b.4\]]'di bskams pa'am/_/yang na sems ni med kyang sla/_/sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad par/_/lhung yang phyin chad sdig mi bgyid/_/tshul khrims nyams pa gson pa bas/_/tshul khrims ldan pa shi yang sla/_/skye ba gcig tu 'di yi phyir/_/ji lta bur ni mi zad sbyang /_/bcom ldan 
[\[208b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sngon tshe gang du rab gnas shing /_/de dang der ni skyes pa na/_/mi dge'i grogs dang 'grogs pa yis/_/nga yi mi dge las rnams byas/_/dge ba'i bshes dang phrad pa na/_/mi dge'i las rnams spangs pa yis/_/bdag gis mi dge'i las rnams bsal/_/
[\[208b.6\]]bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yis/_/sngon gyi gnas rnams mngon mkhyen nas/_/de phyir dge slong rnams la ni/_/thub pas lung yang bstan par mdzad/_/sngon tshe nga ni rngar gyur te/_/kun dga' bo ni nye rnga yin/_/lha sbyin rnga sgrar gyur to zhes/_/skyes rabs de ltar gzung bar gyis/_/
[\[208b.7\]]chos rnams sdud par byed pa yi/_/don rgyas mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/dge slong thams cad gus bcas par/_/chos la spyad pa nyid du gyis/_/klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//_//_
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]{D326}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_u dA na brga/_bod skad du/_ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/_bam po dang po/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bkra shis par gyur cig_/rgyal bas ched du brjod gsungs pa/_/bdag gis rab tu bshad par bya/_/gnyid dang 
[\[209a.2\]]rmugs pa rnams sol la/_/yid la dga' ba bskyed de nyon/_/thams cad mkhyen pa skyob pa po/_/thub pa rjes su thugs brtse ba/_/sku yi tha ma 'dzin pa yi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/_/kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag_/skye zhing 'jig pa'i 
[\[209a.3\]]chos can yin/_/skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste/_/de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/_/de ltar rab tu 'bar ba la/_/ci zhig dgar yod mgur ci yod/_/mun pa'i nang zhugs gnas pa dag_/ci phyir sgron ma tshol mi byed/_/rus pa thi ba'i mdog 'dra ba/_/bor ba 
[\[209a.4\]]gang yin 'di dag ni/_/phyogs dang phyogs su rnam 'thor ba/_/de mthong 'di la ci zhig dga'/_/gang gi nub mo kho nas/_/mngal du dang por 'jug pa'i mi/_/de ni sdod med 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/song ba las kyang ldog pa med/_/snga dro skye bo mang mthong 
[\[209a.5\]]ba/_/phyi dro kha cig mthong mi 'gyur/_/phyi dro skye bo mang mthong ba/_/snga dro kha cig mthong mi 'gyur/_/skyes pa bud med mang po dang /_/dar la bab pa'ang 'chi 'gyur na/_/de la mi 'di gzhon zhes te/_/gson pa'i gdeng drod ci zhig yod/_/kha cig mngal du 'chi 
[\[209a.6\]]bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin kha cig btsas pa'i sar/_/de bzhin kha cig gog tsam na/_/de bzhin kha cig yongs rgyug na/_/la la rgan dang la la gzhon/_/la la dar la bab pa'i mi/_/rim gyis rab tu 'gro 'gyur te/_/'bras bu smin pa ltung ba bzhin/_/
[\[209a.7\]]dper na 'bras bu smin pa rnams/_/ltung bas rtag tu 'jigs pa ltar/_/de bzhin skyes par gyur pa'i mi/_/rtag tu 'chi bas 'jigs par 'gyur/_/dper na rdza ma'i mkhan po yis/_/'jim pa las ni snod byas pa/_/thams cad tha mar 'jig pa ltar/_/
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/_/dper na thags ni brkyang ba la/_/spun ni gang dang gang bcug pa'i/_/spun gyis rting la gtugs pa ltar/_/mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/_/dper na nges par bsad pa dag_/gom pa gang dang gang bor bas/_/gsad 
[\[209b.2\]]sa'i drung du bsnyen pa ltar/_/mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/_/chu klung drag tu 'bab pa'i rgyun/_/ldog pa med pa ji lta bar/_/de bzhin mi yi tshe 'gro ba/_/slar ni ldog par 'gyur ba med/_/dka' ba nyid dang thung ba dang /_/de yang sdug bsngal ldan pa dag_/
[\[209b.3\]]myur ba kho nar 'jig 'gyur te/_/chu la dbyug gus bris pa bzhin/_/dper na phyugs rji dbyug thogs kyis/_/phyugs rnams gnas su phyin byed ltar/_/de bzhin nad dang rga ba yis/_/mi rnams 'chi bdag drung du skyel/_/chu bran gyi ni chu lta bur/_/nyin dang 
[\[209b.4\]]mtshan mo 'das pa yis/_/mi rnams tshe yang zad 'gyur zhing /_/srog kyang nye bar 'jig par 'gyur/_/mel tse byed la mtshan mo ring /_/lam gyis du ba la rgyang grags ring /_/dam chos rnam par mi shes pa'i/_/byis pa rnams la 'khor ba ring /_/bdag 
[\[209b.5\]]la bu yod de bzhin du/_/nor yod ces pas byis pa brlag_/phyi rol nang na bdag med na/_/su yi bu yin ci zhig nor/_/skyes pa bud med rnams kyi rigs/_/brgya dang stong phrag mang po dang /_/longs spyod legs par bsgrubs pa yang /_/'chi bdag 
[\[209b.6\]]dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/bslang ba'i mtha' ni 'gyel bar 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pas na/_/sems can thams cad 'chi 
[\[209b.7\]]'gyur zhing /_/dge sdig 'bras bur nyer 'gro ba'i/_/ji bzhin las kyi rjes su 'brang /_/sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba dang /_/bsod nams byas pas bde 'gro ste/_/gzhan dag gis ni lam bsgoms pas/_/zag med mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/_/
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]gang yang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos kyang /_/sku lus 'di ni spong mdzad na/_/skye bo phal pa smos ci dgos/_/gang du gnas kyang 'chi bas mi tshugs pa'i/_/sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/_/bar 
[\[210a.2\]]snang la med rgya mtsho'i nang na med/_/ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs na'ang min/_/byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa/_/kun gyis lus 'di btang nas 'gro ba dang /_/de kun 'jig par mkhas pas rtogs gyis te/_/chos la gnas gyis tshangs par 
[\[210a.3\]]spyad pa spyod/_/rga ba mthong zhing nad kyis sdug bsngal dang /_/sems dang bral ba'i shi ba mthong nas ni/_/brtan pas btson ra 'dra ba'i khyim spangs kyi/_/'jig rten phal pas 'dod spang nus re skan/_/rgyal po'i shing rta shin tu bkra ba'ang 'jig_/de 
[\[210a.4\]]bzhin lus kyang nye bar rga bar 'gyur/_/dam pa rnams kyi chos 'di dam pa ste/_/mi mchog gzhan rtogs byed cing rga mi 'gyur/_/rga ba khyod ni blun zhing ngang na/_/khyod ni mi rigs byed pa ste/_/yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs 'di yang /_/khyod kyis mngon 
[\[210a.5\]]par bcom par gyur/_/gang zhig lo ni brgyar 'tsho ba/_/de yang 'chi bdag nyid kyis khrid/_/'di dag rga bar 'gyur ba'am/_/yang nan ba'am 'chi bas 'joms/_/rtag tu ldog pa med par 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/nyin dang mtshan du rab tu 'jig pa dang /_/
[\[210a.6\]]skye dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa/_/chu tshan nang du gdungs pa'i nya dang 'dra/_/tshe 'di nyin dang mtshan mo dang /_/'gro ba dang ni 'dug pa na/_/chu klung chen po'i rgyun bzhin du/_/phyir mi ldog par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/chu chung nang gi nya lta bur/_/
[\[210a.7\]]gang zhig nyin mtshan 'da' ba yis/_/tshe 'di shin tu thung 'gyur na/_/de la dga' bar byar ci yod/_/gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pa'i phyir/_/lus 'di yongs su rga ba dang /_/nad kyi tshang 'di myur 'jig cing /_/snag gi tshogs kyang 'jig par 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]'gyur/_/kye ma lus 'di mi thogs par/_/stong zhing rnam shes dang bral nas/_/dur khrod bor ba'i mgal dum ltar/_/sa yi steng du 'gyel bar 'gyur/_/rgyun du nad kyis mngon gdung zhing /_/rtag tu mi gtsang 'dzag pa dang /_/rga dang 'chi bas 'tsher 
[\[210b.2\]]'grib pa'i/_/lus 'di dor ba cir mi rung /_/myur du 'jig cing na ba dang /_/rnag dang ldan pa'i lus 'di yis/_/grub dang bde ba bla twa med pa/_/zhi mchog don du gnyer bar gyis/_/dgun ka dang ni dpyid ka dang /_/dbyar ka 'di dag bya'o zhes/_/byis 
[\[210b.3\]]pa rnam par sems byed pas/_/bar chad mthong bar ma gyur to/_/bu dang nor phyugs 'byor pa la/_/mi yid ni rnam chags pa/_/'chi bdag gis ni blangs nas 'gro/_/nyal grong chu bos bdas pa bzhin/_/'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/_/bu rnams 
[\[210b.4\]]skyabs su mi 'gyur zhing /_/pha yang ma yin gnyen 'dun min/_/khyod la skyabs su 'gyur ba med/_/'di ni bya ba byas zin don 'di bya/_/de dag byas nas bdag gis 'di bya zhes/_/de ltar mi ni yongs su shom pa na/_/rga dang nad bcas 'chi bas mngon 
[\[210b.5\]]du bcom/_/de ltas rtag tu ting 'dzin la dga' mnyam par zhog_/brtson pa skyed la skye dang rga ba'i mtha' ma ltos/_/bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa mngon par zil non la/_/dge slong dag go skye shi'i pha rol 'gro bar gyis/_/mi rtag pa'i tshoms te 
[\[210b.6\]]dang po'o//_//kun rtog las ni 'dod skyes pas/_/'dod pa'i rtsa bar shes gyis te/_/khyod ni kun rtog ma byed dang /_/des na khyod la 'byung mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa rnams las mya ngan skyes/_/'dod pa rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung /_/
[\[210b.7\]]'dod pa dag ni rnam spangs na/_/mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/_/dga' ba rnams las mya ngan skyes/_/dga' ba rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung /_/dga' ba dag ni rnam spangs na/_/mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/_/'dod dga'i rnam smin sdug 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]bsngal te/_/dang po mngar la 'bras bu tsha/_/me sgron lag nas ma bor ba/_/mjug tu byis pa sreg byed bzhin/_/nor bu'i rna cha bu dang bu mo la/_/yongs su chags sems gang yin la ltos na/_/lcags shing gres ma las byas ching ma gang /_/
[\[211a.2\]]de dag dam po min zhes 'phags pa gsung /_/'dod pa'i ching ma gang yin de lhod kyang /_/rab tu dgrol bar dka' zhes 'phags pa gsung /_/brtan rnams 'dod pa'i bde la mi lta bar/_/de dag gtubs nas myur du 'gro bar byed/_/'jig rten sna tshogs 
[\[211a.3\]]gang de 'dod min gyi/_/skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin/_/'jig rten sna tshogs de bzhin gnas kyang ni/_/'on kyang brten rnams 'di la 'dun pa 'dul/_/mi rnams la ni rtag pa'i 'dod pa med/_/'dod can gang la chags de mi rtag pas/_/
[\[211a.4\]]yang srid med phyir sems kyis rab spongs la/_/'chi ba'i gnas mi 'gyur bar byos shes gsungs/_/'dun pa skyes shing zad par mi byed dam/_/sems la skyon med pa dang dran pa dang /_/'dod pa rnams la so sor ma chags gang /_/de ni gong du 'pho 
[\[211a.5\]]ba yin zhes gsungs/_/mgar ba yis ni dngul bzhin du/_/blo gros ldan pas rim pa bzhin/_/skad cig skad cig cung zad tsam/_/rang gi dri ma bsal bar bya/_/lham mkhan gyis ni ko ba dag_/yongs su sbyangs nas lham byed ltar/_/'dod pa gang dang gang 
[\[211a.6\]]spangs pa/_/de de bde ba phun sum ldan/_/gal te bde ba kun 'dod na/_/'dod pa thams cad yongs su spongs/_/'dod pa thams cad yongs spangs pas/_/mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/ji srid 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang ba/_/de srid bar du ngoms mi 
[\[211a.7\]]'gyur/_/de las gang dag shes rab kyis/_/ldog byed de dag tshim pa thob/_/'dod pas ngoms par mi 'gyur bas/_/shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa skyid/_/shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa'i mi/_/srid pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ro/_/'dod la chags pa'i mi gang 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]yin/_/de dag kye ma chos min dga'/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]gson por 'dug pa na/_/bar chad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/blo ngan longs spyod kyis bcom pas/_/pha rol tshol bar mi byed cing /_/bsam brlag 'dod la sred pa yis/_/bdag dang gzhan yang phung 
[\[211b.2\]]bar byed/_kar Sha pa Na'i char bab kyang /_/'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa mnog chung nyes mang bar/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis khong du chud/_/lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang /_/lhag par dga' bar mi 'gyur gyi/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas 
[\[211b.3\]]dang nyan thos rnams/_/sred pa zad pas dgyes par 'gyur/_/gangs can dang ni mnyam pa yi/_/gser gyi ri bo yod gyur kyang /_/nor des gcig kyang mi tshim par/_/rtogs par gyis la legs par spyod/_/gang dag sdug bsngal de yi rgyu shes pa/_/
[\[211b.4\]]de dag nam yang 'dod la dga' mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten dag na zug rngu'i rgyur shes nas/_/de dag gdul phyir bstan pa slob par byed/_/'dod pa'i tshoms te gnyis pa'o//_//lus can rnam par rtog pas rab bcom pa/_/'dod chags mi 
[\[211b.5\]]bzad gtsang bar rjes lta bas/_/'dod chags phyir zhing rab tu 'phel 'gyur te/_/rang gi 'ching ba de yis dam por byed/_/gang dag rnam rtog nye bar zhi dga' zhing /_/mi sdug sgom pa rtag tu dran byed de/_/de yi sred pa rab tu spangs pa yis/_/rang gi 'ching 
[\[211b.6\]]ba de dag rul bar byed/_/'dod pa mun nag 'dra bas g.yogs/_/sred pa'i dgab pas bkab pa dang /_/bag med 'ching bas bcings pa dag_/tshe dmar chud pa'i nya dang 'dra/_/skyes bu bag med rab tu spyod byed pa/_/'khri shing bzhin du sred pa 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[211b.7\]]rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te/_/ma drung nu zho 'dod pa'i be'u dang 'dra/_/mi dag dran par byed dang chags byed dang /_/yid bde ba la rtog par byed pa dag_/de yis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khyams/_/tshal nang 'bras bu 'dod pa'i spre'u dang mtshungs/_/mi 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]gang rtag tu bde ba 'dod byed pa/_/skye dang rga bar nye bar 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/skye dgu sred pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar/_/rgya nang ri bong yongs su rgyug pa bzhin/_/sred pa rnams kyis mdud pa'i sems can dag_/srid dang srid min dag la sems chags 
[\[212a.2\]]shing /_/kun sbyor ro la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams/_/yang dang yang du sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur/_/skye bo grub dang bde rnams dang bral zhing /_/bdud kyi sbyor ba dag dang ldan pa de/_/rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te/_/ma drung nu zho 'dod pa'i be'u dang 'dra/_/'di 
[\[212a.3\]]na sred pa de 'dra spong byed pa/_/srid dang srid min dag la sred bral zhing /_/dge slong srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa/_/lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan 'da'/_/gang zhig 'jig rten spang dka' ba'i/_/sred pa'i bud med 'dis bkol ba/_/de yi mya ngan 'phel 
[\[212a.4\]]'gyur te/_/rtswa la char pa bab pa bzhin/_/gang zhig 'jig rten spang dka' ba'i/_/sred pa'i bud med 'di spong ba/_/de yi mya ngan ldog 'gyur te/_/pad ma las ni chu thigs bzhin/_/de phyir ji snyed 'dir lhags pa/_/khyed la smra yis khyed bde shig_/u shir phyir 
[\[212a.5\]]ni rtswa bzhin du/_/sred pa rtswar bcas drungs nas phyung /_/skyes bu sred pa dang 'grogs na/_/yun ring dus su 'khyam 'gyur bas/_/sred pa drungs nas phyung shig dang /_/mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/_/yang dang yang du nyer len cing /_/yang dang yang du mngal du 
[\[212a.6\]]'jug_/gnas skabs 'gyur dang gzhan 'gyur bas/_/sems can 'ong dang 'gro bar byed/_/'dir ni spang dka'i sred pa de/_/spongs la sa bon chod cig dang /_/de la sred pa med 'gyur zhing /_/de ni yang du 'khor mi 'gyur/_/dal 'byor chud ni ma gzan par/_/
[\[212a.7\]]gang gis lha dang mi rnams su/_/don gnyer bcings nas 'jog byed pa/_/yul la sred pa de las rgol/_/sems can dmyal bar skyes na yang /_/dal 'byor thal bas 'gyod par 'ong /_/gang phyir srid mtsho rgyur gyur pa/_/yul la sred pa 'bras kyi gzhi/_/'khri 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]shing dra bas khebs byed pa/_/gdung bar byed pa ma btul na/_/sdug bsngal 'di ni yang dang yang /_/rnam pa kun du ldog mi 'gyur/_/dper na ljon shing rtsa nas ma bton na/_/bcad kyang phyir zhing skye ba kho nar zad/_/de bzhin sred pa'i phra rgyas ma bton na/_/yang 
[\[212b.2\]]dang yang du sdug bsngal 'di mi ldog_/dper na bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa'i mtshon/_/de yis rkun po'i mthu yis bdag gsod ltar/_/de bzhin nang gi sems las byung ba yi/_/sred pas lus can nye bar gsod par byed/_/de ltar sred las sdug bsngal 
[\[212b.3\]]dag_/'byung ba'i nyes dmigs shes gyis te/_/sred spongs nye bar len med dang /_/dran ldan dge slong kun du rgyus/_/sred pa'i tshoms te gsum pa'o//_//bag yod 'chi med gnas yin te/_/bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas/_/
[\[212b.4\]]bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_/bag med pa ni rtag tu 'chi/_/de yi khyad par de rig pas/_/mkhas pa rnams ni bag dang bcas/_/bag yod pa la rab dga' ba/_/'phags pa'i spyod yul dga' ba yin/_/de la rgyun du bsgoms pa dang /_/rtag tu pha rol 
[\[212b.5\]]gnon brtan pa'i/_/brtan pas grub bde bla med pa/_/mya ngan 'das la reg pa yin/_/gang tshe mkhas pas bag yod pas/_/bag med bcom pa de yi tshe/_/shes rab khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]steng 'dzegs nas/_/mya ngan med pas gdung bcas dang /_/brtan rnams ri bo'i 
[\[212b.6\]]spo dag las/_/sa stengs byis pa rnams la blta/_/brtson 'grus dang ni bag yod dang /_/yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis/_/mkhas pas gling du byas nas ni/_/chu bo chen po mngon du zlog_/brtson 'grus ldan zhing dran dang ldan pa dang /_/spyod pa gtsang zhing brtags nas 
[\[212b.7\]]byed pa dang /_/yang dag sdom dang chos kyis 'tsho ba dang /_/bag yod rnams kyi grags pa mngon par 'phel/_/lhag pa'i sems la bag bya ste/_/thub pa'i thub gzhi rnams la bslab/_/nyer zhi rtag tu dran ldan pa'i/_/skyong ba mya ngan med pa yin/_/dman pa'i 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]chos la mi rten cing /_/bag med pa la bsten mi bya/_/log par lta la 'dod med dang /_/'jig rten 'phel bar mi bya'o/_/'jig rten pa yi yang dag lta/_/chen po su la yod gyur pa/_/de ni tshe rabs stong du yang /_/ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[213a.2\]]bag med pa la sbyor byed pa/_/skye bo byis pa bsam brlag yin/_/tshong dpon nor rnams srung ba ltar/_/mkhas pa bag dang ldan par bya/_/bag med pa la mi sbyor zhing /_/'dod la dga' ba mi sogs dang /_/rtag tu bag yod sems byed pa/_/zag pa zad pa thob par 
[\[213a.3\]]'gyur/_/zag pa zad pa ma thob kyang /_/dus 'dir bag med mi bya ste/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ma yin seng ge ltar/_/bag med pa dag bsad par 'gyur/_/bag med pha rol bud med sten byed pa'i/_/mi gang yid la gnas skabs 'di bzhi 'byung /_/bsod nams mi 'thob bde 
[\[213a.4\]]bar mi nyal dang /_/gsum pa smad 'gyur bzhi pa dmyal bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams ma thob sdig pa'i 'gro ba dang /_/'jigs dang bag tsha lhan cig bde ba chung /_/rgyal po'i chad pa chen pos gcod 'gyur zhing /_/lus zhig sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'tshed/_/
[\[213a.5\]]gang zhig bdag bde lta 'dod pa/_/des ni gong ma bzhin du bya/_/byis pa'i shing rta bzhin 'gyur bas/_/brtan pas brtson 'grus zhan mi bya/_/dper na byis pa'i shing rta dag_/lam chen bzang po bor nas su/_/lam ngan dag tu 'gro byed pas/_/mig chag sems khongs 
[\[213a.6\]]chud pa ltar/_/de bzhin chos ni spangs nas kyang /_/chos min rjes su 'jug byed pa'i/_/byis pa 'chi bdag dbang 'gro zhing /_/mig chag bzhin du bcom pa thob/_/gang zhig bya ba rnam spangs nas/_/mi bya ba dag byed pa dang /_/bag med pa yis rlom byed pa/_/de dag 
[\[213a.7\]]rnams kyi zag pa 'phel/_/gang gis zag pa 'phel 'gyur ba/_/de yi zag med rgyang ma na/_/gang zhig lus gtogs dran pa dag_/rtag tu legs par brtsams pa dang /_/bya ba ma yin mi byed cing /_/rgyun du bya ba byed pa dang /_/dran dang shes bzhin ldan pa de'i/_/
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]zag pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur/_/gang gi zag pa zad gyur pa/_/des ni zag med thob par 'gyur/_/ji tsam mang du smra byed pa/_/de dag dam chos 'dzin ma yin/_/gang dag 'di na thos nyung yang /_/lus kyis chos dag mngon sum byas/_/gang dag chos la bag byed pa/_/de 
[\[213b.2\]]dag dam chos 'dzin pa yin/_/gal te rigs bcas mang du smras kyang ni/_/bag med mi dag de ltar byed mi 'gyur/_/dper na phyugs rdzis gzhan gyi phyugs bgrangs ltar/_/de dag dge sbyong skal ba thob ma yin/_/gal te rigs bcas nyung ngu smra byed kyang /_/chos kyi rjes 
[\[213b.3\]]su chos la spyod pa dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spong byed pa/_/de dag dge sbyong skal ba thob pa yin/_/bag yod bsngags pa rjod byed cing /_/rtag tu bag med la smod pas/_/bag yod mchod sbyin brgya pa yang /_/lha rnams nang na gtso bor gyur/_/bya ba 
[\[213b.4\]]byas rung ma byas rung /_/mkhas pa bag yod bsngags pa rjod/_/bag dang chas pa'i mkhas pa yis/_/don gnyis rab tu len par byed/_/tshe 'di'i don ni gang yin dang /_/phyi ma'i don ni gang yin pa/_/de dag brtan pas rtogs pas na/_/mkhas pa zhes ni 
[\[213b.5\]]brjod pa yin/_/dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing /_/bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/_/bdag nyid ngan 'gro las 'drel te/_/'dam rdzab las ni glang chen bzhin/_/dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing /_/bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/_/sdig pa'i chos rnams 
[\[213b.6\]]sprug par byed/_/rlung gis ljon shing lo ma bzhin/_/dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing /_/bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/_/kun tu sbyor ba phra sbom dag_/me yis bsregs pa bzhin du 'gro/_/dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing /_/bag med pa la 'jigs 
[\[213b.7\]]lta bas/_/kun tu sbyor ba kun zad pa/_/rim gyis nyams su rmyang bar 'gyur/_/dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing /_/bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/_/'du byed nyer zhi zhi ba yi/_/zhi ba'i go 'phang so sor rtogs/_/dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing /_/bag 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]med pa la 'jigs lta ba/_/mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/_/yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/_/brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod dang /_/chos spyad legs par spyod byed pa/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/chos spyad pas ni bde ba 'thob/_/
[\[214a.2\]]zhi phyir bslab pa la rten dang /_/rtsol ba dang ni brtson 'grus skyed/_/mi dran pa dang bag med dang /_/brtson 'grus chung dang kun sdom med/_/gnyid dang snyom dang g.yeng ba ste/_/'di dag bslab pa'i bar chad pas/_/khyed kyis yan lag de rtogs la/_/dran pa chud 
[\[214a.3\]]ni ma gzan cig_/dge slong tshul khrims bzang ba dang /_/bag yod pa la dga' ba yis/_/kun rtog legs par mnyam zhog ste/_/rang gi sems ni rjes su srungs/_/brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang 
[\[214a.4\]]chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/bag yod pa'i tshom sa te bzhi pa'o//_//sdug pa 
[\[214a.5\]]rnams las mya ngan skye/_/sdug pa rnams las 'jigs pa skye/_/sdug pa dag ni rnam spangs na/_/mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/_/sdug gu ma las mya ngan skye/_/sdug las sdug bsngal sdug las 'jigs/_/sdug gu ma dag gzhan gyur na/_/yi mug 'gyur ba thob 
[\[214a.6\]]par byed/_/'jig rten sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang /_/mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa ji snyed pa/_/de dag sdug pa dag las rten te 'byung /_/sdug pa spangs na de dag yod mi 'gyur/_/gang phyir 'jig rten 'ga' na'ang sdug med pa/_/gang yin de dag bde zhing mya ngan 
[\[214a.7\]]med/_/de bas gdung med rdul bral don gnyer bas/_/nam yang sdug par byed pa mi bya'o/_/sdug pa ma mthong sdug bsngal la/_/mi sdug mthong na'ang de bzhin pas/_/nam yang sdug dang phrad mi bya/_/mi sdug dang yang phrad mi bya/_/sdug pa dang ni bye bral dang /_/mi sdug 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]pa dang phrad pa yis/_/gang gis mi dag rgas byed pa'i/_/mya ngan mi bzad skye bar 'gyur/_/sdug pa shi bar gyur pa na/_/gnyen 'dun mdza' bshes mang po dag_/yun ring dus su mya ngan dang /_/sdug dang bral bas sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/gang la sdug dang sdug min med/_/
[\[214b.2\]]de la mdud pa yod min pas/_/de ltas sdug nyid sdig can la/_/sdug par byed pa mi bya'o/_/sdug la bltas te don btang nas/_/bde sbyor rnams la mi 'jug cing /_/bdag nyid mi bde'i sbyor ldan dag_/bde sbyor don ldan rnams la smon/_/gzugs sdug bde bas 
[\[214b.3\]]bsdams pa dag_/lha mi so so'i ris dag tu/_/sdig pa byed cing yongs nyams nas/_/rga dang 'chi ba'i dbang du 'gro/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/bag yod gzugs sdug spong byed pa/_/des ni spang dka' bdud zas dang /_/sdig pa'i rtsa ba'ang drungs nas 
[\[214b.4\]]phyung /_/legs min legs pa'i tshul dang ni/_/sdug min sdug pa'i tshul gyis dang /_/sdug bsngal bde ba'i tshul gyis su/_/bag med rnams ni mngon du 'joms/_/gal te bdag la dga' byed na/_/nyes par byed pas bde ba dag_/bde blag kho nar mi 'thob pas/_/
[\[214b.5\]]'di ni sdug la gzhug mi bya/_/gal te bdag la dga' byed na/_/legs par byed pas bde ba dag_/bde blag kho nar thob 'gyur bas/_/'di ni sdig la gzhug mi bya/_/dper na dgon pa'i grong khyer dag_/brtan pa'i 'obs kyis bskor ba ltar/_/gal te bdag 
[\[214b.6\]]la dga' byed na/_/'di ni bsrung bas legs par bsrung /_/gal te bdag la dga' byed na/_/thun gsum gang yang rung ba la/_/mkhas pas mel tse bya ba yis/_/'di ni sba bas legs par sba/_/dper na dgon pa'i grong khyer dag_/tra phyi nang srung bar byed pa ltar/_/dal 
[\[214b.7\]]'byor chud ni mi zos pa/_/de ltar bdag ni bsrung bar bya/_/sems can dmyal bar skye na yang /_/dal 'byor thal bas 'gyod par 'ong /_/phyogs rnams kun du sems kyis yongs brtags kyang /_/bdag las ches sdug 'ga' yang ma mthong ba/_/de ltar so sor 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gzhan la'ang rang sdug pas/_/de phyir ba dag dgas gzhan la gnod mi bya/_/thams cad la yang srog 'di sdug_/thams cad chad pas 'jigs pa na/_/rang gi nyams las dpag gyis te/_/brdeg par mi bya gsad mi bya/_/rgyang thag bcad par 
[\[215a.2\]]spyugs pa'i mi/_/ring nas nye zho med 'ongs na/_/gnyen bshes mdza' bo lhags nas su/_/a la la zhes mngon par dga'/_/de bzhin bsod nams byas pa'i mi/_/'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu/_/phyin tshe nyin bzhin bsod nams dag_/'ongs nas mngon par dga' 
[\[215a.3\]]bar byed/_/de bas 'jig rten pha rol gyi/_/ched du bsod nams bsags par gyis/_/bsod nams 'jig rten pha rol tu/_/lus can rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur/_/gang zhig legs spyad spyod byed pa'i/_/dge la lha rnams stod par byed/_/'di na'ang smad 
[\[215a.4\]]par mi 'gyur la/_/mtho ris su yang dga' ba 'thob/_/chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/_/ngo tsha shes shing bden par smra/_/rang gi bya ba byed pa la/_/skye bo gzhan rnams dga' bar byed/_/rang gi don ni byed pa la/_/'di ltar gzhan rnams dga' 
[\[215a.5\]]'gyur zhing /_/mthong ba'i chos la bsngags pa dang /_/pha rol tu yang bde 'gror 'gyur/_/gtams na gnang ba'i tshig smra dang /_/mi rigs spyod las zlog pa la/_/dam pa rnams ni dga' bar byed/_/dam pa ma yin dga' mi 'gyur/_/de bas mchog 
[\[215a.6\]]dang mchog min pa/_/shi 'phos bral bar gyur pa na/_/dam pa ma yin dmyal bar 'gro/_/dam pa mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sdug pa'i tshoms te lnga pa'o//_//bsngags par 'gyur dang nor 'thob dang /_/pha rol bde 'gror dga' 'gyur ba'i/_/bde 
[\[215a.7\]]ba gsum po don gnyer ba'i/_/mkhas pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/_/'phags dang mthong ba phun tshogs dang /_/'jig rten zhi ba rten 'gyur ba'i/_/gnas gzhan 'di dag mthong ba yi/_/mkhas pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/_/lus la yongs su 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]gdung med par/_/tshul khrims kyis ni bde ba 'thob/_/mtshan mo bde bar nyal ba dang /_/sad pa na yang dga' bar 'gyur/_/sbyin pa tshul khrims ldan pa dag_/mkhas pas byas pa'i bsod nams kyis/_/'di dang pha rol dag tu yang /_/rtag tu bde ba 'thob 
[\[215b.2\]]par 'gyur/_/rgan pa'i bar la tshul khrims dge/_/dad la rab tu gnas na legs/_/mi yi rin chen shes rab ste/_/bsod nams chom pos dbrog par dka'/_/dge slong tshul khrims la gnas shing /_/dbang po rnams kyang bsdams pa dang /_/zas 
[\[215b.3\]]kyi tshod ni rig pa dang /_/mi nyal ba la 'bad pa ste/_/de ltar gnas par brtson pa dang /_/nyin mtshan snyom las mi byed pa/_/mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/_/yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/_/mi ni tshul khrims la gnas nas/_/sems dang shes rab 
[\[215b.4\]]sgom pa la/_/brtson zhing nges gnas dge slong gis/_/sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur/_/de phyir rtag tu tshul khrims dang /_/ting 'dzin rjes su srung ba dang /_/lhag mthong la ni bslab pa dang /_/shes bzhin so sor dran par bya/_/des ni kun sbyor zad byas nas/_/
[\[215b.5\]]yid bral lhag ma med 'gyur te/_/lus zhig shes rab ldan pa yis/_/bgrang du med pa'i mya ngan 'das/_/gang zhig tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang /_/shes rab 'di gsum legs bsgoms te/_/shin tu dri med mthar phyin cing /_/gdung med yang srid zad gyur dang /_/
[\[215b.6\]]chags pa'i 'ching las rnam grol zhing /_/lus spangs shes rab ldan pa dang /_/bdud kyi yul las 'das pa dang /_/nyi ma bzhin du lam me 'bar/_/dge slong phyi dang nang nyid la/_/bag med rlom par byed pa yi/_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnams/_/yongs 
[\[215b.7\]]su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/sprin gyis khebs las char 'bab cing /_/nam thang ba las char mi 'bab/_/de bas khebs pa sol cig dang /_/'di ltar char pa 'bab mi 'gyur/_/de ltar rtag tu mthong ba dang /_/dge slong tshul khrims sdom pa yi/_/mya ngan 'das par 'gro 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]ba'i lam/_/myur ba kho nar rnam par 'dag_/me tog dri ni rdzi phyogs min mi 'gro/_/rtsa ba rgya spos tsan dan rnams kyang min/_/dam pa'i dri ni rdzi phyogs mi 'gro ste/_/phyogs rnams kun du mi mchog dri yis khyab/_/rgya spos dang ni tsan dan dang /_/ud_
[\[216a.2\]]pa la dang ma li ka/_/spos kyi rigs ni 'di dag pas/_/tshul khrims dri bsung phul du phyin/_/rgya spos tsan dan gang yin pa'i/_/dri bsung 'di ni chung ngu ma/_/tshul khrims ldan pa'i dri bsung gang /_/des ni 'di dang mtho ris khyab/_/de ltar bag yod gnas bya zhing /_/tshul khrims 
[\[216a.3\]]rnam par dag par bya/_/yang dag shes pas rnam grol na/_/bdud kyi lam ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/'di ni bde bar 'gro lam ste/_/rnam par dag byed lam 'di la/_/rab tu zhugs te bsgoms nas kyang /_/bdud kyi 'ching ba spang bar gyis/_/tshul khrims kyi tshoms te drug 
[\[216a.4\]]pa'o//_//lus kyi nyes par spyod spangs shing /_/lus kyi legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir/_/lus kyi nyes chen las bsrungs na/_/lus ni bsdam pa byas par 'gyur/_/ngag gi nyes par spyad spangs shing /_/ngag gi legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir/_/ngag gi nyes 
[\[216a.5\]]chen las bsrungs na/_/ngag ni bsdam pa byas par 'gyur/_/yid kyi nyes par spyod spangs shing /_/yid kyi legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir/_/yid kyi nyes chen las bsrungs na/_/yid ni bsdam pa byas par 'gyur/_/lus kyi nyes par spyod spang zhing /_/ngag gi nyes par 
[\[216a.6\]]spyod pa spang /_/yid kyi nyes par spyod spang zhing /_/skyon gzhan ldan pa gang yin spang /_/lus kyi dge bya rnams bya zhing /_/ngag gi dge ba phal chen bya/_/yid kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing /_/tshad med bzhi dang ldan par bya/_/lus kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing /_/ngag dang yid 
[\[216a.7\]]kyis byas na ni/_/'di dang pha rol dag tu yang /_/rtag tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/rtag tu lus ni bsdams pa'i phyir/_/thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin/_/de ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing /_/gang du song na'ang mya ngan med/_/rtag tu ngag ni bsdams pa'i phyir/_/thub pa 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]'tshe ba med pa yin/_/de ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing /_/gang du song na'ang mya ngan med/_/rtag tu yid ni bsdams pa'i phyir/_/thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin/_/de ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing /_/gang du song na'ang mya ngan med/_/brtan pa rnams kyis lus bsdam zhing /_/
[\[216b.2\]]brtan pa rnams kyis ngag kyang bsdam/_/brtan pa rnams kyis yid bsdam zhing /_/brtan pas kun du bsdams byas na/_/de dag 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing /_/gang du song yang mya ngan med/_/lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste/_/ngag gi sdom pa legs pa yin/_/
[\[216b.3\]]yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa ste/_/thams cad du ni bsdams pa legs/_/kun du bsdams pa'i dge slong ni/_/sdug bsngal kun las rnam par 'grol/_/ngag rnams bsrung zhing yid ni legs bsdams te/_/lus kyis mi dge ba dag spyad mi bya/_/las lam 
[\[216b.4\]]gsum po 'di dag rnam sbyangs na/_/drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni thob par 'gyur/_/legs par spyad pa'i tshom sa te bdun pa'o//_//gang dag byas bzhin ma byas zer ba dang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/mi de gnyis 
[\[216b.5\]]ka 'dra ba pha rol tu/_/song nas dman pa'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur/_/skyes bu skyes pa'i kha nas ni/_/chig ngan smra bar byed pa yi/_/tshig gi sta re skyes gyur nas/_/bdag nyid gcod par byed par 'gyur/_/gang zhig smad 'os skye bo stod byed dang /_/bstod 
[\[216b.6\]]'os skye bo rnam par smod byed pa/_/de ni kha yis 'thab khrol kun sogs shing /_/'thab khrol can gang des ni bde mi 'a thob/_/gang 'dir cho los rang nor 'pham byed pa/_/'thab khrol de ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam du zad/_/gang zhig bde bar gshegs la yid 'khrug pa/_/
[\[216b.7\]]de 'dir 'thab khrol shin tu chen po yin/_/ngag yid 'phags pas smad pa'i sdig bsten na/_/bye bar chu bur can dang stong phrag ni/_/bzhi bcu gcig tu chu bur rdol pa yi/_/sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i sems kyis ma nyes skyon 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]rjod pa/_/bdag nyid bsad phyir dmyal ba spel bar zad/_/stobs ldan nyes med pa dag bzod byed cing /_/de la sems kyang 'khrug par mi byed do/_/bsam brlag gang zhig sdig can gyi/_/lta la brten nas 'phags pa ni/_/dgra bcom chos 
[\[217a.2\]]kyis 'tsho ba dang /_/bstan pa spong bar byed pa dag_/smyig ma 'bru chags lta bur ni/_/de ni rang gi 'bras bus gsod/_/chig bzang kho na smra bya yi/_/sdig pa can dag smra mi bya/_/sdig can gdung byed smra ba babs/_/tshig bzang smra bar byed pa rung /_/byis pa sdig can smra 
[\[217a.3\]]byed pa/_/smra ba'i tshe na 'ching 'gyur la/_/gal te smra na gzhan spong ba/_/de dag 'phags pa mi gsung ngo /_/dge slong ngag ni bsdams pa dang /_/dal bus smra zhing zlom pa med/_/gang zhig chos ldan don ston pa/_/de ni snyan par smra ba yin/_/legs par smra ba mchog 
[\[217a.4\]]ces 'phags pa gsung /_/snyan smra mi snyan ma yin de gnyis pa/_/bden smra [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma yin de gsum pa/_/chos smra phal pa ma yin bzhi pa de'o/_/tshig de rnams ni smra bya zhing /_/gang gis bdag kyang mi gdung la/_/pha rol la yang gnod med pa'i/_/tshig de legs 
[\[217a.5\]]par smra bar bya/_/gang gis mngon par dga' 'gyur zhing /_/gang gis sdig pa mi skyed dang /_/smras pas pha rol dga' 'gyur ba'i/_/snyan tshig kho na smra bar bya/_/bden pa'i tshig ni bdud rtsi ste/_/bden pa'i tshig ni bla med yin/_/don dang chos la rab gnas 
[\[217a.6\]]pa/_/bden pa yin zhes dam pa gsung /_/sdug bsngal thams cad spang ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs tshig gang /_/bden pa mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/_/tshig de bla na med pa yin/_/tshig gi tshoms te brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[217a.7\]]chos gcig las ni rab 'das shing /_/'jig rten pha rol bcom pa yi/_/lus can [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yis/_/sdig pa mi bya ci yang med/_/lcags sgong me lce 'bar 'dra ba/_/zos par gyur pa ches sla yi/_/tshul 'chal legs par mi sdom pas/_/yul 'khor bsod 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]snyoms za mi rung /_/khyod ni sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs shing /_/khyod la sdug bsngal mi sdug na/_/mngon sum dag gam lkog tu'ang rung /_/sdig pa can gyi las mi bya/_/gal te sdig pa'i las byas sam/_/byed kyang rung ste khyod kyis ni/_/kog ces langs 
[\[217b.2\]]te bros byas kyang /_/sdug bsngal las ni thar mi 'gyur/_/gang du gnas na las kyis mi tshugs pa'i/_/sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/_/bar snang la med rgya mtsho'i nang na med/_/ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang min/_/pha rol po la brtags nas gang /_/
[\[217b.3\]]sdig pa can gyi las mthong ba/_/de dag bdag gis mi bya ste/_/sdig byas las ni rjes su 'brang /_/las gang shin tu mi bzad dang /_/zol byed gzhal blugs 'chos pa dang /_/mi la 'tshe bar byed pa dang /_/gzhan la byed du 'jug pa yi/_/las de mi yi rjes 
[\[217b.4\]]'brang bas/_/de yis g.yang sar ltung bar byed/_/mi yis dge ba'am sdig pa yi/_/las ni gang dang gang byas pa'i/_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/de lta de ltar 'bras bur 'gyur/_/de yi tshogs pa ji srid par/_/de srid 'di ni rdung bar byed/_/de la gzhan 
[\[217b.5\]]dag rdung byed de/_/rdung byed de ni brtags par 'gyur/_/'di ni bdag rjes mi 'brang zhes/_/byis pas ma brtags byas pa yi/_/sdig pa'i las kyis 'gro ba dag_/pha rol tu ni shes par 'gyur/_/gal te byis pas mi shes par/_/sdig pa'i las ni byas pa dag_/
[\[217b.6\]]nam zhig na ni de nyid kyis/_/rnam smin tsha ba so sor sten/_/rang gi las kyis de'i 'og tu/_/me yis bsregs pa bzhin du gdungs/_/byis pa shes rab chung ngu dag_/bdag la dgra bzhin byed pa yis/_/gang zhig 'bras bu cher 'gyur ba'i/_/sdig can las ni spyod 
[\[217b.7\]]par byed/_/gang dag byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing /_/mchi mas gdong yog ngu bzhin du/_/rnam smin so sor sten pa yi/_/las de dag ni ma byas legs/_/gang zhig byas na mi gdung zhing /_/dga' zhing yid ni bde ba yis/_/rnam smin so sor sten pa yi/_/
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]las de dag ni byas na legs/_/bdag nyid bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir/_/rgod bzhin sdig pa'i las byas pa'i/_/sdig pa'i las de'i rnam smin dag_/ngu bzhin nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/nges par sdig las 'phral du ni/_/'o ma lta bur 'gyur mi 
[\[218a.2\]]byed/_/thal bas g.yogs pa'i me lta bur/_/des ni byis pa sreg par byed/_/sdig las 'phral du nges par ni/_/mtshon bzhin gcod par mi byed kyang /_/sdig pa'i las kyi 'gro ba dag_/pha rol tu ni mngon par 'gyur/_/gang du de dag rnam smin ni/_/tsha ba 
[\[218a.3\]]so sor sten pa yi/_/sdig pa'i las kyi 'gro ba dag_/pha rol tu ni shes par 'gyur/_/lcags las g.ya' ni langs gyur pa/_/langs pa des ni de nyid za/_/de bzhin ma brtags byas pa yi/_/rang gi las kyis ngan 'gror 'gro/_/las kyi tshoms te dgu 
[\[218a.4\]]pa'o//_//dad dang ngo tsha tshul khrims sbyin pa ste/_/chos 'di rnams ni skyes bu dam pas bsngags/_/'di yis lha yi 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/lam 'di nyid kyis lha yul 'gro zhes gsungs/_/'jungs rnams lha yi 'jig rten mi 'gro 
[\[218a.5\]]zhing /_/de yis byis pa sbyin pa'i bsngags mi rjod/_/brtan rnams sbyin la rjes su yi rang ba/_/des ni de dag gzhan du bde ba myong /_/'di na skyes bu'i nor mchog dad pa ste/_/'di na chos la legs spyod bde ba 'thob/_/bden pa kho na ro bro rnams kyi phul/_/shes rab 
[\[218a.6\]]kyis 'tsho 'tsho ba'i mchog ces gsungs/_/mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba yi/_/dgra bcom chos la dad bskyed de/_/mkhas pas gus par mnyan na ni/_/de dang de yi shes rab 'thob/_/bag can gyis ni rgya mtsho dang /_/dad pas chu bo rnams las sgrol/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[218a.7\]]kyis ni sdug bsngal spong /_/shes rab kyis ni yang dag 'gyur/_/dge slong dad pa'i grogs ldan zhing /_/shes rab kyis ni gtams pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das la mngon dga' bas/_/'ching ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur/_/gang gis dad dang tshul khrims dang /_/
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]shes rab nyid ni legs bsgoms shing /_/mkhas pa skyon rnams spong ba de'i/_/legs pa'i ngang tshul can zhes brjod/_/dad dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/_/gtong ldan 'jungs pa rnam spangs pa/_/de ni gang dang gar song ba/_/de dang der ni mchod par 
[\[218b.2\]]'gyur/_/mkhas gang 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na/_/dad dang shes rab sten byed pa/_/de dag de yi nor mchog ste/_/de yi nor gzhan phal par zad/_/'phags pa lta bar 'dod pa dang /_/dam chos nyan par dga' ba dang /_/ser sna'i dri ma rnam spangs pa/_/de ni dad 
[\[218b.3\]]pa can zhes bya/_/dad pa'i lam rgyags bskur bar bya/_/bsod nams chom pos dbrog mi nus/_/chom rkun 'phrog par byed pa bzlog_/dge sbyong rnams kyis blangs nas dga'/_/mkhas pa dge sbyong 'ongs pa la/_/mngon par dga' bar byed 'gyur zhing /_/skye 
[\[218b.4\]]bo rnams ni ci rigs par/_/dad pa ji bzhin sbyin byed cig_/gzhan gyi zas dang skom de la/_/gang zhig yid ni mi bde ba/_/des ni nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/ting 'dzin thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gis ta la'i mgo bcad ltar/_/de 'dra kun du gcod byed pa/_/
[\[218b.5\]]des ni nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/ting nge 'dzin dag thob par 'gyur/_/khron pa skam po ji lta bar/_/dad pa med pa bsten mi bya/_/ji ste de la yongs brkos kyang /_/'dam chu dri nga 'byung bar 'gyur/_/chu mang rnam par dang ba dang /_/bsil bar gyur cing rnyog med pa'i/_/
[\[218b.6\]]mtsho la chu 'dong ji lta bar/_/shes rab can gyis dad ldan bsten/_/chags sam ma chags kyang rung ste/_/de yis thub sku mi nges pas/_/ma dad pa dag spang bar bya/_/dad pa rnams ni nye bar bsten/_/dad pa'i tshoms te bcu pa'o//_//sdom 
[\[218b.7\]]la/_/mi rtag 'dod dang sred pa dang /_/bag yod de bzhin dga' ba dang /_/tshul khrims legs spyod tshig dag dang /_/las dang dad pa de dag bcu/_/bram zes 'dod pa rab spang zhing /_/brtson 'grus kyis ni rgyun chod cig_/'dod pa rab tu ma spangs par/_/
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]thub pa gcig gis ma thob bo/_/kun du rgyu ba zhan pa dag_/nyon mongs phyir yang kun sogs pas/_/brtson 'grus brtan po kho na yis/_/bya ba de nyid byed la rag_/zhan pa'i las ni ji snyed dang /_/kun nas nyon mongs dka' thub dang /_/tshangs spyod 
[\[219a.2\]]yongs su ma dag de/_/don chen 'gyur snyam mi byed do/_/ji ltar mda' ni gzung nyes pas/_/lag pa chod par gyur pa ltar/_/dge slong bsrung ba bya nyes dang /_/dmyal bar nye bar khrid par byed/_/ji ltar mda' ni gzung legs pas/_/lag pa chod par mi 'gyur 
[\[219a.3\]]ltar/_/dge sbyong bsrung ba bya legs na/_/mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'dren/_/dge sbyong rnam par ma shes dang /_/rgal bar dka' dang bzod dka' dang /_/gang dag zhan pa 'gyod 'gyur ba'i/_/sdug bsngal mang po de dag 'byung /_/yang dang yang du 'gyod pa yi/_/
[\[219a.4\]]kun rtog dbang du 'gro ba yi/_/sems ni bzlog pa ma byas par/_/dge sbyong spyod pa ji ltar bya/_/nyes par rab byung nyes dga' ba/_/khyim 'dug nyes rtsom byed pa dag_/sdug bsngal mnyam med sten pa dag_/yang srid sdug bsngal sogs par zad/_/tshem 
[\[219a.5\]]bu ngur smrig gyon pa dang /_/phal cher yang dag mi sdom zhing /_/sdig pa'i chos can sdig la dga'/_/sdig can de dag ngan 'gror 'gro/_/sA la'i shing la 'khri shing ltar/_/gang zhig shin tu khrims 'chal te/_/ji ltar rang la dgra bzhin du/_/de ni de ltar byed 
[\[219a.6\]]par 'dod/_/mgo bo skya bor gyur bar du/_/da dung rgan rabs ma chud pa/_/de ni lang tsho gtugs pa ste/_/de ni rgan blun zhes bya'o/_/gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dag_/spangs shing tshangs par spyod pa dang /_/sde tshogs spangs nas spyod byed pa/_/de ni rgan rabs 
[\[219a.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/brtul zhugs med cing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra na/_/mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/_/rmongs pa 'dod la zhugs pa dag_/ji ga dge sbyong yin nam kye/_/brtul zhugs med cing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra na/_/mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/_/gang zhig sdig pa zhi gyur 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]te/_/mkhas pas dge sbyong yin par shes/_/brtul zhugs med cing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra na/_/mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/_/gang dag sdig pa che phra dag_/kun la brtags nas byed pa dang /_/sdig pa zhi ba de dag ni/_/dge sbyong nyid ces brjod par bya/_/sdig pa 
[\[219b.2\]]spangs pa bram ze ste/_/zhi bar byed pa dge sbyong yin/_/bdag gi dri ma rab spangs pa/_/des na rab tu byung zhes brjod/_/dge sbyong gi tshoms te bcu gcig pa'o//_//gang tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi/_/shes rab kyis ni mthong ba dang /_/lam 'di 
[\[219b.3\]]rab tu shes pa yis/_/srid pa'i sred pa rab tu 'dra la/_/dper na rlung gis rdul bslang ba/_/char pa bab pas zhi byed ltar/_/gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/_/de tshe kun rtog zhi bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig legs par rtogs pa yis/_/skye shi legs par zad 'gyur 
[\[219b.4\]]zhing /_/'jig rten nges 'byed 'gyur ba yi/_/shes rab de ni gtso bo yin/_/bden pa'i nang na bden bzhi dang /_/lam nang yan lag brgyad pa mchog_/rkang gnyis nang na mig can dang /_/chos kyi nang na chags bral mchog_/'du byed thams cad mi rtag par/_/
[\[219b.5\]]gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/_/de tshe sdug bsngal las yid 'byung /_/lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar/_/gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/_/de tshe sdug bsngal las yid 'byung /_/lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/'du 
[\[219b.6\]]byed thams cad stong nyid du/_/gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/_/de tshe sdug bsngal las yid 'byung /_/lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/'du byed thams cad bdag med par/_/gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/_/de tshe sdug bsngal las yid 'byung /_/lam 'di rnam 
[\[219b.7\]]par dag par 'gyur/_/sred pa'i zug rngu gcod byed lam/_/ngas ni khyed cag rnams la bstan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa ste/_/khyed cag rnams kyis bya dgos so/_/sred pa'i zug rngu sel ba'i lam/_/ngas ni khyed cag rnams la bstan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]ston pa ste/_/khyed cag rnams kyis bya dgos so/_/lta ba rnam par dag byed pa/_/lam 'di ma gtogs gzhan med pas/_/ting nge 'dzin la rab gnas te/_/bdud kyi 'ching ba spang bar gyis/_/'di ni drang lam 'di ni pha rol gnon/_/mtsho la ngang pa'i 
[\[220a.2\]]srang ltar bgrod pa gcig//shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag gang rtogs nas/_/tshogs la yang dang yang du bshad pa 'di/_/skye shi'i mtha' rtogs phan mdzad thugs brtse bas/_/bgrod pa gcig lam rab tu bstan mdzad pa'i/_/lam 'dis chu bo rnams las sngon rgal 
[\[220a.3\]]zhing /_/de bzhin rgal bar 'gyur zhing rgal bar mdzad/_/shin tu mthar thug gdul bya dag bya dang /_/'khor ba'i skye shi zad par bya ba dang /_/khams rnams du ma so sor rtogs bya'i phyir/_/spyan dang ldan pas lam 'di rab tu bstan/_/ji ltar chu klung gang gA'i chu 
[\[220a.4\]]rgyun zhugs/_/rgya mtsho'i nang du 'bab par 'gyur ba ltar/_/de bzhin shes rab yangs pas bstan pa'i lam/_/'di ni 'chi med thob par bya phyir 'jug_/gang zhig 'byung po kun la thugs brtse bas/_/sngon chad ma thos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/skyob pa lha dang mi 
[\[220a.5\]]rnams 'dul mdzad pa/_/srid pa'i mthar phyin de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam rtog dge ba gsum ni brtag bya zhing /_/dge ba ma yin gsum yang rnam par spangs/_/kun nas rdul langs char gyis mnan pa ltar/_/de nas rtog dang dpyod pa zhi bar bya/_/de nas sems la 
[\[220a.6\]]rnam rtog nyer zhi nas/_/bla med byang chub bde la reg par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin gsum po rnams la yid gtad cing /_/bden pa las skyes tshad med bsgom par bya/_/dran ldan mkhas pas mdud pa zhi bya zhing /_/gsum po rnams kyis gnas gsum rab tu dral/_/shes 
[\[220a.7\]]rab mtshon dang brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan/_/dran ldan mnyam bzhag ting 'dzin la dga' bas/_/'jig rten skye dang 'jig par rtogs nas ni/_/kun las rab tu rnam grol de rig yin/_/'jig rten mtha' ma legs par rtogs gyur nas/_/'jig rten mthar son pha 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]rol phyin zhes brjod/_/gang gis zhi ba 'phags lam yan lag brgyad/_/lam drang bsgoms pa des ni bdud rtsi rnyed/_/de ltar spyod pas bde 'dod bde ba 'thob/_/snyan pa 'thob cing grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/lam gyi tshoms te bcu gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[220b.2\]]ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/_bam po gnyis pa/_dre'u mo rang gi mngal gyis dang /_/'dam bu smyig ma 'bras bus dang /_/chu shing 'bras bus phung ba ltar/_/pho bshal bkur stis phung bar 'gyur/_/ji srid blun po mchod byas pa/_/de srid rab tu brlag par 'gyur/_/byis 
[\[220b.3\]]pa'i dkar po'i cha 'grib cing /_/de yi spyi bo'ang nges par nyams/_/ngan pa rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /_/dge slong 'khor ni 'dod pa dang /_/gnas la ser sna byed pa dag_/rigs gzhan dag gis mchod pa dang /_/rab tu byung dang khyim pa dag_/gang yang rung bas bdag 'phrigs 
[\[220b.4\]]te/_/bya ba byas rung ma byas rung /_/bdag dbang gyur na re stes zhes/_/de ltar byis pa kun rtog na/_/sems la 'dod chen 'phel bar 'gyur/_/rnyed pa'i thabs ni gzhan yin la/_/mya ngan 'das 'gro'i gzhan yin zhes/_/de ltar ci rigs shes nas su/_/bkur 
[\[220b.5\]]sti dag la mi dga' zhing /_/dben pa rim gyis 'phel byed pa'i/_/dge slong sangs rgyas nyan thos yin/_/thams cad la ni mi rtsol zhing /_/mi yis 'phrigs par ma gyur dang /_/'tsho ba gzhan la mi rten cing /_/chos la tshong pa bzhin mi spyad/_/rang gi rnyed pa blang bya 
[\[220b.6\]]zhing /_/gzhan gyi la ni 'dod mi skyed/_/dge slong gzhan gyi 'dod byed pas/_/ting 'dzin thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te bde bar 'tsho 'dod cing /_/dge sbyong 'di la lta 'dod na/_/dge 'dun gyis ni chos gos dang /_/bza' btung byin par gyur na blang /_/gal te 
[\[220b.7\]]bde bar 'tsho 'dod cing /_/dge sbyong 'di la lta 'dod na/_/byi ba'i khung nas sbrul lta bur/_/gnas mal dag la bsten par gyis/_/gal te bde bar 'tsho 'dod cing /_/dge sbyong 'di la lta 'dod na/_/ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes shing /_/chos gcig po yang bsgom 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]par bya/_/gal te mang po mi shes shing /_/tshul khrims legs par mnyam bzhag na/_/de shes pa dag 'tsho dag cing /_/snyom las med ces stod par byed/_/gal te 'chi bdag nyams byed pa'i/_/zag med rig pa gsum ldan na/_/blun pos ci yang 
[\[221a.2\]]mi shes zhes/_/bsams nas de la 'phya yang sla/_/gang zag sdig pa'i chos can la/_/gal te bza' dang btung ba yi/_/rnyed pa dag dang ldan gyur na/_/de la de dag mchod pa byed/_/mgo bregs ngur smrig byis pa yi/_/bza' ba dang ni btung ba dang /_/gos dang mal cha rnyed 
[\[221a.3\]]pa lta/_/dgra byed mang ba kho nar zad/_/de ltar bkur sti 'jigs chen gyi/_/skyon rnams khong du chud byas nas/_/'phrigs nyung sems khral bskyungs nas su/_/dran ldan dge slong kun du rgyus/_/kham gyi zas kyis sems zhir mi 'gyur yang /_/'tsho ba 'di phyir mi bza' mi bya 
[\[221a.4\]]ste/_/kha zas kyis ni lus dag gnas 'gyur ba/_/de ltar rtogs la bsod snyoms dag la rgyus/_/rigs kyis phyag byas mchod pa gang yin 'di/_/zug rngu phra mo dbyung bar dka' ba ste/_/mi yis bzod dka' bkur sti gang yin 'di/_/'dam dang 'dra bar rab tu rtogs 
[\[221a.5\]]par gyis/_/bkur sti'i tshom sa te bcu gsum pa'o//_//sdig pa'i las ni mi byed pa/_/'khu bya min la gang 'khu ba/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/de nyid sdig pa rnams kyis gos/_/dang por ba dag ni phung byed cing /_/phyi nas gzhan yang phung 
[\[221a.6\]]byed pa/_/khra yi gzan ma'i bya lta bur/_/phung zhing gzhan yang phung bar byed/_/rdeg par byed pas rdeg pa 'thob/_/'khon du 'dzin pas 'khon can mthong /_/de bzhin gshe bas gshe ba ste/_/khro bar byed la khro ba 'byung /_/'di gzhan dge sbyong byis pa ste/_/dam pa'i chos la 
[\[221a.7\]]mi mkhas pa/_/yongs su tshe thung 'di la yang /_/gyi na'i phyir ni 'khon par byed/_/'di ni mchog ces bsams nas su/_/so sor smra zhing 'thun 'jug pas/_/'di na dge 'dun 'byed pa'i tshe/_/ci phyir stobs med sems mi byed/_/rus pa gcog cing srog gcod 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]la/_/rta phyugs nor ni 'phrog pa dang /_/yul 'khor 'joms par byed pa yang /_/phyi nas 'jal dum byed pa ltar/_/mkhas pas brtags shing gsungs pa'i tshig_/spyod yul ston par byed pa yi/_/chos 'di rnam par shes na go/_/khyed cag ci phyir byed mi 'gyur/_/
