[\[221b.2\]]khyod ni mi mkhas lugs can te/_/kha bya yis ni rtsol byed pa/_/pha rol po dag mi shes pas/_/bdag ni 'di la brtson par byed/_/'di na mkhas pa gang yin pa/_/de dag bzhams pa'i tshig gis zhi/_/bdag la kha zer ba dag la gshe/_/bdag pham bdag pham 
[\[221b.3\]]byed pa'o zhes/_/'di gang sems la 'dzin byed pa/_/de yi 'khon ni zhi mi 'gyur/_/bdag la kha zer ba dag la gshe/_/bdag pham bdag pham byed pa'o zhes/_/'di gang sems la mi 'dzin pa/_/de yi 'khon ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/'di na 'khon gyis 'khon can dag_/
[\[221b.4\]]nam yang zhi bar 'gyur ba med/_/bzod pas 'khon ni zhi 'gyur ba/_/'di ni chos kyi rang bzhin yin/_/'khon gyis 'khon can nam yang zhi mi 'gyur/_/'khon med rnams kyis 'khon ni zhi bar byed/_/sha khon zhugs pa lus can la gnod pas/_/de phyir mkhas pas 
[\[221b.5\]]'khon par mi bya'o/_/brtan pa legs gnas lhan cig spyad pa yi/_/grogs po mkhas pa gal te rnyed na ni/_/nyon mongs thams cad mngon par zil mnan nas/_/dran ldan dga' ba'i yid kyis de dang spyad/_/brtan pa legs gnas lhan cig spyad pa yi/_/
[\[221b.6\]]grogs po mkhas pa gal te ma rnyed na/_/yul 'khor yangs pa spangs pa'i rgyal po ltar/_/gcig pus spyad bya sdig pa mi bya'o/_/bdag dang 'thun par spyod pa yi/_/grogs bzang rnyed par ma gyur na/_/byis pa grogs su mi 'gyur bas/_/gcig pus spyod 
[\[221b.7\]]pa brtan par bya/_/byis pa grogs su mi 'gyur bas/_/gcig pu spyod par byed sla bas/_/ma tang dgon pa'i glang po ltar/_/sems khral bskyungs te gcig pu spyad/_/'khu ba'i tshoms te bcu bzhi pa'o//_//sangs rgyas kyis ni bstan 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]pa bzhin/_/gang gi dbugs dbyung rngub dran pa/_/yongs su rdzogs par legs bsgoms pas/_/rim gyis yongs su byang gyur te/_/sprin bral nyi ma zla ba ltar/_/'jig rten 'di na kun nas gsal/_/'greng dang 'dug dang de bzhin nyal ba dang /_/lus 
[\[222a.2\]]dang de bzhin sems ni 'jog byed cing /_/dge slong dran pa de legs 'jog pa na/_/snga phyi'i khyad par rnams ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/snga phyi'i khyad par rnams ni thob gyur na/_/'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro/_/lus rtogs dran pa nye bar bzhag nas su/_/
[\[222a.3\]]reg pa'i skye mched drug ni bsdams byas te/_/gang zhig rtag tu mnyam par 'jog byed pa/_/de bdag nyid kyis mya ngan 'das pa rtogs/_/gang zhig rtag tu rnam pa thams cad du/_/lus rtogs dran pa nye bar 'jog byed pa/_/bdag nyid med cing bdag gir 'dzin pa med/_/
[\[222a.4\]]bdag tu mi 'gyur bdag gir 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/de ltar dge slong mnyam 'jog myur du ni/_/yul la sred pa dag las rgal bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig dran dang shes bzhin mnyam 'jog dang /_/dga' dang rab tu dang bas dus dus su/_/chos 'di la spyod mel tse byed pa de/_/
[\[222a.5\]]skye rga rnams las rgal bar 'gyur zhes gsung /_/de ltas rtag tu mel tse byed sten cing /_/dge slong mkhas pa dran ldan brtson pa yis/_/skye ba kun du sbyor ba spangs nas su/_/des ni 'di la mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/gnyid log de dag sad par byed pa yi/_/mel tse bdag 
[\[222a.6\]]las khyod nyon cig_/nyal bas mel tse byed sla ste/_/mel tse byed la 'jigs pa med/_/mel tse byed par brtson pa dang /_/nyin mtshan rjes su slob byed cing /_/'chi ba med la lhag mos pa'i/_/zag pa rnams ni za par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/sangs 
[\[222a.7\]]rgyas rjes su dran byed cing /_/gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs song ba/_/de dag mi yi rnyed pa yin/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/chos rnams rjes su dran byed cing /_/gang dag chos la skyabs song ba/_/de dag mi yi rnyed pa yin/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]su/_/dge 'dun rjes su dran byed cing /_/gang dag dge 'dun skyabs song ba/_/de dag mi yi rnyed pa yin/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran byed pa/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 
[\[222b.2\]]nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/chos rnams rjes su dran byed pa/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/dge 'dun rjes su dran byed pa/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 
[\[222b.3\]]'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/tshul khrims rjes su dran byed pa/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/gtong ba rjes su dran byed pa/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad 
[\[222b.4\]]pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/lha ni rjes su dran byed pa/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/rtag tu lus rtogs dran byed pa/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par 
[\[222b.5\]]sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/rtag tu ting 'dzin bzhi dran pa/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/'tshe ba med la yid dga' ba/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/
[\[222b.6\]]legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/gnod sems med la yid dga' ba/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/bsgom pa la ni yid dga' ba/_/gau ta ma yi 
[\[222b.7\]]nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/stong pa nyid la yid dga' ba/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/mtshan ma med la yid dga' ba/_/
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/dben pa la ni yid dga' ba/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/nges par 
[\[223a.2\]]'byung la yid dga' ba/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/ci yang med la yid dga' ba/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams 
[\[223a.3\]]su/_/mya ngan 'das la yid dga' ba/_/gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/_/legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/_/dran pa'i tshoms te [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//bdag gi bya ba bya ba'i dus g.yo bas/_/dang po kho nar bya ba'i mel tse gyis/_/bdag gis 
[\[223a.4\]]dang po de ltar byas na ni/_/bya ba bya ba'i dus ltar zad 'dod cing /_/ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin 'byor 'gyur bar/_/de yi rang bzhin nga yis mthong bas na/_/ji srid don ni phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba/_/de srid bar du mi yis bsgrim par gyis/_/bsgrim zhing brtson par bya ba 
[\[223a.5\]]yis/_/bdag nyid gling du 'gyur bar bya/_/mgar ba yis ni dngul bzhin du/_/rang gi dri ma sbyang bar gyis/_/dri ma sbyangs pa skyon mi 'byung /_/phyi nas skye dang rga mi 'thob/_/ngo tsha min la ngo tsha zhing /_/ngo tsha ba la ngo mi tsha/_/mi 'jigs pa la 'jigs lta dang /_/'jigs 
[\[223a.6\]]la mi 'jigs lta ba yi/_/log par lta ba blangs pa yis/_/sems can ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'di na gang sngon bag med las/_/phyi nas bag dang ldan gyur te/_/sprin bral nyi ma zla ba ltar/_/'jig rten 'di na kun nas gsal/_/'di na gang sngon bag med las/_/
[\[223a.7\]]phyi nas bag dang ldan gyur te/_/'jig rten 'di na sred pa las/_/dran pa legs par 'da' bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig gzhon nur rab byung nas/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug pa de/_/sprin bral nyi ma zla ba ltar/_/'jig rten 'di na kun nas gsal/_/gang zhig gzhon 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]nur rab byung nas/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug pa de/_/'jig rten 'di na sred pa las/_/dran pas legs par 'da' bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig sdig pa'i las byas pa/_/dge bas 'gebs par byed pa de/_/sprin bral nyi ma zla ba ltar/_/'jig rten 'di na kun nas gsal/_/
[\[223b.2\]]gang zhig sdig pa'i las byas pa/_/dge bas 'gebs par byed pa de/_/'jig rten 'di na sred pa las/_/dran pas legs par 'da' bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig gson la mi dga' ba/_/de ni shi na'ang mya ngan med/_/brtan pa go 'phang mthong ba de/_/mya ngan dbus na'ang 
[\[223b.3\]]gdung mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig gson la mi dga' ba/_/de ni shi na'ang mya ngan med/_/brtan pa go 'phang mthong ba de/_/gnyen 'dun dbus na lam mer 'dug_/dge slong dkar po bsgom gyis la/_/nag po'i chos ni rnam par spongs/_/khyim nas khyim med song nas su/_/
[\[223b.4\]]spyod yul dben pa gang yin pa/_/de la mngon par dga' bslab cing /_/'dod pa ci yang med par spangs/_/rtag tu snying po dag pa dang /_/rtag tu gso sbyong dag pa dang /_/gtsang ma'i las ni dag pa de'i/_/brtul zhugs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/zhing gi skyon 
[\[223b.5\]]ni rtswa yin ltar/_/skye dgu 'di la 'dod chags skyon/_/de bas 'dod chags bral rnams la/_/byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/_/zhing gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/_/skye dgu 'di la zhe sdang skyon/_/de bas zhe sdang bral rnams la/_/byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/_/zhing gi 
[\[223b.6\]]skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/_/skye dgu 'di la gti mug skyon/_/de bas gti mug bral rnams la/_/byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/_/zhing gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/_/skye dgu 'di la nga rgyal skyon/_/de bas nga rgyal bral rnams la/_/byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/_/zhing gi 
[\[223b.7\]]skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/_/skye dgu 'di la chags pa skyon/_/de bas chags dang bral rnams la/_/byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/_/zhing gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/_/skye dgu 'di la sred pa skyon/_/de bas sred dang bral rnams la/_/byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/_/drug 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]pa bdag po rgyal po ste/_/chags par gyur na chags can yin/_/ma chags gyur nam chags yin/_/chags pa byis pa zhes brjod do/_/'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dang /_/'chab pa gang du gnas pa yi/_/grong khyer rus pa'i ra ba can/_/sha dang khrag 
[\[224a.2\]]gis zhal zhal byas/_/rgyu yis kun nas bslang ba las byung sdug bsngal can/_/de ma mthong na der ni de dag 'ching 'gyur zhing /_/de dag rtogs na chu bo rnams ni rab tu spong /_/phyi rol pa la chags pa de dag spong ba med/_/sil bu'i tshoms te bcu drug 
[\[224a.3\]]pa'o//_//de dag khyim la mi dga' bar/_/dran dang ldan pa 'bad pa yis/_/ngang pas mtsho ngan spong ba ltar/_/de dag khyim spangs chu bo rgal/_/brtan pa 'jig rten nges byung nas/_/bdud kyi sde rnams rab bcom ste/_/nyi ma'i lam nas 
[\[224a.4\]]ngang pa ltar/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/_/tshangs par spyod pa ma spyad cing /_/gzhon nur nor ni ma rnyed pa/_/mtsho ngan nya nyung ngogs dag na/_/chu skyar rgan sems bzhin du 'gyur/_/tshangs par spyod pa ma spyad cing /_/gzhon nur nor ni ma rnyed pa/_/sngan 
[\[224a.5\]]chad byas pa rjes dran zhing /_/lus bskums nas ni nyal bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa chung byas bdag nyid kyi/_/phyi bzhin mi 'ong ma sems shig_/chu yi thigs pa lhung ba yis/_/bum chen gang ba ji bzhin du/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bsags pa yi/_/sdig pas byis pa 
[\[224a.6\]]gang bar 'gyur/_/dge ba chung byas bdag nyid kyi/_/phyi bzhin mi 'ong ma sems shig_/chu yi thigs pa lhung ba yis/_/bum chen gang ba ji bzhin du/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bsags pa yi/_/dge bas brtan pa gang bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig rags brtsigs mtsho 
[\[224a.7\]]ngan spangs/_/rgya mtsho'i chu bo rgal 'dod pa/_/skye bos gzings ni bcas nas kyang /_/skye bo mkhas pa rgal bar byed/_/rgal nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/bram ze skam sar gnas par mdzad/_/de la dge slong khrus byed cing /_/nyan thos rnams kyis 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]gzings kyang bcas/_/ji ltar mtsho chen zab mo dag_/rab tu mnam dang rnyog med ltar/_/de bzhin mkhas pa rab dang bas/_/'di ni chos ni nyan par byed/_/'di ltar kun na chu yod pas/_/su zhig tshol zhing rgyu byed de/_/khron pa'i chu lta ci zhig dag dgos/_/
[\[224b.2\]]sred pa rtsa nas gcad par gyis/_/btso blag mkhan dag chus 'khru zhing /_/mda' mkhan mes ni srong ba dang /_/shing mkhan shing la 'jog sbyong ltar/_/mkhas pas bdag nyid gdul bar bya/_/nam mkha' lta bur chags med cing /_/sgo them lta bur 
[\[224b.3\]]g.yo ba med/_/rnyog pa can gyi mtsho lta bur/_/mkhas pa 'khor ba la mi dga'/_/chu'i tshoms te bcu bdun pa'o//_//lhar bcas gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'di/_/sa stengs las rgyal gang zhing lags/_/me tog lta bur rab 'dod 
[\[224b.4\]]pa'i/_/chos bzhi legs par ston mkhas gang /_/lhar bcas gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'di/_/sa stengs las rgyal slob pa yi/_/me tog lta bur rab 'dod pa'i/_/chos bzhi legs par ston mkhas de/_/nags tshal las ni 'jigs skyes phyir/_/
[\[224b.5\]]nags tshal gcad kyi shing ma yin/_/nags dang nags sbyor chod cig dang /_/dge sbyong mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/gal te nags sbyor ma bcad na/_/phra rab kyis kyang mi rnams sa skye/_/ma drung nu zho 'dod be'u ltar/_/de yis yid ni rab tu 'ching /_/lag pas 
[\[224b.6\]]ston ka'i pad ma ltar/_/bdag la dga' ba bcad nas su/_/rgyal gsungs mya ngan 'das pa'i phyir/_/zhi ba'i lam nyid bskyed par gyis/_/ji ltar me tog yid 'ong ba/_/kha dog bzang yang dri med ltar/_/de bzhin legs par gsungs pa'i tshig_/'bras bu 
[\[224b.7\]]med par ma byed cig_/ji ltar bung ba me tog gi/_/kha dog dri la mi gnod par/_/khu ba bzhibs nas 'phur ba ltar/_/de bzhin thub pa grong du rgyu/_/gzhan gyi skyon la mi brtag cing /_/gzhan gyi byas dang ma byas min/_/bdag nyid kyis ni rigs pa dang /_/mi 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]rigs pa la brtag par bya/_/ji ltar phyag dar phung po dag_/mi gtsang chu ni med 'di las/_/pad ma kha bye gtsang ba dang /_/dri zhim yid 'ong rab skyes ltar/_/de bzhin so so skye bo dag_/ldongs gyur phyag dar phung 'di las/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas 
[\[225a.2\]]kyi nyan thos dag_/shes rab kyis ni gsal ba 'byung /_/ji ltar me tog phung po las/_/me tog phreng rgyud mang byed ltar/_/de bzhin mir ni skyes pa yis/_/dge ba phal chen rnams kyang bya/_/ji ltar dbyar ka ba ku la'i/_/me tog rab tu rnam 'brul ltar/_/de bzhin 
[\[225a.3\]]dge slong 'dod chags dang /_/zhe sdang gti mug spang bar gyis/_/mi yid la rnam chags dang /_/me tog bzhin du rab bsags pa/_/'chi bdag gis ni blangs nas 'gro/_/nyal 'gro chu bos bdas pa bzhin/_/mi yid la rnam chags dag_/me tog 
[\[225a.4\]]bzhin du rab bsags pa/_/'dod pa rnams kyis mi ngoms shing /_/'chi bdag gis ni dbang du byed/_/mi yid la rnam chags dag_/me tog bzhin du rab bsags pa/_/longs spyod skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/'chi bdag gis ni dbang du byed/_/mi yi yid 
[\[225a.5\]]la rnam chags dag_/me tog bzhin du rab bsags pa/_/bya ba mthar ni ma phyin par/_/'chi bdag gis ni dbang du byed/_/lus 'di bung ba 'dra bar rtogs byas shing /_/de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/_/bdud kyi me tog mchog ni 'dir 
[\[225a.6\]]gcod pa/_/'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro/_/'jig rten 'di dag bung ba 'drar rtogs shing /_/de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/_/bdud kyi me tog mchog ni 'dir gcod pa/_/'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro/_/
[\[225a.7\]]lus 'di dbu ba 'dra bar rtogs byas shing /_/de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/_/bdud kyi me tog mchog ni 'dir gcod pa/_/'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro/_/'jig rten 'di dag dbu ba 'drar rtogs shing /_/de bzhin chos rnams 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/_/bdud kyi me tog mchog ni 'dir gcod pa/_/'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro/_/srid pa u dum ba ra 'i me tog ltar/_/snying po med par sems pa'i dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas 
[\[225b.2\]]pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/_/'dod chags ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/_/zhe sdang ma lus 
[\[225b.3\]]gcod byed dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/_/gti mug ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags 
[\[225b.4\]]rnying rje ba bzhin/_/chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'/_/nga rgyal ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/_/chags pa ma lus gcod byed dge slong 
[\[225b.5\]]gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/_/sred pa ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spang ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/me tog 
[\[225b.6\]]gi tshoms te [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//ji ltar rta [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lcag gis gzhus pa na/_/skrag cing shugs drag 'gro byed ji bzhin du/_/dad pa tshul khrims ting 'dzin ldan pa dang /_/chos rnams rnam par gtan la 'bebs ldan zhing /_/dbang po mnyam 
[\[225b.7\]]bzhag bzod ldan 'grogs bde ba/_/skyob pa de rnams sred pa ma lus spong /_/ji ltar rta [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lcag gis gzhus pa na/_/skrag cing shugs drag 'gro byed ji bzhin du/_/dad pa tshul khrims ting 'dzin ldan pa dang /_/chos rnams rnam par gtan la 'bebs ldan 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]zhing /_/rig dang rkang par ldan zhing dran ldan pa'i/_/skyob rnams sdug bsngal ma lus spong bar mdzad/_/'dul sbyong byed pas legs btul rta lta bur/_/gang zhig dbang po legs par sdom pa yis/_/khro ba spong zhing zag pa zad byed pa/_/thub de rnams 
[\[226a.2\]]kyis lha yi bar du myong /_/bag yod pa yis bag med dang /_/mi nyal mang pos gnyid log dang /_/rta [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ni rta rgod ltar/_/shin tu mkhas pas spangs nas 'gro/_/rta [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la ni lcag bzhin du/_/gang zhig ngo tsha shes sten cing /_/shes rab legs par 
[\[226a.3\]]mnyam bzhag pa/_/des ni sdig pa sel bar byed/_/dul ba 'dun sar 'gro byed cing /_/dul ba rgyal po lhag par zhon/_/gang zhig tshig ngan byed pa/_/dul ba mi yi nang na mchog_/glang po'i nang na glang chen dang /_/sin du'i cang shes rta dang ni/_/dre'u 'dul 
[\[226a.4\]]byed pa gang yin pa/_/de bas bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog_/bdag nyid legs 'dul gang yin pa'i/_/mkhas des zhi ba thob 'gyur gyi/_/bzhon pa de dag rnams kyis ni/_/sa de mngon par 'thob mi sri srid/_/glang po'i nang na glang chen dang /_/sin du'i cang shes 
[\[226a.5\]]rta dang ni/_/dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa/_/de bas bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog_/bdag nyid legs 'dul dran ldan gang /_/des ni sdug bsngal mthar phyin gya/_/bzhon pa de dag rnams kyis ni/_/sa de mngon par 'thob mi sri srid/_/glang po'i nang na glang chen dang /_/
[\[226a.6\]]sin du'i cang shes rta dang ni/_/dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa/_/de bas bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog_/bdag nyid legs 'dul dran ldan gang /_/des ni 'gro rnams spong 'gyur gyi/_/bzhon pa de dag rnams kyis ni/_/sa de mngon par 'thob mi srid/_/glang po'i nang na 
[\[226a.7\]]glang chen dang /_/sin du'i cang shes rta dang ni/_/dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa/_/de bas bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog_/bdag nyid legs 'dul gang yin des/_/'ching ba bcad nas 'gro 'gyur gyi/_/bzhon pa de dag rnams kyis ni/_/sa de mngon par 'thob mi 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]sri srid/_/'dul sbyong byed pas rta [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ltar/_/bdag nyid kho na gdul bar bya/_/bdag nyid legs par 'dul ba yis/_/sdug bsngal rnams kyi pha mthar phyin/_/bdag nyid kho na bdag gi mgon/_/bdag nyid bdag gi skyabs yin pas/_/'dul sbyong byed pas 
[\[226b.2\]]rta [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ltar/_/de bas bdag nyid gdul bar bya/_/rta yi tshoms te bcu dgu pa'o//_//khro ba spangs shing nga rgyal rnam spangs na/_/kun sbyor kun las shin tu 'da' 'gyur zhing /_/ming dang gzugs la chags pa med de dag_/ci yang med 
[\[226b.3\]]pas chags pa'i rjes mi lhung /_/skyes ma thag tu khro ba spongs/_/skyes nas 'dod chags spang bar gyis/_/brtan pas ma rig rab tu spang /_/bden pa mthong na bde bar 'gyur/_/khro ba spangs na bde bar nyal/_/khro ba spangs na gdung mi 'gyur/_/dge slong khro ba 
[\[226b.4\]]bde 'joms pa'i/_/dug gi rtsa ba chom shig dang /_/'phags pa rnams kyis bsngags 'gyur zhing /_/de bcom pa yis mya ngan med/_/gang khros bdag gis legs byas kyi/_/ma legs min zhes rab smra ba/_/de ni khro ba zhi 'og tu/_/me yis bsregs 
[\[226b.5\]]bzhin gdung bar 'gyur/_/ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa/_/khro ba can la brtul zhugs med/_/khro bas mngon par zil gnon pa/_/de la su yang rten mi byed/_/gang zhig byis pa'i mthu stobs can/_/de yi stobs ni stobs med yin/_/byis pa chos dang bral ba la/_/
[\[226b.6\]]bsgrub par bya ba yod re skan/_/gang zhig stobs dang ldan gyur yang /_/stobs chung rnams kyi bzod byed pa/_/de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces gsungs/_/nyam chung ba lta rtag tu sgur/_/gang zhig gzhan gyi dpon gyur kyang /_/stobs chung rnams kyi bzod byed pa/_/de 
[\[226b.7\]]ni bzod pa'i mchog ces gsungs/_/nyam chung ba lta rtag tu sgur/_/gzhan gyis lhag par brgyad bkag kyang /_/stobs ldan gang zhig bzod byed pa/_/de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces gsungs/_/nyam chung ba lta rtag tu sgur/_/gzhan gyis lhag par smad byas kyang /_/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]stobs ldan gang zhig bzod byed pa/_/de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces gsungs/_/nyam chung ba lta rtag tu sgur/_/gang zhig pha rol khros rig nas/_/bdag nyid nye bar zhi byed pa/_/de ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi/_/'jigs chen dag las skyob pa yin/_/
[\[227a.2\]]gang zhig pha rol khros rig nas/_/bdag nyid nye bar zhi byed pa/_/de ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi/_/gnyi ga'i don ni spyod pa yin/_/bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag dang /_/gnyi ga'i don ni spyod de la/_/skye bo chos la mi mkhas rnams/_/byis pa yin zhes sems kyang 
[\[227a.3\]]sla/_/gtso bo'i tshig ni 'jigs phyir bzod byed dang /_/thab zla'i tshig ni 'thab gcugs rgyu bzod pas/_/gang zhig dman pa'i tshig la bzod byed de/_/bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas rab tu gsungs/_/byis pa khros nas tshig rtsub da ga_/smras na rgyal bar 'gyur 
[\[227a.4\]]snyam sems/_/gang zhig tshig dag bzod byed pa/_/de ni rtag tu rgyal ba yin/_/bden par smra bya khro mi bya/_/slong la chung yang sbyin par bya/_/rnam pa 'di gsum gnas kyis ni/_/lha yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/khro ba'i zil gyis non pa'i mis/_/rang 
[\[227a.5\]]gi don kyang mi rtogs pas/_/'khor gyi nang du bag skyong la/_/khro ba med pa'i tshig smros shig_/gang zhig khros la slar khro ba/_/de ni sdig pa can 'gyur bas/_/khros la slar ni ma khro dang /_/thub par dka' ba'i g.yul las rgyal/_/khro ba med pas khro ba thub/_/
[\[227a.6\]]legs pas legs pa ma yin thub/_/sbyin pa yis ni 'jungs pa thub/_/bden pas bden pa ma yin thub/_/dul zhing rigs pas 'tsho ba dang /_/khro ba med pa ga la khro/_/yang dag shes pas rnam grol ba'i/_/mkhas pa rnams la khro ba med/_/khro ba med 
[\[227a.7\]]la 'tshe med la/_/'phags pa'i skye bos rtag bsten kyang /_/skye bo sdig can khro ba dag_/ri bo bzhin du sgur bar byed/_/gang zhig khro ba byung ba dang /_/shing rta 'khyams las 'dzin byed de/_/'dul sbyong mkhan du ngas gsungs kyi/_/zhags 'degs skye bo phal 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]pa yin/_/khro ba'i tshoms te nyi shu pa'o//_//sdom la/_/dge sbyong lam dang bkur sti dang /_/'khu dang lnga pa dran pa ste/_/sil bu chu dang me tog dang /_/rta dang khro ba bcu pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di na kun rig kun zil gnon/_/'di na chos rnams 
[\[227b.2\]]kun gyis ma gos shing /_/kun spangs sred zad rab tu rnam grol ba/_/nyid kyis mngon mkhyen pa la su yis bstan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi'i ston pa ste/_/stobs rnams kun ldan thams cad mkhyen pa nga /_/byang chub brnyes nas nyid kyis rab ston pa/_/
[\[227b.3\]]mtshungs med mnyam med nga la su yis bas bstan/_/nga ni 'jig rten dgra bcom ste/_/'jig rten dag na bla med dang /_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/bdud rnams zil gnon rgyal ba nga /_/nga dang 'dra ba med pas na/_/nga la slob dpon su yang med/_/'jig rten 'di na 
[\[227b.4\]]gcig pu yis/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med brnyes/_/gang zhig zag pa zad brnyes pa/_/rgyal ba nga 'drar shes par gyis/_/sdig pa'i chos las nga rgyal bas/_/de bas nye 'gro nga rgyal ba/_/'jig rten yul sred rgal ba yi/_/kun mkhyen sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das/_/
[\[227b.5\]]'jig rten pa la ma bstan par/_/kun nas 'byung ba mi shes pas/_/bA ra Na sIr song nas su/_/ngas ni chos kyi rnga brdung zhing /_/'jig rten sus kyang ma bskor ba'i/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byas/_/dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/'di na chos kyis 
[\[227b.6\]]'dul bar mdzad/_/de dag chos kyis btul ba la/_/mkhas pa su yang smod mi byed/_/brtan gang ting 'dzin la zhugs shing /_/nges 'byung zhi la dga' ba dang /_/sku yi tha ma 'dzin pa yi/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/_/shes rab myur ba de dag la/_/
[\[227b.7\]]lha dang mi rnams dga' bar byed/_/gang dag 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/gang dag ma byon sangs rgyas dang /_/gang dag da ltar rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mang po'i mya ngan sel mdzad pa/_/bzhugs par gyur cing bzhugs pa dang /_/de bzhin bzhugs par 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]'gyur kun gyis/_/dam chos bla mar mdzad pa 'di/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid yin/_/de bas 'di na bdag dga' zhing /_/bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te/_/dam pa'i chos la bla mar bya/_/mi gang sangs 
[\[228a.2\]]rgyas bstan pa la/_/dad pa ma bskyed byis pa de/_/rgud pa'i gnas su 'gro 'gyur te/_/srin mo rnams kyis tshong pa bzhin/_/mi gang sangs rgyas bstan pa la/_/dad pa bskyed pa shes rab can/_/de ni bde bar pha rol 'gro/_/sprin shugs ldan pas tshong pa bzhin/_/
[\[228a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam med mtshungs pa med/_/bde bar rnam rtog de bzhin rab dben pa'i/_/rnam rtog gnyis po spyod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/mun bsal pha rol gshegs shing grags dang ldan/_/des ni brnyes bya brnyes shing yid dbang gyur/_/kun 
[\[228a.4\]]grol zag zad rab tu rnam par grol/_/rnam grol thugs ldan tha ba zag med rnams/_/lus can 'jig rten rnams la phan phyir gzigs/_/'ga' zhig ri bo'i spo la 'dug nas su/_/'gro ba rnams la kun du lta ba ltar/_/de bzhin blo bzang mya ngan bral ba dag_/chos 
[\[228a.5\]]las byung ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]steng gshegs nas/_/skye bo skye rgas zil gnon mya ngan gyis/_/gdungs pa rnams la kun du spyan gzigs nas/_/'chi ba med pa'i sgo mo 'byed mdzad kyis/_/gang dag nyan 'dod the tsom bsal bar gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[228a.6\]]tshoms te nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//legs par thos dang legs spyod dang /_/khyim nas legs par byung ba dang /_/spong bar byed pas rab bskor cing /_/dge sbyong gi ni rjes 'thun legs/_/byis pa mi mkhas pa dag ni/_/'chi ba 
[\[228a.7\]]med pa lta bur spyod/_/mkhas pa dam pa'i chos dag la/_/mtshan mo'i nad pa bzhin du byed/_/ji ltar khyim ni legs g.yogs pa/_/mun pas khebs pa'i nang zhugs na/_/gzugs rnams yod par gyur kyang ni/_/mig ldan bzhin du mi mthong ba/_/de bzhin 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]'di na rigs skyes pa'i/_/mi ni blo gros ldan gyur kyang /_/sdig pa dang ni dge ba'i chos/_/ma thos bar du shes mi 'gyur/_/mig ldan mar me yod pa yis/_/gzugs rnams mthong ba ji lta bar/_/de bzhin dge dang sdig pa'i chos/_/thos pas rnam par shes 
[\[228b.2\]]par 'gyur/_/thos pas chos rnams rnam par shes/_/thos pas sdig las ldog par 'gyur/_/thos pas don med spong bar byed/_/thos pas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/gal te thos pa mang gyur kyang /_/tshul khrims legs par mi sdom na/_/de ni tshul 
[\[228b.3\]]khrims phyir smad cing /_/de yi thos pa phun sum min/_/gal te thos pa nyung gyur kyang /_/tshul khrims legs par sdom byed na/_/de ni tshul khrims phyir bsngags shing /_/de yi thos pa phun sum 'gyur/_/gang zhig thos pa nyung ba dang /_/tshul khrims 
[\[228b.4\]]legs par mi sdom pa/_/de ni gnyi ga'i phyir smad cing /_/de yis brtul zhugs phun sum min/_/gang zhig mang du thos pa dang /_/tshul khrims legs par sdom byed pa/_/de ni gnyi ga'i phyir bsngags shing /_/de yis brtul zhugs phun sum 'gyur/_/thos pa 
[\[228b.5\]]mang zhing chos 'dzin dang /_/shes rab ldan zhing mnyam bzhag pa/_/de dag sus kyang smad 'os min/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi gser rgyan bzhin/_/gang zhig gzugs kyis rjes dpog cing /_/nga la sgra yis 'jal byed pa/_/'dun pa'i 'dod chags ldan pa yi/_/skye 
[\[228b.6\]]bo de yis nga mi shes/_/gal te nang ni rnam shes shing /_/phyi rol mthong bar ma gyur na/_/nang gi 'bras bu mthong ba gang /_/de ni sgra yis drang du rung /_/gal te phyi rol mthong gyur cing /_/nang ni shes par ma gyur na/_/phyi rol 'bras bu mthong ba gang /_/de ni sgra 
[\[228b.7\]]yis drang du rung /_/gal te nang yang mi shes shing /_/phyi rol mthong bar ma gyur na/_/byis pa kun nas bsgribs pa dag_/de ni sgra yis drang du rung /_/gal te nang ni rnam shes shing /_/phyi rol dag kyang mthong gyur pa/_/bstan pa nges 'byung shes rab can/_/de ni sgra 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]yis drang du rung /_/rna bas phal chen thos pa dang /_/mig gis mang po mthong na yang /_/bstan pa mthong thos de kun gyis/_/yid ches bya ba'i mi rigs so/_/legs gsungs thos pa snying por shes pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dag snying por shes 
[\[229a.2\]]gyur kyang /_/gang zhig bag med rlang por byed pa de'i/_/thos dang shes pa don chen mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig 'phags pas bstan pa'i chos dga' zhing /_/de bzhin lus dang ngag gis spyod byed pa/_/de dag bzod ldan 'grogs dga' dbang po bsdams/_/
[\[229a.3\]]thos dang shes pa'i pha rol phyin pa 'thob/_/thos pa'i tshoms te nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//legs par gsungs la bslab bya zhing /_/dge sbyong la ni bsnyen bkur dang /_/dben pa dang ni stan gcig dang /_/sems ni nye bar zhi bar bya/_/
[\[229a.4\]]stan gcig mal stan gcig pa dang /_/gcig pu snyom las med spyod cing /_/gcig pu nags tshal gnas pa dang /_/gcig pus bdag nyid gdul bar bya/_/gang zhig stong phrag stong dag gi/_mi yi g.yul las rgyal ba babs/_/gang zhig bdag las 
[\[229a.5\]]rgyal byed pa/_/de ni mi yi g.yul las rgyal/_/rtag tu sdom pa spyod pa yi/_/mi yis bdag brtul gcig pu yis/_/bdag nyid las rgyal mchog yin gyi/_/skye dgu gzhan lta phal par zad/_/shes rab kyis gnas dge slong gis/_/rgyal bar byas la 
[\[229a.6\]]bdud dang ni/_/tshangs par bcas pas pham mi nus/_/lha yis ma yin dri zas min/_/bdag nyid dang por rigs par gnas byas nas/_/phyi nas gzhan dag bdag bzhin gdul bar bya/_/bdag nyid dang por rigs par gnas byas nas/_/phyi dus 'dul tshe 
[\[229a.7\]]mkhas pa nyon mi mongs/_/bdag la ji ltar byas pa bzhin/_/gzhan dag la yang de ltar bya/_/bdag nyid dul zhing zhi ba yis/_/gzhan dag bde bar gdul bar bya/_/bdag la ji ltar byas pa bzhin/_/gzhan dag la yang de ltar bya/_/kye ma bdag rang 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]legs dul ba/_/bdag nyid dul bas dga' bar 'gyur/_/bdag gi don phyir gzhan don ni/_/mang po dag kyang gtang bar bya/_/bdag don ched cher shes gyur na/_/rang gi don gyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su 
[\[229b.2\]]zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/_/mkhas pas don rnams 'thob par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/_/mkhas pas chos rnams 'thob 
[\[229b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/_/mkhas pas grags pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag 
[\[229b.4\]]nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/_/mkhas pas bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/_/mkhas pas bde 'gro 'thob par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag 
[\[229b.5\]]gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/_/yun ring mtho ris dga' bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa/_/
[\[229b.6\]]gnyen gyi nang na lam mer 'bar/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa/_/mya ngan nang na gdung mi 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 
[\[229b.7\]]'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/_/'ching ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/_/ngan 'gro thams cad spong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/_/sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thar/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/
[\[230a.2\]]bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/_/bdag nyid mgon du 'gyur ba 'thob/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/_/mya ngan 'das nyid nye bar 'gyur/_/bdag gi tshoms te 
[\[230a.3\]]nyi shu gsum pa'o//_//gang dag don dang mi ldan tshig_/tshigs bcad brgya dag smra ba bas/_/gang dag nye bar zhi 'gyur ba'i/_/don ldan tshig gcig thos pa rung /_/gang dag chos dang mi ldan tshig_/tshigs bcad brgya dag smra ba bas/_/
[\[230a.4\]]gang dag nye bar zhi 'gyur ba'i/_/chos ldan tshig gcig thos pa rung /_/tshul 'chal mnyam par ma bzhag pa/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/tshul khrims ldan zhing mnyam bzhag pa/_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/brtson med le lo ldan pa dag_/
[\[230a.5\]]lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa brtsams pa dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/shes 'chal mnyam par ma bzhag pa/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/shes rab chen po mnyam bzhag pa/_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig 
[\[230a.6\]]gson pa rung /_/skye dang 'jig pa ma mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/skye dang 'jig pa mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/tshor ba zad pa ma mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/tshor ba zad pa mthong 
[\[230a.7\]]ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/zag pa zad pa ma mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/zag pa zad pa mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/go 'phang mi g.yo ma mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]pas/_/go 'phang mi g.yo mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/go 'phang blta dka' ma mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/go 'phang blta dka' mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/go 'phang mthon po ma 
[\[230b.2\]]mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/go 'phang mthon po mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/go 'phang dam pa ma mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/go 'phang dam pa mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig 
[\[230b.3\]]gson pa rung /_/'chi med go 'phang ma mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/'chi med go 'phang mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/bdud rtsi'i go 'phang ma mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/bdud rtsi'i 
[\[230b.4\]]go 'phang mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/rdul med go 'phang ma mthong ba/_/lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/rdul med go 'phang mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/rdul bral go 'phang ma mthong ba/_/
[\[230b.5\]]lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/_/rdul bral go 'phang mthong ba dag_/nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung /_/mi ni lo brgyar nags tshal na/_/me la yongs sten gang yin dang /_/bdag nyid bsgom la yud tsam zhig_/mchod pa byed pa gang 
[\[230b.6\]]yin pa/_/mchod byed de nyid ches rung gi/_/lo brgyar sbyin sreg byed mi rung /_/zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses/_/kha zas za ba gang yin/_/sangs rgyas la ni dad pa yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses/_/kha zas za ba gang yin 
[\[230b.7\]]des/_/dam pa'i chos la dad pa yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses/_/kha zas za ba gang yin des/_/dge 'dun la ni dad pa yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses/_/kha zas za ba gang yin des/_/sems 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]can rnams la snying brtse ba'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses/_/kha zas za ba gang yin des/_/srog chags rnams la snying brtse ba'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses/_/kha zas za ba gang 
[\[231a.2\]]yin des/_/'byung po rnams la snying brtse ba'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses/_/kha zas za ba gang yin des/_/byams par sems par byed pa yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses/_/kha zas za ba gang yin 
[\[231a.3\]]des/_/legs par gsungs pa'i dam chos kyi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stong /_/lo brgyar byed pa gang yin des/_/sangs rgyas la ni dad pa yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stong /_/lo brgyar byed pa gang 
[\[231a.4\]]yin des/_/dam pa'i chos la dad pa yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stong /_/lo brgyar byed pa gang yin des/_/dge 'dun la ni dad pa yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stong /_/lo brgyar byed pa gang yin 
[\[231a.5\]]des/_/sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stong /_/lo brgyar byed pa gang yin des/_/srog chags rnams la snying brtse ba'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stong /_/lo brgyar byed pa gang 
[\[231a.6\]]yin des/_/'byung po rnams la snying brtse ba'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stong /_/lo brgyar byed pa gang yin des/_/byams par sems par byed pa yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stong /_/lo brgyar 
[\[231a.7\]]byed pa gang yin des/_/legs par gsungs pa'i dam chos kyi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/bsod nams 'dod pa'i mi yis 'jig rten du/_/sbyin sreg mchod sbyin [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ci byas des/_/gang zhig drang po'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal ba/_/de yi bzhi char yang 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ni mi phod do/_/bsgre ba'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/_bam po gsum pa/_dad pa med cing 'jungs pa dang /_/dbyen byed phra ma can dag dang /_/mkhas pas bshes par mi bya zhing /_/sdig can mi dang 'grogs 
[\[231b.2\]]mi bya/_/dad ldan snyan par smra ba dang /_/thos mang tshul khrims ldan pa dang /_/mkhas pa yis ni mdza' bya zhing /_/mi mchog dag dang 'grogs par bya/_/sdig pa'i grogs po mi bsten cing /_/skyes bu ngan pa bsten mi bya/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten bya 
[\[231b.3\]]zhing /_/skyes bu dam pa bsten par bya/_/de lta bu dag bsten byas na/_/sdig par mi 'gyur legs par 'gyur/_/gang dag thos mang gnas mang sems pa dang /_/dad dang shes rab ldan de mi yis bsten/_/'dir ni de yis legs smras mnyan byas na/_/ring 
[\[231b.4\]]po nas kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur/_/dman pa bsten pas mi dag nyams 'gyur zhing /_/thad kar bab pa bsten pas so na gnas/_/gtso bo bsten pas dam pa 'thob 'gyur bas/_/de phyir bdag pas gtsor gyur bsten par bya/_/tshul khrims nye bar zhi 
[\[231b.5\]]ba dang /_/shes rab ches mchog ldan pa yi/_/gtso bo gang yin de bsten na/_/gtso bo bas kyang ches gtsor 'gyur/_/mi yis 'di na nya rul la/_/ku sha'i gtsang byed bcings pa gang /_/ku sha nyid kyang rul 'gyur ba/_/sdig pa bsten pa'ang de bzhin 'gyur/_/
[\[231b.6\]]mi yis rgya spos pa la sha'i/_/lo mar phur ma byas pa gang /_/lo ma nyid kyang dri zhim pa/_/dam pa bsten pa'ang de bzhin 'gyur/_/gal te sdig pa byed pa dag_/sdig mi byed pas bsten na yang /_/sdig pa byed par dogs skye zhing /_/mi snyan pa yang 'phel 
[\[231b.7\]]bar 'gyur/_/bsten bya ma yin bsten pa'i mi/_/de yi skyon gyis skyon can 'gyur/_/dong par dug bskus mda' bcug pas/_/dug ma bskus pa'ang gos pa bzhin/_/brten pa skyon gos 'jigs pa dag_/sdig pa can dang bshes mi bya/_/ji ltar grogs 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]po bsten pa dang /_/ji ltar nye bar bsten byas pa/_/bsten bya de ni ci 'dra bar/_/ring po mi thogs de 'drar 'gyur/_/de bas 'bras bu'i snod bzhin du/_/bdag gis bsten pa shes pa yis/_/dam pa ma yin mi bsten cing /_/mkhas pas dam pa 
[\[232a.2\]]bsten byas la/_/dge slong de'i lam rjes 'brang na/_/sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur/_/byis pas ji srid gson bar du/_/gal te mkhas pa bsten byas kyang /_/de yis chos shes mi 'gyur te/_/gzar bus tshod ma'i ro bzhin no/_/shes rab ldan pas yud 
[\[232a.3\]]tsam zhig_/mkhas pa nye bar bsten pas kyang /_/de yis chos rnams shes 'gyur te/_/lce yis tshod ma'i ro bzhin no/_/byis pas ji srid gson bar du/_/gal te mkhas pa bsten byas kyang /_/de la mig ni med pa'i phyir/_/chos rnams shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[232a.4\]]shes rab ldan pas yud tsam zhig_/mkhas pa nye bar bsten pas kyang /_/de la mig ni yod pa'i phyir/_/chos rnams rab tu shes par 'gyur/_/byis pas ji srid gson bar du/_/gal te mkhas pa bsten byas kyang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa yi/_/chos 
[\[232a.5\]]rnams de yis shes mi 'gyur/_/shes rab ldan pas yud tsam zhig_/mkhas pa nye bar bsten pas kyang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa yi/_/chos rnams de yis shes par 'gyur/_/don ldan tshig ni gcig gis kyang /_/mkhas pa yi ni bya ba byed/_/sangs 
[\[232a.6\]]rgyas kun gyi gsung gis kyang /_/byis pa'i bya ba byed mi 'gyur/_/blo dang ldan pa tshig gcig gis/_/tshig brgya dag ni shes par 'gyur/_/byis pa la ni tshig stong gis/_/tshig gcig shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/nyis na mkhas dang mi mdza' sla'i/_/byis pa rnams 
[\[232a.7\]]dang mdza' mi rung /_/byis pa rnams dang mdza' byed pa/_/sems can dmyal bar khrid par byed/_/byis pa gang zhig byis pa'o zhes/_/shes pa de 'dir mkhas pa yin/_/byis pa gang zhig mkhas sems pa/_/de ni byis pa zhes brjod do/_/byis pas bstod 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]pa gang yin dang /_/mkhas pas smad pa gang yin las/_/mkhas pas smad pa ches rung gis/_/byis pas bstod pa mi rung ngo /_/byis pa bsten pa sdug bsngal zhing /_/rnam pa kun du dgra 'dra bas/_/byis pa mi thos mi mthong zhing /_/ma bsten gyur pa nyid rung 
[\[232b.2\]]ngo /_/gnyen dang phrad pa ji lta bar/_/brtan pa bsten na bde bar 'gyur/_/de bas rgyu skar lam du zla ba ltar/_/brtan zhing thos mang mchog 'dren byed pa dang /_/tshul khrims ldan dang 'phags pa'i brtul zhugs can/_/mi mchog brtse ldan blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bsten par 
[\[232b.3\]]gyis/_/mdza' bshes kyi tshoms te nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//ru sbal rang gi khog par yan lag ltar/_/dge slong yid kyi rnam rtog nang bsdus nas/_/rten pa med cing gzhan la 'tshe med par/_/mya ngan 'das la su yang smod mi byed/_/bzod pa 
[\[232b.4\]]dka' thub mchog ste bzod pa ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces sangs rgyas gsung /_/rab tu byung ba gzhan la 'tshe ba dang /_/gzhan la gnod pas dge sbyong ma yin no/_/tshig rtsub ci yang smra mi bya/_/smras na slar yang smra bar byed/_/'thab gcugs tshig gis 
[\[232b.5\]]sdug bsngal zhing /_/de la phyir yang chad pas gcod/_/gal te bdag gis phar byas na/_/'khar ba'i snod la brdungs pa bzhin/_/'khor bar skye dang rga ba dag_/yun ring nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis phar ni ma byas dang /_/'khar ba'i snod la ma 
[\[232b.6\]]brdungs ltar/_/'di ltar 'thab mo mi 'byung zhing /_/mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur/_/nad med rnyed pa'i dam pa ste/_/chog shes pa ni nor gyi dbyig_/yid gcugs bshes pa'i mchog yin te/_/mya ngan 'das pa bde ba'i phul/_/'du byed sdug bsngal ma 
[\[232b.7\]]rungs pa/_/nad kyi nang na bkres mi bzad/_/de ltar ji bzhin shes na ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu 'gyur/_/bde 'gror 'gro ba nyung zad de/_/ngan 'gror 'gro ba bsam yas shig_/de lta'i nyes dmigs rtogs gyur na/_/myur du mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/bde 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]'gror 'gro ba rgyu dang bcas/_/ngan 'gror 'gro ba rgyu dang ldan/_/mya ngan 'das 'gro rgyu can te/_/de dag thams cad rgyu dang bcas/_/nags tshal mchog tu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'gro/_/mkha' la bya rnams 'gro bar byed/_/chos la rnam par bsgoms 'gro ste/_/
[\[233a.2\]]dgra bcom mya ngan 'das par 'gro/_/'di na brtson 'grus zhan pa dang /_/blo chung shes pa med pa yis/_/mdud pa thams cad rab gtubs pa'i/_/mya ngan 'das pa thob mi 'gyur/_/khyod kyis gru 'di'i chu phyags dang /_/'di ni yang bar 'gyur ba ltar/_/de bzhin 
[\[233a.3\]]zhe sdang 'dod chags spongs/_/de nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/sngon chad byung ba mi 'byung zhing /_/ma byung ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/_/da ltar byung ba'ang yod ma yin/_/blta dka' mtha' med der mi mthong /_/bden pa rab rtogs 
[\[233a.4\]]shes pa dang /_/sred dang dga' ba med mthong ba/_/'di 'dra 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha'/_/sred pa rnams ni bcad pa dang /_/'dod chags rab tu spangs pa dang /_/mtsho bskams nas ni mi 'bab pa/_/'di 'dra 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha'/_/lus zhig tshor ba bsil 
[\[233a.5\]]bar gyur/_/'du shes 'gags shing 'du byed zhi/_/rnam par shes pa nub gyur pa/_/'di 'dra 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha'/_/lta bas mthong bar gyur tsam dang /_/nyan pas thos par gyur pa tsam/_/rtogs par byed pas rtogs tsam dang /_/rnam par shes pas 
[\[233a.6\]]rnam shes tsam/_/'di 'dra 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha'/_/'di dang ma dang gdungs rab gdungs/_/'di 'dra 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha'/_/ma re ma dga' rab zhi dang /_/kun du 'dod chags bral gyur pa/_/'di 'dra 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha'/_/rten pa yod pas 
[\[233a.7\]]spyod par 'gyur ro/_/spyod pa yod pas gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhol ba yod pas shin tu ma sbyangs par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu ma sbyangs pa yod pas 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba dang 'ong ba yod pas gzhan du shi 'pho len par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du shi 'pho 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]blangs pas 'di ltar gzhan du skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa 'byung zhing 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[233b.2\]]rten pa med pas spyod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/spyod pa med pas gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhol bar ma gyur pas shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu sbyangs pas 'gro ba dang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pas gzhan du 'chi 'pho len pa med 
[\[233b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du 'chi 'pho len pa med pas 'di ltar gzhan du skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur zhing /_'di ltar 
[\[233b.4\]]sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma bcos pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang /_mi 'byung ba yod do/_/skye ba dang /_'byung ba dang /_bcos ma dang /_sems pas byas pa dang /_
[\[233b.5\]]'dus byas dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yod do/_/dge slong dag gal te ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma bcos pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang /_mi 'byung ba med du zin na/_skye ba dang /_'byung ba dang /_bcos ma dang /_'dus byas dang /_
[\[233b.6\]]sems pas byas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i nges par 'byung ba yod do zhes nga mi smra'o/_/dge slong dag gang gi phyir 'di na ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma bcos pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang /_mi 'byung ba yod pa de'i phyir/_skye ba dang /_'byung 
[\[233b.7\]]ba dang /_bcos ma dang /_'dus byas dang /_sems pas byas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i nges par 'byung ba yod do zhes nga smra'o/_/skyes dang byung dang 'byung ba dang /_/bcos dang 'dus byas mi brtan zhing /_/rga dang 'chi dang rmongs pa yi/_/chos can 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]rab tu 'jig 'gyur ba/_/zas kyi rgyud las byung ba yi/_/'jig 'gyur 'di la dga' mi bya/_/de yi nges par 'byung ba'i gzhi/_/rtog dang dpyod dang zhi ba dang /_/sdug bsngal chos rnams 'gags pa ste/_/'du byed nye bar zhi ba bde/_/dge slong 
[\[234a.2\]]dag de ni gang du yang gnas par mi 'gyur te/_sa la gnas par mi 'gyur/_chu la ma yin/_me la ma yin/_rlung la ma yin/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched la ma yin/_'du 
[\[234a.3\]]shes yod min med min skye mched la ma yin/_'jig rten 'di la ma yin/_'jig rten pha rol la ma yin/_nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la gnas pa ma yin te/_'di la dmigs pa med par ngas mngon par shes so/_/dge slong dag de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yod par 
[\[234a.4\]]nga mi smra ste/_gnas par ma yin no/_/'chi 'pho yod par nga mi smra ste/_skye bar ma yin/_'di lta bu 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa/_/de la dkar pos gsal mi byed/_/de la mun pa'ang 
[\[234a.5\]]yod ma yin/_/de la zla bas snang mi byed/_/de la nyi mas mngon mi byed/_/thub pa bram ze gang yin pa/_/des ni rang gis rig pa yin/_/de ni gzugs dang gzugs med dang /_/sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol/_/mthar phyin 'jigs pa med pa ste/_/rlom 
[\[234a.6\]]med 'gyod pa med pa yin/_/srid pa'i zug rngu gtubs pa ste/_/lus kyi tha mar gyur pa yin/_/'di ni mthar phyin rnams kyi mchog_/zhi ba'i go 'phang bla med pa/_/mtshan ma thams cad zad pa ste/_/byang grol go 'phang 'chi med yin/_/mtshungs dang mi mtshungs 
[\[234a.7\]]'byung ba yi/_/'du byed thub pas rab tu spangs/_/nang du mnyam bzhag dga' ba yis/_/sgo nga'i sbubs ni dral nas byung /_/sbyin kun chos kyi sbyin pas thub/_/dga' kun chos kyi dga' bas thub/_/stobs kun bzod pa'i stobs kyis thub/_/bde kun sred pa 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]zad pas thub/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//bdag las gzhan pa'i skyon dag ni/_/phub ma gtor ba ji bzhin du/_/gzhan gyi skyon mthong sla ba ste/_/rang gi skyon ni mthong bar dka'/_/g.yo can cho lo 'jo ba ltar/_/
[\[234b.2\]]rang gi de ni sbed pa dang /_/gzhan gyi skyon la lta byed cing /_/rtag tu 'phyas lang 'du shes can/_/de yis ring du chos mi mthong /_/g.yon phyogs chos ni rab tu 'phel/_/spyi rdol byed cing 'phrog rlom can/_/mi gtsang las ldan khwa lta bur/_/shin tu nyon mongs 'tsho ba can/_/ngo tsha med pa'i 'tsho 
[\[234b.3\]]ba sla/_/rtag tu gtsang ma tshol ba dang /_/thub chod mi byed 'dzem bag can/_/'tsho ba dag pa lta ba yi/_/ngo tsha shes pa'i 'tsho ba dka'/_/'jig rten mun par gyur 'di ste/_/de las lhag mthong ldan pa nyung /_/rgya las shor ba'i bya lta bur/_/
[\[234b.4\]]mtho ris la dga' shas tsam zhig_/byis pa lus kyis bcings gyur pa/_/mun pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba yin/_/'jig rten nor la chags pa dag_/gzhan rdzas lta bur lta bar byed/_/bdag gis skye dgu 'di phyung zhing /_/gzhan gyis byas so snyam sems pa/_/bden 
[\[234b.5\]]pa min la bden lta bas/_/ci yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ni 'gas kyang mi mthong zhing /_/zug rngu mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yul sred gang la skye bo chags pa yi/_/zug rngu de dag sngon chad mthong ba dag_/de ni bdag gis byas snyam mi 'dzin cing /_/de ni gzhan 
[\[234b.6\]]gyis byas snyam mi 'dzin to/_/skye dgu 'di dag nga rgyal ldan/_/nga rgyal la chags nga rgyal bcings/_/rtsod par gyur pa'i lta ba can/_/'khor ba ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/thob par gyur pa gang yin dang /_/thob par bya ba gang yin pa/_/de dag gnyi ga rdul gyis yog_/
[\[234b.7\]]rjes su nad pa slob par byed/_/gang zhig tshul khrims dang /_bslab pa dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_tshangs par spyod pa dang /_dka' thub dang /_nye bar gnas pa snying por byed pa de ni mtha' gcig go/_/gang zhig de ltar lta zhing 'di skad ces 'dod pa ni gtsang ba'o/_/'dod 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]pa ni bsod nyams can no/_/'dod pa ni longs spyad par bya ba'o/_/'dod pa ni skyon med pa yin no zhes smra zhing de dag lhag par 'dod pa rnams su lhung bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs len pa 'di yang mtha' gcig go/_/mtha' gnyis po 'di dag ni dur 
[\[235a.2\]]khrod 'phel bar byed pa ste/_'di dag gis dur khrod 'phel bar byas so/_/mtha' gnyis po 'di dag ma mthong ba kha cig zhen par byed cing /_kha cig mngon par rgyug par byed la/_de dag lhag par zhen par byed cing lhag par rgyug par byed pa dag mig dang ldan 
[\[235a.3\]]pas mthong ngo /_/mtha' gnyis po 'di dag mthong ba na zhen par mi byed rgyug par mi byed la/_de dag lhag par zhen par mi byed cing lhag par rgyug par mi byed pa yang mig dang ldan pas mthong ngo /_/de dag de ltar mi byed cing de dag de ltar mi sems na/_de dag gi 
[\[235a.4\]]lam du mi gdags pa 'di lta ste 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/_/ji ltar chu bur mthong ba dang /_/ji ltar smig rgyu mthong ba ltar/_/de bzhin 'jig rten lta byed pa/_/'chi bdag rgyal pos mthong mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar chu bur mthong ba dang /_/ji ltar smig rgyu 
[\[235a.5\]]mthong ba ltar/_/de bzhin lus la lta byed pa/_/'chi bdag rgyal pos mthong mi 'gyur/_/gang la byis pa mngon chags pa/_/de la mkhas pa chags mi 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i shing rta bkra ba ltar/_/lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis/_/gang la byis pa rmongs 'gyur ba/_/
[\[235a.6\]]de la mkhas pa rmongs mi 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i shing rta bkra ba ltar/_/lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis/_/gang du byis pa nyams gyur pa/_/glang rgan rdzab tu chud pa bzhin/_/rgyal po'i shing rta bkra ba ltar/_/lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis/_/nad pa lta bur 'jig chos 
[\[235a.7\]]can/_/rma byung ba dang 'dra ba ste/_/gang yang brtan par mi gnas pa/_/lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis/_/nad pa 'jig pa'i chos can ltar/_/gang yang brtan par mi gnas par/_/nor bu'i rna cha gdub 'khor gyis/_/brgyan pa'i lus la blta bar gyis/_/skra ni lan 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]bu brgyad byas shing /_/mig sman gyis ni bskus pa'i mig_/byis pa lhag par rmongs byed kyang /_/pha rol tshol bar mi byed do/_/mig sman gyis ni gsar bris shing /_/rnag can lus ni brgyan pa yis/_/byis pa lhag par rmongs byed kyang /_/pha rol tshol bar mi byed do/_/
[\[235b.2\]]lus ni dri zhim gyis bskus nas/_/rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa dag_/byis pa lhag par rmongs byed kyang /_/pha rol tshol bar mi byed do/_/gang zhig 'dod par kun sbyor 'brel chags shing /_/kun du sbyor ba'i skyon rnams ma mthong ba/_/'dod par 'brel la chags 
[\[235b.3\]]pa'i mi de yis/_/chu bo mtha' yas yangs pa rgal mi 'gyur/_/chags bral mchog dang tha ma thams cad dag_/'di la bdag dang bdag gir mi lta zhing /_/de ltar rnam grol sngon chad ma rgal ba'i/_/chu bo rab rgal yang srid med par 'gyur/_/gang zhig tshal spangs 
[\[235b.4\]]tshal med pa/_/nags tshal spangs nas nags su rgyug_/grol ba 'ching bar gcen pa yin/_/gang zag 'di la ltos shig tshur/_/shing rta 'thun pa'i rtsibs ldan pa/_/yan lag yid 'ong gos dkar g.yogs/_/sdig med 'gro ba la ltos la/_/ching ma'i rgyun 
[\[235b.5\]]rnams bcad par gyis/_/'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi dag ni/_/phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang /_/skyed mos tshal dang mchod gnas dang /_/ljon shing rnams la skyabs su 'gro/_/skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing /_/skyabs de mchog tu gyur pa min/_/de la 
[\[235b.6\]]skyabs su song ba yis/_/sdug bsngal kun las grol mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas chos dang ni/_/dge 'dun la ni skyabs song zhing /_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang /_/sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang /_/bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/_/'phags 
[\[235b.7\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag_/gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/_/de ni skyabs kyi mchog yin zhing /_/de ni skyabs kyi dam pa yin/_/de la skyabs su song ba yis/_/sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/mthong bas mthong zhing 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]mthong bas ma mthong mthong /_/ma mthong mi mthong mthong bya mthong mi 'gyur/_/'dra mthong lhag mthong tha dad dngos por brjod/_/nyin mtshan nam yang lhan cig mi gnas bzhin/_/'dra ba mthong bas mthong mi 'gyur/_/gal te mthong na 'dra mi mthong /_/
[\[236a.2\]]mthong 'dis 'dra ba mi mthong ste/_/'dra mthong mi yis mthong ba med/_/mi yis ci ma mthong na 'dra ba mthong /_/ci zhig mthong na 'dra ba mthong mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'di na 'dra ba mthong ba dag_/gang zhig med na 'dra bar mthong dang bral/_/gang tshe 'di yis sdug 
[\[236a.3\]]bsngal ma mthong ba/_/de yi tshe na bdag tu mthong bar 'gyur/_/ji lta ji ltar sdug bsngal rtogs gyur pa/_/des ni bdag 'di 'dra ba mthong mi 'gyur/_/gang gis so so'i skye bsgribs na/_/'du byed sdug bsngal ma mthong ba/_/de phyir 'di na 'dra mthong ste/_/de med 'dra 
[\[236a.4\]]ba mi mthong ngo /_/mthong ba'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste/_/dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya/_/rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/sbyin pas bsod nams rab tu 'phel/_/
[\[236a.5\]]legs bsdams dgra sogs mi 'gyur ro/_/dge dang ldan pas sdig pa spong /_/nyon mongs zad pas mya ngan 'da'/_/mkhas dang 'dre dang byis pa'i skye bo dang /_/lhan cig spyod dang gcig pu gnas kyang rung /_/ngang pas chu la 'o ma 'thung ba ltar/_/mkhas pas sdig 
[\[236a.6\]]pa can rnams rab tu spang /_/'jig rten nyes dmigs mthong ba dang /_/'gog par 'gyur ba'i chos mthong bas/_/'phags pa sdig la dga' mi byed/_/sdig can dge la dga' mi 'gyur/_/legs par nyer zhi'i ro dang ni/_/rab tu dben pa'i ro shes pa/_/rims 
[\[236a.7\]]nad med cing sdig med la/_/chos la dga' ba'i ro dag 'thung /_/sems kyi zag pa med pa dang /_/sems ni 'ching bas ma bcom la/_/dge dang sdig pa rab spangs pa/_/ngan 'gro rnams kyis 'jigs pa med/_/gnas min zlog dang legs smra dang /_/nyes dmigs 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]ston par byed pa dang /_/mkhas pas tshar gcod smra byed pa/_/de lta'i skye dgu bsten par bya/_/de lta bu dag bsten byas na/_/sdig par mi 'gyur legs par 'gyur/_/nye bar zhi zhing rab zhi la/_/dal bus smra zhing khengs med pa/_/sdig pa'i chos rnams sprug byed de/_/rlung gis 
[\[236b.2\]]ljon shing lo ma bzhin/_/gang zhig skyes bu dag cing nyon mongs med/_/rab tu sdang med mi la khro byed pa'i/_/byis pa de la sdig pa phyir 'gog ste/_/rdzi phyogs su ni rdul rnams gtor ba bzhin/_/dge ba byed pas dge ba dang /_/sdig pa byed pas sdig pa ste/_/mi yis 
[\[236b.3\]]gang dang gang byas pa/_/de de rang gis mthong bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis sdig pa byas na ni/_/de bdag kho na kun nyon mongs/_/bdag gis sdig pa ma byas na/_/bdag nyid kho na rnam par dag_/gzhan gyis gzhan spyod mi byed kyi/_/dag dang ma dag rang rang byed/_/bdag 
[\[236b.4\]]nyid kyis ni sdig pa dag_/byas shing nye bar bsags pa yis/_/bsam brlag mngon du 'joms par byed/_/rdo rjes nor bu 'bigs pa bzhin/_/mig ldan 'gro bar byed pa yis/_/nyam nga'i lam dag ji lta bar/_/mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir/_/sdig pa 
[\[236b.5\]]dag ni yongs su spang /_/nor chen gyis ni grogs nyung dang /_/tshong pas 'jigs bcas lam dang ni/_/gson par 'dod pas dug lta bur/_/mkhas pas sdig can yongs su spang /_/gal te lag mthil rma med na/_/lag pas dug ni bzung byas kyang /_/rma med dug ni mi 
[\[236b.6\]]'jen ltar/_/ma byas pa la sdig pa med/_/bdag la mi phan bya ba dang /_/legs pa ma yin bya bar sla/_/gang dag phan zhing bder 'gyur ba/_/de ni mchog tu bya bar dka'/_/dam pas legs pa bya sla yi/_/dam pas sdig pa bya bar dka'/_/ngan pas sdig pa bya sla 
[\[236b.7\]]yi/_/'phags pas sdig pa bya bar dka'/_/ji srid sdig pa ma smin pa/_/de srid byis pa mngar bar sems/_/gang tshe sdig pa smin gyur pa/_/de tshe de ni tsha bar sems/_/ji srid sdig pa ma smin pa/_/de srid sdig pa rung bar lta/_/gang tshe sdig pa smin gyur pa/_/de tshe 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]sdig pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/ji srid bzang po ma smin pa/_/de srid bzang po sdig par mthong /_/gang tshe bzang po smin gyur pa/_/de tshe bzang por mthong bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa sdug bsngal sogs pas na/_/de la dga' bar mi bya'o/_/brgya la sdig pa byas na 
[\[237a.2\]]yang /_/yang dang yang du de mi bya/_/bsod nams bde ba sogs pas na/_/de nyid la ni dga' bar bya/_/gal te bsod nams byas na yang /_/de ni yang dang yang du bya/_/sdig la yid ni mngon dga' ba/_/bsod nams dal bus byed 'gyur bas/_/sdig pa las ni sems bzlog 
[\[237a.3\]]cing /_/bsod nams mngon par smyur te bya/_/sdig pa chung ngu byas pas kyang /_/'jig rten pha rol 'jig chen dang /_/phung khrol chen po byed 'gyur te/_/khong par song ba'i dug bzhin no/_/bsod nams chung ngu byas pas kyang /_/'jig rten pha rol bde bar 'dren/_/don chen 
[\[237a.4\]]dag kyang byed 'gyur te/_/'bru rnams phun sum 'byor ba bzhin/_/gang zhig nyes med chad pas gcod/_/sdang ba min la rab sdang ba/_/gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba bcu/_/myur du thob pa kho nar 'gyur/_/tshor ba mi bzad pa dag gam/_/yang na lus ni 'dral 
[\[237a.5\]]ba'am/_/gnod pa'i tshor ba tsha ba'ang rung /_/yang na sems 'khrugs thob par 'gyur/_/gnyen 'dun rnams dang bral ba'am/_/longs spyod zad par 'gyur ba'am/_/rgyal po'i gnod pa 'byung ba'am/_/mi snyan shin tu mi bzad dam/_/yang na khyim ni me chen pos/_/nges 
[\[237a.6\]]par sreg par byed par 'gyur/_/shes rab 'chal ba lus zhig nas/_/bcu pa ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa byas pas bag dbab mi bya ste/_/ring byas rgyang mar byas kyang bag mi dbab/_/dben par byas kyang bag dbab mi bya ste/_/de yi rnam smin yod pas 
[\[237a.7\]]bag mi dbab/_/bsod nams byas pas bag ni dbab bya ste/_/ring byas rgyang ring byas kyang bag dbab cing /_/dben par byas kyang bag ni dbab par bya/_/de yi rnam smin yod pas bag dbab bo/_/bdag gis sdig pa byas pas mya ngan byed/_/ring dang rgyang ring byas 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]pas mya ngan byed/_/bdag gis dben par byas pas mya ngan byed/_/de yi rnam smin yod pas mya ngan byed/_/bdag nyid nag po'i las dang ldan mthong nas/_/'dir yang mya ngan gzhan du'ang mya ngan byed/_/sdig pa byas pas gnyi gar mya ngan byed/_/de ni mya ngan de rab 
[\[237b.2\]]mya ngan byed/_/bdag gis bsod nams byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/_/ring dang rgyang ring byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis dben par byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/_/de yi rnam smin yod pas dga' bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid rnam dag las dang ldan mthong 
[\[237b.3\]]nas/_/'di na dga' 'gyur gzhan du'ang dga' bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams byas pas gnyi gar dga' 'gyur zhing /_/de ni dga' 'gyur de rab dga' bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis sdig pa byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing /_/ring byas rgyang ring byas pas gdung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[237b.4\]]bdag gis dben par byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing /_/de yi rnam smin yod pas gdung bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid nag po'i las dang ldan mthong nas/_/'di na gdung 'gyur pha rol gdung bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa byas pas gnyi gar gdung 'gyur zhing /_/de ni gdung 'gyur 
[\[237b.5\]]de rab gdung bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis bsod nams byas pas dga' 'gyur zhing /_/ring byas rgyang ring byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis dben par byas pas dga' 'gyur zhing /_/de yi rnam smin yod pas dga' bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid dkar po'i 
[\[237b.6\]]las dang ldan mthong nas/_/'di na dga' 'gyur pha rol dga' bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams byas pas gnyi gar dga' 'gyur zhing /_/de ni dga' 'gyur de rab dga' bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa byas shing bsod nams ma byas la/_/chos dang gol zhing chos min thob pa'i 
[\[237b.7\]]mi/_/sdig pa'i las can 'chi bas 'jigs 'gyur te/_/chu chen nang du gru ngan zhig pa bzhin/_/bsod nams byas shing sdig pa ma byas la/_/dam pa rnams kyi sngon gyi chos spyod pas/_/nga ni nams kyang 'chi bas 'jigs med de/_/brtan pa'i gru yis pha rol 'gro 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]ba bzhin/_/sdig pa'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//ji srid nyi ma ma shar ba/_/de srid srin bu me khyer snang /_/nyi ma shar bar gyur pa na/_/snang ba med cing sngon por 'gyur/_/ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma shar/_/de srid 
[\[238a.2\]]rtog ge pa rnams snang /_/'jig rten rdzogs sangs rgyas shar ba/_/rtog can nyan thos bcas mi snang /_/gces min gces par blos 'dzin cing /_/gces la gces pa min rtog pa/_/log par kun rtog spyod yul can/_/des ni gces pa thob mi 'gyur/_/gces pa 
[\[238a.3\]]min la gces min dang /_/gces la gces par 'du shes pa/_/legs par kun rtog spyod yul can/_/des ni gces pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/'di na lta dang nyan la mngon zhen pa'i/_/chings ma gsar dang gsar du 'phel ba dag_/'khor bar rgyug cing 'gro dang sdod 'gyur 
[\[238a.4\]]te/_/me nang lhung ba'i phye ma leb dang 'dra/_/'di la myong 'gyur gzhan la myong 'gyur ba'am/_/'di na the tshom tha dad ji snyed pa/_/de dag tshangs par spyad spyod 'bad pa dang /_/sems par byed pas rab tu rnam par spong /_/gang zhig snyigs ma yod bzhin du/_/ngur 
[\[238a.5\]]smrig gos ni gyon byed pa/_/dul dang des pa med pa de/_/ngur smrig gyon pa'i 'os ma yin/_/gang zhig snyigs ma rnams spangs nas/_/tshul khrims legs par mnyam bzhag pa/_/dul dang des par ldan pa de/_/ngur smrig gyon pa'i 'os yin no/_/g.yo sgyu 
[\[238a.6\]]'jungs dang ldan pa'i mi/_/kha dog dang ni gzugs ldan pa'am/_/yang na smra bar byed tsam gyis/_/pho mchog yin par mi chud do/_/gang zhig chos gsum de dag rnams/_/ta la'i mgo bo bzhin bcad nas/_/blo ldan skyon ni bsal ba de/_/pho mchog yin par 
[\[238a.7\]]brjod par bya/_/'jig rten 'di na legs par ma bsdams pa/_/phal cher legs bsdams rtags kyis rgyu byed pas/_/legs par ma brtags bar du mi dag gi/_/mdog gzugs lan 'ga' mthong bas yid ma rton/_/ra gan kha bsgyur lta bur mi 'tsham zhing /_/
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]lcags phyed gser gyis g.yogs pa ji lta bur/_/khong pa rab gdug phyi rol 'phags tshul gyis/_/'jig rten 'di na 'khor dang bcas par rgyu/_/gang zhig rde 'gengs gnyid ni log pa dang /_/nyin dang mtshan du 'gre ldog nyal byed pa/_/rdzab nang phag chen lus 
[\[238b.2\]]rgyas ji lta bar/_/yang dang yang du smad pa'i mngal du 'jug_/mi ni rtag tu dran pa ldan pa dang /_/rtag tu kha zas kyi ni tshod shes pa/_/de yi sdug bsngal chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_/dal bus 'ju bas tshe yang ring bar byed/_/gang zhig dbang po ma bsdams 
[\[238b.3\]]shing /_/zas kyi tshod ni mi shes la/_/dran pa nyams dang le lo can/_/gtsang bar lta zhing gnas byed pa/_/de ni 'dod chags rnams kyis bcom/_/rlung gis mi brtan ljon shing bzhin/_/gang zhig dbang po legs bsdams shing /_/zas kyi tshod ni shes pa dang /_/
[\[238b.4\]]so sor dran zhing brtson 'grus ldan/_/mi gtsang lta bas gnas byed pa/_/de ni 'dod chags kyis mi choms/_/rlung gis ri bo mi g.yos bzhin/_/dgon pa dga' bar bya 'os pa/_/de la skye bo mi dga' yang /_/de la 'dod chags bral ba dga'/_/'dod pa tshol 
[\[238b.5\]]bar byed rnams min/_/dgon pa'am yang na grong dag gam/_/gshang ngam thang bu dag kyang rung /_/gang na 'phags pa bzhugs pa yi/_/sa de yid du 'ong ba yin/_/dam pa ring nas snang gyur te/_/gangs can gyi ni ri bo bzhin/_/ngan pa nye yang mi snang ste/_/
[\[238b.6\]]mun khrod mda' ni 'phangs pa bzhin/_/mkhas pa don sems byed pa yi/_/dam pa nyid dang 'grogs na ni/_/don chen 'gyur zhing zab mo yi/_/shes rab so sor rtogs par 'gyur/_/gzhu yis mda' 'phangs bsnun pa yi/_/g.yul ngo'i glang chen ji bzhin du/_/
[\[238b.7\]]tshul 'chal skye bo mang po yis/_/mi snyan smras pa bzod par bya/_/mi gang khyim 'bigs byed pa dang /_/dad pa med cing byas mi gzo/_/go skabs bcom dang skyugs pa za/_/de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/_/pha ma dag ni bsad byas shing /_/rgyal po gtsang sbra can 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]gnyis dang /_/yul 'khor 'khor dang bcas bcom na/_/mi ni dag par 'gyur zhes bya/_/gang dag kun du sogs med cing /_/gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/_/de dag 
[\[239a.2\]]'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag kun du sogs med cing /_/gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/_/de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la 
[\[239a.3\]]ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag kun du sogs med cing /_/gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/_/de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag kun du sogs 
[\[239a.4\]]med cing /_/gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/_/de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag kun tu sogs med cing /_/gang dag kha zas yongs 
[\[239a.5\]]shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/_/de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag kun du sogs med cing /_/gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/dben 
[\[239a.6\]]pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/_/de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag pha mthar rten med cing /_/gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/_/de dag 'gro ba 
[\[239a.7\]]rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag pha mthar rten med cing /_/gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/_/de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]gang dag pha mthar rten med cing /_/gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/_/spong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/_/de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag pha mthar rten med cing /_/gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/_/stong dang 
[\[239b.2\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_/rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/_/de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag pha mthar rten med cing /_/gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/_/de dag 'gro ba rtogs 
[\[239b.3\]]dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/gang dag pha mthar rten med cing /_/gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_/rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/_/de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/skye dgu phal pa 'di dag ni/_/pha mtha' 
[\[239b.4\]]nyid du rgyug byed pas/_/gang dag pha rol 'gro byed pa'i/_/mi yi skye bo de dag nyung /_/gang dag legs par gsungs pa yi/_/chos la chos kyi rjes lta bas/_/skye bo de dag skye shi yi/_/mtsho chen rgal dka'i pha rol 'gro/_/skyob pa rab tu rnam grol zhing /_/dus 'das mya ngan bral ba dang /_/mdud 
[\[239b.5\]]pa thams cad spangs pa la/_/yongs su gdung ba yod mi 'gyur/_/'jigs dang bcas pa'i lam rgal cing /_/g.yang sa yongs su spongs pa dang /_/sbyor dang mdud pa las grol bas/_/'dod chags kyi ni dug kun bcom/_/'dod pa lta bu'i 'dam rdzab med/_/zhe sdang lta bu'i 
[\[239b.6\]]gnod med do/_/gti mug lta bu'i rgya med de/_/sred pa lta bu'i chu klung med/_/nam mkha' la ni rjes lta bur/_/phyi rol pa la dge sbyong med/_/byis pa spros la mngon par dga'/_/de bzhin gshegs la spros mi mnga'/_/sbyor bas byis pa khrid pa'i phyir/_/mkhas pa sbyor ba 'joms 
[\[239b.7\]]par byed/_/mkhas pa lha dang mi dag gi/_/sbyor ba gang yin 'joms byed pa/_/sbyor ba kun dang bral ba'i phyir/_/sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/sbyor ba las ni srid pa 'byung /_/sbyor ba med pas srid pa zad/_/srid pa dang ni srid med pa'i/_/lam 'di gnyis ni shes gyis la/_/
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]sbyor las rab tu 'da' bya'i phyir/_/mkhas pas de la bslab par gyis/_/nyes par spyad pa byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing /_/ngan 'gror song ba'i 'og tu'ang gdung bar 'gyur/_/legs par spyad pa byas pas dga' 'gyur zhing /_/bde 'gror song ba'i 
[\[240a.2\]]'og tu'ang dga' bar 'gyur/_/phyi nas gdung 'gyur de byed pas/_/gnyis na nyes spyad ma byas bla/_/gdung bar mi 'gyur de bya ste/_/legs par spyad pa byas na rung /_/mkhas dang byis pa 'dres pa las/_/ma smras shes par mi 'gyur bas/_/zhi ba'i go 'phang 
[\[240a.3\]]smros shig dang /_/smras pa yis ni shes par 'gyur/_/legs bshad drang srong rgyal mtshan te/_/drang srong rgyal mtshan chos yin pas/_/chos ni bshad pas gsal bya zhing /_/drang srong rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar gyis/_/ma smras na yang smod byed cing /_/mang du 
[\[240a.4\]]smras na smod par byed/_/dal bus smras kyang smod byed de/_/'jig rten na ni mi smad med/_/gcig tu smad par bya ba dang /_/gcig tu bstod par bya ba'i mi/_/da ltar yod pa ma yin te/_/byung bar ma gyur 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gang dag la ni gnas pa'i spros med 
[\[240a.5\]]cing /_/gang dag kun sbyor gdung las rab log pa/_/thub pa sred bral de dag rgyu mdzad kyang /_/lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams kyis mi shes so/_/gang gis dad dang tshul khrims dang /_/blo la phan ni ma byung bar/_/ji lta ji ltar rtogs gyur pa'i/_/shes pa can 
[\[240a.6\]]dag stod byed de/_/de dag sus kyang smad 'os min/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi gser rgyan bzhin/_/ji ltar ri dang brag dag ni/_/rlung gis g.yos par mi 'gyur ltar/_/de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/_/mkhas pa rab tu g.yo ba med/_/sa la gang gi rtswa med pa/_/
[\[240a.7\]]lo med lcug phran ga la yod/_/'ching ba las grol brtan pa de'i/_/ji ga sus kyang smad 'os min/_/gang zhig rgyal las mi nyams shing /_/'jig rten ma rgyal [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas de/_/'gro med gom pa gang gis bkri/_/gang zhig 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rgyal las mi nyams shing /_/'jig rten ma rgyal [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med/_/sangs rgyas mthu rtsal mtha' yas de/_/'gro med gom pa gang gis bkri/_/gang la 'khrid byed srid pa ni/_/yul sred 'dra ba 'ga' med pa/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas de/_/'gro med 
[\[240b.2\]]gom pa gang gis bkri/_/gang la 'khrid byed srid pa ni/_/yul sred 'dra ba 'ga' med pa/_/sangs rgyas mthu rtsal mtha' yas de/_/'gro med gom pa gang gis bkri/_/gang zhig rnam par rtog pa rnam bsal cing /_/nang gi kun la rnam par rtog med pa/_/kun du 
[\[240b.3\]]sbyor dang gzugs dang 'du shes 'das/_/rnal 'byor bzhi dang bral la skye ba med/_/sngon bral phyi ma dang bral zhing /_/dbus bral srid pa'i pha rol phyin/_/rnam pa kun las sems grol ba/_/skye rga phyi ma 'dren mi 'gyur/_/phrugs kyi tshoms te nyi shu dgu 
[\[240b.4\]]pa'o//_//rgyal ba las ni 'khon 'byung zhing /_/pha rol pham pa sdug bsngal 'thob/_/rgyal dang pha rol pham spangs na/_/nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba 'thob/_/gzhan la sdug bsngal bskyed pa yis/_/gang zhig bdag ni bde 'dod pa/_/dgra dang mi 
[\[240b.5\]]'bral 'grogs pa dang /_/de ni sdug bsngal las mi 'grol/_/bde ba 'dod phyir 'byung po la/_/gang zhig 'tshe zhing chad pas gcod/_/bdag gi bde ba 'dod pa de/_/pha rol du ni bde mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig bde ba 'dod pa dag_/'byung po la ni mi 'tshe zhing /_/
[\[240b.6\]]chad pas mi gcod bde 'dod pa/_/de dag pha rol bde ba 'thob/_/chos spyod legs par spyad bya zhing /_/nyes par spyad pa de mi spyad/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/chos spyad pas ni bde ba 'thob/_/chos la legs spyad bde skyed pas/_/chos spyod chos 
[\[240b.7\]]kyis bsrung bar bya/_/chos spyod ngan 'gror mi 'gro ba/_/chos la legs spyod phan yon de'o/_/yangs pa'i gdugs kyis dbyar ka ltar/_/chos spyod chos kyis bsrung bar bya/_/chos spyod ngan 'gror mi 'gro ba/_/chos la legs spyod phan yon de'o/_/bag 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]med mi yis chos min spyad na ni/_/'gro ba gang yang rung ba ngan 'gror 'gro/_/'di na sbrul nag rked nas bzung ba ltar/_/chos min spyod pa de dag rlag par 'gyur/_/chos dang chos min gnyi ga yi/_/rnam smin 'dra bar mi 'gyur te/_/chos ma 
[\[241a.2\]]yin pas dmyal bar 'gro/_/chos kyis bde 'gro thob par byed/_/sbyin pa byed pa'i dus dang g.yul 'gyed dus/_/rgyu yis yongs su bzung bar 'dra bas na/_/sbyin pa byed dang g.yul 'gyed 'dra zhes gsungs/_/yon tan de gnyis mi ngan rten mi byed/_/shin tu 
[\[241a.3\]]legs par chas pa gcig pus kyang /_/legs par ma chas 'phyes las rgyal byed ltar/_/gal te dad bskyed chung ngu byin pas kyang /_/des ni de dag gzhan du bde bar 'gyur/_/'di na lan brgyar g.yul zlog dpa' bo bas/_/ser sna dgrar gyur zil gyis 
[\[241a.4\]]mnan nas su/_/gang zhig chags med sems kyis sbyin byed pa/_/de dag ches dpa' yin par ngas gsungs so/_/bsod nams rnam smin bde ba ste/_/mngon par bsams pa 'byor bar byed/_/myur du zhi ba dam pa yi/_/mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[241a.5\]]bsod nams byed pa rnams la ni/_/gzhan las byung ba'i gnod pa dang /_/lha dang bdud kyi ris rnams kyis/_/bar chad bya bar mi nus so/_/gal te sdug bsngal zad bya'i phyir/_/'phags dang shes rab gtong ldan la/_/de yis 'bad rtsol byas na ni/_/lhag 
[\[241a.6\]]mthong gis ni reg par 'gyur/_/sems ni rab tu rnam dang bas/_/chos la dga' byed bde ba 'thob/_/'phags pas gsungs pa'i chos dag la/_/mkhas pa rtag tu dga' bar byed/_/gang dag sems ni bsam gtan dga'/_/gang zhig skye med dga' ba 
[\[241a.7\]]dang /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhi dang /_/byang chub yan lag bdun dag dang /_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi rnams dang /_/yan lag brgyad lam gang dga' ba/_/de dag chos gos 'chang ba dang /_/bsod snyoms bde bar za bar byed/_/de dag ri dang nags tshal 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]na/_/bde bar 'chag par byed pa dang /_/de dag bde 'thob bde bar ni/_/mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'da'/_/'khon dang 'jigs pa kun 'das shing /_/'jig rten yul gyi srid las rgal/_/chos thos pa dang mthong ba dang /_/dben par dga' ba bde 
[\[241b.2\]]ba ste/_/'jig rten srog chags 'byung po la/_/'tshe med yang dag sdom pa bde/_/'dod pa rnams las rab 'das shing /_/'jig rten 'dod chags bral ba bde/_/nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dag_/btul ba de dag mchog tu bde/_/rgas khar tshul khrims 
[\[241b.3\]]ldan pa bde/_/dad la rab tu gnas pa bde/_/don ldan tshig la dga' ba bde/_/sdig pa mi byed pa dag bde/_/'jig rten na ni phar 'dzin bde/_/de bzhin mar yang 'dzin pa bde/_/'jig rten dge sbyong 'dzin pa bde/_/de bzhin bram zer 'dzin pa bde/_/sangs 
[\[241b.4\]]rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba bde/_/de bzhin chos rnams bstan pa bde/_/dge 'dun rnams ni 'thun pa bde/_/'thun pa rnams kyi dka' thub bde/_/tshul khrims ldan pa mthong ba bde/_/mang du thos pa mthong ba bde/_/yang srid rnam par grol ba yi/_/
[\[241b.5\]]dgra bcom pa dag mthong ba bde/_/'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bde/_/chos kyis rgyal ba'i skye bo bde/_/shes rab thob par gyur pa bde/_/nga 'o nga rgyal zad pa bde/_/'phags pa rnams ni mthong ba bde/_/dam pa dag dang 'grogs pa bde/_/byis pa rnams 
[\[241b.6\]]ni ma mthong na/_/rtag tu bde ba nyid du 'gyur/_/rnam pa kun du dgra 'dra ba'i/_/byis dang 'grogs pa sdug bsngal zhing /_/byis pa dag dang 'grogs byed pa/_/yun ring rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur/_/skyes bu cang shes dkon pa ste/_/de dag kun du 'byung ma yin/_/
[\[241b.7\]]brtan pa rnams dang 'grogs pa dag_/gnyen dang phrad pa lta bur bde/_/gang du brtan pa de skyes pa/_/de yi rigs kyis bde ba 'thob/_/bram ze mya ngan 'das pa dag_/rnam pa kun du bde bar 'jug_/gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos shing /_/zag med rab tu rnam 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]grol ba/_/sred pa thams cad gtubs pa dag_/snying las rims nad rnam par bsal/_/sems kyis zhi ba thob pa rnams/_/nye bar zhi zhing bde bar 'jug_/gang zhig bde ba yangs 'dod cing /_/bde ba chung ngu gtong 'dod pa'i/_/brtan pas 
[\[242a.2\]]bde chung spang byas na/_/bde ba yangs pa legs par mthong /_/'jig rten 'dod bde gang yin dang /_/lha yul bde ba gang yin pas/_/sred pa zad pa'i bde ba de'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/khur gyis sdug bsngal blangs pas na/_/khur bor na ni bde bar 
[\[242a.3\]]'gyur/_/lci ba'i khur dag nges bor na/_/phyi nas gzhan dag len mi 'gyur/_/kun sbyor thams cad zad bya'i phyir/_/sred pa thams cad rab tu spongs/_/phung po thams cad yongs shes na/_/srid pa phyi mar 'gro ba med/_/don rnams bkrun pa la ni grogs 
[\[242a.4\]]ldan bde/_/srog dag rab tu gtugs la bsod nams bde/_/ngan ngon tsam gyis legs par chog shes bde/_/sdug bsngal thams cad nges par nub pa bde/_/'di na me ni 'bar ba la/_/lcags kyi tho bas brgyab pa yis/_/rim gyis nye bar zhi 'gyur te/_/ji 
[\[242a.5\]]ltar song ba mi shes ltar/_/'dod pa'i 'dam rdzab chu rgal cing /_/go 'phang mi g.yo thob pa dang /_/legs par rnam par grol rnams kyi/_/'gro ba gdags su med pa yin/_/gang zhig khong na 'khrug pa med pa dang /_/gang zhig sred dang sred min las log pa/_/
[\[242a.6\]]de dag 'jigs bral bde zhing mya ngan med/_/lhas kyang blta zhing bsam du med par 'gyur/_/'di na gang dag chos mang thos pa dang /_/rtogs shing ci yang med pa kye re bde/_/skye bo skye bo'i lus la rab chags shing /_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/_/'di 
[\[242a.7\]]na gang dag chos mang thos pa dang /_/rtags shing ci yang med pa kye re bde/_/skye bo skye bo'i lus la rab chags shing /_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/_/skye bo ci med yon tan rtogs pa dang /_/skye bo ci yang med par gyur pa bde/_/skye bo skye bo'i sems 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]la rab chags shing /_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/_/skye bo ci med yon tan rtogs pa dang /_/skye bo ci yang med par gyur pa bde/_/skye bo skye bo'i lus la rab chags shing /_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/_/gzhan gyi dbang gyur kun sdug 
[\[242b.2\]]ste/_/rang dbang yod pa thams cad bde/_/sbyor ba shin tu spang dka' ba/_/thun mong gyur pas brlag par zad/_/zhen par gyur pa'i mi nang na/_/zhen pa med par gnas pa dang /_/zhen pa'i nang na ma zhen pa/_/kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/_/nad kyis thebs 
[\[242b.3\]]pa'i mi nang na/_/nad med par ni gnas pa dang /_/nad pa'i nang na nad med pa/_/kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/_/'tshe ba can gyi mi nang na/_/'tshe ba med par gnas pa dang /_/'tshe ba'i nang na 'tshe med pa/_/kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/_/gnod sems can gyi 
[\[242b.4\]]mi nang na/_/gnod sems med par gnas pa dang /_/gnod sems can nang gnod med pa/_/kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/_/sha khon can gyi mi nang na/_/sha khon med par gnas pa dang /_/sha khon can nang 'khon med pa/_/kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/_/
[\[242b.5\]]mi thi la dag rab bsregs kyang /_/nga la ci yang tshig pa med/_/nga la gang dag ci med pas/_/kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/_/nga la ci yang med mod kyi/_/dga' ba za bar byed pas na/_/'od gsal gyi ni lha bzhin du/_/kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/_/'jig 
[\[242b.6\]]tshogs la ni mi rten pas/_/nga la ci yang med mod kyis/_/dga' ba za bar byed pas na/_/kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/_/len pa'i rkyen gyis phrad cing reg 'gyur gyi/_/len med ci dang phrad cing reg med pas/_/bdag dang gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i bde sdug gis/_/
[\[242b.7\]]dgon pa'am grong du reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten 'di na bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/_/skyes bu dam pa mtho dman mi 'gyur zhing /_/brtan rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu yis mi 'khyal bar/_/skyes bu dam pa kun du 'gro bar byed/_/bde ba'i tshoms te sum 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]cu pa'o//_//ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/_bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/_gzung bar dka' zhing yang ba dang /_/gang du dga' bar 'gro ba yi/_/sems dul ba ni legs pa ste/_/sems dul ba yis bde ba 'dren/_/bdud kyi gzhi 
[\[243a.2\]]dag spong ba na/_/chu bo'i gnas nas rab bton te/_/thang la bor ba'i nya lta bur/_/bdag gi sems ni yongs su g.yo/_/nyi ma las ni 'od zer ltar/_/bdag gi sems ni so sor rgyug_/de dag mkhas pas nges bzlog ste/_/lcags kyu yis ni glang chen bzhin/_/
[\[243a.3\]]nga la don med spyod pa dang /_/bltar med snying po med pa de/_/rtag tu gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/_/sems de la ni nga smra'o/_/sems 'di sngon chad ji ltar 'dod pa dang /_/dga' dgur spyod cing rgyu bar byed pa dag_/glang chen myos la mi yis lcags kyu ltar/_/de ni
