[\[243a.4\]]tshul bzhin bya bas de bzung ngo /_/khang khyim byed pa 'di yis ni/_/yang yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal can/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba du ma zhig_/da ltar phan cad khyod kyis phyung /_/khang khyim byed pa khyod mthong bas/_/khyim gyi gdung chen rnam bcom la/_/phyam rnams thams 
[\[243a.5\]]cad bcag nas su/_/phyin cad khyim byed mi gzhug go/_/sems ni 'du byed dang phral nas/_/'di nyid la ni zad par 'dod/_/sems ni g.yo zhing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ste/_/ring du 'gro zhing bzlog dka' ba/_/mda' mkhan me yis srong ba ltar/_/yid gzhungs pa yis bsrang bar 
[\[243a.6\]]bya/_/gang zhig lus med phug na gnas/_/gcig pu rgyu zhing ring 'gro ba'i/_/sems de 'dul bar byed pa ni/_/'jigs pa che las thar bar 'gyur/_/log pa'i smon ldan sems gang gis/_/bdag nyid sdug bsngal byed 'gyur ba'i/_/de ltar 'khon gyis 'khon can 
[\[243a.7\]]dang /_/dgra bos dgra la'ang byed mi 'gyur/_/yang dag smon ldan sems gang gis/_/bdag nyid bde bar byed 'gyur ba/_/de ltar pha dang ma dag dang /_/gnyen gzhan gyis kyang byed mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar khong steng g.yogs nyes na/_/char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/_/
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/_/'dod chags rnams kyis yongs su bcom/_/ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/_/char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/_/de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/_/'dod chags rnams kyis yong mi choms/_/ji ltar khang steng 
[\[243b.2\]]g.yogs nyes na/_/char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/_/zhe sdang rnams kyis yongs su bcom/_/ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/_/char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/_/de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/_/zhe sdang 
[\[243b.3\]]rnams kyis yong mi choms/_/ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/_/char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/_/gti mug rnams kyis yongs su bcom/_/ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/_/char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/_/
[\[243b.4\]]de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/_/gti mug rnams kyis yong mi choms/_/ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/_/char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/_/nga rgyal rnams kyis yongs su bcom/_/ji ltar khang steng 
[\[243b.5\]]g.yogs legs na/_/char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/_/de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/_/nga rgyal rnams kyis yong mi choms/_/ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/_/char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/_/chags 
[\[243b.6\]]pa rnams kyis yongs su bcom/_/ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/_/char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/_/de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/_/chags pa rnams kyis yong mi choms/_/ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/_/char pa yongs su 
[\[243b.7\]]'dzag pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/_/sred pa rnams kyis yongs su bcom/_/ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/_/char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/_/de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/_/sred pa rnams kyis yong mi choms/_/chos kyi 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]sngon du yid 'gro ste/_/yid mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin/_/gal te yid rab gdug pa yis/_/smras sam yang na byas kyang rung /_/de yis de ni sdug bsngal 'thob/_/'khor los mgo bo bcad pa bzhin/_/chos kyi sngon du yid 'gro ste/_/yid 
[\[244a.2\]]mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin/_/gal te yid rab dang ba yis/_/smras sam yang na byas kyang rung /_/de yis de ni bde ba 'thob/_/grib ma rjes su 'brang ba bzhin/_/brtsad pa ched cher 'dzin pa dang /_/sems ni nyon mongs gyur pa yis/_/glags skabs tshol 
[\[244a.3\]]bar byed pa yis/_/legs bshad legs par mi shes so/_/sdang ba'am yang na 'khrug pa'am/_/dad pa med pa'i sems dag gis/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa yi/_/dam chos kun shes mi nus so/_/gang gis bag med sems dang ni/_/khro ba rnam par 
[\[244a.4\]]btul ba dang /_/'di na gnod sems rab spangs pa/_/des ni legs par bshad pa shes/_/sems kyi brtan pa med pa yis/_/dam chos rnam par shes mi 'gyur/_/dad pa 'gyur ldog byed pa yi/_/shes rab yongs su rdzogs mi 'gyur/_/kun rtog la chums 
[\[244a.5\]]rten pa yi/_/lta ngan sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/chu bo'i rgyun ni gang yin pa/_/yid kyi rgyun las rab tu 'bab/_/dga' sems dbang po phal pa dang /_/sems kyi rjes 'brang zhan pa yi/_/mi de'i grags 'grib 'bras lhags pa'i/_/ljon shing la ni bya bzhin no/_/sems 
[\[244a.6\]]khyod phung khrol 'dod la dga' ma byed/_/brtson sems bag yod pa la gnas par gyis/_/bag med byas pas dmyal bar btsos pa dang /_/lcags gong mid pas khyod ni ma ngu shig_/ldang ba'i dus tshe 'dug par byed pa dang /_/lang tsho stobs ldan mi 'bad khyim 'dug 
[\[244a.7\]]dang /_/bsam pa rdzogs tshe le lo byed pa yi/_/mi yi shes rab lam rtogs mi 'gyur ro/_/phran tshegs rnam rtogs zhib mor rnam rtog pas/_/nang na gnas pa'i yid ni g.yen yang spyo/_/yid kyi rnam rtog de dag ma shes na/_/'khrul sems yang dang yang du 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]rgyug par byed/_/gang zhig dran ldan rnam 'byed brtson pa dang /_/rnam par rtog la mkhas pas de shes na/_/nang na gnas pa'i yid ni g.yen spyo ba/_/thams cad ma lus blo yis rab tu spong /_/lus 'di bum pa 'dra bar rtogs byas shing /_/grong khyer 'dra ba'i 
[\[244b.2\]]sems kyis sran btsugs nas/_/shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/_/btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/_/'jig rten 'di dag bum pa 'drar rtogs shing /_/de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/_/shes rab mtshon gyis 
[\[244b.3\]]bdud dang g.yul sprad de/_/btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/_/lus 'di dbu ba 'dra bar rtogs byas shing /_/grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/_/shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/_/btul nas gnas med par ni 
[\[244b.4\]]bsrung bar bya/_/'jig rten 'di dag dbu ba 'drar rtogs shing /_/grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/_/shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/_/btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/_/gang gis byang chub yan lag bdun/_/
[\[244b.5\]]sems kyis legs par bsgoms pa dang /_/gang zhig len la mi dga' zhing /_/len pa rab tu spangs pa dang /_/zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de/_/'jig rten dag na mya ngan 'das/_/gang zhig g.yag rnga'i rtse mo ltar/_/rang gi sems ni rjes srung zhing /_/
[\[244b.6\]]'byung po rnams la brtser ldan pa/_/de yi bde ba yong mi nyams/_/gang phyir glang po'i glang po che/_/mche ba bzang po'i glang chen dang /_/sems dang sems ni mnyam pas na/_/de phyir gcig pu nags su dgyes/_/gang gi yid la gnod med cing /_/'byung po kun 
[\[244b.7\]]la brtse ba dang /_/'byung po rnams la byams byed pa/_/de la nams kyang 'khon mi 'byung /_/gang la gnod pa'i sems med cing /_/'byung po kun la brtse ba dang /_/srog chags kun la byams byed pa/_/de la nams kyang 'khon mi 'byung /_/gang la gnod 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]pa'i sems med cing /_/'byung po rnams la brtse ba dang /_/sems can kun la byams byed pa/_/de la nams kyang 'khon mi 'gyur/_/mdza' bshes kun dang grogs kun dang /_/'byung po kun la brtse ba dang /_/byams pa'i sems 
[\[245a.2\]]ni bsgoms byas na/_/bde ba shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gal te gang zhig srog chags 'ga' la'ang sdang med sems/_/byams par byed na de yis de ni dge ba yin/_/sems can thams cad la ni yid kyis brtse byas na/_/bsod nams phal 
[\[245a.3\]]chen 'phags pas rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur/_/mi gang dga' ba'i sems dang ni/_/zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis su/_/dge ba'i chos la sgom byed pa/_/grub pa dang ni bde ba 'thob/_/yang dag shes pas rnam grol zhing /_/skyo ba nye bar zhi gyur pa/_/de 
[\[245a.4\]]yis yid ni zhi gyur cing /_/lus dang ngag gi las kyang zhi/_/ji ltar rtse gcig sems kyis ni/_/chos rnams legs par mthong ba ltar/_/sil snyan yan lag lnga pas kyang /_/de ltar dga' bar byed mi 'gyur/_/gang yid ting 'dzin la dga' ba/_/de dag 
[\[245a.5\]]'dod pas rtse mi byed/_/gang zhig cung zad gdung med pa'i/_/skyob pa bde bar nyal bar 'gyur/_/gang yid ting 'dzin la dga' ba/_/de dag 'dod pas rtsen mi byed/_/gang zhig cung zad gdung med pa'i/_/thub pa kye ma'o dga' bar 'gyur/_/gang gi sems ni 
[\[245a.6\]]brag lta bur/_/rab tu g.yo ba med 'dug pa/_/chags pa'i gnas la mi chags te/_/khro ba'i gnas la 'khrug med par/_/gang yid de ltar gyur pa de/_/sdug bsngal thob par ga la 'gyur/_/skur pa mi gdab gnod mi bya/_/so sor thar pas bsdam par bya/_/
[\[245a.7\]]zas kyi tshod kyang shes par bya/_/bas mtha' dgon par gnas bya zhing /_/lhag pa'i sems la rnal 'byor bya/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/sems kyi rtags la mkhas pa dang /_/rab tu dben pa'i ro rnyed dang /_/rab drang sems pa'i 'grus skyong can/_/zang zing 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]med pa'i dga' ba myong /_/gang zhig yid gzhungs dben dga' dben gnas pas/_/rtag tu rang gi lus kyis spyod lam dang /_/smra dang yid ni srung bar byed pa de/_/mya ngan spong zhing sdug bsngal 'thob mi 'gyur/_/ma bsrungs pa yi sems dag ni/_/log par 
[\[245b.2\]]lta bas bcom pa dang /_/gnyid dang rmugs pas zil non pa/_/bdud kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de bas sems ni bsrung byas te/_/yang dag lta bas mdun bdar cing /_/yang dag kun rtog spyod yul can/_/yang dag skye dang 'jig pa shes/_/gnyid dang 
[\[245b.3\]]rmugs pa zil gnon pa'i/_/dge slong sdug bsngal zad pa 'thob/_/bag yod sems ni bsrung ba dang /_/sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/_/skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag_/gcig tu sems can dmyal bar 'tshed/_/bag yod sems ni bsrung ba 
[\[245b.4\]]dang /_/sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/_/skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag_/gcig tu dud 'gro rnams su 'tshed/_/bag yod sems ni bsrung ba dang /_/sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/_/skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag_/gcig tu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[245b.5\]]rnams su 'tshed/_/bag yod sems ni bsrung ba dang /_/sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/_/skye dgu sems ni bsrung ba dag_/gcig tu mi yi nang du dga'/_/bag yod sems ni bsrung ba dang /_/sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/_/skye dgu sems 
[\[245b.6\]]ni bsrung ba dag_/gcig tu mtho ris rnams su dga'/_/bag yod sems ni bsrung ba dang /_/sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/_/skye dgu sems ni bsrung ba dag_/gcig tu mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/sems kyi tshoms te sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//dge slong 
[\[245b.7\]]bsod snyoms byed pa bdag rang tsam/_/'grangs par byed kyi gzhan dag mi gso ba/_/rtag tu nyer zhi dran dang ldan pa yi/_/skyob pa de la lha rnams dga' bar byed/_/dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa bdag rang tsam/_/'grangs par byed kyi gzhan dag mi gso ba/_/skyob pa 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]de la lha rnams dga' byed kyi/_/bkur sti nor dang grags 'dod rnams la min/_/dge slong 'dod pa kun spangs shing /_/mdun na gnas pa'i rdul bsal ba/_/bdag med thub pa brten pa yis/_/gzhan la smra bar bya mi dgos/_/skye bo ma bsdams 
[\[246a.2\]]tshig gis gnod byed pa/_/mi bzad rjod pa'i tshig de thos gyur kyang /_/dge slong sdang sems bral la ci mi snyam/_/g.yul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin/_/skye bo ma bsdams tshig gis gnod byed pa/_/mi bzad rjod pa'i tshig de thos gyur kyang /_/dge slong yid 
[\[246a.3\]]legs bzhag la ji mi snyam/_/g.yul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin/_/bzo yis mi 'tsho yang zhing bdag la dga'/_/dbang po dul zhing kun las rnam grol zhing /_/khyim la ma chags bag med 'dod sred spangs/_/gcig pu spyod byed de ni dge slong 
[\[246a.4\]]yin/_/'tsho gtsang snyom las med pa yi/_/grogs po 'thun pa bsten bya zhing /_/so sor bgo bsha' bya ba dang /_/spyod yul cho ga mkhas par bya/_/lag pa legs bsdams rkang pa legs bsdams dang /_/tshig rnams legs bsdams dbang po legs 
[\[246a.5\]]bsdams shing /_/gcig pu nang du mnyam par 'jog la dga'/_/chog shes de ni dge slong yin zhes gsung /_/dge slong chos la kun dga' zhing /_/chos dga' chos la sems pa dang /_/chos la rjes su dran pa dag_/chos las yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/_/dge slong 
[\[246a.6\]]khang stong zhugs nas su/_/nang la lta bar byed pa dang /_/chos rnams legs par mthong ba dag_/lha yi dga' dang ldan par 'gyur/_/ji lta ji ltar phung po la/_/skye dang 'jig par legs rtogs pa/_/de lta de ltar de yis ni/_/dga' dang mgu ba nyid kyang 'thob/_/
[\[246a.7\]]dge slong dga' ba mang po yis/_/sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag_/rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/_/de bzhin dge slong 'dod chags dag_/zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/_/ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag_/rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]ltar/_/de bzhin dge slong zhe sdang dag_/zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/_/ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag_/rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/_/de bzhin dge slong gti mug dag_/zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/_/ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag_/rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/_/de 
[\[246b.2\]]bzhin dge slong nga rgyal dag_/zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/_/ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag_/rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/_/de bzhin dge slong chags pa dag_/zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/_/ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag_/rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/_/de bzhin dge slong 
[\[246b.3\]]sred pa dag_/zad pa kun du rab mi g.yo/_/gang la kun du sogs med cing /_/gang la bdag gir byed med pa/_/gang dag med na'ang mi gdung ba/_/de ni dge slong zhes brjod do/_/re zhig gzhan la slong ba tsam/_/ji ga dge slong min pa snyam/_/grong ba'i chos ni 'dzin byed pa/_/ji ga 
[\[246b.4\]]dge slong min pa snyam/_/gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dag_/rab spangs tshangs par spyod ldan zhing /_/sde tshogs spangs nas spyod byed pa/_/de ni dge slong zhes brjod do/_/dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing /_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang ba/_/des ni blta bas mi ngoms 
[\[246b.5\]]pa'i/_/zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing /_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang des/_/'du byed nyer zhi zhi ba yi/_/zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing /_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang ba/_/des 
[\[246b.6\]]ni kun sbyor kun zad pa/_/rim gyis mngon sum byed par 'gyur/_/dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing /_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang bas/_/bdag nyid ngan 'gro las 'dren te/_/'dam rdzab las ni glang chen bzhin/_/dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing /_/
[\[246b.7\]]sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang bas/_/sdig pa'i chos rnams sprug byed de/_/rlung gis ljon shing lo ma bzhin/_/dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing /_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang bas/_/mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/_/yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/_/
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]sems dga' yid ni bzang ba dang /_/dga' dang mi dga' zil gnon pa'i/_/dge slong dga' ba mang po yis/_/sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur/_/lus zhi ngag ni zhi ba dang /_/sems zhi legs par mnyam bzhag cing /_/'jig rten zang 
[\[247a.2\]]zing spangs pa yi/_/dge slong nyer zhi yin zhes brjod/_/ting 'dzin med la shes rab med/_/shes rab med la ting 'dzin med/_/shes rab ting 'dzin ldan pa de/_/dge slong yin zhes brjod par bya/_/de bas ting 'dzin shes rab la/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis 'jug bya 
[\[247a.3\]]ste/_/de bzhin shes rab dge slong de'i/_/dang por bya ba 'di yin no/_/chog shes dbang po bsdam bya zhing /_/so sor thar pas bsdam par bya/_/zas kyi tshod kyang shes par bya/_/bas mtha' dgon par gnas bya zhing /_/lhag pa'i sems la rnal 
[\[247a.4\]]'byor bya/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/gang gi lus dang ngag dang ni/_/yid la nyes byas med gyur pa/_/de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims can/_/ngo tsha'i yid ldan dge slong yin/_/gang gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/_/phyogs kyi chos bdun legs 
[\[247a.5\]]bsgoms pa/_/de ni dge ba'i chos can de/_/mnyam bzhag dge slong yin zhes gsung /_/'di na gang zhig bdag nyid kyi/_/sdug bsngal zad pa rab shes la/_/dge zhing shes rab ldan pa de/_/zag med dge slong yin zhes gsung /_/zag pa zad pa ma thob na/_/tshul 
[\[247a.6\]]khrims brtul zhugs tsam dag gam/_/yang na thos pa mang po'am/_/dben pa dag tu gnas kyang rung /_/ting 'dzin thob par gyur kyang ngal/_/rdeng drod chod pa'i dge slong min/_/phung po la ni bdag zer ba'i/_/'jig rten 'di dag gdung ba skye/_/rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[247a.7\]]chub bde ba ni/_/'phags pas bstan pa mngon du bya/_/ji lta ji ltar bsam byas pa/_/de lta de ltar gzhan du 'gyur/_/gzhan du 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten 'di/_/srid pa la chags srid la dga'/_/srid la mngon chags srid la dga'/_/srid pa nyid la mngon par dga'/_/dga' 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]bya gang yin de sdug bsngal/_/skyi g.ya' gang yin de bde bas/_/srid pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/_/'di na tshangs par spyod pa ste/_/dge sbyong bram ze ji snyed pa/_/srid pas srid las nges 'byung zer/_/de dag thams cad srid pa las/_/nges 'byung min zhes brjod par bya/_/dge sbyong 
[\[247b.2\]]bram ze ji snyed pa/_/srid pas srid las nges 'byung zer/_/de dag thams cad srid pa las/_/rnam grol min zhes brjod par bya/_/len pa'i rkyen las sdug bsngal byung /_/sdug bsngal las ni len pa byung /_/len pa thams cad yongs zad na/_/sdug bsngal rab tu 'byung ba med/_/len pa 
[\[247b.3\]]thams cad na srid pa'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_sdug bsngal ba/_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no zhes de ltar de dag la yang dge ba'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mthong na/_srid pa'i sred pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur zhing /_srid pa med pas 
[\[247b.4\]]mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong skyob pa ni gzhan du len pa med cing yang srid med par 'gyur te/_bdud zil gyis non pa dang /_g.yul las rgyal ba dang /_srid pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa 'di lta bu 'di ni sdug bsngal 
[\[247b.5\]]gyi mtha' yin no/_/dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang /_/nye bar zhi zhing sems zhi ba/_/de ni yang srid med par 'gyur/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/_/dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang /_/nye bar zhi zhing sems zhi ba/_/de ni bdud kyi 'ching las grol/_/skye 
[\[247b.6\]]ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/_/dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang /_/sems ni zag pa med gyur pa/_/de ni yang srid med pa ste/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/_/dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang /_/sems ni zag pa med gyur pa/_/de ni bdud 
[\[247b.7\]]kyi 'ching las grol/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/_/dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang /_/srid pa'i sred pa gtubs gyur pa/_/de ni yang srid med par 'gyur/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/_/dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang /_/
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]srid pa'i sred pa bcad gyur pa/_/de ni bdud kyi 'ching las grol/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/_/gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing /_/grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang /_/'dod chags zad pa rjes thob pa/_/
[\[248a.2\]]de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/_/gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing /_/grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang /_/zhe sdang zad pa rjes thob pa/_/de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/_/gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing /_/grong gi tsher ma 
[\[248a.3\]]dkrugs pa dang /_/gti mug zad pa rjes thob pa/_/de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/_/gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing /_/grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang /_/nga rgyal zad pa rjes thob pa/_/de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/_/gang 
[\[248a.4\]]zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing /_/grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang /_/chags pa zad pa rjes thob pa/_/de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/_/gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs rgal cing /_/grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang /_/sred pa zad pa rjes 
[\[248a.5\]]thob pa/_/de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/_/gang zhig gshe ba dang ni gsod pa dang /_/'ching dang grong gi tsher ma thul ba dang /_/gang zhig ri bo bzhin gnas mi bkri zhing /_/sdug bdes mi g.yo de ni dge slong yin/_/skur pa mi 'debs sgro 
[\[248a.6\]]'dogs mi byed cing /_/'jig rten 'di kun [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]rtogs dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/_/'dod chags langs pa 'dul ba'i 
[\[248a.7\]]dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/_/zhe sdang langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/_/gti mug langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman 
[\[248b.2\]]bzhin du/_/nga rgyal langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/_/chags pa langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol 
[\[248b.3\]]min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/_/khro ba langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/sbrul 
[\[248b.4\]]gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/_/sred pa langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/_/'dod chags ma lus drungs 'byin 
[\[248b.5\]]dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/_/zhe sdang ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul 
[\[248b.6\]]rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/_/gti mug ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung 
[\[248b.7\]]chen ltar/_/nga rgyal ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/_/chags pa ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/_/sred pa ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas 
[\[249a.2\]]pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad spong byed cing /_/'dod sbyor 'ching ba rnam bsal dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/sgrib pa thams cad spangs shing 
[\[249a.3\]]sdig med pa/_/yid gnyis zug rngu bcad pa'i dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/rtog pa rnam bsal nang gi ma lus la/_/rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dge slong gang /_/
[\[249a.4\]]de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/nags sbyor byed pa 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/_/rtsa ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje 
[\[249a.5\]]ba bzhin/_/rims nad bcas pa 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/_/rtsa ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/bag la nyal ba 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/_/rtsa ba legs 
[\[249a.6\]]par drungs phyung dge slong gang /_/de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/_/spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/_/khrims ldan gang yin dge slong de/_/stong nyid gang ldan bsam gtan de/_/rtag tu byed gang rnal 'byor de/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[249a.7\]]gang bde ba de/_/dge slong dga' dang mi dgas mi brjod cing /_/bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu sten pa dang /_/de ni bag yod gnas shing sred pa yi/_/'dod chags phra rgyas legs par 'byin par byed/_/dge slong gi tshoms te sum cu 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]gnyis pa'o//_//gang zhig brgyan kyang chos spyod dul ba dang /_/zhi zhing yang dag sdom la tshangs par spyod/_/'byung po kun la chad pas mi gcod de/_/bram ze dge sbyong de yin dge slong de/_/gcer bur spyod pas ma yin ral pas 
[\[249b.2\]]ma yin rdzab kyis min/_/kha zas mi za ba yis ma yin thang la nyal ba 'am/_/rdul dang dri mas ma yin cog pur 'dug la 'bad pa yis/_/mi rnams dag par mi 'gyur som nyi rnams las rgal mi 'gyur/_/dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung /_/de dag nyid 
[\[249b.3\]]la chags byed pa/_/zag pa zad pa ma thob par/_/bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/_/dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung /_/de dag nyid la chags byed pa/_/tshor ba zad pa ma thob par/_/bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/_/dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung /_/de dag nyid la chags byed 
[\[249b.4\]]cing /_/byis pa mtha' gcig la lta ba/_/bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/_/dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung /_/de dag nyid la chags byed pa/_/byis pa'i skye bo blo ngan rnams/_/bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/_/dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung /_/de dag nyid la chags 
[\[249b.5\]]byed pa/_/go 'phang dam pa ma thob par/_/bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/_/blo ngan khyod kyi ral pa ci/_/khyod kyi g.yang gzhi gyon pa ci/_/khyod nang thibs por 'dug bzhin du/_/phyi rol legs par byi dor byed/_/blo ngan khyod kyi ral pa ci/_/khyod kyi g.yang gzhi gyon pa ci/_/
[\[249b.6\]]khyod nang dri ma ldan bzhin du/_/phyi rol legs par byi dor byed/_/rigs kyis bram zer 'gyur ma yin/_/ral pas ma yin rus kyis min/_/gang zhig bden pa'i chos ldan pa/_/gtsang ma de yin bram ze yin/_/rigs kyis bram zer 'gyur ma yin/_/ral 
[\[249b.7\]]pas ma yin rus kyis min/_/gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/_/thams cad spong bar byed pa dag_/sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir de/_/bram ze yin zhes nges par brjod/_/mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/_/oM zhes zer ba bram ze min/_/gang zhig 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]dge ba'i chos ldan pa/_/gtsang ma de yin bram ze de/_/mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/_/oM zhes zer ba bram ze min/_/gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/_/thams cad spong bar byed pa dag_/sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir de/_/dge sbyong bram ze de yin no/_/
[\[250a.2\]]skye bo phal cher 'dir 'khru ba/_/chu yis dag par mi 'gyur te/_/gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/_/thams cad spong bar byed pa dag_/sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir de/_/dge sbyong bram ze de yin no/_/gang zhig sdig chos rab spangs shing /_/rtag tu dran ldan spyod byed pa/_/
[\[250a.3\]]kun sbyor zad pa'i sangs rgyas de/_/'jig rten dag na bram ze yin/_/bram ze gang zhig sdig pa'i chos spangs shing /_/bdag nyid tshul 'chos med cing rnyog med gnas/_/rig byed mthar phyin tshangs par spyod pa spyad/_/dus su smra byed de ni tshangs pa smra/_/gang zhig sgyu 
[\[250a.4\]]la mi gnas nga rgyal med/_/gang zhig chags med bdag med re ba med/_/'khrug bcom bdag nyid mya ngan 'das phyogs de/_/bram ze dge sbyong de yin dge slong de/_/gang zhig ma yi mngal skyes nas/_/gal te 'dzin pa dang bcas na/_/de ming bu zhes smra bar bstan/_/
[\[250a.5\]]bram ze yin par nga mi smra/_/yongs su 'dzin med len med de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni/_/yid kyis nyes byas mi byed cing /_/gang zhig gnas gsum legs bsdams te/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang gi 
[\[250a.6\]]tshig ngag mi rtsub cing /_/go byed yid 'ong smra ba dang /_/gang gis nyon mongs mi skyed de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig gsod 'ching gshe ba dang /_/sdang ba'i mi la bzod byed de/_/bzod pa'i brtul zhugs stobs tshogs can/_/bram ze 
[\[250a.7\]]yin par ngas gsungs so/_/khro ba med cing tshul khrims can/_/brtul zhugs ldan zhing sems khral med/_/dul zhing lus mthar gnas pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig rab byung khyim pa dang /_/de bzhin gnyis kar mi 'dre zhing /_/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]'dod chung khyim nas ma byung de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/ma 'ongs pa la mngon mi dga'/_/'das pa rnams la gdung med pa/_/'khrig pa'i sbyor bral g.yul rgyal de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/ma 'ongs pa la mngon mi dga'/_/
[\[250b.2\]]'das la gdung med rdul bral zhing /_/zhi ba mya ngan med pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig 'dod chung gzhan mi gso/_/dul zhing snying por rab gnas la/_/zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/
[\[250b.3\]]gang zhig pha rol tshu rol dang /_/pha rol tshu rol gnyis med cing /_/chos rnams kun gyi mthar phyin te/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig pha rol tshu rol dang /_/pha rol tshu rol gnyis med cing /_/gang zhig gnas gsum ma chags de/_/
[\[250b.4\]]bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig thung dang ring ba dang /_/phra sbom dge dang mi dge dang /_/'jig rten cung zad mi len de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig 'di nyid rab shes shing /_/rang gi sdug bsngal zad pa dang /_/'dod 
[\[250b.5\]]chags bral zhing mi ldan de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dang /_/gnyi ga yis kyang mi gos pa/_/gos med rdul bral zhi ba de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig dge dang sdig pa'i las/_/chags 
[\[250b.6\]]gang yin de rab 'das shing /_/chags las rab 'das rnam grol de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig sngon dang phyi ma dang /_/dbus kyang yod pa ma yin pa/_/rdul bral 'ching ba las grol de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/pad 
[\[250b.7\]]ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang /_/smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/_/gang zhig sdig la mi gnas de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/pad ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang /_/smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/_/gang zhig 'dod la mi gnas de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]pad ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang /_/smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/_/srid la dga' ba yongs spangs de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/zla ba dag cing dri med la/_/skyon bral rab tu dang ba ltar/_/gang zhig sdig pas mi gos de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/zla ba dag 
[\[251a.2\]]cing dri med la/_/skyon bral rab tu dang ba ltar/_/gang zhig 'dod pas mi gos de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/zla ba dag cing dri med la/_/skyon bral rab tu dang ba ltar/_/srid la dga' ba yongs spangs de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang /_/rdul gyis zla 
[\[251a.3\]]ba ji lta bar/_/gang zhig sdig pas mi gos de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang /_/rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/_/gang zhig 'dod pas mi gos de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang /_/rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/_/
[\[251a.4\]]srid la dga' ba yongs spangs de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig 'dug nas rdul bral ba/_/sems shing zag zad bya ba byas/_/dul zhing lus mthar gnas pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/shes rab zab cing yid gzhungs la/_/lam dang lam min rnams 
[\[251a.5\]]la mkhas/_/gang zhig don mchog rjes thob de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/mi ni gang yang rung ba dag_/slongs mo tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_/bdag med su la'ang gnod mi byed/_/brtan ldan tshangs par spyod pa can/_/kun shes spyad phyir chos ston de/_/bram ze yin 
[\[251a.6\]]par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig 'dod pa legs spangs shing /_/khyim med par ni rab byung ste/_/'dod pa'i zag pa yongs zad de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/_/'byung po chad pas mi gcod cing /_/gsod med gsod du mi 'jug de/_/
[\[251a.7\]]bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig mi 'thun 'thun byed cing /_/chad pas gcod pa dang du len/_/'byung po rnams la brtse phan de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/_/gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang /_/nga rgyal 'chab pa 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]'joms pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig sred pa'i rdzong 'di dang /_/'khor ba'i klung las rab rgal cing /_/brgal nas pha rol 'gro bar sems/_/yid nyid kyis ni mi bkri zhing /_/gang zhig len pa las log de/_/bram ze yin par ngas 
[\[251b.2\]]gsungs so/_/gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dang ni/_/pha rol na yang sred med cing /_/srid pa'i sred pa yongs zad de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dang ni/_/pha rol la yangs chags med cing /_/chags med rnam par bral 
[\[251b.3\]]ba de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/dga' dang mi dga' spangs pa dang /_/bsil bar gyur cing zag pa med/_/'jig rten kun zil gnon brtan de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/mi yi sbyor ba spangs nas su/_/lha yi sbyor ba rab 'das 
[\[251b.4\]]shing /_/sbyor ba kun dang rnam bral de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig lha dang dri za dang /_/mi yi 'gro ba mi shes shing /_/zhi ba 'gro ba mi shes de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang gis chos rnams mi shes pa'am/_/ma mthong ba 
[\[251b.5\]]ni med gyur la/_/shes bya mtha' yas lta ba de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang gis sngon gyi gnas rtogs shing /_/mtho ris ngan song mthong ba dang /_/de nas skye ba zad thob pa'i/_/thub pa mngon shes la brtson pa/_/sdug bsngal tha mar rab shes de/_/bram 
[\[251b.6\]]ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/sems kyi rnam grol shes pa dang /_/'dod chags kun las grol ba dang /_/rig pa gsum dang ldan pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang gis sems can 'chi 'pho dang /_/skye ba thams cad rtogs gyur pa/_/thogs 
[\[251b.7\]]med spyan ldan sangs rgyas de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig kun sbyor kun 'das shing /_/yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /_/dga' med dran ldan ston pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/thub pa rnam rgyal drang srong che/_/khyu mchog 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]rab mchog glang po che/_/bkrir med khrus byas sangs rgyas de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig srid 'das kun zil gnon/_/chu bo las rgal rnam par 'dren/_/rnam grol pha rol phyin pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/sdig 
[\[252a.2\]]can rnam par mi sems shing /_/mi sgom smra bar mi byed par/_/'dug nas rdul bral sems pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig phyag dar khrod 'chang zhing /_/ngo tsha shes shing 'dod mi lta/_/shing drung dag tu gnas pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs 
[\[252a.3\]]so/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spangs phyir/_/zhi ba 'phags lam yan lag brgyad/_/drang po sgom par byed pa de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]gnas med cing /_/'du shes yid gnyis zug rngu med/_/'chi med go 'phang thob pa de/_/bram 
[\[252a.4\]]ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig lus med phug na gnas/_/gcig pu rgyu zhing ring du 'gro/_/gdul bar dka' ba'i sems 'dul de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang zhig gzugs med bltar med mtha' yas la/_/shin tu bltar med phra zhing gzhi mngon rtogs/_/rtag dran 
[\[252a.5\]]kun sbyor zad rgyu sangs rgyas pa/_/'jig rten 'di na de ni bram ze yin/_/gang gis sog mig 'ching gtubs te/_/chings ma rgyang thag bcad nas su/_/yongs su gdung spangs sangs rgyas de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/gang gis rnyed 'dod sdig can dang /_/sog mig 
[\[252a.6\]]chings ma gtubs gyur cing /_/sred pa rtsar bcas drungs phyung de/_/bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/_/brtson pas chu bo'i rgyun bcad cing /_/'dod pa thams cad rab bcom dang /_/'du byed rnams kyi zad shes pa/_/sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/_/
[\[252a.7\]]pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing /_/rgyal po gtsang sbra byed gnyis dang /_/yul 'khor 'khor dang bcas bcom pa/_/sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/_/pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing /_/rgyal po gtsang sbra can gnyis dang /_/mi bzad pa yi stag bsad pa/_/sdig med gang yin 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]bram ze yin/_/gang zhig bram ze rdeg pa blun/_/skrod par byed pa de ngan pas/_/bram ze rnams la brdeg mi bya/_/bram ze bskrad par mi bya'o/_/gang zhig chos rnams rnam shes na/_/rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung /_/de la bkur zhing phyag bya ste/_/bram ze gtsang 
[\[252b.2\]]mas me bzhin no/_/gang zhig chos rnams rnam shes na/_/rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung /_/de la bkur zhing bsnyen bkur te/_/bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/_/gang zhig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/bstan pa'i chos rnams rnam shes na/_/de 
[\[252b.3\]]la bkur zhing phyag bya ste/_/bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/_/gang zhig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/bstan pa'i chos rnams rnam shes na/_/de la bkur zhing bsnyen bkur te/_/bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/_/gang tshe bram ze chos 
[\[252b.4\]]rnams kyi/_/pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/_/de tshe sha za ba ku la/_/gcig po las kyang shin tu 'das/_/gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/_/pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/_/de tshe des mthong tshor ba rnams/_/thams cad nub pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gang tshe 
[\[252b.5\]]bram ze chos rnams kyi/_/pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/_/de tshe de yis mthong bas na/_/rkyen rnams thams cad nub par gyur/_/gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/_/pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/_/de tshe de yis mthong bas na/_/kun sbyor thams 
[\[252b.6\]]cad nub par gyur/_/gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/_/pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/_/de tshe skye dang rga ba dang /_/'chi ba rnams las shin tu 'das/_/nyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/_/mtshan mo zla ba snang ba ltar/_/rgyal rigs go chas chas pa 
[\[252b.7\]]gsal/_/bram ze sems par byed na gsal/_/nyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/_/mtshan mo zla ba snang byed ltar/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas gzi brjid can/_/nyin dang mtshan du gsal bar byed/_/ji ltar mi sdug pa las yid ldog pa/_/de 'dra 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bram ze rnams la cung zad med/_/ji lta ji ltar de yi yid ldog pa/_/de lta de ltar kun rdzob bden par zad/_/gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/_/gang gis chos rnams rgyur bcas rab shes pa/_/chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 
[\[253a.2\]]'gyur te/_/de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong /_/gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/_/gang gis sdug bsngal rgyur bcas rab shes pa/_/chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/_/de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong /_/gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/_/gang gis tshor ba zad pa 
[\[253a.3\]]'thob 'gyur ba/_/chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/_/de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong /_/gang tshe bram ze brtson pas 'bad pa na/_/gang gis rkyen rnams zad pa 'thob 'gyur ba/_/chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/_/de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong /_/gang tshe bram ze brtson pas 
[\[253a.4\]]sems pa na/_/gang gis zag pa zad pa 'thob 'gyur ba/_/chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/_/de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong /_/gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/_/ji ltar mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ltar/_/'jig rten thams cad snang byed 'dug 'gyur ba/_/chos 'di rnams las rab 
[\[253a.5\]]tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/_/blo yis kun sbyor rnams las rab grol te/_/bdud sde rnam par bsal nas 'dug 'gyur ba/_/chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bram ze'i tshoms te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//sdom la//_
[\[253a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs dang thos dang bdag_/bsgre dang mdza' bshes lnga pa'o/_/mya ngan 'das dang mthong ba dang /_/sdig dang phrugs dang bde ba dang /_/sems dang dge slong tshoms dag dang /_/bram ze yang ni tha ma yin/_/ched du brjod pa'i tshoms 
[\[253a.7\]]dgra bcom pa chos skyob kyis bsdus pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA pra b+ha ka ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus nas gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]{D327}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sat+pu ru Sha sU tra/_/bod skad du/_'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[253b.2\]]mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lnga po 'di dag ni skyes bu dam pa'i sbyin pa dag yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 
[\[253b.3\]]skyes bu dam pa ni dad pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin/_gus par byas te rang gi lag pa nas dang /_dus su gzhan dag la mi gnod par sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin no/_/dge slong dag dad pas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba 
[\[253b.4\]]gang zhe na/_dad pas sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin/_nor mang ba dang /_longs spyod che ba yin/_nor gyi yo byad mang ba yin/_bdag dbang ba'i slong che ba yin/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba'i tshogs mang ba yin/_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed 
[\[253b.5\]]pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba yin/_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin te/_dge slong dag dad pas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gus par byas te/_sbyin pa byin pa'i 
[\[253b.6\]]'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/_gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin/_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/bu dang /_chung ma dag dang /_bran 
[\[253b.7\]]dang /_bran mo dang las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang gus par byas par 'gyur ba yin te/_dge slong dag gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag rang gi lag pa nas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/_rang gi lag pa nas sbyin pa byin pas phyug por gyur pa nas/_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen 
[\[254a.2\]]mtshams mang ba yin pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de'i khyim gyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la yang sems 'jug pa yin/_zas kyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang /_theg pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang /_gos kyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang /_mal cha'i longs spyod rgya chen 
[\[254a.3\]]po dag dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya rgya chen po dag la yang sems 'jug pa yin te/_/dge slong dag rang gi lag pa nas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag dus su sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam 
[\[254a.4\]]par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/_dus su sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin pa nas/_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams mang po'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de'i nor dag kyang dus su thob pa dang /_mang zhing 'thun pa mngon du 'byung 
[\[254a.5\]]ba yin te/_dge slong dag dus su sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/_gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin pa 
[\[254a.6\]]nas/_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de'i longs spyod gang dag brtson 'grus brtsams pas thob pa lags/_mthus bsgrubs pa rngul zhing dri ma chags chags su bsgrubs pa/_chos dang ldan pa chos 
[\[254a.7\]]kyis thob pa de dag la yang rgyal po'am/_rkun po'am/_me'am/_chu'am/_mi mdza' ba bgo skal la spyod pa 'am/_gang las kyang bar chad mi 'byung ba yin te/_gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di la 'dod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_/bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas 'di ltar ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dad cing gus par byas te rang gi lag pa nas/_/dus su gnod pa med par mkhas pa sbyin pa byed/_/sbyin pa rgya che ba 
[\[254b.2\]]dang chen po 'dir byin nas/_/kun bged byed pa de ni bzang 'gror 'gro ba yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo rdzogs 
[\[254b.3\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban de bzang skyong gis bsgyur/_ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhu chen bgyis//[ {D328}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_nan+da pra bra dz+yA sU tra/_bod skad du/_dga' 
[\[254b.4\]]bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas kyi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs 
[\[254b.5\]]te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /_rigs kyi bu dga' bos bcom 
[\[254b.6\]]ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[254b.7\]]gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dga' 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dga' bo ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /_dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba yin 
[\[255a.2\]]no/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rab tu sel ba yin no/_/'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_sgyu dang /_g.yo'i mun pas bsdus pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khru ba yin no/_/lo tog thams cad kyi sa gzhi lta 
[\[255a.3\]]bur yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yin no/_/rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no/_/bde ba thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu yin no/_/yon tan thams cad kyi go 'phang gi gnas yin no/_/sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa yin no/_/'byung po thams 
[\[255a.4\]]cad kyi yid brtan pa yin no/_/srog chags thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa yin no/_/sems can dbul po thams cad kyi bum pa bzang po yin no/_/skyabs med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin no/_/kun du tshol bas phongs pa dang sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa 
[\[255a.5\]]rnams kyi bsti sa yin no/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin no/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no/_/thar par 'gro ba rnams kyi lam yin no/_/sems can dag pa rnams kyi bsnyen par 
[\[255a.6\]]bya ba yin no/_/snod du gyur pa rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin no/_/ngan song gi sgo gcod pa yin no/_/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo 'byed pa yin no/_/lha'i 'gro ba rnams kun du 'gengs pa yin no/_/sdug bsngal thams cad kun du gcod pa yin no/_/sred 
[\[255a.7\]]pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te/_dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba'i khyim yin no/_/thar pa'i yang dag par sdom pa yin no/_/mya ngan las 'das pa la bsnyen pa yin no/_/rgyun nye bar gcod pa yin 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]no/_/nyon mongs pa rnams sreg pa yin no/_/phra rgyas rnams 'byin pa yin no/_/lta ba ngan pa'i dra ba rnams 'jig par byed pa yin no/_/bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba yin no/_/bzod pa smra ba sgreng ba yin no/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par byed pa yin no/_/chos 
[\[255b.2\]]kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa yin no/_/nu zho'i rgya mtsho skems pa yin no/_/rus pa'i ri 'jig par byed pa yin no/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba'i mtha' yin no/_/phung po'i khur 'jog pa yin no/_/nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin pa yin no/_/
[\[255b.3\]]khyim gyi gzeb tu bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin no/_/gnod pa'i tshor ba rnams zad par byed pa yin no/_/the tshom rnams dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma brtan por gyur pa rnams gcod pa yin no/_/rga shis 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa yin no/_/
[\[255b.4\]]sdug pa dang bral ba zad par byed pa yin no/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses pa rnams kyi bde ba dang mi 'jigs pa'i 'gram yin no/_/'dod pa'i khams las rgal bar byed pa yin no/_/gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par rgal bar byed pa yin no/_/
[\[255b.5\]]gzugs med pa'i khams las rnam par rgal bar byed pa yin no/_/don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa mchog thob par byed pa yin te/_/dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi mig lta bu yin no/_/gti mug gi mun pa'i sgron 
[\[255b.6\]]ma yin no/_/rgyud dag par byed pa yin no/_/nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/_/lam stor ba rnams la lam kun du ston pa yin no/_/chos thams cad kyi de kho na ston pa yin no/_/mdud pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed pa 
[\[255b.7\]]yin no/_/ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no/_/mi shes pa'i rab rib kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa rnams 'dral bar byed pa yin no/_/le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la rtsom par byed pa yin no/_/tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyo bar byed pa yin no/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams mchog tu dga' ba yin no/_/nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba rnams rab tu dga' ba yin no/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa 
[\[256a.2\]]rnams mchog tu chog shes par byed pa yin no/_/nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms par byed pa rnams kyi mtshon cha yin no/_/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams mchog tu rgyal bar byed pa yin no/_/gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/skyob pa med pa rnams kyi skyob pa yin no/_/
[\[256a.3\]]'jigs pas 'brel pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs par byed pa yin no/_/skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no/_/sdug bsngal rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad yin no/_/'khor ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams 'grol bar byed pa yin te/_dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba 
[\[256a.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/lha dang mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas pa yin no/_/mi'i dbang po rnams kyis mchod pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no/_/khyim gyi gnas yongs su gtong ba yin no/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam 'dren pa yin no/_/skra'i 
[\[256a.5\]]khur 'dreg pa yin no/_/gos ngur smrig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin no/_/rigs pa la brtson pa brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin no/_/'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin no/_/bdud sdig to can rnams kyi grags pa 'joms pa yin no/_/lha dang 
[\[256a.6\]]mi rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin te/_dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu yin na ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /_dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags par bde ba yin na dga' bo gzhan yang dal ba thob 
[\[256a.7\]]pa ni bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni de bas kyang ches rnyed par dka' ba yin no/_/dga' bo thar par 'dod pa rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang /_gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pa rnams kyang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te sa bor nas rab tu byung ngo /_/de bzhin du khyim bdag dang /_bram ze'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang khyim rnams bor nas rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[256b.2\]]pa bdag ni khyim par mchis la sbyin pa dag stsal/_bsod nams dag bgyi zhing /_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing /_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo 
[\[256b.3\]]byad rnams kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis khams gsum pa gang dag yin pa'i 'jig rten gang bar gyur la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[256b.4\]]kyi bu mo dad pa can la las lo brgyar 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na dga' bo de ni rab tu byung bar nges par 'byung ba'i sems kyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/_/
[\[256b.5\]]dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung /_/dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste/_/dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/_/nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig_/dga' bo dper na sa chen po 'di chu gcig pur rgya mtshor gyur la/_de na ru sbal zhar ba gcig kyang yod/_de na gnya' shing bu ga gcig pa 
[\[256b.6\]]gcig kyang rgyu la ru sbal zhar ba de 'di skad du/_gnya' shing gi bu ga der mgrin pa chud par bya'o snyam du sems skye zhing /_gnya' shing bu ga can de yang rlung gis bskyod nas phyogs phyogs su rgyug par byed pa na dga' bo brgya la rkyen zhig gis ru sbal zhar ba de'i mgrin 
[\[256b.7\]]pa gnya' shing gi bu ga der 'jug par 'gyur gyi/_dga' bo mi nyid thob pa ni ma yin no/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin no/_/dga' bo khyod kyis mi nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang /_de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na/_dga' bo khyod 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]kyis rab tu byung /_/dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed/_/dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur na/_/nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig_/dper na 'ga' zhig gis khab kyi mig gnam du bstan te yungs kar gyi 'bru rnams 'thor bar byed na dga' bo brgya la rkyen zhig 
[\[257a.2\]]gis der yungs kar gyi 'bru gang yin pa gcig chud par 'gyur gyi/_dga' bo mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma yin no/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin no/_/dga' bo mi nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang /_de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na/_dga' 
[\[257a.3\]]bo khyod kyis rab tu byung /_/dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed/_/dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/_/nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bskal pa bye ba stong dang ni/_/brgya dang khrag khrig dag tu yang /_/sangs rgyas sgra ni mi thos na/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[257a.4\]]mthong ba ga la zhig_/u dum ba ra'i me tog ni/_/shing las shin tu rnyed dka' ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste/_/khyed kyis nga ni rnyed gyur na/_/dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung /_/dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste/_/dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/_/
[\[257a.5\]]nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig_/de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te/_rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang dag par dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang 
[\[257a.6\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rtsangs de ben dra ra k+Shi tas zhus chen bgyis pa//_//_
[\[257a.7\]{D329}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_de ba tA sU tra/_bod skad du/_lha'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na lha mdog bzang po zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas lha de'i mthus 
[\[257b.2\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe lha des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/mtshon cha rnon po de gang lags/_/ha la ha la'i dug gang lags/_/rab tu 'bar ba'i me gang lags/_/mun pa rab gnag de 
[\[257b.3\]]gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon po yin/_/'dod chags ha la ha la'i dug_/zhe sdang rab tu 'bar ba'i me/_/mun pa rab gnag ma rig pa'o/_/lhas gsol pa/_mi yis zin pa de gang lags/_/gang 
[\[257b.4\]]'dir bor ba de gang lags/_/mi shigs go cha ci zhig lags/_/'di na mtshon du ci rno lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag gis gang byin zin pa yin/_/khyim du gang bzhag 'dir bor yin/_/mi shigs go cha bzod pa yin/_/'di na mtshon 
[\[257b.5\]]du shes rab rno/_/lhas gsol pa/_chom rkun zhes bgyi de gang lags/_/dam pa rnams kyi nor gang lags/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/bslus zhes bgyi ba gang dag lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam rtog chom rkun mkhas pa 
[\[257b.6\]]yin/_/tshul khrims dam pa rnams kyi nor/_/gang dag tshul khrims log lhung byas/_/de dag 'jig rten bslus pa yin/_/lhas gsol pa/_bde zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_/dbang phyug dam pa de gang lags/_/rtag tu rnam par brgyan pa gang /_/mtho btsams 
[\[257b.7\]]gang lags bka' stsal gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dod chung bde bar shes par bya/_/chog shes dbang phyug dam pa yin/_/khrims ldan rtag tu rnam par brgyan/_/tshul khrims nyams pa mtho btsams yin/_/lhas gsol pa/_rtsa 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]lag mnyes gshin de gang lags/_/bsam pa sdang ba'i dgra gang lags/_/sdug bsngal mi bzad de gang lags/_/mchog tu bde ba de gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsa lag mnyes gshin bsod nams yin/_/
[\[258a.2\]]sdig pa bsam pa sdang ba'i dgra/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_/phung po med pa'i bde ba'i mchog_/lhas gsol pa/_sdug la mi phan de gang lags/_/phan yang mi sdug gang zhig lags/_/gnod pa bgyid pa'i nad gang lags/_/sman pa'i 
[\[258a.3\]]mchog gcig de gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dod pa sdug kyang mi phan pa/_/thar pa phan la mi sdug pa/_/'dod chags gnod pa med pa'i nad/_/sman pa'i mchog gcig sangs rgyas yin/_/lhas gsol pa/_gang gis 
[\[258a.4\]]'jig rten 'di bsgribs lags/_/gang gis 'jig rten dbang du bgyis/_/gang gis mdza' bshes 'byed par bgyid/_/gang gis mtho ris mchi mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi shes pas ni 'jig rten bsgribs/_/gti mug gis ni 
[\[258a.5\]]dbang du byas/_/zhen pas mdza' bshes 'byed par byed/_/chags pas mtho ris 'gro mi 'gyur/_/lhas gsol pa/_gang gis mdza' bshes 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gang gis dgra rnams zhi bar bgyid/_/gang gis mtho ris 'thob par bgyid/_/gang gis thar 
[\[258a.6\]]par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtong bas mdza' bshes 'phel bar 'gyur/_/byams pas dgra rnams zhi bar byed/_/tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris thob/_/shes pas thar par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/lhas gsol pa/_rgyal 
[\[258a.7\]]po dang ni chom rkun gyis/_/shin tu bsgrim pa bgyis gyur na/_/skyes pa'am bud med gang gi'ang rung /_/dbrog par mi tshugs ci zhig lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis/_/shin tu bsgrim pa byas gyur kyang /_/skyes 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]pa'am bud med gang gi'ang rung /_/dbrog par mi tshugs tshul khrims so/_/lhas gsol pa/_'jig rten 'di ni gang gis 'ching /_/gang gis 'jig rten rnam par grol/_/gang zhig rnam par spangs pas na/_/mya ngan 'das zhes bgyi bar bgyi/_/bcom ldan 
[\[258b.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dod pas 'jig rten 'ching bar byed/_/'dod pa med pas rnam par grol/_/sred pa rnam par spangs pas na/_/mya ngan 'das zhes brjod pa yin/_/lhas gsol pa/_rlung dmar gyis kyang mi shigs shing /_/zhugs kyis mi 'tshig 
[\[258b.3\]]de ci lags/_/dog sa gtam par bgyid pa yi/_/chab kyis mi 'drul ci zhig lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rlung dmar gyis kyang mi shigs shing /_/mes kyang mi 'tshig bsod nams yin/_/sa rnams khebs par byed pa yi/_/chus 
[\[258b.4\]]kyang mi 'drul bsod nams so/_/lhas gsol pa/_su zhig shin tu bslus gyur nas/_/'jig rten 'di nas pha rol mchis/_/da dung bdag gi dogs pa 'di/_/khyod kyis bsal bar mdzad pa'i rigs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang gis longs 
[\[258b.5\]]spyod yod bzhin du/_/bsod nams bsags pa ma byas pa/_/de ni shin tu bslus gyur nas/_/'jig rten 'di nas pha rol song /_/lhas gsol pa/_'jigs pa kun las 'das gyur cing /_/rgal ba'i 'jig rten mthu ldan pa'i/_/bram ze mya ngan yongs 'das 
[\[258b.6\]]par/_/kye ma bdag gis ring nas mthong /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha de yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rjes su yi rangs te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/lha'i mdo rdzogs so//_//_
[\[258b.7\]{D330}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_alpa de ba tA sU tra/_bod skad du/_lha'i mdo nyung ngu /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas lha zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 
[\[259a.2\]]lha des bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa/_tshul khrims gang lags spyod pa gang /_/yon tan gang lags las gang gis/_/gnas pa ji ltar shes rab gang /_/skye bo gang dag mtho ris mchi/_/lha la thugs brtse nyer bzung nas/_/ston pas de la lung bstan 
[\[259a.3\]]pa/_/skye bo mtho ris gang 'gro ba/_/lha khyod nga la rab tu nyon/_/srog gcod pa las phyir ldog cing /_/khrims bzung yang dag sdom la dga'/_/gang dag 'byung po mi 'tshe ba/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/gang dag ma byin len spong zhing /_/sbyin pa gtong 
[\[259a.4\]]la rtag dga' ste/_/rku ba spong zhing mi rku ba/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad mi 'gro/_/log par g.yem pa rnam par spong /_/bdag gi chung mas chog sems pa/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/gzhan gyi don la rku byed dang /_/bdag gi 
[\[259a.5\]]phyir dang 'jigs pa'i phyir/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig rnams mi smra ba/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/grogs po rtag par 'byed byed pa/_/phra ma'i tshig rnams rab spong zhing /_/gang dag 'dun par rab dga' ba/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/rgyags la rten 
[\[259a.6\]]cing zhe gcod pa/_/tshig rtsub dag ni rnam sbyong zhing /_/'jam po'i tshig tu gang smra ba/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/don med gnas dang ldan pa yi/_/kyal pa'i tshig rnams rab spong zhing /_/gang yang dus su chos smra ba/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/grong ngam 
[\[259a.7\]]'on te dgon pa na/_/gzhan gyis bdag gir byas pa la/_/de la chags sems gang med pa/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/byams pa'i sems kyis mi 'tshe zhing /_/gnod par sems pa med pa yis/_/skye bo kun la mi gnod pa/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]'gro/_/las dang las kyi rnam smin dang /_/gnyi ga la yang gang dad cing /_/yang dag lta ba yang dag 'dzin/_/skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/dge ba'i chos rnams 'di dag ni/_/dkar po'i chos kyi lam bcu ste/_/gang dag yang dag 'dzin 'gyur ba/_/skye bo 
[\[259b.2\]]de dag mtho ris 'gro/_/bram ze mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/dgra dang 'jigs pa kun 'das shing /_/'jig rten chags med rgal ba ni/_/mang po yod par ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha de yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[259b.3\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/lha'i mdo nyung ngu rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D331}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsan+d+ra sU tra/_bod skad du/_zla ba'i mdo/_
[\[259b.4\]]dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa can na 'gro ba po'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'od kyis bkab 
[\[259b.5\]]par gyur to/_/de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de skrag cing dngangs la mi dga' bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[259b.6\]]gcig tu 'dug nas lha des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_kun las rnam par rab grol ba'i/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/_/gnod pa dag dang phrad gyur pa/_/bdag gi skyabs ni mdzad par gsol/_/'jig rten dgra bcom bde gshegs la/_/
[\[259b.7\]]zla ba skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten thugs brtse rnams/_/zla ba thar mdzod sgra gcan las/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sgra gcan zla ba mun sel ba/_/nam mkha' dag la 'od byed cing /_/lam mer 'dug la dkar 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ba dang /_rnam par dag pa'i 'od ldan pa/_/bar snang dag la ma bzung bar/_/skye dgu'i sgron de myur du thong /_/de nas [{]rings [,]ring [}]bzhin sgra gcan de/_/lus kyang rngul cing skrag gyur la/_/nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis/_/zla ba rnam par gtong 
[\[260a.2\]]bar byed/_/de nas rnam par snang byed kyi bu chen pos lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan rings pa bas kyang rings par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor btang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ci yi phyir na sgra gcan khyod/_/lus kyang rngul 
[\[260a.3\]]cing skrag gyur la/_/nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis/_/rings par zla ba gtong bar byed/_/sgra gcan gyis smras pa/_sangs rgyas tshigs bcad 'di brjod pas/_/gal te zla ba ma btang na/_/bdag gi mgo bo tshal bdun 'gas/_/gson yang bde bar mi 'gyur 
[\[260a.4\]]ro/_/rnam par snang byed kyi bu chen pos smras pa/_kye ma bden pa gzigs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba rmad/_/de dag gis ni tshigs su bcad/_/brjod na sgra gcan zla ba gtong /_/zla ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//_
[\[260a.5\]{D332}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_kU TA gAr sU tra/_bod skad du/_khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[260a.6\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[260a.7\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyag dar bgyis pas dge ba'i rtsa ba cir 'gyur lags/_dkyil 'khor bgyis pas cir 'gyur lags/_skyabs su mchi ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyi dge bas ni cir 'gyur 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba'i sug las kyis ni cir 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'khor bar bas par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la bas ma 'tshal ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 
[\[260b.2\]]'gyur ba ni gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bgyis pas ni cir 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo phyag dar byas pa'i phan yon ni lngar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_bdag gi sems 
[\[260b.3\]]dang bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang /_lha rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_mdzes pa'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /_lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig 
[\[260b.4\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byed na de byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing lus zhig nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[260b.5\]]pa'i ched du dkyil 'khor zlum po byed na de nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing lus zhig nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems dang bas dkyil 
[\[260b.6\]]'khor zla gam lta bu byed na de shar gyi lus 'phags gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing lus zhig nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems dang bas dkyil 'khor shing rta'i 
[\[260b.7\]]dbyibs lta bur byed na 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing lus zhig nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_gang chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]'gro zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang mnos nas yongs su srung bar byed na kun dga' bo dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i bsod nams ni dpag tu med cing grangs med par nga smra ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 
[\[261a.2\]]thug pa'i bar du mtha' gzung bar mi nus par nga smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems thugs su chud nas ljags pad ma dmar po'i 'dab ma dri ma med cing lo ma 'jam pa dang /_mtshal dmar po dang /_shing mya ngan 'tshang 
[\[261a.3\]]gi lo ma dang /_zangs kyi glegs ma srab mo dang 'dra la chu zheng gab pas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dbu'i skra mtshams la thug pa'i bar thams cad du brkyang nas kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub 
[\[261a.4\]]po dang /_tshig kyal pa smra ba la lce 'di lta bu mthong ngam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bden pa gsung ba yin no/_/kun dga' bo gang la la thal mo sbyar te/_bcom 
[\[261a.5\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag 'tshal bar byed na sems can de dag ngas yongs su bzung zhing yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa yin no/_/sems can 
[\[261a.6\]]de rnams la ni nga thugs khral chung ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ni shin tu rab tu gnas pa yin no/_/de shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i phyir thal mo sbyar ba yang chud za bar mi 'gyur na sbyin pa la sogs 
[\[261a.7\]]pa byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_kun dga' bo ltos shig_/skyes bu zhig la rang gi gzar bu bkrus pa tsam mam/_phor bu bkrus pa tsam pa 'am/_phru ldog bkrus pa tsam gang yin pa de yang yod la/_gal te de 'di snyam du/_/'di na gnas pa'i srog chags 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]thams cad 'dis bde bar gyur snyam du sems shing stor khung du 'bor bar byed na kun dga' bo 'on kyang bsod nams skye ba'i sgor 'gyur bar nga smra na mir gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_kun dga' bo gsum po 'di dag ni bar gyi bskal pa dag yin no/_/gsum 
[\[261b.2\]]gang zhe na/_mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal pa dang /_nad kyi bar gyi bskal pa dang /_mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa'o/_/kun dga' bo de la gang gis nyi ma gcig cig srog gcod pa spong zhing yang dag par blangs te/_gnas par byed na de mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal par 
[\[261b.3\]]mi skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig gis a ru ra gcig tsam yang dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed na de nad kyi bar gyi bskal par mi skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig gis zas nal tse gang tsam dge 'dun la phul na de mu ge'i bar gyi bskal par mi skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[261b.4\]]kun dga' bo dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag bskyed pa ni 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur bar byed pa yin no/_/gsum po gang dag ce na/_kun dga' bo sangs rgyas la 
[\[261b.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa yin no/_/chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_dge 'dun la bskyed pa ni 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing 
[\[261b.6\]]yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[261b.7\]]gi gling mthong ngam/_kye btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gling ni zheng du ni dpag tshad bdun stong /_chur yang dpag tshad bdun stong ste/_byang gi zhing ni che/_lho'i ni shing rta'i dbyibs so/_/de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi 
[\[262a.2\]]dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang /_gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug_/srog shing khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug_/
[\[262a.3\]]gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/_/sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na kun dga' bo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gling 
[\[262a.4\]]lta zhog gi/_kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling zheng du yang dpag tshad brgyad stong /_chur yang dpag tshad brgyad stong kun nas zla ba gam pa lta bu zhig yod de/_/de rigs kyi bu'am/_de rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun 
[\[262a.5\]]gyis bkang ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang /_gang zhig de 
[\[262a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug_/srog shing khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug_/gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing 
[\[262a.7\]]sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug_/sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na kun dga' bo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gling lta yang zhog_/shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta yang 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]zhog gi/_kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling zheng du dpag tshad dgu stong /_chur yang dpag tshad dgu stong pa kun nas zla ba nya ba lta bu zhig yod de/_de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_rgyun du 
[\[262b.2\]]zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang /_gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[262b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam du byed du 'jug_/srog shing khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug_/gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug 
[\[262b.4\]]la/_sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'dzug par byed na kun dga' bo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gling lta yang zhog_/shar gyi lus 'phags po'i gling lta yang zhog_/nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling 
[\[262b.5\]]lta yang zhog gi/_kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan zhes bya ba'i gling zheng du dpag tshad khri/_chur yang dpag tshad khri pa kun nas gru bzhi pa zhig yod de/_de rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa 
[\[262b.6\]]rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang /_gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[262b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug_/srog shing khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug_/gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/_
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/_kun dga' bo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gling lta yang zhog_/shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta yang zhog_/nub kyi 
[\[263a.2\]]ba lang spyod kyi gling yang lta zhog_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta yang zhog gi/_kun dga' bo lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_
[\[263a.3\]]rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang /_gang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[263a.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug_/srog shing khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug_/gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 
[\[263a.5\]]'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/_sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na kun dga' bo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu rab tu mang bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gling lta yang zhog_/shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta yang zhog_/nub 
[\[263a.6\]]kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta yang zhog_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta yang zhog_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal ba lta yang zhog gi/_kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi 
[\[263a.7\]]bu mo gang la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]bar byed pa dang /_gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug_/srog shing ni khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug_/gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 
[\[263b.2\]]'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/_sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/_kun dga' bo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu rab tu mang bar nga smra'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[263b.3\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa dpag tu med pa/_tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/_bzod pa dpag tu med pa/_brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa/_bsam gtan dpag tu med pa/_shes rab dpag tu med pa/_byams pa nas btang 
[\[263b.4\]]snyoms kyi bar du dpag tu med de/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_
[\[263b.5\]]dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par bstod do/_/khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ra da na ra k+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[263b.6\]{D333}]@#/_/'phags pa gnas 'jog gi mdo zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas drang 
[\[263b.7\]]srong chen po ser skya nyin re zhing rkang pas 'gro la 'chag cing rjes su 'chag pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der ched du song ste/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par bsnyen pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]go/_/bram ze gnas 'jog phyogs gcig tu 'dug par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gnas 'jog khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar skem zhing mdog mi sdug_/ag tsom dang /_skra dang /_sen mo dang /_spu ring zhing 
[\[264a.2\]]lus rtsub la gcom chung ngur smra/_gnas 'jog gis gsol pa/_gau ta ma bdag ni dgung zlar smyung ba bgyid pas 'di ltar skem zhing mdog ngan/_ag tsom dang /_skra dang /_sen mo dang /_spu ring zhing lus rtsub la gcom chung ngur smra ba lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[264a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du drang srong gnas 'jog la smras pa/_gnas 'jog khyod 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas shing cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la yang nan tan gyis sgrub bam/_gnas 'jog gis gsol pa/_kye gau ta ma gang 
[\[264a.4\]]'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas pa dang /_cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la nan tan gyis sgrub pa de cir 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze de ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'dod pa la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/gnas 'jog gis 
[\[264a.5\]]gsol pa/_gau ta ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_gau ta ma ji ltar na 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la bsnyen pas lha dang mi rnams kyi 'dod pa la nye bar spyod par 'gyur/_gnas 'jog rigs kyi 
[\[264a.6\]]bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas par 'dod pas nang par langs nas dge slong ngam/_bram ze'am/_gzhan gang yang rung ba shes pa zhig gi drung du song ste/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas la pus 
[\[264a.7\]]mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba 'di dus 'di nas bzung ste/_gang do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang /_sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spang zhing srog gcod pa las slar log 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]ste/_dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te ngo tsha dang ldan zhing snying rje dang ldan par bgyis la/_sems can dang /_srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog sbur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/_/
[\[264b.2\]]ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar log nas dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/_sems can dang /_srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog sbur yan 
[\[264b.3\]]chad kyi srog gcod pa yang spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du bdag che ge mo yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/_do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang /_sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spang zhing srog gcod pa las slar ldog ste/_dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon 
[\[264b.4\]]cha spangs te/_ngo tsha dang ldan zhing snying rje dang ldan par bgyis la sems can dang /_srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog sbur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa yang spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/_/yan lag dang 
[\[264b.5\]]po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo/_/rjes su sgrub bo/_/rjes su bgyid do/_/ji ltar srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_
[\[264b.6\]]bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas dang /_glu gar dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos nyug pa dang /_rgyan dang /_kha dog 'chang ba dang /_khri stan mthon po dang /_khri stan chen po dang /_dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/_dus ma yin pa'i 
[\[264b.7\]]kha zas las slar ldog par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/_dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar log pa de bzhin du bdag che ge mo yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/_gang do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang /_
[\[265a\]]
